title: 资深前端-远程办公
team: 某大型已上市互联网公司深圳
summary: JavaScript,Node.js,React
summary_chinese: Node.js与BFF建设,SSR与渲染调优,微前端架构设计,React/Vue框架,自动化与K8s容器化,可视化搭建平台建设
summary_english: Node.js & BFF Development,SSR & Rendering Optimization,Micro-frontend Architecture Design,React/Vue Frameworks,Automation & K8s Containerization,Visual Development Platform Construction
description:
资深前端工程师（Nodejs方向）
职位描述
负责构建高可用、⾼性能的前端技术体系，推动复杂业务场景下的技术架构升级。主导渲染服务调优、微前端架构设计、BFF层建设等核⼼⽅向，提升工程效率与系统稳定性，为业务快速迭代提供可靠的技术保障。
岗位职责
渲染服务调优与容灾
-设计并优化服务端渲染（SSR）架构，实现高性能渲染与动态降级策略，保障⾼并发场景下的
服务可用性。
-构建容灾方案（如多级缓存、兜底数据、流量切换），提升系统的鲁棒性。；
微前端架构设计与实施
-主导同构渲染与微前端技术融合，实现多团队协作下的模块解耦与动态集成。
BFF（Backend for Frontend）层建设
-搭建基于Node.js的BFF中间层，聚合异构后端服务，优化前后端协作模式。
-基于后端基础服务API，抽象并封装面向业务的领域服务层，设计高内聚、低耦合的业务模块
工程质量与自动化
-推动代码规范、自动化测试（单元/集成/E2E）、代码扫描工具链落地，确保工程交付质量。
-设计CI/CD流程优化方案，缩短构建部署时间，实现灰度发布、一键回滚等能力。
可视化搭建服务
-参与低代码/可视化搭建平台建设，构建业务服务标准化接口规范，实现前后端协作解耦，提升业务需求迭代效率。
云组件与版本管理
-搭建组件化开发体系，设计多环境云组件动态版本管理方案。
任职要求：
-学历要求：计算机、软件工程等相关专业本科及以上学历；
技术能力：
-深入理解至少一种主流前端框架（React/Vue/Angular）；
-精通Node.js生态（Express/Koa/NestJS），熟悉高并发、性能调优、内存泄漏排查。
-掌握关系型/非关系型数据库设计原则，能独立完成表结构设计、索引优化及慢查询分析。
-熟悉服务端渲染，有渲染服务系统性建设经验，熟悉Nextjs等主流SSR框架
-熟悉BFF层开发，熟悉RESTful/GraphQL接口设计规范，具备网关层设计经验。
-熟练使用Jenkins、GitLab CI等工具，精通Docker/K8s容器化部署。
-具备复杂系统性能优化经验（如Lighthouse调优、CDN加速、资源加载策略）。
经验要求：
-5年以上前端开发经验，3年以上Node.js中大型项目实战经验；
加分项：
-主导过可视化搭建平台、低代码工具的设计与开发。
-有电商、金融等复杂业务系统开发经验，熟悉分布式事务（Saga/TCC）、最终一致性等解决方案。
-有全栈开发经验，熟悉Java/Go/Python等后端语言。
-熟悉云原生技术（AWS/Aliyun），具备Serverless落地经验。

-有全栈开发经验，熟悉Java/Go/Python等后端语言。
-熟悉云原生技术（AWS/Aliyun），具备Serverless落地经验。
description_english:
Senior Frontend Engineer (Node.js Direction)
Job Description
Responsible for building high-availability and high-performance frontend technology systems, driving technical architecture upgrades in complex business scenarios. Lead core directions such as rendering service tuning, micro-frontend architecture design, and BFF layer construction to improve engineering efficiency and system stability, providing reliable technical guarantees for rapid business iteration.
Responsibilities
Rendering Service Optimization and Disaster Recovery
- Design and optimize Server-Side Rendering (SSR) architecture, implementing high-performance rendering and dynamic fallback strategies to ensure service availability in high-concurrency scenarios.
- Build disaster recovery solutions (e.g., multi-level caching, fallback data, traffic switching) to enhance system robustness.;
Micro-frontend Architecture Design and Implementation
- Lead the integration of isomorphic rendering and micro-frontend technology to achieve module decoupling and dynamic integration under multi-team collaboration.
BFF (Backend for Frontend) Layer Construction
- Build a Node.js-based BFF intermediate layer to aggregate heterogeneous backend services and optimize frontend-backend collaboration models.
- Abstract and encapsulate business-oriented domain service layers based on backend basic service APIs, designing highly cohesive and loosely coupled business modules.
Engineering Quality and Automation
- Promote the implementation of code standards, automated testing (Unit/Integration/E2E), and code scanning toolchains to ensure engineering delivery quality.
- Design CI/CD process optimization plans to shorten build and deployment times, enabling capabilities like grayscale releases and one-click rollbacks.
Visual Development Services
- Participate in the construction of low-code/visual building platforms, establish standardized interface specifications for business services, decouple frontend and backend collaboration, and improve business iteration efficiency.
Cloud Components and Version Management
- Build a component-based development system and design dynamic version management solutions for multi-environment cloud components.
Requirements:
- Education: Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related fields;
Technical Skills:
- In-depth understanding of at least one mainstream frontend framework (React/Vue/Angular);
- Proficient in the Node.js ecosystem (Express/Koa/NestJS), familiar with high concurrency, performance tuning, and memory leak troubleshooting.
- Master relational/non-relational database design principles, capable of independent table structure design, index optimization, and slow query analysis.
- Familiar with server-side rendering, with systematic experience in rendering service construction, and familiar with mainstream SSR frameworks like Next.js.
- Familiar with BFF layer development, RESTful/GraphQL interface design standards, and experienced in gateway layer design.
- Proficient in tools like Jenkins and GitLab CI, and expert in Docker/K8s containerized deployment.
- Experience in performance optimization for complex systems (e.g., Lighthouse tuning, CDN acceleration, resource loading strategies).
Experience Requirements:
- Over 5 years of frontend development experience, with over 3 years of hands-on experience in large-scale Node.js projects;
Pluses:
- Led the design and development of visual building platforms or low-code tools.
- Experience in developing complex business systems such as e-commerce or finance, familiar with distributed transactions (Saga/TCC), eventual consistency, and other solutions.
- Full-stack development experience, familiar with backend languages like Java/Go/Python.
- Familiar with cloud-native technologies (AWS/Aliyun) and experienced in Serverless implementation.

title: 前端工程师（WEB3远程）
team: 八部半文化传媒（北京）有限公司
summary_chinese: Vue/React开发,区块链行业,Webpack+npm,ES6+语法特性,区块链/支付背景优先
summary_english: Vue/React Development,Blockchain Industry,Webpack+npm,ES6+ Syntax,Blockchain/Payment Background Preferred
description:
前端工程师
1.教育背景：
‒ 计算机科学与技术、软件工程、信息技术等相关专业本科及以上学历
2.工作经验：
‒ 具有前端开发经验，有完整的 Web 或移动端项目开发经历
‒ 熟悉前端开发框架，如 Vue、React 等，并有实际项⽬应⽤经验
3.技能要求：
‒ 熟练掌握 HTML5、CSS3、JavaScript 等前端基础技术，熟悉 ES6 及以上语法特性
‒ 熟练使⽤前端开发工具和构建工具，如 Webpack、npm 等
‒ 具备良好的代码逻辑和编程习惯，有较强的问题分析和解决能⼒
4.软技能：
‒ 优秀的沟通能力和团队合作精神，能够快速融入团队并高效开展工作
‒ 具有较强的学习能力和钻研精神，对技术有浓厚的兴趣和追求
‒ 熟悉区块链/支付相关知识者优先
欢迎光临，感谢您关注深链财经！
深链财经是一家专注于区块链领域深度报道的媒体，设置了调查报道、人物专访、项目评测等多个专栏，目前已获得了梅花天使、PreAngel、千方基金、Dfund等超过16家顶级基金的投资，估值过亿。

Frontend Engineer
1. Educational Background:
- Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science and Technology, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or related majors

- Familiar with frontend development frameworks such as Vue, React, etc., and have practical project application experience

Welcome, and thank you for your interest in DeepChain Finance!
DeepChain Finance is a media outlet focused on in-depth reporting in the blockchain field. It has established several columns such as investigative reporting, celebrity interviews, and project evaluations. Currently, it has received investment from over 16 top-tier funds including Plum Ventures, PreAngel, Qianshi Fund, and Dfund, with a valuation exceeding 100 million.

title: 资深前端工程师（远程办公）
team: 某大型企业服务公司深圳
summary_chinese: 核心组件开发重构,协同办公行业,React与TypeScript,PWA与WebAssembly,SSO与平台化,自动化测试与CR
summary_english: Core Component Dev & Refactoring,Collaborative Office Industry,React & TypeScript,PWA & WebAssembly,SSO & Platformization,Automation Testing & CR
description:
职位内容：
1. 作为大前端一员参与到公司核心业务组件的重构与开发，包括 Web、客户端和编辑器等；
2. 探索和尝试 PWA, WebAssembly 和 Server Push 等前沿技术提升产品体验；
3. 持续思考提升工程质量的⽅式，如果 TypeScript、Code Review 和⾃动化测试等；
4. 通过实现 SSO、渐进增强、代码复⽤等方式帮助推动石墨⽂档平台化；
5. 分享和推动更科学的项目管理方式，帮助项目更好地成功。
职位要求：
1. 有良好的逻辑思维能力；
2. 具备扎实且与时俱进的 Javascript 基础；
3. 关注前端动态，至少非常熟练使用一种前端框架，包括但不限于：React, Vue, Angular ...；
了解状态管理；
4. 熟练的调试和工程化功底；
5. 有写测试的习惯，且在项目中有过实践经历；
6. 如果你是前端 leader，当然需要具备组建团队和项目管理的能力啦。
加分点
熟悉或了解 React Native ；
GitHub 有 500 以上 star 的前端项目；
了解 Node.js ，有后端开发的经验；
有网页可视化编辑器的开发经验；

title: Web3 前端开发工程师（远程）
team: 某知名企业深圳
summary: CSS,区块链,智能合约,JavaScript,HTML5,接受居家办公,React,前端开发经验
summary_chinese: React架构与组件开发,区块链行业,Next.js + TailwindCSS,Rollup/Gulp 构建优化,Solidity/Rust,敏捷开发环境
summary_english: React Architecture & Component Development,Blockchain Industry,Next.js + TailwindCSS,Rollup/Gulp Build Optimization,Solidity/Rust,Agile Development Environment
description:
Job Responsibilities
1. Solid understanding of frontend web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
2. Proven experience with React.js and state management (e.g., Redux, Context API)
3. Familiarity with TailwindCSS for styling and Next.js for React-based server-side rendering
4. Experience organizing and bundling JavaScript components using Rollup, Gulp, or similar tools
5. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
6. Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, agile development environment
Qualifications
1. Develop and maintain user-facing features using React, TailwindCSS, and Next.js
2. Organize and optimize reusable components and JavaScript SDK libraries for efficient use and performance
3. Use bundlers like Rollup or task runners like Gulp to streamline the development workflow
4. Collaborate with backend developers, designers, and other stakeholders to create seamless user experiences
5. Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Nice to have:
1. Experience with Node.js, Solidity, or Rust
2. Knowledge of Web3 or blockchain-related technologies and development experience
description_chinese:
工作职责
1. 深入理解前端 Web 技术（HTML, CSS, JavaScript）
2. 在 React.js 和状态管理（如 Redux, Context API）方面拥有成熟的经验
3. 熟悉用于样式的 TailwindCSS 和用于基于 React 的服务端渲染的 Next.js
4. 具有使用 Rollup、Gulp 或类似工具组织和打包 JavaScript 组件的经验
5. 强大的问题解决能力和对细节的关注
6. 能够在快速迭代的敏捷开发环境中协作工作

职责任职资格
1. 使用 React、TailwindCSS 和 Next.js 开发和维护面向用户的功能
2. 组织和优化可重用的组件和 JavaScript SDK 库，以提高使用效率和性能
3. 使用 Rollup 等打包工具或 Gulp 等任务运行器来简化开发工作流程
4. 与后端开发人员、设计师和其他利益相关者合作，打造无缝的用户体验
5. 编写整洁、可维护且高效的代码

加分项：
1. 具有 Node.js、Solidity 或 Rust 的经验
2. 了解 Web3 或区块链相关技术并具有开发经验

title: 前端工程师（远程居家办公）
team: 北京瑞升德胜信息咨询服务有限公司
summary_chinese: 钱包与SDK开发,区块链行业,React/Vue+TS,Web3.js/Ethers.js,DApp开发经验,开源项目贡献
summary_english: Wallet & SDK Development,Blockchain Industry,React/Vue+TS,Web3.js/Ethers.js,DApp Development Experience,Open Source Contribution
description:
（远程居家办公）
岗位职责
 1、QKL钱包插件的设计与开发
   • 设计并开发高安全性、用户友好的QKL钱包插件，确保其功能完备且易于使用。
   • 实现钱包与前端应用的⽆缝集成，提供流畅的⽤户体验。
   • 优化插件的性能，确保在不同浏览器和设备上的兼容性。
2、  SDK 的封装与优化
   • 封装现有的  SDK，提⾼其可用性和性能，满足项⽬需求。
   • 优化代码结构，提升 SDK 的响应速度和资源利用效率。
   • 编写详细的开发文档和示例代码，支持团队成员和外部开发者快速上手使用。
 3、技术架构与生态建设
   • 参与 QKL技术架构的整体设计与优化，确保架构的高效性和可扩展性。
   • 制定前端开发的技术标准和最佳实践，提升团队的技术能力和开发效率。
   • 推动 QKL 生态系统的建设
岗位要求
 • 计算机科学或相关领域本科及以上学历。
 • 5年以上前端开发经验，3年以上相关项目经验。
 • 精通 JavaScript、TypeScript 及主流前端框架（如 React、Vue）
 • 熟悉区块链原理及主流区块链平台，具备区块链钱包插件开发、及钱包sdk设计经验
 • 熟悉 Web3.js、Ethers.js 等 Web3 库
 • 具备 DApp 开发经验，理解去中心化应用的架构和安全性要求
 • 优秀的代码编写能力和问题解决能力
 • 良好的团队合作精神和沟通能力
 • 强烈的责任心和自我驱动力，能够在快节奏环境中高效工作
 • 有开放源码项目贡献经验者优先

description_english:
(Remote Work)
Responsibilities
 1. Design and Development of QKL Wallet Plugin
   • Design and develop high-security, user-friendly QKL wallet plugins, ensuring complete functionality and ease of use.
   • Implement seamless integration between the wallet and frontend applications to provide a smooth user experience.
   • Optimize plugin performance to ensure compatibility across different browsers and devices.
 2. SDK Encapsulation and Optimization
   • Encapsulate existing SDKs to improve usability and performance, meeting project requirements.
   • Optimize code structure to improve SDK response speed and resource utilization efficiency.
   • Write detailed development documentation and sample code to support team members and external developers in getting started quickly.
 3. Technical Architecture and Ecosystem Building
   • Participate in the overall design and optimization of QKL technical architecture, ensuring efficiency and scalability.
   • Establish technical standards and best practices for frontend development to enhance team technical capabilities and efficiency.
   • Promote the construction of the QKL ecosystem.
Requirements
 • Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related fields.
 • 5+ years of frontend development experience, with 3+ years of relevant project experience.
 • Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, and mainstream frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Vue).
 • Familiar with blockchain principles and mainstream blockchain platforms; experience in blockchain wallet plugin development and wallet SDK design.
 • Familiar with Web3 libraries such as Web3.js and Ethers.js.
 • Experience in DApp development, understanding the architecture and security requirements of decentralized applications.
 • Excellent coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
 • Good teamwork spirit and communication skills.
 • Strong sense of responsibility and self-motivation, able to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.
 • Experience in open-source project contributions is preferred.

title: 【硅谷AI外企 远程办公】高级后端工程师
team: 北京捷瑞网络技术有限公司
summary: Golang,Java,分布式经验,微服务经验,MySQL,Kafka,架构设计经验,Spring
summary_chinese: 大规模复杂系统开发,汽车金融行业,NodeJS/GraphQL/AWS,架构设计与优化,硅谷外企,跨国轮岗机会
summary_english: Large-scale System Dev,Automotive Finance Industry,NodeJS/GraphQL/AWS,Architecture & Optimization,Silicon Valley Foreign Firm,Global Rotation Opportunity
description:
Jerry.ai 是总部位于硅谷的明星 Ai 汽车金融产品互联网高科技公司。 聚焦万亿级市场，以⽤技术解决问题为准则，以创造真正有价值的产品为驱动⼒，我们为数百万⽤户提供最佳汽车金融产品选购平台。近来，公司完成了新一轮上亿元级别融资, 并被领英列为全美⾼科技新兴公司 50 强,同时荣登福布斯2021 年度最佳新兴雇主排行榜。
加入我们，一起迎接职业生涯爆发黄金时期。
关于我们:
1、全美高科技新兴公司 50 强，福布斯 2021 年度最佳新兴雇主，聚焦万亿级朝阳市场，获得硅谷顶级风投上亿级融资
2、北美最佳Ai汽车金融产品平台，致力打造移动+AI 时代的最优汽车金融产品
3、直击用户痛点，提供绝佳用户体验，APP 业内排名第一，季度营收指数增长
4、国际化多元文化，团队来自全球多个国家， 开放透明平等
5、一群崇尚极客精神，热爱技术的同事（我们的成员来自于：Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, Linkedin, Nvidia, 阿里巴巴, 字节跳动等）
加入我们，您将：
1.感受极客氛围，拥抱前沿创新技术
2.全面参加从用户沟通、需求讨论、产品开发、到上线部署的每个环节，参与一个产品创新和用户高速成长的过程。您不仅仅作为一个终端执行者，而是可以提供作为产品的设计者和规划者参与其中
我们希望你:
1.你热爱挑战复杂的问题，并能产出清晰稳定、可扩展的解决方案。
2.对设计与实施优雅的软件解决方案，你有着真正的热情。
3.你熟知并跟踪最新的开发生态环境，并在选择适当的工具或库时能做出明智的决策。
4.你会在整个产品栈中贡献，并共同监督代码库的完整性。
我们想要你解决的问题:
1.与产品经理、设计师和其他工程师合作，定义技术需求，创建软件架构，并开发软件组件。
2.挖掘软件系统以及开发流程中的问题并提出可靠的解决方案，确保软件系统的稳定性、可扩展性和安全性。
3.参与新功能和自动化开发，编写单元测试、自我测试和质量保证软件，确保工程成果持续高质量交付。
4.日常进行代码审查，始终维持高标准的代码质量，不断优化软件和工具。
5.定期参与产品和工程规格的审查，从商业和技术双重视角为团队提供洞见。
6.不断收集客户及团队反馈，定期根据反馈优化产品。
7.日常积极监控软件错误和警报，确保迅速解决关键问题。
8.创建和维护开发、故障排除和培训文档。
9.理解并朝着公司的目标、战略、哲学以及盈利目标努力。
10.支持并培养初级工程师，营造持续学习和改进的文化氛围。
11.识别并解决软件系统中的性能瓶颈、可扩展性问题和其他潜在难题。
12.日常开发中关注现有代码的审查和优化，如消除重复代码、移除无效代码，以及改进一些不符合最佳实践的代码。
13.理解代码的性能和可扩展性影响。
14.设计和实施大规模复杂系统。
15.识别技术债务并实施解决方案，提升代码质量和可维护性。
16.关注行业动态，不断研究和采纳新技术、工具和最佳实践，提升软件开发效率和有效性。
我们需要你具备:
1.你具备4年以上的全职软件开发经验，本科及以上学历，且专业为计算机科学或相关领域。
2.你对软件开发的基本原理（例如数据结构，算法等）有深厚的了解。
3.你具备现代web的实践经验，了解开源web框架和常用基础设施（包括但不限于 NodeJS / GraphQL / PostgreSQL / Redis / Kubernetes）。
4.你对云端基础设施有比较熟悉的了解和使用经验（包括但不限于 AWS、Azure、阿里云 等）
5.你能理解并运用JavaScript的最佳实践，认识并能使用常用的设计模式，编写符合习惯的JavaScript代码。（擅长其他语言的希望能够具有快速学习的能力）
6.对于代码性能问题，可扩展性以及故障排查，你有深入的了解。
7.面对疑难杂症，你能够建立清晰的排查方案，找到切入点。
8.你热衷于编写有意义的测试，维持全面的测试覆盖。
9.你有设计、分析、调试分布式系统或大型web应用的经验。
加分项目:
对于LLM具有一些了解
对于CICD、devOps具有一些经验
熟练掌握React Native, GraphQL以及Apollo。
有写技术Blog的习惯，活跃于技术社区，参与开源项目等。
Jerry.ai 是总部位于硅谷的明星Ai汽车金融产品互联网高科技公司。 聚焦朝阳行业，以用技术解决问题为准则，以创造真正有价值的产品为驱动力，我们为数百万用户提供一站式汽车金融产品选购平台。近来，公司完成了新一轮上亿元级别融资, 并被评为全美高科技新兴公司50强，同时荣登福布斯列 2021 年度最佳新科技雇主排行榜。我们正在致力于大规模的产研团队扩建，希望寻找喜爱挑战的优秀人才加入我们的团队。

加入我们，您将：
* 感受极客氛围，拥抱前沿创新技术
* 全面参加从用户沟通、需求讨论、产品开发、到上线部署的每个环节，参与一个产品创新和用户高速成长的过程。您不仅仅作为一个终端执行者，而是可以提供作为产品的设计者和规划者参与其中
* 来硅谷总部和加拿大分公司出差和转岗的机会，结识一大群有理想、有热情的战斗伙伴

9.你有设计、分析、调试分布式系统或大型web应用的经验。
加分项目:
对于LLM具有一些了解
对于CICD、devOps具有一些经验
熟练掌握React Native, GraphQL以及Apollo。
有写技术Blog的习惯，活跃于技术社区，参与开源项目等。
Jerry.ai 是总部位于硅谷的明星Ai汽车金融产品互联网高科技公司。 聚焦朝阳行业，以用技术解决问题为准则，以创造真正有价值的产品为驱动力，我们为数百万用户提供一站式汽车金融产品选购平台。近来，公司完成了新一轮上亿元级别融资, 并被评为全美高科技新兴公司50强，同时荣登福布斯列 2021 年度最佳新科技雇主排行榜。我们正在致力于大规模的产研团队扩建，希望寻找喜爱挑战的优秀人才加入我们的团队。

加入我们，您将：
* 感受极客氛围，拥抱前沿创新技术
* 全面参加从用户沟通、需求讨论、产品开发、到上线部署的每个环节，参与一个产品创新和用户高速成长的过程。您不仅仅作为一个终端执行者，而是可以提供作为产品的设计者和规划者参与其中
* 来硅谷总部和加拿大分公司出差和转岗的机会，结识一大群有理想、有热情的战斗伙伴
description_english:
Jerry.ai is a star AI automotive finance internet high-tech company headquartered in Silicon Valley. Focused on a trillion-dollar market, we solve problems through technology and are driven by creating truly valuable products, providing millions of users with the best platform for selecting automotive finance products. Recently, the company completed a new round of funding worth hundreds of millions of RMB and was listed by LinkedIn as one of the top 50 high-tech startups in the US, while also appearing on the Forbes 2021 Best Startup Employers list.
Join us and embrace the golden era of your career explosion.
About Us:
1. Top 50 high-tech startups in the US, Forbes 2021 Best Startup Employer, focused on a trillion-dollar sunrise market, with hundreds of millions in funding from top Silicon Valley venture capital firms.
2. North America's best AI automotive finance product platform, dedicated to building the optimal automotive finance products in the mobile + AI era.
3. Directly addressing user pain points to provide an excellent user experience; the app is ranked number one in the industry, with quarterly revenue growing exponentially.
4. International and multicultural, with a team from multiple countries worldwide, open, transparent, and equal.
5. A group of colleagues who advocate for the geek spirit and love technology (our members come from: Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, Linkedin, Nvidia, Alibaba, ByteDance, etc.)
Joining us, you will:
1. Feel the geek atmosphere and embrace cutting-edge innovative technologies.
2. Participate comprehensively in every stage from user communication, requirement discussion, and product development to launch and deployment, involving yourself in a process of product innovation and rapid user growth. You are not just a terminal executor but can participate as a designer and planner of the product.
We hope you:
1. Love challenging complex problems and can produce clear, stable, and scalable solutions.
2. Have genuine passion for designing and implementing elegant software solutions.
3. Are familiar with and track the latest development ecosystems, making wise decisions when choosing appropriate tools or libraries.
4. Will contribute across the entire product stack and co-supervise the integrity of the codebase.
Problems we want you to solve:
1. Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to define technical requirements, create software architectures, and develop software components.
2. Identify problems in software systems and development processes and propose reliable solutions to ensure the stability, scalability, and security of the software system.
3. Participate in the development of new features and automation, writing unit tests, self-tests, and quality assurance software to ensure the continuous high-quality delivery of engineering results.
4. Conduct daily code reviews, consistently maintain high standards of code quality, and continuously optimize software and tools.
5. Regularly participate in the review of product and engineering specifications, providing insights for the team from both business and technical perspectives.
6. Continuously gather feedback from customers and the team, and regularly optimize products based on feedback.
7. Actively monitor software errors and alerts daily to ensure swift resolution of critical issues.
8. Create and maintain documentation for development, troubleshooting, and training.
9. Understand and work towards the company's goals, strategies, philosophies, and profitability targets.
10. Support and mentor junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
11. Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, scalability issues, and other potential challenges in software systems.
12. Focus on reviewing and optimizing existing code in daily development, such as eliminating duplicate code, removing dead code, and improving code that does not follow best practices.
13. Understand the performance and scalability impacts of code.
14. Design and implement large-scale complex systems.
15. Identify technical debt and implement solutions to improve code quality and maintainability.
16. Follow industry trends, continuously research and adopt new technologies, tools, and best practices to improve software development efficiency and effectiveness.
We need you to have:
1. Over 4 years of full-time software development experience, a bachelor's degree or above, and a major in Computer Science or a related field.
2. A deep understanding of software development fundamentals (e.g., data structures, algorithms, etc.).
3. Practical experience with modern web practices, knowledge of open-source web frameworks, and common infrastructure (including but not limited to NodeJS / GraphQL / PostgreSQL / Redis / Kubernetes).
4. Familiarity and usage experience with cloud infrastructure (including but not limited to AWS, Azure, Alibaba Cloud, etc.).
5. The ability to understand and apply JavaScript best practices, recognize and use common design patterns, and write idiomatic JavaScript code. (Those proficient in other languages should have the ability to learn quickly.)
6. A deep understanding of code performance issues, scalability, and troubleshooting.
7. The ability to establish clear troubleshooting plans and find entry points when faced with difficult issues.
8. A passion for writing meaningful tests and maintaining comprehensive test coverage.
9. Experience in designing, analyzing, and debugging distributed systems or large-scale web applications.
Bonus Points:
Some understanding of LLMs.
Experience with CICD and DevOps.
Proficiency in React Native, GraphQL, and Apollo.
A habit of writing technical blogs, being active in technical communities, participating in open-source projects, etc.
Jerry.ai is a star AI automotive finance internet high-tech company headquartered in Silicon Valley. Focused on a sunrise industry, solving problems through technology, and driven by creating truly valuable products, we provide millions of users with a one-stop platform for selecting automotive finance products. Recently, the company completed a new round of funding worth hundreds of millions of RMB and was rated as one of the top 50 high-tech startups in the US, while also appearing on the Forbes 2021 Best New Tech Employers list. We are currently dedicated to a large-scale expansion of our R&D team and are looking for exceptional talent who love challenges to join our team.

Joining us, you will:
* Feel the geek atmosphere and embrace cutting-edge innovative technologies.
* Participate comprehensively in every stage from user communication, requirement discussion, and product development to launch and deployment, involving yourself in a process of product innovation and rapid user growth. You are not just a terminal executor but can participate as a designer and planner of the product.
* Opportunities for business trips and transfers to the Silicon Valley headquarters and Canada branch, meeting a large group of idealistic and passionate partners.

title: 【远程办公】高级后端开发工程师
team: 合肥果速科技有限公司
summary: Golang,高并发,dex,web3,defi
summary_chinese: 区块链数据索引,区块链行业,精通Go语言,DeFi流动性池,实时交易路由,高性能数据处理
summary_english: Blockchain Data Indexing,Blockchain Industry,Expert in Go,DeFi Liquidity Pools,Real-time Trade Routing,High-performance Data Processing
description:
主要职责
- 构建实时区块链数据索引系统，监控EVM Chain每个区块的流动性变化
- 设计并实现多DEX流动性池状态跟踪，实时计算最优交易路径
- 开发高性能的数据处理流水线，处理链上事件、交易和状态变化
- 构建路由计算引擎，基于实时流动性数据生成最优交易报价
- 优化数据存储和查询性能，使用Redis缓存热点数据，降低API延迟
- 设计并实现实时价格预言机，支持动态滑点计算和风险评估
- 开发监控和告警系统，确保数据索引的准确性和实时性
任职要求
- 4-6年后端开发经验，必须精通Go语言
- 丰富的区块链数据处理经验，熟悉技术栈和节点API
- 熟悉算法设计和性能优化，有图算法、路径查找或交易路由经验者优先
- 熟悉分布式系统设计，有高并发、低延迟系统开发经验
- 精通数据库技术（PostgreSQL, MySQL）和缓存系统（Redis）
- 有DeFi数据索引、交易策略或量化系统开发经验者优先
- 熟悉DEX流动性池机制，能够处理复杂的金融数据计算
-计算机科学、数学或相关专业本科以上学历

description_english:
Main Responsibilities
- Build real-time blockchain data indexing systems to monitor liquidity changes in every EVM Chain block
- Design and implement state tracking for multiple DEX liquidity pools, calculating optimal trading paths in real-time
- Develop high-performance data processing pipelines to handle on-chain events, transactions, and state changes
- Build a routing calculation engine to generate optimal trade quotes based on real-time liquidity data
- Optimize data storage and query performance, using Redis to cache hot data and reduce API latency
- Design and implement real-time price oracles supporting dynamic slippage calculation and risk assessment
- Develop monitoring and alerting systems to ensure the accuracy and real-time nature of data indexing

Requirements
- 4-6 years of backend development experience, must be proficient in Go
- Extensive experience in blockchain data processing, familiar with the technology stack and node APIs
- Familiar with algorithm design and performance optimization; experience with graph algorithms, pathfinding, or trade routing is preferred
- Familiar with distributed system design, with experience in high-concurrency, low-latency system development
- Proficient in database technologies (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and caching systems (Redis)
- Experience in DeFi data indexing, trading strategies, or quantitative system development is preferred
- Familiar with DEX liquidity pool mechanisms, capable of handling complex financial data calculations
- Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related field

team: 某知名互联网公司深圳
summary: 远程办公,JavaScript,性能优化,小程序,前端开发经验,架构师经验
summary_chinese: 前端类库框架开发,区块链行业,React与Vue底层,NodeJS与SSR技术,前端构建工具优化,开源项目贡献者

description:
岗位职责
1.设计并构建支持复杂 Web 应用的类库与框架，提升开发效率并改进代码质量；
2.定义并落地架构标准与最佳实践；
3.对 Web 应用进行优化，以最⼤化提升运⾏速度与扩展能⼒。
任职要求
1.精通 JavaScript 与 NodeJS，具备 4 年及以上 JavaScript 框架与类库的设计及落地经验；
2.深入理解主流 UI 渲染框架（如 React、Vue）的底层实现机制；
3.精通以下任一领域（掌握领域越多越好），且有可追溯的实践成果：
--开发⽤于提升前端开发效率与质量的工具集，深入理解 esbuild、Webpack、Parcel、Vite 等构建工具；
--精通特定领域语言（DSL）的编译器与运行时编写及优化；
--精通服务端 NodeJS 框架开发与服务端渲染（SSR）技术；
具备扎实的实际编码能力。
优先考虑条件
1.拥有活跃的 Github/NPM 项目作品集；
2.曾担任热门开源项目的核心开发者；
3.深入研读过多款主流前端框架或类库的源码（熟悉每一行代码）；
4.具备 “一专多能” 的技术能力，精通多种编程语言。

必需满足以下任职条件：
1、 要专科以上学历，物联网、应用电子、电子信息，电气自动化专业；
2、 具有良好的语言表达能力和沟通技巧，能独立解决售后问题，具有较强学习能力，开放的求知心态；
3、需要熟悉使用World/Exce/PPTl等办公软件，
4，必须居住龙岗区，工作日可以随时向应，特殊情况到公司办公，
工作职责：
1、线上负责客户技术对接、产品使用培训、故障分析和排除；
2、线上面向客户的技术交流和需求引导，进行售前项目分析、设计和规划，促进销售目标达成；
3、项目技术支持，远程指导协助安装调试，交付培训和资料准备
深圳市佳佳眼科技有限公司，成立于2014年,致力于物联网环境监测设备的研制，是一家集研发、生产、销售、服务于一体的高新技术企业。

深圳市佳佳眼科技有限公司专注物联网环境监测设备八年以来，只为社会提供质量过硬的拳头产品。主要产品有PM2.5大气监测，城市积水内涝监测，水库，河流水位，雨量监测，水电站生态流量监测，产品在多个政府项目中得到应用。
公司网站www.jjyip.com

title: 测试开发工程师-可远程办公
team: 某小型人工智能公司上海
summary: Java,Python,Go,Shell,嵌入式技术,消息队列
summary_chinese: 自动化测试框架与工具,嵌入式AI智能硬件,全栈SaaS与App测试,Playwright与Pytest,CI/CD流水线建设,移动端与Web端自动化
summary_english: Automation Testing Frameworks & Tools,Embedded AI Hardware,Full-stack SaaS & App Testing,Playwright & Pytest,CI/CD Pipeline Construction,Mobile & Web Automation
description:
岗位职责：
负责公司全栈产品线（嵌入式 AI 智能硬件、SaaS 平台、移动端 App）的体系建设，包括功能测试、集成测试、E2E 测试等；
设计并开发框架与工具链，实现嵌入式端、云端服务、移动 App 的统一测试能⼒；
开发稳定可靠的 UI 脚本，覆盖 Web 端和移动端（Android / iOS）的核⼼场景；
与后端、嵌⼊式、移动端研发协作，深入理解各系统的业务逻辑，制定测试方案、测试数据与测试⽤例；
建设持续集成 / 持续交付（CI/CD）中的测试流水线，推动在 PR、夜间构建、版本回归中全面落地；
搭建和维护测试环境，包括云端测试环境、嵌入式设备池、模拟数据环境等；
参与线上问题的定位与复现，结合日志、监控、链路追踪等手段，提高问题排查效率；
推动测试质量指标体系建设（覆盖率、稳定性、耗时等），形成可量化的质量反馈与改进建议；
持续优化测试过程与工具，提升系统整体稳定性和交付质量。
任职要求：
本科及以上学历，计算机、软件工程等相关专业，2 年以上测试开发/SDET/经验；
熟练掌握至少一种后端开发语言（Python/Go/Java），具备编写测试工具的工程能力；
熟悉常用框架：
Web/UI：Playwright / Selenium / Appium
接口测试：pytest / unittest / Postman / JMeter 等；
熟悉 Linux 环境及基础 Shell 脚本能力，能在服务器与嵌入式设备上进行调试；
熟悉 CI/CD 工具（Jenkins / GitLab CI / GitHub Actions），能独立设计测试流水线；
了解微服务体系结构，理解 API、消息队列、数据库等基础服务的测试要点；
具备良好的逻辑分析能力、沟通协调能力，能推动跨团队质量协作；
热爱质量体系建设，对提高整体研发效率有强烈的热情。

title: Perp DEX 运营与市场主管-远程办公
title_chinese: Perp DEX 运营与市场主管
title_english: Perp DEX Operations and Marketing Lead
team: 某大型已上市互联网公司上海
summary: 策划社区活动,英语可作为工作语言,财经
summary_chinese: 平台用户增长与品牌建设,区块链行业,Perp DEX/CEX运营,社区与社媒营销,交易竞赛与激励策划,跨国团队管理经验,英语流利/多语种
summary_english: Platform User Growth & Branding,Blockchain Industry,Perp DEX/CEX Operations,Community & Social Media Marketing,Trading Competitions & Incentives,International Team Management,Fluent English/Multilingual
description:
-岗位定位
负责制定并执行平台的市场与运营策略，深度结合交易产品特性，通过事件营销、社区建设与品牌传播，推动平台的用户增长、交易活跃度与全球品牌影响力。
-核心职责
1. 社区与社媒深耕
负责平台在 Twitter、Discord、Telegram 等社媒的品牌调性与内容策略；
输出月度社媒增长计划与数据复盘报告，持续优化增长路径；
通过数据分析（GA、Dune、内部 BI）驱动增长决策。
2. 事件营销与热点联动
具备对行业热点、宏观事件、话题趋势的快速捕捉与反应能力；
能基于市场动态、链上数据、行业情绪策划病毒式传播活动；
主导事件级营销 Campaign，从创意到执行全流程负责（内容策划、素材制作、KOL传播、战报复盘）。
3. 交易类活动策划与增长
能独立设计并执行交易竞赛、空投、激励计划、交易积分赛、Referral 竞赛等；
结合交易深度与 TVL、OI 等核心指标设定激励规则；
协调 BD、产品、数据团队执行活动，确保用户转化和 ROI 最优化。
4. 团队管理与跨部门协作
统筹市场、设计、内容与社区运营团队；
协调产品与 BD 部门，确保活动与产品节奏同步。
-任职要求
1.3年以上 交易平台运营经验，熟悉 Perp DEX 或 CEX 业务逻辑；
2.具备优秀的事件洞察、活动策划、内容创意与传播执行能力；
3.数据敏感度高，能用指标驱动增长；
4.有强执行力、责任感和抗压能力。
-加分项
1.参与过头部交易平台或 DeFi 项目的社区和运营建设或搭建
2.英语流利，会 日语/韩语 者优先； 
3.自身为 Perp DEX 资深用户或 KOL，具备内容传播力与行业影响力；
4.对交易机制、撮合逻辑、杠杆管理、资金费率等有深入理解；
5.熟悉链上用户画像分析、增长漏斗设计与用户生命周期管理；
6.有 跨国团队管理经验 或 大型社区运营经验。

title: 新媒体运营专员 远程居家办公
team: 领研（天津）文化传播有限公司
summary_chinese: 全平台内容增长,教育行业,小红书抖音运营,私域引流与转化,SEO与算法优化,3年+教育行业经验,知识IP打造
summary_english: Full-Platform Content Growth,Education Industry,Xiaohongshu & Douyin Operations,Private Domain Traffic & Conversion,SEO & Algorithm Optimization,3+ Years Education Industry Exp,Knowledge IP Creation
description:
新媒体运营专家岗位JD
一、岗位职责
1.全平台运营
负责小红书、抖音、公众号等社交媒体平台的整体运营策略，主导账号体系搭建、内容矩阵规划及品牌声量提升，对粉丝增长、精准用户沉淀及平台影响⼒负责；
基于各平台调性与⽤户⼼智，制定差异化的内容策略，打造具有辨识度的账号风格与高价值内容闭环。
2.自然流量增长与优化
深度运⽤SEO策略（关键词挖掘、搜索排名优化）、平台算法机制及用户心理学，系统性提升账号自然流量占比，降低获客成本；
通过内容联动、异业合作、活动策划等形式拓展流量渠道，构建可持续的自然增长模型。
3.私域引流与转化路径设计
设计高效引流-沉淀-转化路径，将公域流量沉淀至企业微信、社群等私域阵地，并跟踪线索转化全链路数据；
协同销售团队优化转化策略，推动流量有效转化为咨询与成交，直接贡献业务增长。
4.数据驱动运营迭代
建立日常数据监控体系，定期输出多维复盘报告，通过数据洞察持续优化内容选题、呈现形式、发布节奏等；
关注平台规则与行业动向，快速调整运营动作，保障账号健康度与合规竞争力。
5.行业研究与策略创新
深度了解教育行业趋势、竞品动态及用户需求变化，迭代运营方法论，探索创新增长点。
二、任职要求
1.3年以上新媒体跨平台运营经验，3年以上教育行业（或高净值客户类）实战背景，有从0到1打造万粉以上账号案例者优先；
2.熟悉高端教育/咨询类产品流量运营逻辑，对长决策周期用户转化有深入理解。
3.精通主流社交媒体平台（小红书、微信、抖音等）运营机制，具备全链条操作能力：内容策划、文案撰写、视觉排版、数据分析、后台工具运用；
4.具备出色的内容感知与原创能力，能产出高信息密度、高共鸣感的文案与选题，擅长知识IP化打造。
5.拥有系统的自然流量增长策略，熟练掌握SEO优化、用户心理引导、内容裂变等手法，追求长期健康的流量结构；
6.能独立设计并实施增长实验，通过A/B测试等手段持续提升关键指标。
7.强数据思维，熟练运用平台数据分析工具指导决策；
8.具备优秀的跨团队协同能力，能有效联动市场、销售团队推动业务目标达成。
9.对教育行业有热情，具备敏锐的市场洞察力和结果导向思维；
10.逻辑清晰、学习能力强，能在快速变化的环境中保持策略定力和执行力。
薪资：底薪+绩效+提成 区间10-20k
公司介绍
领研教育集团全资子公司，总部位于北京市，目前业务范围涵盖考博教育、考研教育、学术科研服务等。为适应时代的变化，致吾辈教育立志应用新时代的技术和理念，打造教育服务、教育学习、教育资源整合以及教育平台综合体。
现在与多个高等院校以及教学服务平台达成友好合作关系。
下属子公司2家，在上海市设立5个直营校区，累计服务学员超过1万名。获得学员广泛好评以及信任。在市场竞争日益激烈的今天，致吾辈始终坚持“客户第一”的服务以及教学理念。着力打造让客户满意的产品服务和教学体系!

通过内容联动、异业合作、活动策划等形式拓展流量渠道，构建可持续的自然增长模型。
3.私域引流与转化路径设计
设计高效引流-沉淀-转化路径，将公域流量沉淀至企业微信、社群等私域阵地，并跟踪线索转化全链路数据；
协同销售团队优化转化策略，推动流量有效转化为咨询与成交，直接贡献业务增长。
4.数据驱动运营迭代
建立日常数据监控体系，定期输出多维复盘报告，通过数据洞察持续优化内容选题、呈现形式、发布节奏等；
关注平台规则与行业动向，快速调整运营动作，保障账号健康度与合规竞争力。
5.行业研究与策略创新
深度了解教育行业趋势、竞品动态及用户需求变化，迭代运营方法论，探索创新增长点。
二、任职要求
1.3年以上新媒体跨平台运营经验，3年以上教育行业（或高净值客户类）实战背景，有从0到1打造万粉以上账号案例者优先；
2.熟悉高端教育/咨询类产品流量运营逻辑，对长决策周期用户转化有深入理解。
3.精通主流社交媒体平台（小红书、微信、抖音等）运营机制，具备全链条操作能力：内容策划、文案撰写、视觉排版、数据分析、后台工具运用；
4.具备出色的内容感知与原创能力，能产出高信息密度、高共鸣感的文案与选题，擅长知识IP化打造。
5.拥有系统的自然流量增长策略，熟练掌握SEO优化、用户心理引导、内容裂变等手法，追求长期健康的流量结构；
6.能独立设计并实施增长实验，通过A/B测试等手段持续提升关键指标。
7.强数据思维，熟练运用平台数据分析工具指导决策；
8.具备优秀的跨团队协同能力，能有效联动市场、销售团队推动业务目标达成。
9.对教育行业有热情，具备敏锐的市场洞察力和结果导向思维；
10.逻辑清晰、学习能力强，能在快速变化的环境中保持策略定力和执行力。
薪资：底薪+绩效+提成 区间10-20k
公司介绍
领研教育集团全资子公司，总部位于北京市，目前业务范围涵盖考博教育、考研教育、学术科研服务等。为适应时代的变化，致吾辈教育立志应用新时代的技术和理念，打造教育服务、教育学习、教育资源整合以及教育平台综合体。
现在与多个高等院校以及教学服务平台达成友好合作关系。
下属子公司2家，在上海市设立5个直营校区，累计服务学员超过1万名。获得学员广泛好评以及信任。在市场竞争日益激烈的今天，致吾辈始终坚持“客户第一”的服务以及教学理念。着力打造让客户满意的产品服务和教学体系!
description_english:
New Media Operations Expert Job Description
I. Job Responsibilities
1. Full-Platform Operations
Responsible for the overall operation strategy of social media platforms such as Xiaohongshu, Douyin, and WeChat Official Accounts; lead the establishment of account systems, content matrix planning, and brand voice enhancement; responsible for follower growth, precise user accumulation, and platform influence.
Formulate differentiated content strategies based on the tone of each platform and user mentality to create a recognizable account style and a high-value content closed loop.
2. Organic Traffic Growth and Optimization
Deeply apply SEO strategies (keyword mining, search ranking optimization), platform algorithm mechanisms, and user psychology to systematically increase the proportion of organic traffic and reduce customer acquisition costs.
Expand traffic channels through content synergy, cross-industry cooperation, and activity planning to build a sustainable organic growth model.
3. Private Domain Traffic Acquisition and Conversion Path Design
Design efficient acquisition-retention-conversion paths to move public domain traffic to private domains such as Enterprise WeChat and communities, and track the full-link data of lead conversion.
Collaborate with the sales team to optimize conversion strategies, drive the effective conversion of traffic into consultations and transactions, and directly contribute to business growth.
4. Data-Driven Operational Iteration
Establish a daily data monitoring system and regularly output multi-dimensional review reports; continuously optimize content topics, presentation formats, and publishing rhythms through data insights.
Stay updated on platform rules and industry trends, quickly adjust operational actions, and ensure account health and compliant competitiveness.
5. Industry Research and Strategy Innovation
Deeply understand education industry trends, competitor dynamics, and changes in user needs; iterate operational methodologies and explore innovative growth points.
II. Job Requirements
1. 3+ years of experience in cross-platform new media operations, 3+ years of practical background in the education industry (or high-net-worth customer category); candidates with cases of building accounts with 10k+ followers from scratch are preferred.
2. Familiar with the traffic operation logic of high-end education/consulting products; deep understanding of user conversion for long decision-making cycles.
3. Proficient in the operation mechanisms of mainstream social media platforms (Xiaohongshu, WeChat, Douyin, etc.), with full-chain operational capabilities: content planning, copywriting, visual layout, data analysis, and use of backend tools.
4. Excellent content perception and originality; capable of producing high-density, highly resonant copy and topics; skilled in creating knowledge-based IPs.
5. Possess systematic organic traffic growth strategies; proficient in SEO optimization, user psychology guidance, content fission, and other techniques; pursue a long-term healthy traffic structure.
6. Able to independently design and implement growth experiments; continuously improve key indicators through A/B testing and other means.
7. Strong data-driven mindset; proficient in using platform data analysis tools to guide decision-making.
8. Excellent cross-team collaboration skills; able to effectively coordinate with marketing and sales teams to drive business goals.
9. Passionate about the education industry, with keen market insight and result-oriented thinking.
10. Clear logic and strong learning ability; able to maintain strategic focus and execution in a fast-changing environment.
Salary: Base salary + performance + commission, range 10-20k.
Company Introduction
A wholly-owned subsidiary of Lingyan Education Group, headquartered in Beijing. The current business scope covers doctoral entrance exam education, postgraduate entrance exam education, academic research services, etc. To adapt to the changes of the times, Zhiwubei Education is determined to apply new-era technologies and concepts to create an integration of educational services, learning, resource integration, and educational platforms.
Currently, it has established friendly cooperative relations with multiple higher education institutions and teaching service platforms.
It has 2 subsidiaries and has established 5 direct-operated campuses in Shanghai, serving over 10,000 students in total. It has received widespread praise and trust from students. In today's increasingly competitive market, Zhiwubei always adheres to the "Customer First" service and teaching philosophy, striving to create product services and teaching systems that satisfy customers!

   业务背景：直播电商、供应链系统的高稳定性和高可用性，持续优化系统性能和用户体验。

title: 财务主管（可远程办公）
team: 某小型人工智能公司上海
summary_chinese: 智能硬件成本核算,智能硬件行业,委外加工财务管理,全流程税务合规,预算编制与P&L分析,3年制造业财务经验
summary_english: Smart Hardware Cost Accounting,Smart Hardware Industry,Outsourced Manufacturing Financial Management,Full-process Tax Compliance,Budgeting and P&L Analysis,3 Years Manufacturing Finance Experience
description:
财务主管（可远程办公）岗位职责>建立、维护并持续优化适用于委托加工模式的智能硬件产品成本核算体系。精确核算产品成本、标准成本与实际成本差异分析，识别降本增效机会。管理与代工⼚的财务结算流程，包括加⼯费核算、对账、付款审核及成本分摊确认。建⽴并完善委托加工模式下的库存（原材料、在制品、产成品）财务管控流程。深入理解硬件⽣产流程（委托加工模式），为生产计划、产能规划、效率提升提供财务视角的分析和建议。精通委托加工模式下的税务处理（增值税、加工费进项管理等）及供应链税负优化，负责软/硬件全流程税务合规与风险管控，并主导研发/生产相关税收优惠的申请与落地，确保税负最优。监控生产相关预算执行情况，进行关键运营指标（如生产良率）的财务影响分析。主导各产品线的年度预算编制、滚动预测更新。定期生成各业务线财务报告（P&L等），深入分析业务表现、成本趋势及盈利能力，向管理层提供洞察和建议。建立健全相关领域的财务内部控制制度，确保合规并有效管理风险。与供应链管理、研发、营销等部门紧密合作，提供专业的财务支持与解决方案。
任职要求>本科及以上学历，财务、会计、金融或相关专业。具备初级会计师、管理会计师等职称。3年以上制造业财务工作经验。熟悉委外生产模式下成本构成、对账流程及风险点。精通主流ERP系统中的财务模块（特别是成本、库存、采购等模块）。优先考虑>有参与新产品导入（NPI）财务评估经验。有国际业务（涉及进出口、外汇）财务处理经验。熟悉国际会计准则（IFRS）和中国会计准则（CAS）。
description_chinese:
财务主管（可远程办公）
岗位职责>建立、维护并持续优化适用于委托加工模式的智能硬件产品成本核算体系。精确核算产品成本、标准成本与实际成本差异分析，识别降本增效机会。管理与代工厂的财务结算流程，包括加工费核算、对账、付款审核及成本分摊确认。建立并完善委托加工模式下的库存（原材料、在制品、产成品）财务管控流程。深入理解硬件生产流程（委托加工模式），为生产计划、产能规划、效率提升提供财务视角的分析 and 建议。精通委托加工模式下的税务处理（增值税、加工费进项管理等）及供应链税负优化，负责软/硬件全流程税务合规与风险管控，并主导研发/生产相关税收优惠的申请与落地，确保税负最优。监控生产相关预算执行情况，进行关键运营指标（如生产良率）的财务影响分析。主导各产品线的年度预算编制、滚动预测更新。定期生成各业务线财务报告（P&L等），深入分析业务表现、成本趋势及盈利能力，向管理层提供洞察和建议。建立健全相关领域的财务内部控制制度，确保合规并有效管理风险与供应链管理、研发、营销等部门紧密合作，提供专业的财务支持与解决方案。
任职要求>本科及以上学历，财务、会计、金融或相关专业。具备初级会计师、管理会计师等职称。3年以上制造业财务工作经验。熟悉委外生产模式下成本构成、对账流程及风险点。精通主流ERP系统中的财务模块（特别是成本、库存、采购等模块）。
优先考虑>有参与新产品导入（NPI）财务评估经验。有国际业务（涉及进出口、外汇）财务处理经验。熟悉国际会计准则（IFRS）和中国会计准则（CAS）。
description_english:
Finance Supervisor (Remote work supported)
Responsibilities>Establish, maintain, and continuously optimize the cost accounting system for smart hardware products applicable to the outsourced manufacturing model. Accurately calculate product costs, analyze variances between standard and actual costs, and identify opportunities for cost reduction and efficiency improvement. Manage the financial settlement process with contract manufacturers, including processing fee calculations, reconciliation, payment auditing, and cost allocation confirmation. Establish and improve financial control processes for inventory (raw materials, work-in-progress, finished goods) under the outsourced manufacturing model. Deeply understand hardware production processes (outsourced model) to provide financial analysis and recommendations for production planning, capacity planning, and efficiency improvement. Proficient in tax processing under the outsourced manufacturing model (VAT, input tax management for processing fees, etc.) and supply chain tax optimization; responsible for full-process tax compliance and risk control for software/hardware, and lead the application and implementation of R&D/production-related tax incentives to ensure optimal tax burden. Monitor production-related budget execution and conduct financial impact analysis of key operational indicators (such as production yield). Lead annual budget preparation and rolling forecast updates for each product line. Regularly generate financial reports for each business line (P&L, etc.), deeply analyze business performance, cost trends, and profitability, and provide insights and recommendations to management. Establish and improve financial internal control systems in relevant areas to ensure compliance and effective risk management. Work closely with supply chain management, R&D, marketing, and other departments to provide professional financial support and solutions.
Requirements>Bachelor's degree or above in finance, accounting, finance, or related fields. Hold professional titles such as Junior Accountant or Management Accountant. More than 3 years of experience in manufacturing finance. Familiar with cost structures, reconciliation processes, and risk points under the outsourced production model. Proficient in financial modules of mainstream ERP systems (especially cost, inventory, procurement modules, etc.).
Preferred>Experience in financial evaluation for New Product Introduction (NPI). Experience in financial processing for international business (involving import/export, foreign exchange). Familiar with International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) and Chinese Accounting Standards (CAS).

通过构建快速、高质量的前端应用程序,塑造 未来。作为我们团队的关键成员,您将设计和开发核心功能,以创造平滑⾼效的⽤户体验。您将与产品、设计和区块链团队密切合作,从头到尾实现创意。

 与产品、设计和区块链团队密切合作,提供出色的用户体验

 精通 JavaScript、TypeScript、React 生态系统
 对 Web 性能优化和最佳实践有深入的理解
 具备 、Ethers.js 的经验,并了解  原理(钱包、智能合约)

description_english:
About this Role
Shape the future by building fast, high-quality frontend applications. As a key member of our team, you will design and develop core features to create a smooth and efficient user experience. You will work closely with product, design, and blockchain teams to bring ideas to life from start to finish.

Core Responsibilities
- Architect, develop, and maintain high-performance, responsive Web applications using modern frontend technologies
- Work closely with product, design, and blockchain teams to deliver an exceptional user experience
- Build pixel-perfect UI components from Figma models and design assets
- Debug and troubleshoot issues across the entire Web stack

Qualifications
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent experience
- 3+ years of frontend development experience, with at least 1 year in the DeFi space
- Proficient in the JavaScript, TypeScript, and React ecosystems
- Deep understanding of Web performance optimization and best practices
- Experience with Ethers.js and understanding of Web3 principles (wallets, smart contracts)

Soft Skills:
- Basic English verbal and written communication skills
- Strong collaboration skills within a remote cross-functional team
- Ownership mindset - "You build it, you run it"
- Detail-oriented problem-solving skills
- Quick learner in a fast-paced environment

title: 前端架构（远程办公）
team: 某中型互联网公司深圳
summary: JavaScript,接受居家办公,前端开发经验
summary_chinese: 前端架构与工程化,Web3行业,React+TypeScript,Serverless架构实践,微前端与容器化,全栈开发能力
summary_english: Frontend Architecture & Engineering,Web3 Industry,React+TypeScript,Serverless Architecture Practice,Micro-frontends & Containerization,Full-stack Development
description:
工作职麦
技术设计与升级:主导前端技术架构方案的设计，推动技术栈的升级及工程化体系的建设。
国际化与跨站组件共享:设计国际化架构平台，具备在自定义SSR架构下设计微前端⽅案的能⼒。
前端⼩程序容器化:推动前端小程序的容器化建设，具备自定义DSL和前端编译、解析和⽣成相关能力。
性能优化:深入理解浏览器原理优化前端页面性能，确保在高并发场景下的稳定性与流畅度，提高用户体验。
前端安全:跟踪最新的安全威胁、漏洞趋势和常见攻击手法，制定和实施前端安全最佳实践和标准。
任职要求
经验要求:6年以上前端开发经验，具有互联网大厂或者同行业经验者优先。技术能力:
深入理解 TypeScript 和 React，熟练使用 Tailwind Css 和 Jotai 等前端工具，掌握原子化 CSS 和状态管理。
深入理解一个或者多个前端构建工具如Webpack、Vite、 Parcel、Bun 等。
深入理解 Web3.js、Wgmi、Viem 等前端技术库，了解常规公链、数字钱包及加密技术。
掌握 Nodejs 或具备 Rust、Java 任意一门后端语言并有实际项目以及高并发经验。
推动serverless架构的最佳实践，有使用 Cloudflare Workers/AWS Lambda/阿里云 FC+ER的实际项目经验。
问题解决能力:能够深度思考业务与技术，主动发现并推动问题的解决。
AI工具应用:熟练使用 AI 工具提升开发效率，了解其在前端的应用。
沟通协作:具备优秀的沟通能力和团队合作精神。

工作职责
技术设计与升级：主导前端技术架构方案的设计，推动技术栈的升级及工程化体系的建设。
国际化与跨站组件共享：设计国际化架构平台，具备在自定义SSR架构下设计微前端方案的能力。

深入理解 TypeScript 和 React，熟练使用 Tailwind CSS 和 Jotai 等前端工具，掌握原子化 CSS 和状态管理。
深入理解一个或者多个前端构建工具如 Webpack、Vite、Parcel、Bun 等。

掌握 Node.js 或具备 Rust、Java 任意一门后端语言并有实际项目以及高并发经验。
推动 Serverless 架构的最佳实践，有使用 Cloudflare Workers/AWS Lambda/阿里云 FC+ER的实际项目经验。

description_english:
Job Responsibilities
Technical Design & Upgrade: Lead the design of frontend technical architecture solutions, and drive the upgrade of the technology stack and the construction of the engineering system.
Internationalization & Cross-site Component Sharing: Design internationalization architecture platforms, with the ability to design micro-frontend solutions under custom SSR architectures.
Frontend Mini-program Containerization: Drive the containerization construction of frontend mini-programs, possessing capabilities in custom DSL and frontend compilation, parsing, and generation.
Performance Optimization: Deeply understand browser principles to optimize frontend page performance, ensuring stability and smoothness in high-concurrency scenarios to enhance user experience.
Frontend Security: Track the latest security threats, vulnerability trends, and common attack methods; formulate and implement frontend security best practices and standards.

Requirements
Experience: 6+ years of frontend development experience, with a preference for candidates from major internet companies or the same industry.
Technical Skills:
Deep understanding of TypeScript and React; proficient in using frontend tools like Tailwind CSS and Jotai; mastered atomic CSS and state management.
Deep understanding of one or more frontend build tools such as Webpack, Vite, Parcel, Bun, etc.
Deep understanding of frontend technology libraries like Web3.js, Wagmi, Viem, etc.; familiar with mainstream public chains, digital wallets, and encryption technologies.
Mastery of Node.js or proficiency in any backend language like Rust or Java, with actual project and high-concurrency experience.
Drive best practices for Serverless architecture; have practical project experience using Cloudflare Workers/AWS Lambda/Alibaba Cloud FC+ER.
Problem-solving Ability: Capable of deep thinking about business and technology, proactively identifying and driving the resolution of problems.
AI Tool Application: Proficient in using AI tools to improve development efficiency and understanding their application in the frontend.
Communication & Collaboration: Possess excellent communication skills and a team-oriented spirit.

title: 资深前端开发工程师（远程）
team: 相信光（重庆）网络科技有限公司
summary: CSS,JavaScript,HTML5,Vue,接受居家办公,React,前端开发经验,计算机/软件工程相关专业,ts
summary_chinese: React/Vue开发,金融科技,原子化CSS,Webpack/Vite工程化,WebSocket/SSR,CI/CD调优
summary_english: React/Vue Development,Fintech,Atomic CSS,Webpack/Vite Engineering,WebSocket/SSR,CI/CD Optimization
description:
前端开发工程师 
岗位职责：
- 负责公司前端项目开发（不限于toB、toC），使用成熟稳定的前端技术，保持产品的交互顺畅，并确保良好的浏览器兼容性。
- 具备良好的团队合作意识、高效的沟通效率，保持持久的工作激情、创造力和责任感，有较高的主观能动性，能按时、高质量完成任务。
- 较强的学习能力，保持前瞻的技术洞察力，积极拥抱 AI 赋能，主动为开发流程、代码质量提质提效。
- 敏感的产品意识，对产出的作品保持敬畏心，有自主迭代优化的意识和魄力。
- 具有成熟的思考复盘能力，能持续为个人和团队提供正向赋能。
 
岗位要求：
- 至少有5年以上前端开发经验，主导或参与过中大型项目的设计到落地。
- 熟练使用 React 或 Vue3，了解其实现原理，熟悉框架的优缺点，并有多个项目的实践经验。
- 熟悉浏览器原理，知晓常见的网络模型，深知从 url 输入到页面渲染的详细细节，并能出具优化建议和措施。
- 熟练使用 CSS3，对于原子化 CSS 框架有过实践。
- 熟练使用业内成熟业务组件库（如antd、arco等），开发维护过组件库更佳。
- 熟练使用 webpack、vite等工程化工具，对 CI/CD 有一定研究，能调优提效。
加分项：
- 熟悉 WebSocket 协议，有实际开发经验。
- 熟悉 SSR 开发、SEO 优化优先。
- 金融行业项目经验优先。
- 有全栈开发能力（移动端、后端）优先。
- 有单元测试、自动化测试经验优先。

description_english:
Frontend Development Engineer 
Responsibilities:
- Responsible for the company's frontend project development (including but not limited to toB and toC), using mature and stable frontend technologies to maintain smooth product interactions and ensure good browser compatibility.
- Possess a strong sense of teamwork and high communication efficiency; maintain lasting passion, creativity, and responsibility; demonstrate high subjective initiative to complete tasks on time with high quality.
- Strong learning ability, maintaining forward-looking technical insight; actively embrace AI empowerment and take initiative to improve the efficiency and quality of development processes and code.
- Sensitive product awareness, maintaining respect for produced work, with the awareness and courage for independent iterative optimization.
- Mature ability for reflection and review, providing continuous positive empowerment for individuals and the team.
 
Requirements:
- At least 5 years of experience in frontend development, having led or participated in the design and implementation of medium to large-scale projects.
- Proficient in using React or Vue3, understanding their implementation principles, being familiar with the pros and cons of the frameworks, and having practical experience in multiple projects.
- Familiar with browser principles and common network models; deeply understand details from URL input to page rendering, and be able to provide optimization suggestions and measures.
- Proficient in CSS3, with practical experience in atomic CSS frameworks.
- Proficient in mature industry business component libraries (such as antd, arco, etc.); experience in developing and maintaining component libraries is preferred.
- Proficient in engineering tools such as webpack and vite; have research experience in CI/CD and be able to perform optimization for efficiency.
Bonus points:
- Familiar with the WebSocket protocol with practical development experience.
- Familiarity with SSR development and SEO optimization is preferred.
- Experience in financial industry projects is preferred.
- Full-stack development capabilities (mobile, backend) are preferred.
- Experience in unit testing and automated testing is preferred.

title: VUE前端开发 武汉远程
team: 深圳市华越智信科技有限公司
summary_chinese: Vue3核心模块开发,互联网应用开发,Vite+TypeScript,SQL查询与优化,AI组件集成,周末双休
summary_english: Vue3 Core Module Development,Internet Application Development,Vite+TypeScript,SQL Query and Optimization,AI Component Integration,Double Weekends Off
description:
要求在武汉 | 前端开发工程师（Vue3） 5 - 7K
公司简介
我们是一家专注于互联网应用开发的创新企业，现因业务发展需要，诚聘远程前端开发⼯程师。我们提供灵活的⼯作⽅式，支持在武汉地区远程办公，期待您的加入！
职位信息
职位性质：全职远程办公
⼯作地点：武汉（部分时间在武汉现场，部分在家办公）
薪资范围：5 - 7K（根据能力经验可面议）
工作时间：固定班次，周末双休
核心职责
独立负责 Web 端核心模块（Vue3 + Vite + TS）
与后端、算法联调 REST / GraphQL，直接写 PostgreSQL / MySQL 查询脚本
封装 AI 组件（语音转写、向量检索、RAG 问答）并落地业务
性能与体验双 90 分：FCP < 1.5s、Lighthouse > 90
Code Review、单元测试、CI/CD 流程共建
硬性要求
Vue3 项目 ≥1 个上线，熟练 Composition API、Pinia、Vue Router 4
掌握 ES2022、TypeScript、CSS3、Webpack / Vite
能写复杂 SQL（JOIN、窗口函数、索引优化），PostgreSQL & MySQL 双实战
了解 AI 前端集成：WebSocket 流式输出、WebRTC、TensorFlow.js 或 WebGPU
Git 规范、Linux 基础、Docker 本地调试
武汉本地，前期需要在现场，家庭网络 ≥100m
要有自学能力，能够快速掌握新技术，工作积极主动，有责任心和团队合作精神,   具备良好的时间管理能力，能够按时完成任务
description_chinese:
要求在武汉 | 前端开发工程师（Vue3） 5 - 7K
公司简介
我们是一家专注于互联网应用开发的创新企业，现因业务发展需要，诚聘远程前端开发⼯程师。我们提供灵活的⼯作⽅式，支持在武汉地区远程办公，期待您的加入！
职位信息
职位性质：全职远程办公
⼯作地点：武汉（部分时间在武汉现场，部分在家办公）
薪资范围：5 - 7K（根据能力经验可面议）
工作时间：固定班次，周末双休
核心职责
独立负责 Web 端核心模块（Vue3 + Vite + TS）
与后端、算法联调 REST / GraphQL，直接写 PostgreSQL / MySQL 查询脚本
封装 AI 组件（语音转写、向量检索、RAG 问答）并落地业务
性能与体验双 90 分：FCP < 1.5s、Lighthouse > 90
Code Review、单元测试、CI/CD 流程共建
硬性要求
Vue3 项目 ≥1 个上线，熟练 Composition API、Pinia、Vue Router 4
掌握 ES2022、TypeScript、CSS3、Webpack / Vite
能写复杂 SQL（JOIN、窗口函数、索引优化），PostgreSQL & MySQL 双实战
了解 AI 前端集成：WebSocket 流式输出、WebRTC、TensorFlow.js 或 WebGPU
Git 规范、Linux 基础、Docker 本地调试
武汉本地，前期需要在现场，家庭网络 ≥100m
要有自学能力，能够快速掌握新技术，工作积极主动，有责任心和团队合作精神, 具备良好的时间管理能力，能够按时完成任务
description_english:
Wuhan Resident Required | Frontend Development Engineer (Vue3) 5 - 7K
Company Profile
We are an innovative enterprise focused on internet application development. Due to business growth, we are looking for a Remote Frontend Development Engineer. We provide flexible work arrangements and support remote work in the Wuhan area. We look forward to your joining!
Position Information
Position Type: Full-time Remote
Work Location: Wuhan (Partially on-site in Wuhan, partially work from home)
Salary Range: 5 - 7K (Negotiable based on ability and experience)
Work Schedule: Fixed shift, double weekends off
Core Responsibilities
Independently responsible for Web-end core modules (Vue3 + Vite + TS)
Coordinate with backend and algorithm teams for REST / GraphQL integration, and directly write PostgreSQL / MySQL query scripts
Encapsulate AI components (speech transcription, vector retrieval, RAG Q&A) and implement them in business scenarios
Performance and experience score 90+: FCP < 1.5s, Lighthouse > 90
Contribute to Code Review, unit testing, and CI/CD processes
Requirements
≥1 launched Vue3 project, proficient in Composition API, Pinia, Vue Router 4
Mastery of ES2022, TypeScript, CSS3, Webpack / Vite
Ability to write complex SQL (JOIN, window functions, index optimization), hands-on experience with both PostgreSQL & MySQL

Wuhan local, required to be on-site in the early stage, home network ≥100m
Must have self-learning ability, be able to quickly master new technologies, work proactively, have a sense of responsibility and team spirit, and possess good time management skills to complete tasks on time.

description:
岗位职责
1.负责Web3项目的硬件架构设计和开发，确保高性能、高可用性和高安全性。
2.与开发团队紧密合作，集成Web3智能合约和去中心化应用（DApps）。
3.参与产品需求分析，与产品经理和设计师沟通，提供技术解决方案和前端实现。
4.优化和维护现有的补充代码，提升用户体验和性能。
5.负责前端技术选型及技术难点攻关，制定开发规范和编码标准。
6.研究和应用最新的前端技术和Web3技术，推动团队技术进步。
岗位要求：
1.计算机科学、软件工程或相关专业学士及以上学位。
2.至少5年前端开发经验；精通HTML5、CSS3、JavaScript（ES6+），有React、Vue等前端框架实际项目经验。
3.深入了解 Web3 技术，并具有使用 Web3.js 和 Ethers.js 等库进行开发的实际经验。
4.熟悉智能合约、钱包、公链等，有智能合约开发部署经验者优先。
5.有去中心化应用程序（DApp）开发经验及区块链项目实践经验者优先。
6.熟悉版本控制工具（如Git），有良好的编码和文档习惯。
7.具有较强的沟通能力和团队精神，能够独立承担开发任务。

Responsibilities
1. Responsible for the hardware architecture design and development of Web3 projects, ensuring high performance, high availability, and high security.
2. Work closely with the development team to integrate Web3 smart contracts and decentralized applications (DApps).
3. Participate in product requirement analysis, communicate with product managers and designers, and provide technical solutions and frontend implementation.
4. Optimize and maintain existing supplementary code to improve user experience and performance.
5. Responsible for frontend technology selection and tackling technical difficulties, and formulating development specifications and coding standards.
6. Research and apply the latest frontend and Web3 technologies to drive team technical progress.
Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related majors.
2. At least 5 years of frontend development experience; proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), with practical project experience in frontend frameworks such as React and Vue.
3. In-depth understanding of Web3 technology and practical experience in development using libraries such as Web3.js and Ethers.js.
4. Familiar with smart contracts, wallets, public chains, etc.; experience in smart contract development and deployment is preferred.
5. Experience in decentralized application (DApp) development and blockchain project practice is preferred.
6. Familiar with version control tools (such as Git), with good coding and documentation habits.
7. Strong communication skills and team spirit, able to independently undertake development tasks.

Remote Position

* Experience in agile development.

- We pursue simplicity, efficiency, and high quality, and are passionate about serving humanity through innovation and creation.

- We have extensive experience in the internet industry, coming from companies like Amazon, Apple, Uber, etc., and graduated from top universities such as Tsinghua, Peking, Fudan, SJTU, and UC Berkeley.

description:
岗位职责
1. 负责鹅同学小程序及管理端的前端开发
2. 和团队成员协作开发
岗位要求
1. 每周能工作五天；本科以上，学习能力强，愿意沟通和有责任心
2. ⾄少了解过⼀门spa框架。如vue，react，了解spa(单页应⽤)的设计理念
3. 熟悉composition-api或react hook写法
4. 对代码质量有要求,会用git
5. 能编写基本样式规则，学习并尝试使用taiwind css原⼦框架，了解其理念
6. 加分项：有管理端开发经验，有vue开发经验，熟悉monorepo理念。有Github开源项目经验
岗位特色
1. 现有团队成员均出自腾讯等大厂
2. 可获得团队负责人的职业规划指导
3. 可免费参加我们举办的AI Party等线下活动，连接全世界优秀的人才
4. 远程工作，无需到岗，不打卡
我们是一个自研AI名片的公司，产研驱动。团队主要来自微信、字节，基本都是毕业于各世界名校；目前已经完成了两轮融资。已入驻的知名高校/企业/协会有MIT、腾讯、Cursor、中国产业海外发展协会等。

目前市面上的Agent产品都是处理信息，接下来一定是处理人与人之间的信任和交易，我们的愿景是通过为智能体经济时代提供交易和信任的基建，来加速商业世界的信任传递。

团队风格是低调、推崇发挥每个人的专长而不是管理控制；我们为每个人提供了AI Coding产品如Cursor的订阅；我们全员远程，每两周有一天线下面对面非coding日，侧重技术分享和目标对齐。

description_english:
Responsibilities
1. Responsible for the frontend development of the E-Classmate (鹅同学) mini program and management portal.
2. Collaborate with team members for development.
Requirements
1. Able to work five days a week; Bachelor's degree or above, strong learning ability, willing to communicate, and responsible.
2. Understand at least one SPA framework, such as Vue or React, and understand the design philosophy of SPA (Single Page Application).
3. Familiar with composition-api or React hook syntax.
4. Have requirements for code quality and be proficient in Git.
5. Able to write basic styling rules, learn and try to use the Tailwind CSS atomic framework, and understand its philosophy.
6. Bonuses: Experience in management portal development, experience in Vue development, familiarity with the monorepo concept. Experience with GitHub open-source projects.
Job Highlights
1. Current team members are all from top tech companies like Tencent.
2. Access to career planning guidance from the team lead.
3. Free participation in AI Parties and other offline activities we host to connect with global talent.
4. Remote work, no office attendance required, no clock-ins.
We are a research and development-driven AI business card company. The team mainly comes from WeChat and ByteDance, mostly graduating from top global universities; we have currently completed two rounds of financing. Notable institutions/enterprises/associations that have joined include MIT, Tencent, Cursor, and the China Overseas Development Association.

Currently, Agent products on the market focus on processing information. Next, it will definitely be about handling trust and transactions between people. Our vision is to accelerate the transmission of trust in the commercial world by providing transaction and trust infrastructure for the Agent economy era.

The team style is low-profile, advocating for leveraging everyone's expertise rather than management and control. We provide everyone with a subscription to AI coding products like Cursor. We are a fully remote team, with one offline face-to-face non-coding day every two weeks, focusing on technical sharing and goal alignment.

description:
我们在做实时互动 AI，需要一套 全球可用、稳定高效 的后端系统。
现在，我们想和你一起，把这件事做到极致。
【你会做的事】
	•	⽤ Go 构建核⼼后端服务。
	•	设计稳定、可扩展的架构：全球多点部署、低延迟、⾃动扩缩容。
	•	建设监控、Tracing、告警体系，确保服务稳定运行。
	•	持续优化性能和工程体验，让系统更稳、更快、更好维护。
【我们希望你】
	•	熟悉 Docker / Linux / 云原⽣，有扎实的后端工程功底。
	•	理解分布式、高可用、容灾、全球部署等系统问题。
	•	对稳定性、性能、工程质量有明确追求。
【加分项】
	•	使用过 Kubernetes、gRPC、Redis、Kafka等。
	•	有全球化服务或高并发系统经验。
	•	有自己的工具、项目或工程化实践。
【你能得到】
	•	不逊大厂的薪资和远超大厂的期权
	•	深度参与 AI 系统的底层架构与全球化部署。
	•	高效透明的工程氛围，灵活办公模式。
	•	和一群认真的人并肩工作
description_chinese:
我们在做实时互动 AI，需要一套 全球可用、稳定高效 的后端系统。
现在，我们想和你一起，把这件事做到极致。
【你会做的事】
• ⽤ Go 构建核⼼后端服务。
• 设计稳定、可扩展的架构：全球多点部署、低延迟、⾃动扩缩容。
• 建设监控、Tracing、告警体系，确保服务稳定运行。
• 持续优化性能和工程体验，让系统更稳、更快、更好维护。
【我们希望你】
• 熟悉 Docker / Linux / 云原⽣，有扎实的后端工程功底。
• 理解分布式、高可用、容灾、全球部署等系统问题。
• 对稳定性、性能、工程质量有明确追求。
【加分项】
• 使用过 Kubernetes、gRPC、Redis、Kafka等。
• 有全球化服务或高并发系统经验。
• 有自己的工具、项目或工程化实践。

• 不逊大厂的薪资和远超大厂的期权
• 深度参与 AI 系统的底层架构与全球化部署。

description_english:
We are building real-time interactive AI and need a globally available, stable, and efficient backend system.
Now, we want to work with you to take this to the next level.

【What You Will Do】
• Build core backend services using Go.
• Design stable and scalable architectures: multi-point global deployment, low latency, and auto-scaling.
• Build monitoring, tracing, and alerting systems to ensure stable service operation.
• Continuously optimize performance and engineering experience to make the system more stable, faster, and easier to maintain.

【What We Hope You Have】
• Familiarity with Docker / Linux / Cloud Native, with solid backend engineering skills.
• Understanding of distributed systems, high availability, disaster recovery, and global deployment.
• A clear pursuit of stability, performance, and engineering quality.

【Bonus Points】
• Experience with Kubernetes, gRPC, Redis, Kafka, etc.
• Experience with global services or high-concurrency systems.
• Experience with your own tools, projects, or engineering practices.

【What You Can Get】
• Salary comparable to big companies and stock options far exceeding those of big companies.
• Deep involvement in the underlying architecture and global deployment of AI systems.
• An efficient and transparent engineering atmosphere with a flexible work model.
• Working alongside a group of dedicated people.

title: node.js后端开发工程师（居家办公为主）
team: 深圳市新类型科技有限公司
summary_chinese: Node.js后端系统开发,金融科技,Nestjs+TypeScript,支付渠道对接与维护,春节额外年假,弹性工作时间
summary_english: Node.js Backend System Development,Fintech,Nestjs+TypeScript,Payment Channel Integration & Maintenance,Extra CNY Annual Leave,Flexible Working Hours
description:
岗位职责：
参与公司项目的开发和维护，确保项目按时完成并满足质量要求。
参与产品需求分析，及项目设计和功能开发。
参与支付渠道对接，与产品经理沟通，独立完成代码的编写及文档补充。
独立完成功能单元测试，确保功能质量，快速分析定位故障。
了解VM及K8S部署和运维相关工作。
根据用户反馈和市场需求，持续改进和优化项目。
任职要求：
计算机或相关专业本科及以上学历，3年及以上软件开发经验。
熟练使用MongoDB、MySQL、Redis等相关数据库的使用。
精通Node.js ，熟练使用VueJs框架、Nestjs、Express、Koa等相关框架。
熟练HTML、CSS、JavaScript等前端开发技术，熟练使用TypeScript。
熟练前端工程化和相关构建打包工具，如Webpack、Vite。
熟练HTTP、TCP/IP等网络协议，并了解RestfulAPI设计规范。
具有微服务、jira、敏捷开发等项目优先。
熟悉Git Flow协作流程。
有金融行业相关经验，有对接过支付渠道的经验优先。
热爱技术，有较强的自我学习能力和问题解决能力。
具备一定英语能力，良好沟通及团队协作能力。
本岗位仅限深圳，以居家办公为主，可接受者优先。
公司简介
    我们是一家创新型科技公司，现拥有强大的客户群体，以确保公司稳定而快速的发展。公司致力于软件开发、网站建设优化的我们，目前已经在领域内汇聚了一支专业、年轻、充满活力且优秀的专业开发团队.公司本着“人才为本，诚信立业”的经营原则扩展壮大，目前正处于快速发展阶段。公司求贤若渴，真诚寻求领域内有经验、有能力、有干劲、有活力并且愿意与公司共同成长的小伙伴前来加入我们，配合业务发展。

企业文化：
       立足客户、用心服务；尊重个人、鼓励创新；齐心协力、团队合作。

       公司立足客户，致公司尊重每一位员工，作为新类型科技的员工，都将受到充分的尊重和平等的对待。公司给予员工同等的机会，提供富于挑战性的事业发展空间，鼓励每一位员工创造性的工作，充分发挥个人的最大价值。只要您有能力，我们就有平台。我们倡导相互尊重、理解和有效沟通，齐心协力，团队合作，力求在平等和谐的合作氛围中创造“1+1>2”的工作效应。共同打造一直年轻、敏锐、朝气蓬勃、有志向的技术团队。

员工福利：

    1、五险一金；
    2、带薪年假：法定节假日遵照国家规定执行。春节另行增加3天带薪年假。
    3、职业发展：公司迅速发展，为员工提供广阔的职业发展平台和可持续发展的岗位。
    4、补充福利：有全勤奖，零食福利金，节日礼金或礼品、员工生日关怀、员工 集体活动（户外运动、游戏、聚餐等），季度/年度旅游（国内外、港澳）等。
    5、弹性工作时间：5天8小时工作制（周末双休）。
    6、良好的工作氛围：公司团队大由80、90后组成，均为高等学历的俊男靓女，年轻有干劲，幽默有内涵，工作氛围nice。

办公地址：深圳市南山区科兴科学园

description_english:
Job Responsibilities:
Participate in the development and maintenance of company projects, ensuring timely completion and meeting quality requirements.
Participate in product requirement analysis, project design, and functional development.
Participate in payment channel integration, communicate with product managers, and independently complete code writing and documentation.
Independently complete functional unit testing, ensure functional quality, and quickly analyze and locate faults.
Understand VM and K8S deployment and O&M related work.
Continuously improve and optimize projects based on user feedback and market demand.

Requirements:
Bachelor's degree or above in computer science or related majors, with 3 years or more of software development experience.
Proficient in using MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, and other related databases.
Proficient in Node.js, and skilled in using VueJs, Nestjs, Express, Koa, and other related frameworks.
Proficient in frontend development technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and skilled in using TypeScript.
Proficient in frontend engineering and related build/packaging tools such as Webpack and Vite.
Proficient in network protocols such as HTTP and TCP/IP, and understand RestfulAPI design specifications.
Experience with microservices, Jira, and Agile development is preferred.
Familiar with Git Flow collaboration process.
Relevant experience in the financial industry and experience in integrating payment channels is preferred.
Passionate about technology, with strong self-learning and problem-solving abilities.
Possess certain English proficiency, good communication, and teamwork skills.
This position is limited to Shenzhen and is primarily work-from-home; candidates who can accept this are preferred.

Company Profile:
We are an innovative technology company with a strong customer base to ensure stable and rapid development. Dedicated to software development and website construction/optimization, we have gathered a professional, young, energetic, and excellent development team in the field. Adhering to the business principle of "talent-oriented, integrity-based," the company is currently in a stage of rapid development. We are thirsty for talent and sincerely seek experienced, capable, driven, and energetic partners who are willing to grow with the company to join us and support business development.

Corporate Culture:
Customer-based, service-oriented; respect individuals, encourage innovation; work together, team cooperation.

The company is customer-based and respects every employee. As an employee of a new type of technology company, everyone will be treated with full respect and equality. The company provides equal opportunities, a challenging career development space, encourages creative work, and gives full play to individual value. As long as you have the ability, we have the platform. We advocate mutual respect, understanding, and effective communication, working together for teamwork, striving to create a "1+1>2" effect in an equal and harmonious atmosphere. Together, we build a young, sharp, vibrant, and ambitious technical team.

Employee Benefits:
1. Five insurances and one housing fund;
2. Paid annual leave: Statutory holidays are implemented according to national regulations. An additional 3 days of paid annual leave are added for the Spring Festival.
3. Career development: The company is developing rapidly, providing a broad platform and sustainable positions.
4. Supplementary benefits: Attendance bonus, snack fund, holiday bonuses or gifts, birthday care, team activities (outdoor sports, games, dinners, etc.), quarterly/annual travel (domestic, international, Hong Kong, and Macau), etc.
5. Flexible working hours: 5 days, 8 hours working system (double rest on weekends).
6. Good working atmosphere: The company team is composed of the 80s and 90s generations, all of whom are highly educated, young, driven, humorous, and insightful, with a nice work atmosphere.

Office Address: Kexing Science Park, Nanshan District, Shenzhen

1、负责风控系统技术方案设计、需求把控及核心功能开发，建设高并发、高性能、高可用的系统；
2、参与风控系统架构演进、性能优化和稳定性建设、故障排查和解决等工作；
3、参与知识传播及技术分享，促进团队成员共同进步。
岗位要求：
1、3年及以上互联网研发工作经验，熟悉Java语言，有良好的Java基础，熟悉IO、多线程等基础技术，对多线程使用、并发处理、JVM基本原理有一定认识；
2、编码功底功扎实，熟悉Spring、Mysql、Redis等常用技术，并理解其原理；
3、有扎实的数据库、中间件知识；熟悉常用的数据结构、算法、设计模式；计算机系统与网络基础知识扎实；
4、具有良好的抽象设计能力，思路清晰，能较独立地分析和解决问题；
5、对分布式系统有较深理解，熟悉常用的MQ系统、一致性协议等；
6、具备良好的学习能力，沟通能力，责任心强，具备良好的团队合作精神。

2、有风控系统开发经验；
3、有资金核对或对账开发经验。

description:
资深Web前端架构师
岗位职责：
- 主导前端技术架构设计和优化，确保技术架构的先进性和可扩展性。
- 深入研究 Web 性能优化方法，全面优化网站性能，提升页⾯加载速度和交互体验。
- 解决前端技术难题，负责攻克⾼并发、⾼性能场景下的技术难关。
- 有全球复杂网络下的前端工程优化能⼒。
- 夯实前端安全护城河，从网站、流程、规范等层面为团队保驾护航。
- 为团队成员提供技术指导和培训，提升团队整体技术能力。
任职要求：
- 计算机相关专业本科及以上学历。
- 八年以上前端开发经验，五年以上前端架构设计经验；有大型互联网行业的前端架构经验优先。
- 精通主流前端框架，对源码实现了若指掌，深入理解相关生态系统，具备扎实的前端基础。
- 精通 Web 前端性能优化技术，能够从代码、网络、渲染等多方面进行全面优化；能够深入诊断和优化前端性能。
- 具备 SEO 优化经验，熟悉搜索引擎的工作原理和优化策略。
- 具有出色的沟通和协调能力，有良好的团队领导能力，能够指导团队成员工作，并提升团队整体技术水平。
description_chinese:
资深Web前端架构师
岗位职责：
- 主导前端技术架构设计和优化，确保技术架构的先进性和可扩展性。
- 深入研究 Web 性能优化方法，全面优化网站性能，提升页面加载速度和交互体验。
- 解决前端技术难题，负责攻克高并发、高性能场景下的技术难关。
- 有全球复杂网络下的前端工程优化能力。
- 夯实前端安全护城河，从网站、流程、规范等层面为团队保驾护航。
- 为团队成员提供技术指导和培训，提升团队整体技术能力。
任职要求：
- 计算机相关专业本科及以上学历。
- 八年以上前端开发经验，五年以上前端架构设计经验；有大型互联网行业的前端架构经验优先。
- 精通主流前端框架，对源码实现了若指掌，深入理解相关生态系统，具备扎实的前端基础。
- 精通 Web 前端性能优化技术，能够从代码、网络、渲染等多方面进行全面优化；能够深入诊断和优化前端性能。
- 具备 SEO 优化经验，熟悉搜索引擎的工作原理和优化策略。
- 具有出色的沟通和协调能力，有良好的团队领导能力，能够指导团队成员工作，并提升团队整体技术水平。
description_english:
Senior Web Frontend Architect
Responsibilities:
- Lead the design and optimization of frontend technical architecture, ensuring its advanced nature and scalability.
- Deeply research Web performance optimization methods, comprehensively optimize website performance, and improve page loading speed and interaction experience.
- Solve frontend technical difficulties, responsible for overcoming technical challenges in high-concurrency and high-performance scenarios.
- Possess frontend engineering optimization capabilities under complex global network conditions.
- Consolidate the frontend security moat, safeguarding the team from aspects such as websites, processes, and standards.
- Provide technical guidance and training for team members to enhance the overall technical capability of the team.
Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree or above in computer-related majors.
- Over eight years of frontend development experience, with more than five years of experience in frontend architecture design; experience in frontend architecture for large-scale internet industries is preferred.
- Proficient in mainstream frontend frameworks, with a deep understanding of source code implementation and the related ecosystem, and a solid frontend foundation.
- Proficient in Web frontend performance optimization technologies, capable of comprehensive optimization from code, network, rendering, etc.; able to diagnose and optimize frontend performance deeply.
- Experience in SEO optimization, familiar with search engine working principles and optimization strategies.
- Excellent communication and coordination skills, good team leadership abilities, capable of guiding team members' work and improving the overall technical level of the team.

title: 牙科供应链客服专员（远程办公，夜班）
title_english: Dental Supply Chain Customer Service Specialist
team: 深圳世纪智投科技发展有限公司
summary: 含有销售的客服工作,售前客服,电话客服,远程办公,售后客服,咨询热线客服,倒班工作制,企业内部客服,线上客服,接受居家办公,质检客服
summary_chinese: 国际订单与物流支持,牙科医疗行业,英语流利/TEM-4+,CRM系统操作,跨时区夜班协作,绩效奖金
summary_english: International Order & Logistics Support,Dental Medical Industry,Fluent English/TEM-4+,CRM System Operation,Cross-timezone Night Shift Collaboration,Performance Bonuses
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：无要求
工作时间：夜班、晚班
工作时段：全周轮班
结算方式：月结
招聘截止时间：2026-01-04
**工作地点：** 全职远程（居家办公）  
**工作时间：** 20:00 - 次日4:00（可选全职或兼职）  
**薪资范围：** 3,000 - 12,000元/月（视经验及绩效而定）  
---
### **职位描述：**  
我们正在招聘一名**英语流利的客服专员**，负责夜间全球牙科供应链的客户支持工作。您将作为牙科诊所、供应商和物流团队之间的重要桥梁，确保订单处理、问题解决和客户满意度的高效执行。  
### **主要职责：**  
- 处理国际牙科诊所及供应商的订单咨询、物流跟踪及售后问题（邮件/在线聊天/电话）。  
- 协调订单流程，及时处理供应链异常（如缺货、延迟发货等）。  
- 提供基础牙科产品支持（如器械、耗材、设备等），协助客户解决问题。  
- 使用CRM系统准确记录客户需求，并与物流团队协作跟进。  
- 以专业、耐心的态度提供高满意度服务。  
### **任职要求：**  
- **英语流利**：需通过英语专业四级（TEM-4）或同等水平，专业八级（TEM-8）/CET-6+优先。  
- **牙科背景优先**：有口腔护理、牙科助理、牙科耗材供应链经验者更佳。  
- **夜班适应力**：能稳定胜任20:00-4:00的工作时段（远程办公）。  
- **熟练使用办公软件**：熟悉CRM系统、Excel等工具，学习能力强。  
- **软性素质**：责任心强，沟通能力佳，具备跨时区服务意识。  
### **职位亮点：**  
- 100%远程办公，灵活排班。  
- 薪资+绩效奖金，多劳多得。  
- 接触全球牙科行业资源，职业发展空间大。

description_english:
Work Cycle: Long-term part-time
Weekly Duration: No requirement
Work Hours: Night shift, late shift
Working Hours: Full week shifts
Settlement: Monthly settlement
Recruitment Deadline: 2026-01-04
**Work Location:** Full-time remote (WFH)  
**Working Hours:** 20:00 - 4:00 next day (full-time or part-time optional)  
**Salary Range:** 3,000 - 12,000 RMB/month (depending on experience and performance)  
---
### **Job Description:**  
We are hiring a **fluent English customer service specialist** responsible for nighttime global dental supply chain customer support. You will serve as a vital bridge between dental clinics, suppliers, and logistics teams, ensuring efficient execution of order processing, problem-solving, and customer satisfaction.  
### **Key Responsibilities:**  
- Handle order inquiries, logistics tracking, and after-sales issues from international dental clinics and suppliers (via email/online chat/phone).  
- Coordinate order processes and promptly handle supply chain exceptions (e.g., out-of-stock, shipping delays).  
- Provide basic dental product support (e.g., instruments, consumables, equipment) and assist customers in problem-solving.  
- Use CRM systems to accurately record customer requirements and collaborate with logistics teams for follow-ups.  
- Provide high-satisfaction service with a professional and patient attitude.  
### **Requirements:**  
- **Fluent English**: TEM-4 or equivalent required; TEM-8 / CET-6+ preferred.  
- **Dental Background Preferred**: Experience in oral care, dental assistance, or dental consumable supply chains is a plus.  
- **Night Shift Adaptability**: Ability to work consistently during the 20:00-4:00 time slot (remote work).  
- **Proficient in Office Software**: Familiarity with CRM systems, Excel, and other tools; strong learning ability.  
- **Soft Skills**: Strong sense of responsibility, excellent communication skills, and awareness of cross-timezone service.  
### **Job Highlights:**  
- 100% remote work with flexible scheduling.  
- Salary + performance bonus, more work more pay.  
- Access to global dental industry resources with significant career development space.

title: 专题编辑（远程办公）
team: 重庆市新美育文化传媒有限公司
summary_chinese: 教育专题调研撰稿,K-12教育行业,微信公众号运营,调研报告与深度报道,文案策划与执行,智库型研究机构
summary_english: Education Research & Writing,K-12 Education Industry,WeChat Official Account Operations,Research & Deep Reporting,Copywriting & Execution,Think Tank Research Institution
description:
岗位职责：
1.深度研究国内外教育趋势和现状，提炼有价值的研究课题，协同团队开展全面专业的研究；
2.深入学校一线开展专题调研、访谈，深入分析研究，撰写调研报告、文章稿件；
3.微信公众号文章撰写、文案策划、深度报道。
职位要求：
1.统招本科以上学历，具备较强的文字功底和敏锐的洞察能力；
2.热爱教育行业，具备较好的研究能力和架构能力；
3.有良好的沟通能力，策划能力以及执行力。
办公方式：驻点上海，远程办公
蒲公英教育智库成立于2008年9月，旗下拥有重庆、北京、成都等地8个公司、7个事业部、32个研究中心、3份刊物，是中国K-12教育领域**专业与品牌影响力智库型研究与服务集团。
       基于21世纪人类共同学习愿景，蒲公英教育智库专注新一代区域教育高质量发展和K12未来学校整体发展，致力于构建完整的教育生态赋能系统和学校服务系统，建设“K12教育生态优化一站式服务平台”。
       公司汇集国内外最杰出的跨界人士和一线教育名家，深耕教育领域多年，衍生出学校内涵建设、场景美学、教师培训、学校云智库、奥秘未来学院、安全与法制、学校图书馆、未来教育家托举等八项面向教育领域的专业服务，获得全国各区域、学校的高度认可与一致好评。
       至今，蒲公英智库已深度服务300个区域，超过5000个学校。在全国范围内28个省市开展过主题峰会，超过80万人参与。旗下《新校长》、《星教师》杂志每年发行超过60万册，覆盖近6万所学校，公众号粉丝超过70万人，举办教育专场会议超过100场，影响国内外数百万教育人。
       由蒲公英教育智库发起的中国教育创新年会，被誉为“中国基础教育年度风向标”。自2014年起，分别在重庆、深圳、上海、杭州、南京、成都等城市连续举办九届。每年现场参会者4000 人左右，200多万人次在线观看，参加年会对象从国内外中小学校长及教研骨干到全球教育创新先锋及不同特质的教育人。中国教育创新年会已成为中国基础教育界的年度盛会。
       蒲公英教育智库办公地址在渝北新牌坊，办公环境优美、福利完善，并有兼具美味和健康的员工食堂，提供各种经典阅读的蒲公英书房。
       欢迎热爱教育，愿意投身教育行业深耕职业愿景的有识之士加盟，让我们一起顶高中国教育的空间高度，贡献世界范围的教育价值！

description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Conduct in-depth research on domestic and international education trends and status, refine valuable research topics, and collaborate with the team to conduct comprehensive professional research;
2. Visit the front line of schools to carry out thematic research and interviews, perform in-depth analysis and research, and write research reports and articles;
3. Write WeChat Official Account articles, plan copy, and conduct in-depth reporting.
Requirements:
1. Full-time bachelor's degree or above, with strong writing skills and keen insight;
2. Passionate about the education industry, with strong research and structural capabilities;
3. Good communication, planning, and execution skills.
Work Mode: Based in Shanghai, remote work
Dandelion Education Think Tank was founded in September 2008. It owns 8 companies in Chongqing, Beijing, Chengdu, and other places, with 7 business divisions, 32 research centers, and 3 publications. It is a professional and brand-influential think-tank research and service group in China's K-12 education field.
       Based on the vision of common human learning in the 21st century, Dandelion Education Think Tank focuses on the high-quality development of a new generation of regional education and the overall development of K12 future schools. It is committed to building a complete education ecology empowerment system and school service system, and constructing a "One-stop Service Platform for K12 Education Ecological Optimization."
       The company brings together outstanding cross-border professionals and frontline education experts from home and abroad. Having deeply cultivated the education field for many years, it has derived eight professional services for the education field, including school connotation construction, scene aesthetics, teacher training, school cloud think tank, Secret Future Academy, safety and law, school library, and future educator support, receiving high recognition and praise from regions and schools nationwide.
       To date, Dandelion Think Tank has deeply served 300 regions and over 5,000 schools. It has held theme summits in 28 provinces and cities across the country, with over 800,000 participants. Its magazines "New Principal" and "Star Teacher" have an annual circulation of over 600,000 copies, covering nearly 60,000 schools. Its public account has over 700,000 followers, and it has held more than 100 special education conferences, influencing millions of educators at home and abroad.
       The China Education Innovation Annual Conference, initiated by Dandelion Education Think Tank, is known as the "Wind Vane of China's Basic Education." Since 2014, it has been held for nine consecutive years in cities such as Chongqing, Shenzhen, Shanghai, Hangzhou, Nanjing, and Chengdu. Each year, there are about 4,000 on-site participants and more than 2 million online views. Participants range from domestic and foreign primary and secondary school principals and teaching research backbones to global education innovation pioneers and educators with different characteristics. The China Education Innovation Annual Conference has become an annual event in China's basic education circles.
       The office of Dandelion Education Think Tank is located in Xinpai Fang, Yubei. It has a beautiful office environment, comprehensive benefits, a staff canteen that provides delicious and healthy food, and a Dandelion Study Room offering classic readings.
       We welcome people of insight who love education and are willing to devote themselves to the education industry to join us. Let us work together to raise the space height of Chinese education and contribute educational value on a global scale!

title: webOL资源运营-远程办公
team: 某中型互联网公司上海
summary: KOL,合约,web3
summary_chinese: 全球KOL资源拓展,区块链行业,制定KOL合作方案,数据跟踪与效果优化,中英口语流利,商务沟通与资源整合
summary_english: Global KOL Resource Expansion,Blockchain Industry,KOL Cooperation Planning,Data Tracking and Optimization,Fluent English and Chinese,Business Communication and Integration
description:
核心职责
挖掘、对接全球 KOL，建立资源库并维护核心合作关系；
制定 KOL 合作方案（内容共创 / 直播联动等），推动全流程落地；
跟踪合作数据，输出效果报告并优化策略；
协同跨部门，对齐业务⽬标。
任职要求
本科及以上，中英口语流利；
⽬标感强，接受绩效压⼒，对 Web3 / 交易所有兴趣；
具备商务沟通、资源整合能力。
优先转型人群（满⾜其一）
币圈转型：有币圈社群 / 代理 / 客服 / BD 经验，曾与 KOL 有合作交集；
传统 BD 转型：有 SaaS / 保险 / B2C 电商 / 外汇销售经验，结果导向，懂佣金模型。
description_chinese:
核心职责
挖掘、对接全球 KOL，建立资源库并维护核心合作关系；
制定 KOL 合作方案（内容共创 / 直播联动等），推动全流程落地；
跟踪合作数据，输出效果报告并优化策略；
协同跨部门，对齐业务目标。

任职要求
本科及以上，中英口语流利；
目标感强，接受绩效压力，对 Web3 / 交易所有兴趣；
具备商务沟通、资源整合能力。

优先转型人群（满足其一）
币圈转型：有币圈社群 / 代理 / 客服 / BD 经验，曾与 KOL 有合作交集；
传统 BD 转型：有 SaaS / 保险 / B2C 电商 / 外汇销售经验，结果导向，懂佣金模型。

title: 意大利语客服（可远程居家办公）
team: 成都金智商擎营销策划有限公司
summary: 对游戏感兴趣,办公室坐班,远程办公,售后客服,不含销售的客服工作,倒班工作制,线上客服,企业内部客服,意大利语,居家办公,接受居家办公
summary_chinese: 游戏邮件回复与处理,游戏行业,意大利语B2或四级,英语大学四级,晚班通宵排班制,节假日三倍薪资
summary_english: Game Email Handling,Gaming Industry,Italian B2 or Level 4,English CET-4,Night Shift Rotation,Triple Pay on Holidays
description:
岗位职责：
1-熟悉你要服务的游戏产品，理解游戏行业客户问题及服务需求；
2-用意大利语回复游戏玩家在游戏过程中出现的充值、账号登陆、查询、以及玩法等邮件，以书面⽅式及时解答；
3-以耐⼼专业的服务提升玩家对该游戏的体验感和好评度；
4-有意识收集服务中存在的待改善的问题，及时反馈上级。
任职要求：
1-对游戏感兴趣，有玩游戏（端游或⼿游均可）的经历；
2-大专以上学历，有意大利语专业四级或B2以上证书，⼤学英语4级以上，均要有证书，能独立对玩家发来的问题进行阅读及书面回复；
3-能接受排班制工作，上5天休2天，能接受晚班或者通宵夜班，如遇节假日上班3薪；
4-积极耐心，有良好的客服意识。
5-欢迎全国各地意大利语能力的朋友，开放远程居家办公。
创立于2009年，金智致力于市场研究、整合营销传播、品牌推广、营销服务等全方位的营销策划服务，为市场提供互联网内容审核与AI标注、AI训练、游戏多语种在线服务、语音类坐席服务、新媒体营销策划与品牌推广等服务。目前公司在职员工600+人，历经15年的稳健发展，金智商擎团队已经具备良好的客户服务意识，丰富的项目运营经验以及优秀的工作执行能力。所服务的行业覆盖IT、互联网、游戏、汽车、医疗、政务、快消、通信等众多行业。
