description_english:
Job Description:
We are looking for an engineer who is passionate about technological innovation and possesses full-stack development capabilities to join our innovation project team. You will be responsible for designing and developing brand new online products from 0 to 1, utilizing advanced technology stacks and AI tools to enhance R&D efficiency, and building high-performance, scalable global products.
Core Responsibilities:
1. Participate in the full lifecycle development of innovation projects, including requirement analysis, architecture design, coding implementation, testing, deployment, and online operation & maintenance.
2. Independently or collaboratively complete front-end and back-end feature development, ensuring rapid product iteration and high-quality delivery.
3. Actively use AI programming tools (such as Cursor, GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, etc.) to optimize the development process and improve code efficiency and maintainability.
4. Explore and implement emerging technologies (such as Agent architecture, AI integration, Serverless, etc.) to solve technical challenges in the business.
5. Collaborate closely with product, design, and operations teams to ensure technical solutions are highly aligned with business goals.
Job Requirements:
1. Over 2 years of full-stack development experience, proficient in at least one mainstream front-end framework (React/Vue) and back-end language (Node.js/Python/Go/Java, etc.).
2. Experience with delivering a complete online product from 0 to 1, familiar with cloud services (AWS/GCP/Azure) and DevOps processes (CI/CD, Docker/K8s).
3. Strong interest in AI-assisted development, proficient in using AI tools for code generation, debugging, or automated testing.
DeepLang AI is a star startup in the currently trending large model sector, incubated from Tsinghua University and the Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence (BAAI), with an academician of the European Academy of Sciences serving as the chief scientist. The founding team consists of PhDs and Masters from Tsinghua, joined by several senior executives from major tech companies like ByteDance. Since its establishment, the company has received hundreds of millions in investment from top institutions such as Sequoia, Tencent, TAL, and MiraclePlus.
Our goal is to build a new generation of intelligent information processing platforms based on large models, reshaping the entire information processing workflow for hundreds of millions of knowledge workers and tens of millions of information-intensive organizations. Currently, our products have a total of over 8 million users across all platforms, with over 500,000 monthly active users.

【Company Highlights】
1️⃣ Prestigious Background: Incubated from the Natural Language Processing Lab at Tsinghua University's Department of Computer Science (THUNLP) and the Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence (BAAI), with an academician of the European Academy of Sciences as the chief scientist.
2️⃣ Exceptional Technical Strength: The team has published hundreds of top-tier papers. Core members come from the "national team" of large models—the ZHIYUAN WuDao Large Model R&D team—and were deeply involved in the development of China's first large model. Our latest self-developed large model, DLM, has shown excellent performance in multiple evaluations.
3️⃣ Rapid Business Growth: We have launched products with millions of users, some of which have been reported by media outlets like CCTV. We have also established commercial partnerships with benchmark clients in various industries, including government, state-owned enterprises, media, and universities.
4️⃣ Backed by Top VCs: We have secured hundreds of millions in financial and strategic investments from top institutions such as Sequoia China, Tencent, TAL, MiraclePlus, and the Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence. Additionally, several successful entrepreneurs have personally invested and serve as advisors.
5️⃣ Diverse and Comprehensive Team: Our team includes outstanding young talents from universities like Tsinghua (including national AI competition champions, provincial Gaokao top scorers, etc.), as well as senior executives and veterans from major internet companies like ByteDance who provide guidance and support.

【What We Offer】
1️⃣ Comprehensive Benefits: Competitive salary, "five insurances and one housing fund," year-end bonus, paid annual leave, transportation allowance, meal allowance, regular health checks, birthday/holiday benefits, unlimited snacks and drinks, etc.
2️⃣ Comfortable Work Environment: The office is located at the southeast gate of Tsinghua University, near the Wudaokou subway station, with convenient transportation. The office environment is comfortable and well-equipped (ergonomic chairs, high-definition monitors, high-spec Mac/PC, etc.). We are willing to provide any facilities that can improve work efficiency and experience.
3️⃣ Simple and Open Culture: We advocate for a simple, candid, efficient, and open company culture. We implement a flexible work system to a certain extent. We hope everyone can work efficiently and live happily, rejecting pointless internal competition.
4️⃣ Share in Company Growth: We believe that excellent talent is the most important factor in achieving any great endeavor. Therefore, the company has reserved a sufficient stock option pool. We are very willing to share the rewards of the company's growth with more people through equity incentives.
5️⃣ Opportunity to Realize Your Dreams: We are a group of passionate young people with dreams. We know that many people are not lacking in ability, but in a crucible to temper themselves and a stage to showcase themselves. We hope to provide like-minded individuals with the opportunity to achieve their dreams. Whether in technology, product, or design, we will match you with top-tier resources and create the best conditions to realize our common dream!

title: Java 技术支持工程师（远程办公）
team: 深圳市同讯信息技术有限公司
summary: Java,桌面技术,Swing、JavaFX、SWT,接受居家办公,英语,Kotlin
summary_chinese: 开发者问题响应与解决,IT技术服务,Java生态,Java桌面技术,跨时区协作,英语沟通
summary_english: Developer Issue Response & Resolution,IT Technical Services,Java Ecosystem,Java Desktop Technologies,Cross-timezone Collaboration,English Communication
description:
一、岗位基本信息​
工作模式：远程办公​
团队协作：需与全球同事高效协作，同步问题与方案​
⼆、核⼼⼯作职责​
1. 响应开发者使用公司 Java 库的问题（功能异常、报错、兼容性等），提供可落地解决方案；​
2. 衔接客户与核⼼团队：传递问题细节（场景、复现步骤、环境），同步排查进度与结果，确保问题闭环；​
3.凭产品知识与经验复现客户问题，为核心团队定位根源提供依据；​
4.开发 “最小化可复现示例”，帮助开发者与团队快速定位问题；​
5.基于英文文档优化中文版本，确保术语准确、符合中文阅读习惯；​
6. 按规范编写 Java 相关示例应用，覆盖核心功能，助力开发者上手。​
三、任职要求​
语言能力：​
1.中文母语，确保文档与沟通流畅；​
2. 英语中级及以上，可与全球同事沟通（邮件、会议、读文档）；​
技术经验：​
1. 3-5 年 Java 开发经验，熟悉 Java 生态；​
2. 熟练掌握 Java 核心技术（JVM、集合、并发等）及桌面技术（Swing、JavaFX、SWT、AWT）；​
3. 加分项：​掌握 Kotlin+Compose Multiplatform（桌面端）；​有技术支持经验，熟悉沟通与问题闭环流程。
深圳市同讯信息技术有限公司成立于2015年底，我们是一家面向大湾区特别是为深圳、香港两地企业提供IT技术服务的科技公司。我们的总部位于深圳南山科技园，在香港设有海外业务平台（叫博洋咨询服务有限公司)。目前服务的客户遍布大湾区重点城市如广州、惠州、深圳、香港等。
从公司成立到现在约8年多的时间里，我们为客户提供了很多数字化转型方面的服务比如：软件的定制开发及维护，企业业务流程咨询实施服务，IT技术人力外包等。博洋咨询服务有限公司是我们在2023年于香港注册的公司，成立这个平台的目的是借助公司专注于大湾区企业的项目服务经验，结合公司管理层在跨国公司近20多年的IT服务管理实战技能，为香港市场提供更有针对性的技术服务方案。我们目前对香港客户主要提供离岸技术外包和IT技术人才的搜索及推荐服务。通过我们的方案，可以帮助客户快速的扩充他们的项目交付能力特别是在一些目前市场很紧缺的人才方向上如网络、安全等方面，同时维持一个相对较低的运营成本。
除了在大湾区，我们还在中国内陆的中心城市-郑州设有一个交付中心，对于客户交付紧急性不高，同时预算比较限制的项目我们会建议客户放到这里，这样通过香港（深圳）结合郑州的交付模式给我们的客户提供性价比最优的解决方案。

title: 资深服务端开发工程师+远程办公+上市公司P8
title_chinese: 资深服务端开发工程师
team: 某大型电子商务公司
summary: Java,SpringCloud,Redis,Node.js,AWS,电商
summary_chinese: 电商服务端开发,电商行业,高并发微服务,Java/Go,AWS,8年以上经验
summary_english: E-commerce Backend Development,E-commerce Industry,High Concurrency Microservices,Java/Go,AWS,8+ Years of Experience
description:
工作职责：
1.需要有2+个电商核心业务模块经验（订单交易，支付，商品，库存，价格，履约等）
2. 为基于 AWS 的先进电子商务平台开发高质量、可扩展且可靠的服务端解决方案
3.. 使用最新的开源和云技术创建解决方案，例如 Java、Go、Node.js，AWS ECS、Lambda、Aurora 和 CloudFormation
4. 负责大规模工程项目从开始到交付的全流程，包括细化需求、设计、编码、测试到部署和运营
5. 运用工程最佳实践，并不断改进团队流程以提高效率
任职要求
1. 8 年以上的服务端开发经验
2. 熟悉电商核心系统的开发
3. 精通至少其中一种开发语言或运行时：Java, Go, Python, JavaScript, Node.js
4. 深入理解数据结构，算法，设计模式和常用的开发框架
5. 熟悉高可用、高并发微服务后端开发和性能调优
6. 熟悉 MySQL 和 NoSQL 数据库
7. 熟悉 Redis、Elasticsearch、Kafka 等主流中间件

description_english:
Job Responsibilities:
1. Experience with 2+ core e-commerce business modules (order transactions, payments, products, inventory, pricing, fulfillment, etc.)
2. Develop high-quality, scalable, and reliable backend solutions for an advanced e-commerce platform based on AWS
3.. Create solutions using the latest open-source and cloud technologies, such as Java, Go, Node.js, AWS ECS, Lambda, Aurora, and CloudFormation
4. Responsible for the entire lifecycle of large-scale engineering projects from start to delivery, including refining requirements, design, coding, testing, to deployment and operations
5. Apply engineering best practices and continuously improve team processes to increase efficiency
Job Requirements:
1. 8+ years of backend development experience
2. Familiar with the development of core e-commerce systems
3. Proficient in at least one of the following development languages or runtimes: Java, Go, Python, JavaScript, Node.js
4. In-depth understanding of data structures, algorithms, design patterns, and common development frameworks
5. Familiar with the development and performance tuning of highly available, high-concurrency microservice backends
6. Familiar with MySQL and NoSQL databases
7. Familiar with mainstream middleware such as Redis, Elasticsearch, Kafka, etc.

title: AI Infra - US Copilot - Remote
team: 某计算机服务公司
summary: 后端开发经验,Docker,全栈侧重后端,K8s,英语读写能力良好
summary_chinese: DevOps与后端开发,Kubernetes,混合云,AI原生应用,基础设施成本优化,灵活的工作时间
summary_english: DevOps & Backend Development,Kubernetes,Hybrid Cloud,AI-native Applications,Infrastructure Cost Optimization,Flexible Working Hours
description:
职位描述：
我们正在寻找一位专注于DevOps和基础设施的工程师，同时具备后端业务开发经验。理想的候选人应具备强大的技术背景，能够设计和实施高效的开发者工具，优化基础设施成本，并在Kubernete（k8s）和混合云环境中工作。此外，候选人应对AI原生应用有深入理解，并能在快节奏的工作环境中保持高效。
主要职责：
设计和实施开发者工具，提高开发效率和代码质量。
优化和降低基础设施成本，确保资源的高效利用。
在Kubernetes和混合云环境中部署和管理应用。
参与AI原生应用的开发和优化。
与后端业务团队紧密合作，确保基础设施支持业务需求。
职位要求：
计算机科学或相关领域的学士/硕士学位。
至少3年DevOps/Infra和后端开发经验。
精通Kubernetes和混合云环境。
有AI原生应用开发经验者优先。
强大的问题解决能力和团队合作精神。
良好的沟通能力，能够与非技术团队成员有效合作。
年龄不限，但需具备适应快节奏工作环境的能力。
我们提供：
具有竞争力的薪资和福利。
灵活的工作时间和远程工作选项。
专业成长和发展的机会。
充满活力和支持性的工作环境

description_english:
Job Description:
We are looking for an engineer focused on DevOps and infrastructure, with backend business development experience. The ideal candidate should have a strong technical background, be able to design and implement efficient developer tools, optimize infrastructure costs, and work in Kubernetes (k8s) and hybrid cloud environments. Additionally, the candidate should have a deep understanding of AI-native applications and be able to maintain high efficiency in a fast-paced work environment.
Key Responsibilities:
Design and implement developer tools to improve development efficiency and code quality.
Optimize and reduce infrastructure costs, ensuring efficient resource utilization.
Deploy and manage applications in Kubernetes and hybrid cloud environments.
Participate in the development and optimization of AI-native applications.
Collaborate closely with backend business teams to ensure infrastructure supports business needs.
Job Requirements:
Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
At least 3 years of experience in DevOps/Infra and backend development.
Proficient in Kubernetes and hybrid cloud environments.
Experience with AI-native application development is a plus.
Strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative spirit.
Good communication skills, able to cooperate effectively with non-technical team members.
No age limit, but must be able to adapt to a fast-paced work environment.
We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits.
Flexible working hours and remote work options.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.
A vibrant and supportive work environment

title: HR招聘经理（remote）
team: 某小型基金公司
summary: 招聘,组织发展,HRBP经验,金融,业务部门
summary_chinese: 招聘与HRBP,互联网行业,2-8年HR经验,多渠道招聘,人才数据库管理,扁平化管理
summary_english: Recruitment & HRBP,Internet Industry,2-8 Years HR Experience,Multi-channel Recruiting,Talent Database Management,Flat Management
description:
岗位职责：
1. 负责公司日常招聘和其他BP相关事宜；
2. 协调各部门的招聘需求，确保招聘的精准性与高效性；
3. 负责候选人的简历评估，包括其专业技能、工作经验和职业态度；
4. 管理并更新人才数据库，确保信息的完整性和实时更新。
岗位要求：
1. 2-8年左右HR工作经验，量化同行业背景 或 字节等互联网大厂绩效优异；
2. 熟悉多种招聘渠道，具备优秀的面试技巧和判断能力；
3. 具有良好的沟通、谈判与组织协调能力，能够高效完成招聘任务；
4. 具备一定的数据分析能力更佳，能够优化招聘流程并提升招聘效果；
我们提供：
1. 合理的培养模式和良好的工作体验；
2. 行业领先的业务水平，更深入的理解业务，不断提高职业发展天花板；
3. 扁平化管理模式，优秀的团队背景，自由的远程办公模式

title: 小红书运营（远程办公）
team: 北京海特思文教育科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 新媒体用户运营,国际教育,英国留学领域,多平台社交媒体,用户增长与转化,节假日福利
summary_english: New Media User Operations,International Education,UK Study Abroad Sector,Multi-platform Social Media,User Growth and Conversion,Holiday Benefits
description:
【岗位职责】
1.负责运营微博/小红书/抖音/豆瓣/知乎/B站等新媒体平台；
2.负责通过相关社交媒体运营进行用户运营；
3.负责日常维护客户工作，对转化结果负责；
4.远程线上工作（“云”工作模式），地点不限。
【任职要求】
1.本科及以上学历毕业；
2.应届生或者1年（以上）工作经验；
3.对英国留学有了解和接触；
4.对相关社交媒体操作熟练，擅长使用微博/小红书/抖音/豆瓣/知乎/B站等平台；
5.热衷互联网新鲜信息，有新媒体运营经验；
6.沟通能力强，有一定的推广/销售经验；
7.有一定的客户挖掘能力；
【我们的文化】
1.结果导向，效率为主，创造价值：我们注重工作结果和效率，以创造价值为核心目标;
2.美貌与智慧并重的年轻团队（高颜值+高学历背景），实干为主：公司拥有一支充满活力的年轻团队，崇尚实干精神。
【超明朗的晋升通道】
1.纵向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 团队主管 – 部门主管 – 部门经理 – 部门负责人
2.横向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 项目/品牌主管 – 项目/品牌负责人
3.毕业生孵化计划：一对一培训 + 各部门轮岗机会 
【超酷的福利待遇】
1.高于同行业薪水 & 奖金丰厚不封顶
2.线上工作，无需通勤
3.表现优异者可享有年度一次的线下团建机会及不定期异地培训福利，助力职业成长
4.宽松高效简单的工作氛围，定期培训无天花板晋级成长通道
【超暖心的人员关怀】
1.节假日节日慰问 & 各大电商平台现金卡礼物
2.入职周年祝福 & 周年纪念日礼物
3.不定期线上（故事分享、线上年会、演唱会、周年庆感受分享等） &  线下团建活动（世界各地线下饭局、中英总部-北京伯明翰线下年会活动等）
（注意：仅限本公司使用，严禁搬运）
海特思文（Hitevision）全球国际教育引领者，总部位于北京。​ 秉持“无国界教育”理念，我们构建了覆盖中国大陆、香港及亚非欧核心地区的强大服务网络（近百家门店/分部）。依托顶尖全球资源与深谙本地的国际化团队，我们为学子提供专业、高效、个性化的一站式国际教育服务，助力拥抱多元文化、开拓全球视野、实现世界顶尖学府梦想。 ​ 
公司以“年轻、精进、担当、共赢”为文化，汇聚实干精英，矢志成为学生连接全球机遇的战略伙伴。​ 
加入我们，与全球化精英团队共成长，启迪智慧，照亮世界征程！​    ​
description_chinese:
【岗位职责】
1.负责运营微博/小红书/抖音/豆瓣/知乎/B站等新媒体平台；
2.负责通过相关社交媒体运营进行用户运营；
3.负责日常维护客户工作，对转化结果负责；
4.远程线上工作（“云”工作模式），地点不限。
【任职要求】
1.本科及以上学历毕业；
2.应届生或者1年（以上）工作经验；
3.对英国留学有了解和接触；
4.对相关社交媒体操作熟练，擅长使用微博/小红书/抖音/豆瓣/知乎/B站等平台；
5.热衷互联网新鲜信息，有新媒体运营经验；
6.沟通能力强，有一定的推广/销售经验；
7.有一定的客户挖掘能力；
【我们的文化】
1.结果导向，效率为主，创造价值：我们注重工作结果和效率，以创造价值为核心目标;
2.美貌与智慧并重的年轻团队（高颜值+高学历背景），实干为主：公司拥有一支充满活力的年轻团队，崇尚实干精神。
【超明朗的晋升通道】
1.纵向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 团队主管 – 部门主管 – 部门经理 – 部门负责人
2.横向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 项目/品牌主管 – 项目/品牌负责人
3.毕业生孵化计划：一对一培训 + 各部门轮岗机会 
【超酷的福利待遇】
1.高于同行业薪水 & 奖金丰厚不封顶

3.表现优异者可享有年度一次的线下团建机会及不定期异地培训福利，助力职业成长
4.宽松高效简单的工作氛围，定期培训无天花板晋级成长通道

title: 高级灯光设计师（远程办公）
team: 浙江摩根集团有限公司
summary: 3ds MAX,五险一金,PS,AutoCAD,灯具产品设计,大小周
summary_chinese: 专业照明设计,智能家居,销售支持,城市代理商培训,高频出差,沟通销售能力
summary_english: Professional Lighting Design,Smart Home,Sales Support,City Agent Training,Frequent Business Travel,Communication & Sales Skills
description:
职责描述 :
一丶核心定位
兼具销售敏锐度与专业照明设计能力的复合型人才作为品牌在总代城市赋能的关键角色，需通过专业知识输出与高效沟通，助力城市代理商提升业务能力与市场竞争力，同时拓展品牌市场份额。
二、核心特质
1.强沟通销售能力:如销售精英般擅长表达，能精准洞察客户需求，通过极具感染力的语言阐述灯光设计方案的价值，推动合作达成。
2.专业设计背景:优先考虑具备审美能力的灯光设计师，熟悉灯光设计原理、空间美学及行业前沿趋势能够将创意与功能结合，设计出个性化灯光方案
三丶能力要求
1.学习力:面对不断更新的灯光技术、设计理念和市场动态，能够快速学习并掌握新知识，及时将新内容融入培训与设计方案中。
2.积极主动性:主动挖掘城市代理商及客户需求，提前规划赋能工作，主动拓展潜在合作机会，积极推动业务发展。
3.执行力:高效落实各项工作任务，包括灯光方案设计、城市培训计划执行，确保在规定时间内高质量完成工作目标。
4.正能量:始终保持积极乐观的工作态度，以热情和活力感染团队与合作伙伴，营造良好的工作氛围与合作环境。
五、工作特性
能够适应高频出差工作模式，负责10-15 个城市的穿梭出差培训工作。能够在不同城市快速开展工作为当地代理商提供专业培训与技术支持
浙江摩根集团有限公司位于浙江宁波，是高端智能家居制造商，公司以自主研发的总线控制技术和云技术为核心，开发了能实现本地和远程可视化控制的500多种智能化产品。目前公司拥有技术专利已达160多项，其中智能模块、智能主机、智能遥控器等均是业内前列，实现了智能家居产品随时随地、随心所欲的操控，真正做到“智能化”、“远程化”。 
        摩根智能的工业设计，传承了简洁、舒适、人性化的用户体验，摩根智能致力于为全球客户提供高品质的技术产品，我们以创新的技术、完善的解决方案，坚持不懈地为客户提供全面支持，并以出众的品质和令人信赖的可靠性，前瞻的技术成就，确立了在全球市场地位。公司现有员工近千人，年销售额15亿人民币，同时在宁波、上海、北京、广州、深圳、杭州、武汉、苏州、成都、东莞、佛山等11个城市设立分公司。

description_english:
Job Responsibilities:
I. Core Positioning
A hybrid talent with both sales acumen and professional lighting design capabilities, serving as a key role in empowering the brand in general agent cities. Needs to enhance the business capabilities and market competitiveness of city agents through the output of professional knowledge and efficient communication, while also expanding the brand's market share.
II. Core Traits
1. Strong Communication and Sales Ability: As articulate as a sales elite, able to accurately discern customer needs, convey the value of lighting design solutions with compelling language, and drive cooperation.
2. Professional Design Background: Preference for lighting designers with aesthetic abilities, familiar with lighting design principles, spatial aesthetics, and cutting-edge industry trends, capable of combining creativity with functionality to design personalized lighting solutions.
III. Skill Requirements
1. Learning Ability: Able to quickly learn and master new knowledge in the face of constantly updated lighting technology, design concepts, and market dynamics, and promptly integrate new content into training and design plans.
2. Proactiveness: Actively explore the needs of city agents and customers, plan empowerment work in advance, proactively seek potential cooperation opportunities, and actively promote business development.
3. Execution Ability: Efficiently implement various work tasks, including lighting solution design and execution of city training plans, ensuring high-quality completion of work goals within the specified time.
4. Positive Energy: Always maintain a positive and optimistic work attitude, inspiring the team and partners with enthusiasm and vitality to create a good working atmosphere and cooperative environment.
V. Work Characteristics
Able to adapt to a high-frequency business travel work model, responsible for shuttle business travel and training across 10-15 cities. Capable of quickly starting work in different cities to provide professional training and technical support to local agents.
Zhejiang Morgan Group Co., Ltd. is located in Ningbo, Zhejiang, and is a high-end smart home manufacturer. With its self-developed bus control technology and cloud technology as its core, the company has developed over 500 intelligent products that enable local and remote visual control. Currently, the company holds more than 160 technology patents, with its smart modules, smart hosts, and smart remote controls being among the top in the industry, achieving control of smart home products anytime, anywhere, and truly realizing 'intelligence' and 'remoteness'.
        The industrial design of Morgan Smart inherits a simple, comfortable, and user-friendly experience. Morgan Smart is committed to providing high-quality technology products to global customers. We provide comprehensive support to customers with innovative technology and complete solutions, and have established a global market position with outstanding quality, reliable credibility, and forward-looking technological achievements. The company currently has nearly a thousand employees, an annual sales revenue of 1.5 billion RMB, and has established branches in 11 cities including Ningbo, Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Hangzhou, Wuhan, Suzhou, Chengdu, Dongguan, and Foshan.

title: Remote-安卓架构开发（Kotlin）-不卡年龄
team: 某互联网公司
summary: Android开发经验,架构经验,架构设计/优化,Android客户端产品研发,架构设计能力,Flutter,前端开发经验,Kotlin
summary_chinese: 客户端平台架构设计,性能优化与ANR治理,网络库优化,组件化开发,Kotlin/Java
summary_english: Client-side Platform Architecture Design,Performance Optimization & ANR Governance,Network Library Optimization,Component-based Development,Kotlin/Java
description:
岗位职责：
设计 Android 客户端平台架构，并推动业务治理优化；
参与架构演进方向的规划，提出优化建议，并与架构师团队协作推进新架构落地；
负责模块化、网络库优化、性能优化（ANR率）、内存管理、功耗控制、网络通信、业务调度等核心技术指标的优化；
推动 Android 前沿技术在公司内的应⽤，提升开发效率与创新能⼒；
配合安全团队完成相关安全功能的开发与优化；
赋能团队，提升整体开发效率，并助⼒初中级工程师成长。
任职要求：
计算机相关专业，本科及以上学历，5 年以上客户端开发经验，3 年以上架构设计经验；
熟悉组件化开发，精通 Kotlin、Java，了解 C++；
深入理解Android 底层原理，熟悉操作系统、内存管理、⽹络通信等计算机基础知识；
具备长期 ANR 治理、网络库优化经验，能够系统性优化应用稳定性；
编程风格良好，具备扎实的数据结构与算法基础，深入理解面向对象编程思想，具备较强的架构设计能力；
具备优秀的团队沟通与协作能力，有项目或团队管理经验者优先；
具备互联网大厂工作经验或中台相关经验者优先；
具备研发流水线建设或Android 研发工具链建设经验者优先。

title: IT Service Desk Analyst  -- 粤语
team: 维布络信息科技（天津）有限公司
summary: 企业内部IT技术支持,IT技术支持经验,粤语,英文可沟通
summary_chinese: 一线IT支持,信息技术服务,粤语/英语,ITSM工具,24x7轮班,外企
summary_english: First-line IT Support,IT Services,Cantonese/English,ITSM Tools,24x7 Shifts,Foreign Enterprise
description:
Overview:
The IT Service Desk Analyst is a critical member of our Global Help Desk team, responsible for providing first-line support and troubleshooting services to end-users across the organization in APAC region. This role requires a strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and a customer-focused attitude to ensure efficient resolution of technical issues. 
Role Purpose / Description:
The job holder will have to perform the following duties:
•	To deliver IT Service desk related services to users and business partners via Voice or Email channels.
•	To handle an acceptable volume of user requests/calls and complete them in the specified Turn Around Time.
•	To identify the customer requirements accurately. User requests should be fully analyzed and processed by following the standards, procedures and policies.
•	To work on feedback and ensure errors are not repeated.
•	To identify and resolve complex issues on a day-to-day basis, escalating if required to the relevant support areas and senior management.
•	To acquire a thorough understanding of the process procedures, keep abreast with changes made and provide quality services to the users.
Key Responsibilities:
•	Responsible for Service ticket creation / assignment / categorization / prioritization / escalation / tracking / closure and feedback as per defined SLA in the SOW.
•	Responsible to acknowledge issues reported by users through Calls / Chat / Portal during the assigned period
•	Follow KEDBs, Wikis for resolving technical issues and follow the defined processes (SOPs / SOWs) while attempting to resolve the Incidents.
•	Ownership of the ticket until support taken from L2.
•	Routing / chasing of tickets with other PRG's.
•	Proactive ITSM Tool queue management
•	Identifying the trend of calls / tickets and highlighting it to L2 / TL / Incident manager as applicable for Outage confirmation.
•	Creating child tickets and tagging them with Parent ticket.
•	Gather information about the latest updates on the high severity incident and convey the same to the customers
•	Tracking resolution and updating KB.
•	Call-back the user and confirm resolution (wherever applicable)
Qualifications:
•	College or bachelor’s degree in computer science, Management Information Systems, Engineering, related technical field or equivalent experience are preferable.
•	Minimum of one year’s Information Technology / IT Service desk experience or equivalent.
•	Ability to build and maintain cordial relationships with users, peers and people at all levels utilizing diplomacy, judgment and interpersonal skills.
•	Good job commitment, able to perform the job according to provided procedure and work independently 
•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Fluent in spoken English and Cantonese; knowledge of Putonghua will be an advantage; Good written English for correspondence.
Skills:
•	Experience with IT service management tools (e.g., ServiceNow).
•	Familiarity with remote desktop software, common IT systems and software applications
•	Attention to detail and ability to multitask effectively.
•	Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving abilities.
•	Team player with positive attitude towards learning and continuous improvement.
Working Hours:
Work according to shift roster to provide 24 x 7 support
维布络集团（Wipro）成立于1945年，总部位于印度班加罗尔，2000年在美国上市。自成立至今，维布络集团已在全球65个国家建有公司，员工超过23万人，主要业务涵盖信息技术服务、信息技术产品研发、业务流程外包、技术工程等多个领域。维布络集团拥有ISO9001、270001行政资源，CMMI 2.0开发和服务能力，MLPS 2.0跨境传输协议，以及技术先进型服务企业等认证，通过生成式人工智能、硅芯片设计、区块链整合技术、数字云、工程和数字运营等新兴技术，帮助客户实现数字化转型和可持续发展。维布络集团与塔塔咨询服务（TCS）、印孚瑟斯（Infosys）并称为印度的“三驾马车”，在全球拥有55个研发中心，与微软、谷歌、AWS和英伟达等合作伙伴密切合作，根据产业需求，设有40余个方案解决中心，为全球945家企业提供服务，其中包含150余家财富500强企业。维布络集团是全球公认的可持续发展和环境、社会和治理（ESG）的长期领导者，作为“向零净值转变”的十大创始成员之一，维布络集团以生态可持续、对社会负责、以良好治理为基础的方式创造经济价值。
description_chinese:
概述：
IT服务台分析师是我们全球帮助台团队的关键成员，负责为整个亚太地区的最终用户提供一线支持和故障排除服务。该职位需要扎实的技术背景、出色的沟通技巧和以客户为中心的态度，以确保高效解决技术问题。
角色目的/描述：
职位持有人需履行以下职责：
• 通过语音或电子邮件渠道向用户和业务合作伙伴提供IT服务台相关服务。
• 处理可接受数量的用户请求/电话，并在指定的周转时间内完成。
• 准确识别客户需求。应遵循标准、程序和政策，全面分析和处理用户请求。
• 根据反馈进行改进，确保不再重复错误。
• 识别和解决日常复杂问题，并在需要时上报给相关支持区域和高级管理层。
• 全面了解流程程序，跟上变化，为用户提供优质服务。
主要职责：
• 根据SOW中定义的SLA，负责服务工单的创建/分配/分类/优先级排序/升级/跟踪/关闭和反馈。
• 负责在指定时间内通过电话/聊天/门户网站确认用户报告的问题。
• 遵循KEDBs、Wikis解决技术问题，并在尝试解决事件时遵循已定义的流程（SOPs / SOWs）。
• 在问题移交给L2支持之前，对工单负责。
• 与其他PRG进行工单的路由/跟进。
• 主动进行ITSM工具队列管理。
• 识别电话/工单的趋势，并向L2 / TL / 事件经理强调，以便确认故障。
• 创建子工单并将其与父工单关联。
• 收集有关高严重性事件的最新更新信息，并传达给客户。
• 跟踪解决方案并更新知识库（KB）。
• 回电用户并确认问题已解决（如适用）。
资格要求：
• 优先考虑拥有计算机科学、管理信息系统、工程、相关技术领域或同等经验的大专或学士学位。
• 至少一年信息技术/IT服务台或同等经验。
• 能够运用外交手腕、判断力和人际交往能力，与用户、同事和各级人员建立并维持友好关系。
• 良好的工作投入度，能够按照既定程序工作并独立完成任务。
• 出色的口头和书面沟通能力。流利的英语和粤语口语；懂普通话者优先；良好的书面英语用于通信。
技能：
• 具有IT服务管理工具（如ServiceNow）的使用经验。
• 熟悉远程桌面软件、常见的IT系统和软件应用。
• 注重细节，能够有效处理多项任务。
• 强大的故障排除和问题解决能力。
• 具有团队合作精神，对学习和持续改进持积极态度。
工作时间：
根据轮班表工作，提供24 x 7支持
维布络集团（Wipro）成立于1945年，总部位于印度班加罗尔，2000年在美国上市。自成立至今，维布络集团已在全球65个国家建有公司，员工超过23万人，主要业务涵盖信息技术服务、信息技术产品研发、业务流程外包、技术工程等多个领域。维布络集团拥有ISO9001、270001行政资源，CMMI 2.0开发和服务能力，MLPS 2.0跨境传输协议，以及技术先进型服务企业等认证，通过生成式人工智能、硅芯片设计、区块链整合技术、数字云、工程和数字运营等新兴技术，帮助客户实现数字化转型和可持续发展。维布络集团与塔塔咨询服务（TCS）、印孚瑟斯（Infosys）并称为印度的“三驾马车”，在全球拥有55个研发中心，与微软、谷歌、AWS和英伟达等合作伙伴密切合作，根据产业需求，设有40余个方案解决中心，为全球945家企业提供服务，其中包含150余家财富500强企业。维布络集团是全球公认的可持续发展和环境、社会和治理（ESG）的长期领导者，作为“向零净值转变”的十大创始成员之一，维布络集团以生态可持续、对社会负责、以良好治理为基础的方式创造经济价值。
description_english:
Overview:
The IT Service Desk Analyst is a critical member of our Global Help Desk team, responsible for providing first-line support and troubleshooting services to end-users across the organization in the APAC region. This role requires a strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and a customer-focused attitude to ensure efficient resolution of technical issues.
Role Purpose / Description:
The job holder will have to perform the following duties:
• To deliver IT Service desk related services to users and business partners via Voice or Email channels.
• To handle an acceptable volume of user requests/calls and complete them in the specified Turn Around Time.
• To identify the customer requirements accurately. User requests should be fully analyzed and processed by following the standards, procedures and policies.
• To work on feedback and ensure errors are not repeated.
• To identify and resolve complex issues on a day-to-day basis, escalating if required to the relevant support areas and senior management.
• To acquire a thorough understanding of the process procedures, keep abreast with changes made and provide quality services to the users.
Key Responsibilities:
• Responsible for Service ticket creation / assignment / categorization / prioritization / escalation / tracking / closure and feedback as per defined SLA in the SOW.
• Responsible to acknowledge issues reported by users through Calls / Chat / Portal during the assigned period
• Follow KEDBs, Wikis for resolving technical issues and follow the defined processes (SOPs / SOWs) while attempting to resolve the Incidents.
• Ownership of the ticket until support taken from L2.
• Routing / chasing of tickets with other PRG's.
• Proactive ITSM Tool queue management
• Identifying the trend of calls / tickets and highlighting it to L2 / TL / Incident manager as applicable for Outage confirmation.
• Creating child tickets and tagging them with Parent ticket.
• Gather information about the latest updates on the high severity incident and convey the same to the customers
• Tracking resolution and updating KB.
• Call-back the user and confirm resolution (wherever applicable)
Qualifications:
• College or bachelor’s degree in computer science, Management Information Systems, Engineering, related technical field or equivalent experience are preferable.
• Minimum of one year’s Information Technology / IT Service desk experience or equivalent.
• Ability to build and maintain cordial relationships with users, peers and people at all levels utilizing diplomacy, judgment and interpersonal skills.
• Good job commitment, able to perform the job according to provided procedure and work independently
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Fluent in spoken English and Cantonese; knowledge of Putonghua will be an advantage; Good written English for correspondence.
Skills:
• Experience with IT service management tools (e.g., ServiceNow).
• Familiarity with remote desktop software, common IT systems and software applications
• Attention to detail and ability to multitask effectively.
• Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving abilities.
• Team player with positive attitude towards learning and continuous improvement.
Working Hours:
Work according to shift roster to provide 24 x 7 support
Wipro Group (Wipro) was founded in 1945, is headquartered in Bangalore, India, and was listed in the United States in 2000. Since its establishment, Wipro Group has set up companies in 65 countries worldwide, with over 230,000 employees, and its main business covers multiple fields such as information technology services, IT product R&D, business process outsourcing, and technology engineering. Wipro Group holds certifications such as ISO9001, 270001 administrative resources, CMMI 2.0 development and service capabilities, MLPS 2.0 cross-border transmission protocol, and Technology-Advanced Service Enterprise. Through emerging technologies like generative artificial intelligence, silicon chip design, blockchain integration, digital cloud, engineering, and digital operations, it helps clients achieve digital transformation and sustainable development. Wipro Group, along with Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) and Infosys, is known as one of India's "big three." It has 55 R&D centers globally and works closely with partners like Microsoft, Google, AWS, and NVIDIA. Based on industry demand, it has established over 40 solution centers, providing services to 945 enterprises worldwide, including over 150 Fortune 500 companies. Wipro Group is a globally recognized long-term leader in sustainability and Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG). As one of the ten founding members of the "Transition to Net Zero" initiative, Wipro Group creates economic value in a manner that is ecologically sustainable, socially responsible, and founded on good governance.

title: 高级风控系统开发Java-远程办公
title_chinese: 高级风控系统Java开发工程师
title_english: Senior Risk Control System Java Developer
team: 某大型计算机软件国有公司
summary: Java,MySQL,Spring
summary_chinese: 风控系统研发,金融科技,高并发系统设计,Java后端,分布式系统,多线程与并发
summary_english: Risk Control System R&D,FinTech,High-Concurrency System Design,Java Backend,Distributed Systems,Multithreading & Concurrency
description:
岗位职责：
1、负责风控系统技术方案设计、需求把控及核心功能开发，建设高并发、高性能、⾼可⽤的系统；
2、参与风控系统架构演进、性能优化和稳定性建设、故障排查和解决等⼯作；
3、参与知识传播及技术分享，促进团队成员共同进步。
岗位要求：
1、3年及以上互联网研发工作经验，熟悉Java语⾔，有良好的Java基础，熟悉IO、多线程等基础技术，对多线程使用、并发处理、JVM基本原理有一定认识；
2、编码功底功扎实，熟悉Spring、Mysql、Redis等常用技术，并理解其原理；
3、有扎实的数据库、中间件知识；熟悉常用的数据结构、算法、设计模式；计算机系统与网络基础知识扎实；
4、具有良好的抽象设计能力，思路清晰，能较独立地分析和解决问题；
5、对分布式系统有较深理解，熟悉常用的MQ系统、一致性协议等；
6、具备良好的学习能力，沟通能力，责任心强，具备良好的团队合作精神。
加分项：
1、有大型网站、分布式系统设计与研发经验背景；
2、有风控系统开发经验；
3、有资金核对或对账开发经验。

title: Java大数据平台开发工程师（远程办公）
title_chinese: Java大数据平台开发工程师
title_english: Java Big Data Platform Development Engineer
team: 奥拉帕迪（广州）科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 数据平台架构与研发,移动应用,Hadoop/Spark/Flink,大模型数据智能体,RAG
summary_english: Data Platform Architecture and R&D,Mobile Applications,Hadoop/Spark/Flink,Large Model Data Agent,RAG
description:
岗位职责
1、数据平台的架构设计与研发，保障数据平台服务的稳定性与高可用性
2、离线/实时数据计算、数据治理、自助分析报表和OLAP查询引擎等大数据组件的功能设计、开发和持续优化
3、探索⼤模型的数据智能体（Data Agent）体系，构建具备⾃然语⾔理解与数据操作能力的Agent，提升数据分析、处理与Pipeline构建的智能化水平
4、构建训练数据全⽣命周期管理体系，覆盖数据元数据、血缘、质量评估、自动化评估，保障大模型训练的数据可控与高质量
任职要求：
1、5年以上大数据平台相关经验，本科以上学历，计算机、软件工程、人工智能、数学等相关专业
2、熟练Spring boot,Mybatis等主流框架,有较好的Web（vue)开发技术；有企业级大数据系统软件集成开发经验者优先
3、熟悉Hadoop、Spark、Flink、Kafka、Paimon、ClikHouse、Doris等组件特性及使用场景，并能解决使用过程中遇到的问题
4、有实际参与过大模型数据体系建设、多模态数据处理系统，对LLM Agent AutoML、数据智能化流程有兴趣，探索并推动落地的能力优先
5、熟悉大模型应用及相关技术，如RAG、MCP、Agent等
6、有高度的工作责任心，学习能力强，善于沟通，勤于思考，具备较强的团队合作能力，有团队管理经验优先
Ola Party 是一家专注于移动应用领域的国际化科技公司，是全球发展最快的科技型企业之一，Ola Party 拥有一流的科技研发团队、领先的核心技术和产品、丰富的科技业态和资源。在多个国家和地区设有分公司和业务机构，在全球各地拥有近2000余名员工。

1、数据平台的架构设计与研发，保障数据平台服务的稳定性与高可用性
2、离线/实时数据计算、数据治理、自助分析报表和OLAP查询引擎等大数据组件的功能设计、开发和持续优化
3、探索⼤模型的数据智能体（Data Agent）体系，构建具备⾃然语⾔理解与数据操作能力的Agent，提升数据分析、处理与Pipeline构建的智能化水平

1、5年以上大数据平台相关经验，本科以上学历，计算机、软件工程、人工智能、数学等相关专业
2、熟练Spring boot,Mybatis等主流框架,有较好的Web（vue)开发技术；有企业级大数据系统软件集成开发经验者优先
3、熟悉Hadoop、Spark、Flink、Kafka、Paimon、ClikHouse、Doris等组件特性及使用场景，并能解决使用过程中遇到的问题
4、有实际参与过大模型数据体系建设、多模态数据处理系统，对LLM Agent AutoML、数据智能化流程有兴趣，探索并推动落地的能力优先
5、熟悉大模型应用及相关技术，如RAG、MCP、Agent等
6、有高度的工作责任心，学习能力强，善于沟通，勤于思考，具备较强的团队合作能力，有团队管理经验优先
Ola Party 是一家专注于移动应用领域的国际化科技公司，是全球发展最快的科技型企业之一，Ola Party 拥有一流的科技研发团队、领先的核心技术和产品、丰富的科技业态和资源。在多个国家和地区设有分公司和业务机构，在全球各地拥有近2000余名员工。
description_english:
Responsibilities
1. Architect, design, and develop the data platform, ensuring the stability and high availability of data platform services.
2. Design, develop, and continuously optimize big data components such as offline/real-time data computation, data governance, self-service analysis reports, and OLAP query engines.
3. Explore the Data Agent system for large models, build Agents with natural language understanding and data manipulation capabilities, and enhance the intelligence level of data analysis, processing, and pipeline construction.
4. Build a full lifecycle management system for training data, covering data metadata, lineage, quality assessment, and automated evaluation, to ensure the controllability and high quality of data for large model training.
Requirements:
1. 5+ years of experience in big data platforms, with a bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Mathematics, or related fields.
2. Proficient in mainstream frameworks like Spring Boot, Mybatis, with good Web (Vue) development skills; experience in enterprise-level big data system software integration and development is a plus.
3. Familiar with the features and usage scenarios of components like Hadoop, Spark, Flink, Kafka, Paimon, ClickHouse, Doris, and able to solve problems encountered during their use.
4. Experience in building large model data systems and multi-modal data processing systems is a plus; interest in LLM Agent AutoML, and intelligent data processes, with the ability to explore and implement them is preferred.
5. Familiar with large model applications and related technologies, such as RAG, MCP, Agent, etc.
6. High sense of responsibility, strong learning ability, good at communication, diligent in thinking, strong teamwork skills; team management experience is a plus.
Ola Party is an international technology company focused on the mobile application field, and one of the fastest-growing tech companies globally. Ola Party has a first-class R&D team, leading core technologies and products, and rich technology formats and resources. It has branches and business institutions in multiple countries and regions, with nearly 2,000 employees worldwide.

description_english:
This position requires video-related experience
Job Requirements:
1. Solid foundation in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3;
2. Proficient in the Vue technology stack and its ecosystem, with practical project experience in complex Vue 2/3 single-page applications, and understanding of its core principles;
3. Familiar with frontend engineering and build tools such as Webpack, Vite, Babel, etc., with experience in engineering optimization;
4. Strong sense of responsibility and team spirit, good communication skills, and problem-solving abilities.
Qualifications:
1. Bachelor's degree or above, with 2+ years of frontend development experience; experience in developing large-scale C-end video websites or complex H5 projects is preferred.

3. Understanding of TypeScript and experience using it in projects.
4. Knowledge of video technologies (such as MP4, m3u8 protocol) or WebGL/Canvas is preferred.

MobTech is a world-leading data intelligence technology platform. In the data intelligence industry, led by data applications, it integrates top-tier advanced technologies such as big data, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence to create four major sectors: Developer Services, Commercialization, AI, and Mob Research Institute. It provides business intelligence solutions, App operation empowerment solutions, enterprise-level AI intelligence solutions, and data consulting research services to enterprises, developers, and government agencies in more than 200 countries and regions worldwide.
As of 2020, the team consists of nearly 300 people in big data R&D, data science, and data product teams, including several contributors to top open-source communities. The company has gathered a group of members who are passionate about the data intelligence industry and have visionary insights, with those born in the 80s as the core, the 90s as the main force, and the post-95s as the vanguard. Core members have previously worked at well-known IT companies such as Microsoft, Tencent, NetEase, Shanda, Duowan, and Ku6.

title: java后台开发（remote）
team: 某大型金融科技公司
summary: Java,MySQL,Spring,接受居家办公,区块链经验
summary_chinese: 金融交易后端研发,金融衍生品,高并发系统开发,分布式系统,SpringBoot,消息队列,数据库优化
summary_english: Financial Trading Backend R&D,Financial Derivatives,High Concurrency System Development,Distributed Systems,SpringBoot,Message Queues,Database Optimization
description:
岗位职责：
1-参与金融产品及衍生品业务核心交易后端的研发工作，保障系统稳定⾼效运⾏
2-根据业务需求，⾼质量独立完成服务的功能设计与开发
3-针对高并发、⼤流量的交易环境进行性能优化，确保系统的低延迟、高稳定性及高可用性
岗位要求：
1-计算机科学、软件⼯程或相关专业本科及以上学历。五年以上后端开发经验，有区块链、交易所或金融衍生品相关开发经验者优先
2-Java基础扎实，深刻理解JVM的配置优化策略、调优，熟悉IO、多线程并发框架，熟悉常见的数据结构、算法与设计模式，具有良好的编程规范和丰富的工作经验
3-熟悉主流开源应用框架，如SpringBoot、SpringCloud等
4-熟练掌握分布式系统设计与开发，具备高并发、大规模系统的开发与优化经验
5-熟悉数据库设计与优化，对事务、锁、索引深入理解，并有 SQL优化经验以及分库分表、主从同步等设计方法
6-熟悉常用中间件，如 MQ、RPC、缓存等
熟悉后端安全措施，能够处理DDoS、SQL注入等攻击风险
加分项：
- 有RocketMQ、Kafka等主流消息队列深度使⽤或调优经验。 
- 熟悉 Kubernetes (k8s) 容器编排技术，有实际的容器化应⽤部署和运维经验。 
- 对RocketMQ、Kafka等消息中间件有源码级别理解。 
- 对系统安全、攻防有深⼊理解和实践经验。 
- 活跃的开源社区贡献者，或有相关的技术博客和分享。
description_chinese:
岗位职责：
1-参与金融产品及衍生品业务核心交易后端的研发工作，保障系统稳定高效运行
2-根据业务需求，高质量独立完成服务的功能设计与开发
3-针对高并发、大流量的交易环境进行性能优化，确保系统的低延迟、高稳定性及高可用性
岗位要求：
1-计算机科学、软件工程或相关专业本科及以上学历。五年以上后端开发经验，有区块链、交易所或金融衍生品相关开发经验者优先
2-Java基础扎实，深刻理解JVM的配置优化策略、调优，熟悉IO、多线程并发框架，熟悉常见的数据结构、算法与设计模式，具有良好的编程规范和丰富的工作经验
3-熟悉主流开源应用框架，如SpringBoot、SpringCloud等
4-熟练掌握分布式系统设计与开发，具备高并发、大规模系统的开发与优化经验
5-熟悉数据库设计与优化，对事务、锁、索引深入理解，并有 SQL优化经验以及分库分表、主从同步等设计方法
6-熟悉常用中间件，如 MQ、RPC、缓存等
7-熟悉后端安全措施，能够处理DDoS、SQL注入等攻击风险
加分项：
- 有RocketMQ、Kafka等主流消息队列深度使用或调优经验。 
- 熟悉 Kubernetes (k8s) 容器编排技术，有实际的容器化应用部署和运维经验。 
- 对RocketMQ、Kafka等消息中间件有源码级别理解。 
- 对系统安全、攻防有深入理解和实践经验。 
- 活跃的开源社区贡献者，或有相关的技术博客和分享。
description_english:
Job Responsibilities:
1-Participate in the R&D of the core trading backend for financial products and derivatives, ensuring the system's stable and efficient operation.
2-Independently complete high-quality service feature design and development based on business requirements.
3-Perform performance optimization for high-concurrency, high-traffic trading environments, ensuring the system's low latency, high stability, and high availability.
Job Requirements:
1-Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. More than five years of backend development experience; experience in blockchain, exchanges, or financial derivatives development is preferred.
2-Solid Java foundation, with a deep understanding of JVM configuration optimization strategies and tuning. Familiar with IO, multithreading concurrency frameworks, common data structures, algorithms, and design patterns. Possess good programming practices and extensive work experience.
3-Familiar with mainstream open-source application frameworks, such as SpringBoot, SpringCloud, etc.
4-Proficient in the design and development of distributed systems, with experience in developing and optimizing high-concurrency, large-scale systems.
5-Familiar with database design and optimization, with a deep understanding of transactions, locks, and indexes, and experience in SQL optimization and design methods like database/table sharding and master-slave replication.
6-Familiar with common middleware such as MQ, RPC, caching, etc.
7-Familiar with backend security measures, capable of handling attack risks like DDoS and SQL injection.
Bonus Points:
- In-depth experience in using or tuning mainstream message queues like RocketMQ, Kafka.
- Familiar with Kubernetes (k8s) container orchestration technology, with practical experience in containerized application deployment and operations.
- Source-code level understanding of message middleware like RocketMQ, Kafka.
- In-depth understanding and practical experience in system security, offense, and defense.
- Active contributor to open-source communities, or have related technical blogs and presentations.

title: 【远程办公】JAVA开发工程师
team: 重庆波士科技有限公司
summary: Java,MySQL,Spring
summary_chinese: 微服务系统开发,出海互联网,Spring Cloud,Kafka,MySQL/Redis/MongoDB,ELK/Grafana,绩效奖金与十三薪
summary_english: Microservices System Development,Overseas Internet,Spring Cloud,Kafka,MySQL/Redis/MongoDB,ELK/Grafana,Performance Bonus & 13th-month Salary
description:
任职资格：
1. 学历要求：大学本科及以上学历，计算机或相关专业。
2. 工作经验：4年以上相关工作经验。
3. Java 基础：有扎实的 Java 基础，熟悉 Java 多线程、并发以及网络通信。
4. 应⽤框架：熟悉主流应⽤框架，如 Spring Boot、Spring、Spring Cloud 和 MyBatis。
5. 微服务架构：有微服务架构设计和搭建经验，熟悉 Kafka。
6. Spring Cloud 组件：熟悉 Spring Cloud 常⽤组件。
7. 监控与服务：熟悉 Grafana、ELK、ES、Etcd 和 ZooKeeper 等监控、查询和服务注册服务。
8. 数据库：熟悉关系型数据库 MySQL，以及 NoSQL 数据库如 Redis 和 MongoDB。
工作职责：
1. 开发任务：按时完成负责的开发任务，交付高质量的代码和⽂档。
系统维护：维护交易系统的高稳定性和高可用性，持续优化系统性能和用户体验。
2. 技术研究：持续研究创新性技术，并与团队成员分享研究成果。
3. 问题解决：负责定位和解决客户遇到的问题，确保系统的正常运行。
4. 团队协作：与团队成员密切协作，完成功能开发任务。"
【企业概况】
波士科技是北京哈希智算科技有限公司旗下品牌（下称“波士科技”），波士科技成立于2018年3月，是一家专注于海外招聘的人力资源服务公司，从成立伊始，就投入大量资源开发自有技术平台，专注于海外互联网产品研发，拥有一支高效的自主研发团队，以产品研发和国际化市场需求为导向，持续高效研发出符合国际化趋势的移动互联网产品。
我们致力于为全球用户提供效率工具、互动娱乐、文化生活等服务。波士科技旗下拥有多款海外移动互联网产品，拥有10+项自主研发产权和软著，全网累积用户超5000万+，获得多项荣誉。

【福利待遇】
1、国际化事业发展舞台
公司为优秀员工提供国际化视野及国际化产品经验机会；
2、多元化学习提升机制
通过大佬培训等机制帮助新进员工快速成长，实现自我价值；
3、全方位员工关怀机制
下午茶+节日礼品+红包购物卡+绩效奖金+十三薪+旅游团建+按摩券+白领体检礼包。

4. 应⽤框架：熟悉主流应⽤框架，如 Spring Boot、Spring、Spring Cloud 和 MyBatis。

description_english:
Qualifications:
1. Education Requirement: Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or a related field.
2. Work Experience: 4+ years of relevant work experience.
3. Java Fundamentals: Solid foundation in Java, familiar with Java multi-threading, concurrency, and network communication.
4. Application Frameworks: Familiar with mainstream application frameworks such as Spring Boot, Spring, Spring Cloud, and MyBatis.
5. Microservices Architecture: Experience in designing and building microservices architecture, familiar with Kafka.
6. Spring Cloud Components: Familiar with commonly used Spring Cloud components.
7. Monitoring & Services: Familiar with monitoring, querying, and service registration services such as Grafana, ELK, ES, Etcd, and ZooKeeper.
8. Databases: Familiar with relational databases like MySQL, and NoSQL databases like Redis and MongoDB.
Job Responsibilities:
1. Development Tasks: Complete assigned development tasks on time, delivering high-quality code and documentation.
System Maintenance: Maintain the high stability and availability of the trading system, continuously optimizing system performance and user experience.
2. Technical Research: Continuously research innovative technologies and share findings with team members.
3. Problem Solving: Responsible for identifying and resolving customer issues to ensure the normal operation of the system.
4. Team Collaboration: Collaborate closely with team members to complete feature development tasks."
【Company Overview】
Boss Tech is a brand under Beijing Hash Zhisuan Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Boss Tech"). Established in March 2018, Boss Tech is a human resources service company specializing in overseas recruitment. Since its inception, it has invested significant resources in developing its own technology platform, focusing on the research and development of overseas internet products. It has an efficient in-house R&D team that, guided by product development and international market demand, continuously and efficiently develops mobile internet products that align with international trends.
We are dedicated to providing global users with services such as efficiency tools, interactive entertainment, and cultural life. Boss Tech has multiple overseas mobile internet products, holds over 10 independently developed intellectual property rights and software copyrights, has accumulated over 50 million users across all platforms, and has received numerous honors.

【Benefits and Perks】
1. International Career Development Platform
The company provides outstanding employees with opportunities for an international perspective and experience with international products;
2. Diversified Learning and Growth Mechanisms
We help new employees grow quickly and realize their self-worth through mechanisms like expert training;
3. Comprehensive Employee Care System
Afternoon tea + holiday gifts + red envelopes/shopping cards + performance bonus + 13th-month salary + team-building trips + massage vouchers + white-collar health check-up package.

title: AI算法工程师（远程办公）
team: 天擎千鑫（北京）科技有限公司
summary: 图像算法,大模型算法,Python
summary_chinese: AI算法设计与开发,Python,深度学习,TensorFlow/PyTorch,计算机视觉/自然语言处理,Docker
summary_english: AI Algorithm Design & Development,Python,Deep Learning,TensorFlow/PyTorch,Computer Vision/NLP,Docker
description:
1. 负责AI算法的设计、开发与优化，运用Python实现机器学习、深度学习模型，推动业务智能化升级。
2. 处理海量数据，涵盖数据收集、清洗、预处理等环节，运用统计学方法分析数据，为模型训练提供高质量数据⽀持。
3. 基于TensorFlow、PyTorch等深度学习框架，开发计算机视觉、⾃然语⾔处理等领域的AI应用，满足业务需求。
4. 将AI模型部署到⽣产环境，借助Docker等技术实现容器化，确保模型的高性能、高扩展性与安全性。
5. 持续关注AI领域前沿技术，探索新技术在实际业务中的应用，推动技术创新与业务发展。
任职要求
能力要求
1. 具备扎实的Python编程能力，熟练掌握Python语法、数据结构、面向对象编程，能够运用Python高效实现各种AI算法和模型。熟悉Flask等Web框架和Git版本控制。
2. 拥有深厚的数学基础，精通高等数学、线性代数、概率论、数理统计，能够理解和推导AI算法，如神经网络反向传播算法。
3. 具备强大的数据处理与分析能力，能熟练使用Python库进行数据收集、清洗、预处理，能够运用数据可视化工具展示数据特征，理解统计学方法并用于数据分析。
4. 深入理解机器学习、深度学习算法，熟悉主流深度学习框架（如TensorFlow、PyTorch），掌握自然语言处理、计算机视觉等领域的相关算法。
5. 具备良好的工程化能力，了解微服务架构，掌握Docker容器化等技术，能够将模型顺利部署到生产环境，确保其性能、扩展性和安全性。
6. 具备较强的问题解决与创新能力，能够快速分析和解决开发过程中遇到的问题，善于将AI技术应用于实际场景，推动技术创新。
经验要求
1. 拥有丰富的AI相关项目经验，参与过模型训练、优化等关键环节，熟悉AI项目从需求分析到上线部署的全流程。
2. 有参与开源AI项目的经验，如在GitHub等平台参与过开源项目的开发或贡献，了解开源项目的协作模式和开发规范。
3. 具备实际的AI实践经验，熟悉数据标注、模型评估等操作，能够通过实践不断提升模型性能。
description_chinese:
1. 负责AI算法的设计、开发与优化，运用Python实现机器学习、深度学习模型，推动业务智能化升级。
2. 处理海量数据，涵盖数据收集、清洗、预处理等环节，运用统计学方法分析数据，为模型训练提供高质量数据⽀持。

4. 将AI模型部署到⽣产环境，借助Docker等技术实现容器化，确保模型的高性能、高扩展性与安全性。
5. 持续关注AI领域前沿技术，探索新技术在实际业务中的应用，推动技术创新与业务发展。
任职要求
能力要求
1. 具备扎实的Python编程能力，熟练掌握Python语法、数据结构、面向对象编程，能够运用Python高效实现各种AI算法和模型。熟悉Flask等Web框架和Git版本控制。
2. 拥有深厚的数学基础，精通高等数学、线性代数、概率论、数理统计，能够理解和推导AI算法，如神经网络反向传播算法。
3. 具备强大的数据处理与分析能力，能熟练使用Python库进行数据收集、清洗、预处理，能够运用数据可视化工具展示数据特征，理解统计学方法并用于数据分析。
4. 深入理解机器学习、深度学习算法，熟悉主流深度学习框架（如TensorFlow、PyTorch），掌握自然语言处理、计算机视觉等领域的相关算法。
5. 具备良好的工程化能力，了解微服务架构，掌握Docker容器化等技术，能够将模型顺利部署到生产环境，确保其性能、扩展性和安全性。
6. 具备较强的问题解决与创新能力，能够快速分析和解决开发过程中遇到的问题，善于将AI技术应用于实际场景，推动技术创新。
经验要求
1. 拥有丰富的AI相关项目经验，参与过模型训练、优化等关键环节，熟悉AI项目从需求分析到上线部署的全流程。
2. 有参与开源AI项目的经验，如在GitHub等平台参与过开源项目的开发或贡献，了解开源项目的协作模式和开发规范。
3. 具备实际的AI实践经验，熟悉数据标注、模型评估等操作，能够通过实践不断提升模型性能。
description_english:
1. Responsible for the design, development, and optimization of AI algorithms, using Python to implement machine learning and deep learning models to drive intelligent business upgrades.
2. Process massive amounts of data, covering data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing, and use statistical methods to analyze data to provide high-quality data support for model training.
3. Develop AI applications in fields such as computer vision and natural language processing based on deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch to meet business needs.
4. Deploy AI models to the production environment, using technologies like Docker for containerization to ensure the model's high performance, scalability, and security.
5. Continuously follow cutting-edge technologies in the AI field, explore the application of new technologies in actual business, and promote technological innovation and business development.
Job Requirements
Skill Requirements
1. Solid Python programming skills, proficient in Python syntax, data structures, and object-oriented programming, able to efficiently implement various AI algorithms and models using Python. Familiar with web frameworks like Flask and Git version control.
2. Strong mathematical foundation, proficient in advanced mathematics, linear algebra, probability theory, and mathematical statistics, able to understand and derive AI algorithms such as the neural network backpropagation algorithm.
3. Strong data processing and analysis capabilities, skilled in using Python libraries for data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing, able to use data visualization tools to display data features, and understand statistical methods for data analysis.
4. In-depth understanding of machine learning and deep learning algorithms, familiar with mainstream deep learning frameworks (such as TensorFlow, PyTorch), and proficient in related algorithms in fields like natural language processing and computer vision.
5. Good engineering skills, understanding of microservices architecture, proficient in technologies like Docker containerization, able to smoothly deploy models to the production environment, ensuring their performance, scalability, and security.
6. Strong problem-solving and innovation skills, able to quickly analyze and solve problems encountered during development, and adept at applying AI technology to real-world scenarios to drive technological innovation.
Experience Requirements
1. Rich experience in AI-related projects, having participated in key stages such as model training and optimization, and familiar with the entire lifecycle of an AI project from requirements analysis to online deployment.
2. Experience participating in open-source AI projects, such as developing or contributing to open-source projects on platforms like GitHub, and understanding the collaboration models and development standards of open-source projects.
3. Practical AI experience, familiar with operations like data annotation and model evaluation, and able to continuously improve model performance through practice.

title: 初高物理在线一对一教师（双休五险一金）
title_chinese: 初高物理在线一对一教师
title_english: Online Junior & Senior High School 1-on-1 Physics Teacher
team: 上海梯方教育科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 初高中物理教学,K12在线教育,2年以上教学经验,教师资格证,家校沟通,五险一金,每周双休
summary_english: Junior & Senior High School Physics Teaching,K12 Online Education,2+ Years of Teaching Experience,Teacher's Qualification Certificate,Parent-Teacher Communication,Social Insurance and Housing Fund,Two Days Off Weekly
description:
岗位要求：
1. 擅长学科教学，有2年以上相关授课经验；
2. 本科及以上学历，有教师资格证，师范类院校毕业优先；
3. 学科知识扎实，热爱教育事业；
4. 普通话标准，具有较强的表达能力，亲和力强，有耐心、责任心，擅长和学生沟通交流；
工作内容：
1. 通过梯方教育教学平台进行在线一对一授课
2. 积极参加各类教研活动及培训，并提交需完成的教学、教研资料
3. 及时与家长、学生沟通教学情况和教学计划，形成良性互动，促进教学
福利待遇：底薪4000起+课时费+奖励
1.入职缴纳五险一金
2.每周双休
梯方在线创立于2014年4月，由复旦大学校友联合创办，是一家线上k12教育机构。梯方在线专注于中高考、自主招生。在过去10年的时间内梯方人凭借勇于开拓的进取精神，付出，感恩的企业文化，已然成为上海滩最具有创新及活力的教培机构。



企业愿景与理念：
我们致力于打造全中国最受尊重的教育品牌，最好的老师，最负责的态度，最严谨的教学，最专业的情商培养，成就360度管家式服务的尊贵品质；我们致力于用最科学的方式帮助更多的孩子发现学习中的思维之美，我们深知，教室里的每个孩子都是一个家庭的全部与希望，同时深感作为教育人肩上那份深沉的义务与责任，我们秉承付出，感恩，创新为企业的核心价值观，用高效的教学产品为更多的家庭带来实实在在的希望。

description_english:
Job Requirements:
1. Proficient in subject teaching with over 2 years of relevant teaching experience;
2. Bachelor's degree or above, with a teacher's qualification certificate; graduates from normal universities are preferred;
3. Solid subject matter knowledge and a passion for education;
4. Standard Mandarin, strong expression skills, approachable, patient, responsible, and skilled in communicating with students;
Job Content:
1. Conduct online one-on-one teaching through the Tifang Education platform
2. Actively participate in various teaching research activities and trainings, and submit required teaching and research materials
3. Communicate teaching progress and plans with parents and students in a timely manner to foster positive interaction and promote teaching
Benefits: Basic salary starting from 4000 + class hour fees + bonuses
1. Social insurance and housing fund provided upon employment
2. Two days off per week
Tifang Online was founded in April 2014 by Fudan University alumni and is an online K-12 education institution. Tifang Online focuses on high school and college entrance exams, and independent admissions. Over the past 10 years, with a pioneering and enterprising spirit and a corporate culture of dedication and gratitude, Tifang has become one of the most innovative and dynamic educational institutions in Shanghai.



Corporate Vision and Philosophy:
We are committed to building the most respected education brand in China, with the best teachers, the most responsible attitude, the most rigorous teaching, and the most professional emotional intelligence development, achieving the esteemed quality of 360-degree butler-style service; we are committed to using the most scientific methods to help more children discover the beauty of thinking in learning. We are deeply aware that every child in the classroom represents the entirety and hope of a family, and at the same time, we feel the profound duty and responsibility on our shoulders as educators. We adhere to dedication, gratitude, and innovation as our core corporate values, bringing tangible hope to more families with efficient educational products.

title: 【英语/波兰语/俄语】翻译 远程办公
team: 北京位来无忧科技有限公司
summary: 笔译,口译,无需坐班,全职
summary_chinese: APP与短剧翻译,APP内容本地化,短剧字幕翻译,双向翻译,HSK,雅思
summary_english: APP and Short Drama Translation,APP Content Localization,Short Drama Subtitle Translation,Two-way Translation,HSK,IELTS
description:
翻译方向：
英语 1名（中： 雅思 8， 有留学经验， 有翻译短剧经验）
波兰语 1名 （外：母语，HSK5-6） / （中：有留学经验， C1-C2 证书）
俄语 1名 （外：母语，HSK5-6） / （中：有留学经验， C1-C2 证书）
职业技能和JD：
要求应聘者具备扎实的 （小语种）翻译能力，熟悉各类翻译技巧，双向翻译 
APP翻译工作内容
⼯作描述: 
APP翻译的⼯作涉及将APP中的⽤户界面，内容及帮助文档等翻译并本地化，以确保在不同地区的⽤户使用时，语言流畅且符合文化习惯。
2、短剧字幕翻译
将视频内容中的对白的字幕从源语言翻译成目标语言，确保字幕与画面同步，翻译简洁明了且符合习惯语言。
3、短剧内容翻译
工作描述: 将短剧的剧名，简介，旁白，文化背景等内容从源语言翻译成目标语言
工作地点：
优先级（北京） 远程
沟通能力与团队合作：
要求应聘者具备良好的沟通能力，能与项目组成员有效沟通，确保翻译需求的准确传达。同时，具备团队协作能力，能在项目中发挥积极作用，共同完成翻译任务。
工作时间：
10:00–19:00 或 10:30–19:30。
所有工作需在工作时间内完成，如未完成需自行加班。
工作时间内不得从事其他工作或兼职。
打卡与汇报：
采用日报制，每日完成工作后需提交工作日报。
考核机制：
每周进行一次 360° 质量评估，绩效以个人翻译质量为准。
位来小猎成立于2018年1月，2019年6月完成A轮融资；聚焦行业精华，利用后发优势，在1年以内成为行业黑马公司。核心团队成员均有十年以上的人力资源经验，具备丰富的人力资源专业知识和项目实践，服务众多500强企业和知名互联网公司。

掌握专业领域核心资源，团队迅速扩张，以北京为中心，在全国建立了10家分公司及办事处，业务覆盖全国。现有300+名员工，派遣、外包员工10000+名；服务客户包括国家体育总局，百度，网易，物美多点，美团，字节跳动，喜马拉雅，作业帮，得物，VIPKID，瓜子，京东，拼多多，喜茶，中国人保等。

以互联网为载体，依托于各平台，微信公众号、入职有赏微信小程序上活跃的海量求职者资源，核心业务包括人才外包、专业招聘、业务外包、转编服务和灵活用工等。服务行业涉及全国各领域，其中包括社交电商，旅游酒店，互联网（教育），新零售，金融和国家单位等。

位来小猎以“把求职者的未来当做自己的未来”为核心价值，希望通过我们专业的服务和不懈的努力，帮助求职者找到更合适、更有发展前景的工作，破冰职场迷茫，为未来指引方向。一直以来，位来无忧秉承以专业诚信为核心，在专注人力资源服务的同时，为众多求职者解决就业问题，优质、用心的服务赢得了众多用户的好评与信赖。除此之外，公司还建立了完善的服务体系，为求职者在工作中遇到的所有问题和困难提供指导帮助。我们相信，通过我们的不断努力和追求，一定能够创造我们和求职者更好的未来！

description_english:
Translation Direction:
English: 1 position (Chinese national: IELTS 8, study abroad experience, experience in translating short dramas)
Polish: 1 position (Foreign national: Native speaker, HSK5-6) / (Chinese national: Study abroad experience, C1-C2 certificate)
Russian: 1 position (Foreign national: Native speaker, HSK5-6) / (Chinese national: Study abroad experience, C1-C2 certificate)

Professional Skills and JD:
Applicants are required to have solid translation skills in the respective language, be familiar with various translation techniques, and be capable of two-way translation.

APP Translation Work Content
Job Description:
The work of APP translation involves translating and localizing the user interface, content, and help documents within the APP to ensure that the language is fluent and culturally appropriate for users in different regions.

2. Short Drama Subtitle Translation
Translate the subtitles of dialogue in the video content from the source language to the target language, ensuring the subtitles are synchronized with the video, and the translation is concise, clear, and idiomatic.

3. Short Drama Content Translation
Job Description: Translate the title, synopsis, narration, cultural background, and other content of the short drama from the source language to the target language.

Work Location:
Priority (Beijing) Remote

Communication and Teamwork Skills:
Applicants are required to have good communication skills to effectively communicate with project team members and ensure the accurate conveyance of translation requirements. At the same time, they must possess teamwork abilities to play an active role in the project and jointly complete translation tasks.

Working Hours:
10:00–19:00 or 10:30–19:30.
All work must be completed within working hours. If not completed, you will need to work overtime on your own.
Engaging in other work or part-time jobs during working hours is not permitted.

Clock-in and Reporting:
A daily report system is used. A work report must be submitted after finishing work each day.

Assessment Mechanism:
A 360° quality assessment is conducted weekly. Performance is based on individual translation quality.

title: 法币风控-远程办公
team: 成都英悦芯瑞网络科技有限责任公司

summary_english: Anti-Fraud Strategy Development,Blockchain Industry,Payment Risk Control,User Behavior Analysis,Familiar with KYC Process,Proficient in SQL
description:
负责法币（充值/提现/划转）反欺诈策略建设与落地
监控可疑行为与异常资金链路，调查欺诈案件并执行拦截/冻结/限制交易
持续迭代规则模型（风控评分、黑名单、特征探索、阈值优化）
搭建用户行为风险画像：包括身份冒用、社工诈骗、黑产批量号、套利套现等
分析诈骗路径（如“带单骗贷/返利/假客服/虚假投资/买卖币诈骗”）
识别新型欺诈模式和区域欺诈趋势，定期更新策略库
参与大额/高风险用户专项审查、用户风险分层与白/灰/黑名单体系搭建
建立欺诈事件 SOP、风险处置流程及运营报警体系
输出事件复盘与反欺诈报告，推动产品/运营/客服优化
与支付通道/运营/法务/合规协作处理跨境欺诈与争议
 
任职要求
 
本科及以上学历（金融、经管、统计、计算机、法学优先）
1–5 年反欺诈、支付风控、银行/三方支付风控、虚拟币 OTC 等经验
熟悉主流欺诈模式及资金走向（倒买倒卖、租号、代付、跑分、洗钱辅助链路）
熟练使用 SQL 分析用户行为与资金交易
熟悉 KYC 流程与风险信号（身份一致性、可疑用户识别）
良好沟通与跨团队协作能力、抗压能力强
 
加分项
 
数字货币 OTC 风控经验
具备 Python / 数据分析经验
有支付通道与银行沟通处理经验
熟悉反欺诈风控系统/模型
有应对诈骗受害者与证据留存经验
 
技能要求
SQL熟练
BI 数据工具应用（如 Tableau / Looker / Superset）
反欺诈策略框架、风控模型基础知识
用户行为、资金路径分析能力

description_english:
Responsible for the development and implementation of anti-fraud strategies for fiat currency (deposits/withdrawals/transfers)
Monitor suspicious activities and abnormal fund flows, investigate fraud cases, and execute interceptions/freezes/transaction restrictions
Continuously iterate on rule models (risk scoring, blacklists, feature exploration, threshold optimization)
Build user behavior risk profiles, including identity theft, social engineering scams, black-market bulk accounts, arbitrage, and cashing out
Analyze fraud paths (e.g., "order-following scams/rebate scams/fake customer service/fraudulent investments/coin trading scams")
Identify new fraud patterns and regional fraud trends, and regularly update the strategy library
Participate in special reviews of large-amount/high-risk users, user risk stratification, and the construction of white/grey/black list systems
Establish SOPs for fraud incidents, risk disposal processes, and an operational alert system
Produce incident reviews and anti-fraud reports to drive improvements in product, operations, and customer service
Collaborate with payment channels, operations, legal, and compliance teams to handle cross-border fraud and disputes
 
Requirements
 
Bachelor's degree or above (majors in Finance, Economics, Management, Statistics, Computer Science, or Law preferred)
1–5 years of experience in anti-fraud, payment risk control, banking/third-party payment risk control, or virtual currency OTC
Familiar with mainstream fraud models and fund flows (e.g., reselling, account renting, proxy payments, "running points," money laundering auxiliary links)
Proficient in using SQL to analyze user behavior and financial transactions
Familiar with KYC processes and risk signals (identity consistency, suspicious user identification)
Good communication and cross-team collaboration skills, strong ability to work under pressure
 
Bonus Points
 
Experience in digital currency OTC risk control
Experience with Python / data analysis
Experience in communicating and handling issues with payment channels and banks
Familiar with anti-fraud risk control systems/models
Experience in dealing with fraud victims and preserving evidence
 
Skill Requirements
Proficient in SQL
Application of BI data tools (e.g., Tableau / Looker / Superset)
Knowledge of anti-fraud strategy frameworks and risk control model basics
Ability to analyze user behavior and fund paths

- 参与核心系统的日常运维，掌握服务细节，对各系统存在的问题和不足，提出合理性引导，提高系统可运维性；
- 负责中台业务的大促支持，制定服务保障计划，对结果负责；
- 熟悉云环境，主导内部服务上云流程，给出合理方案并落地；
- 参与线上问题跟进，沉淀运维经验，推动运维流程规范建设。
职位要求：
- 扎实的运维基本功，在监控、部署、架构规划、可用性保障方面有体系化的经验；
- 良好的owner意识，可独当一面地cover多个工作方向；
- 优秀的分析问题和解决问题的能力，强烈责任感；
- 逻辑思维清晰，具备良好的沟通能力；

title: HRBP-远程办公（职能方向）
team: 北京某小型互联网金融公司
summary_chinese: 人力资源策略规划,3-5年HRBP经验,支持国际团队,双语流利,数据驱动决策
summary_english: HR Strategy Planning,3-5 Years HRBP Experience,Supporting International Teams,Bilingual Fluency,Data-Driven Decision Making
description:
你会做什么
1.与业务团队密切合作,深入了解业务目标、团队动态和人才需求。
2.调整人力资源策略和计划,以支持实现这些目标。
3.作为业务的值得信赖的顾问，提供组织设计、劳动力规划和人才策略方面的指导，以促进创新、灵活性和可扩展性。
4.识别并解决业务特有的组织挑战，如人才保留、技能发展和团队协作。
5.运用先进的人力资源工具和方法，在绩效管理、职业发展和员工敬业度等领域提供量身定制的解决方案。
6.与招聘经理和招聘团队合作,制定并执行策略,吸引人才，充分利用各种招聘渠道,并确保候选人获得无缝的招聘体验。
7.设计并实施针对岗位的定制化学习和发展计划, 包括技能提升计划、经理的发展，以及员工的职业发展路径。
8.监控并支持因业务快速增长和创新而不断变化的团队需求。
9.定期审查团队结构、人才库和技能差距，并盘活资源以提升组织和个人的能力。
10.通过与业务密切合作，解决挑战、改善团队动态，并确保与公司价值观保持一致，从而培养创新、协作和持续改进的文化。
你需要的东西
教育背景和工作经历：
本科及以上学历,至少3-5年人力资源业务合作伙伴经验,最好有过支持战略/法务/财务等职能团队 
英语和普通话双语熟练 ，具备全球化思维，并有支持国际团队的经验。
熟练掌握人力资源核心职能，包括绩效管理、人才招聘、职业发展和组织设计,重点关注技术岗位。
出色的解决问题和分析能力,能够利用数据识别趋势、诊断问题,并衡量人力资源举措的影响。

1.与业务团队密切合作,深入了解业务目标、团队动态和人才需求。
2.调整人力资源策略和计划,以支持实现这些目标。

10.通过与业务密切合作，解决挑战、改善团队动态，并确保与公司价值观保持一致，从而培养创新、协作和持续改进的文化。
你需要的东西
教育背景和工作经历：

英语和普通话双语熟练 ，具备全球化思维，并有支持国际团队的经验。
熟练掌握人力资源核心职能，包括绩效管理、人才招聘、职业发展和组织设计,重点关注技术岗位。
出色的解决问题和分析能力,能够利用数据识别趋势、诊断问题,并衡量人力资源举措的影响。
description_english:
What you will do
1. Collaborate closely with business teams to gain a deep understanding of their goals, team dynamics, and talent needs.
2. Align HR strategies and plans to support the achievement of these goals.
3. Act as a trusted advisor to the business, providing guidance on organizational design, workforce planning, and talent strategy to foster innovation, flexibility, and scalability.
4. Identify and address business-specific organizational challenges, such as talent retention, skill development, and team collaboration.
5. Utilize advanced HR tools and methodologies to provide tailored solutions in areas like performance management, career development, and employee engagement.
6. Partner with hiring managers and the recruitment team to develop and execute strategies to attract talent, leverage various recruitment channels, and ensure a seamless candidate experience.
7. Design and implement customized learning and development programs for positions, including upskilling initiatives, manager development, and employee career paths.
8. Monitor and support the evolving needs of teams resulting from rapid business growth and innovation.
9. Regularly review team structures, talent pools, and skill gaps, and mobilize resources to enhance organizational and individual capabilities.
10. Foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement by working closely with the business to address challenges, improve team dynamics, and ensure alignment with company values.
What you will need
Education and Work Experience:
Bachelor's degree or above, with at least 3-5 years of experience as an HR Business Partner, preferably with experience supporting functional teams such as Strategy, Legal, or Finance.
Fluent in both English and Mandarin, with a global mindset and experience supporting international teams.
Proficient in core HR functions, including performance management, talent acquisition, career development, and organizational design, with a focus on technical positions.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to use data to identify trends, diagnose issues, and measure the impact of HR initiatives.

title: 增长产品(远程办公)
team: 香港某中型互联网公司
summary_chinese: 用户增长策略制定,增长工具建设,数据驱动增长,竞品分析,跨部门协作,5年以上经验
summary_english: User Growth Strategy Formulation,Growth Tool Construction,Data-Driven Growth,Competitor Analysis,Cross-departmental Collaboration,5+ Years of Experience
description:
主要职责
1.用户增长策略制定：与增长运营强配合，探索并制定有效的站内/站外增长策略，负责增长相关的产品需求的设计，跟进与落地，对增长目标负责。
2.增长工具建设：负责福利中心，触达，策略系统等规划和建设，不断打磨增长工具，赋能各个业务目标。
3.跨部门协作：与营销、BD、渠道、广告、seo等团队深度合作，将增长拉新效率最大化。
4.市场洞察与竞品分析：监控行业和竞品动态，保持行业敏感度度，可以提出产品创新想法，持续给团队新的输入。
职位要求
1.5年以上产品/增长经验，熟悉增长方法论。
2.具备较好的数据分析能力和逻辑思维，能通过数据找到增长的的卡点和机会点，并快速验证。
3.优秀的跨职能协作和沟通能力，能够与运营、技术和业务团限人有效配合。
4.有较好的学习能力，可以拥抱变化，可以迅速捕获市场的动态挖掘增长新的机会点。

主要职责
1.用户增长策略制定：与增长运营强配合，探索并制定有效的站内/站外增长策略，负责增长相关的产品需求的设计，跟进与落地，对增长目标负责。
2.增长工具建设：负责福利中心，触达，策略系统等规划和建设，不断打磨增长工具，赋能各个业务目标。
3.跨部门协作：与营销、BD、渠道、广告、seo等团队深度合作，将增长拉新效率最大化。
4.市场洞察与竞品分析：监控行业和竞品动态，保持行业敏感度度，可以提出产品创新想法，持续给团队新的输入。
职位要求
1.5年以上产品/增长经验，熟悉增长方法论。
2.具备较好的数据分析能力和逻辑思维，能通过数据找到增长的的卡点和机会点，并快速验证。
3.优秀的跨职能协作和沟通能力，能够与运营、技术和业务团限人有效配合。
4.有较好的学习能力，可以拥抱变化，可以迅速捕获市场的动态挖掘增长新的机会点。
description_english:
Main Responsibilities
1. User Growth Strategy Formulation: Collaborate closely with growth operations to explore and formulate effective on-site/off-site growth strategies, be responsible for the design, follow-up, and implementation of growth-related product requirements, and be accountable for growth targets.
2. Growth Tool Construction: Responsible for the planning and construction of the benefits center, user reach, strategy systems, etc., continuously refining growth tools to empower various business objectives.
3. Cross-departmental Collaboration: Cooperate deeply with marketing, BD, channel, advertising, SEO, and other teams to maximize the efficiency of new user acquisition.
4. Market Insight and Competitor Analysis: Monitor industry and competitor dynamics, maintain industry sensitivity, propose innovative product ideas, and continuously provide new input to the team.
Job Requirements
1. 5+ years of product/growth experience, familiar with growth methodologies.
2. Possess strong data analysis and logical thinking skills, able to identify growth bottlenecks and opportunities through data and validate them quickly.
3. Excellent cross-functional collaboration and communication skills, able to effectively cooperate with operations, technology, and business team members.
4. Strong learning ability, able to embrace change, and can quickly capture market dynamics to uncover new growth opportunities.

title: 高级后端开发工程师（远程办公）
team: 麦索科技（深圳）有限公司
description:
远程办公
岗位职责：
1、负责后端服务的开发与维护；
2、 技术预研和技术难点攻关，保障系统可用性、稳定性、和可扩展性；
3、 持续优化系统架构设计，提出问题解决方案。
任职要求：
1、计算机或相关专业，全日制本科211以上学历，3年及以上互联网研发⼯作经验；
2、具备优秀的业务理解能⼒，能快速掌握业务变化并利⽤技术为业务赋能；
3、具有良好的沟通能力，较强的独立⼯作能力、规划能力和解决问题的能力；
4、具有扎实的计算机科学功底，扎实的编程基础和数据结构算法基础，优秀的编程能力和问题解决能力；
5、熟练掌握Golang/Rust/C/C++一种或多种开发语言；
6、3年以上的Linux/Unix服务端开发经验；
7、英语CET-4及以上水平。
具备以下者优先：
        - 熟练掌握Rust开发语言者
        - 有大型互联网公司后端开发经验者
        - 英语 CET-6 或以上水平，有托福、雅思等海外语言考试成绩参考者 
          优先。须能够无障碍地进行英文文档阅读及输出，能至少基于文字进 
          行英文技术沟通，能顺畅完成口头英文技术沟通者优先
我们是一家在金融科技领域全球领先的创新型企业，专注于去中心化金融与智能算法的研发和应用。核心团队由经验丰富的金融科技专家和技术精英组成，在数字资产管理、量化模型构建及金融工程领域拥有超过五年的技术和经验沉淀。

公司依托自主研发的智能合约系统与交易架构，为全世界专业机构客户提供安全可靠的数字金融解决方案。现已形成包含底层协议、高并发应用、智能风控体系在内的完整技术研发和积累。公司目前产品、用户和营收都很稳定，各项数据呈稳健增长。顶级行业资源，拿过多家Tier 1美元基金投资，正处于业务和生产力的快速扩张阶段，因此在寻找更多有意于去中心化金融的同学加入。

我们希望候选人能够拥有对前沿技术和具体应用有长期的热情、较强自驱力和对新事物的自学能力。我们相信我们能够为员工提供广阔的发展空间和丰富的学习机会。

title: 算法工程师（远程办公）
team: 北京瑞升德胜信息咨询服务有限公司
summary: Java,大模型算法,算法工程化经验,推荐算法,Python
summary_chinese: AIGC算法优化,大模型应用与调优,特征工程与用户建模,RAG与语义检索,自然语言处理(NLP),强化学习
summary_english: AIGC Algorithm Optimization,Large Model Application & Tuning,Feature Engineering & User Modeling,RAG & Semantic Retrieval,Natural Language Processing (NLP),Reinforcement Learning
description:
方向1：生成与评测方向 / Generation & Evaluation
岗位职责
负责AIGC内容生成的算法优化，包括Prompt策略、⽣成质量评测与反馈机制建设；
建⽴⽣成效果评估指标体系，提升内容的相关性、多样性与一致性；
参与用户⾏为数据建模，基于反馈优化生成逻辑与模板；
与产品、工程团队协作，构建高质量可控的内容生成闭环。
任职要求
计算机、数学、人工智能相关专业，本科及以上；
熟悉主流大模型（GPT、Claude、Gemini等）应用与调优；
有生成式AI、推荐或自然语言处理经验；
理解强化学习、内容质量评测、自动化优化流程；
具备良好的建模思维与跨团队沟通能力。
关键词：AIGC / Prompt优化 / 内容评测 / 强化学习 / NLP / 自学习系统
方向2：特征与数据建模方向 / Feature Engineering
岗位职责
负责构建用户、内容与交互行为的特征体系，支撑个性化推荐与生成优化；
建立样本管理机制，保障线上线下数据一致性；
与数据工程协作定义埋点及特征字典，实现算法可持续学习；
支撑业务的指标监控、效果分析与模型优化。
任职要求
熟悉特征工程、embedding 管理、实时计算与数据流处理；
有推荐系统、增长算法或用户建模经验；
熟悉常见数据框架（Flink / Kafka / Spark 等）；
具备良好的业务理解能力与数据抽象能力。
关键词：特征工程 / 用户建模 / 实时计算 / 推荐算法 / 样本一致性
方向3：知识检索与语义增强方向 / RAG & Retrieval
岗位职责
负责构建与优化知识检索体系，支撑内容生成、交易助手与智能客服场景；
设计多模态检索与混合召回策略，提高语义匹配与时效性；
参与知识增强生成（RAG）架构的优化与评估；
结合业务需求，实现高效、可扩展的语义索引方案。
任职要求
熟悉文本检索、向量化

title: 俄语兼职（远程办公）
team: 华育（广州）国际文化产业发展有限公司
summary: 俄语兼职,远程办公,对外汉语教师
summary_chinese: 俄语教授中文,在线教育,俄语口语流利,长期兼职,时间自由灵活
summary_english: Teaching Chinese via Russian,Online Education,Fluent Spoken Russian,Long-term Part-time,Flexible Hours
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：无要求
工作时间：不限
工作时段：按单安排时间
结算方式：月结

team: 上海合溢网络科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 风控模型搭建与优化,金融科技,风控策略制定,数据分析,Python,SQL
summary_english: Risk Control Model Building & Optimization,FinTech,Risk Control Strategy Development,Data Analysis,Python,SQL

2.监测和分析各类交易数据，运营数据以及风险指标，对风控策略不断精进；

4.具备良好的数据分析能力，能够准确评估和快速应对风险情景，有Python和SQL经验者优先考虑。

title: Web3运维工程师-远程办公
team: 北京盛通寰宇科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 服务器与自动化运维,Web3行业,Linux/Unix,CI/CD流水线,数据库备份与优化,Prometheus+Grafana
summary_english: Server & Automation O&M,Web3 Industry,Linux/Unix,CI/CD Pipeline,Database Backup & Optimization,Prometheus+Grafana
description:
岗位职责：
1、维护服务器（物理机 / 云服务器）、网络设备，负责配置、监控、故障排查与定期巡检，保障基础设施稳定。
2、负责 MySQL 等数据库的安装、备份、恢复与性能优化，解决慢查询、高负载问题，预防数据丢失。
3、开发 / 优化自动化运维工具（如批量管理、监控告警⼯具），维护现有⼯具，降低⼈工成本。
4、梳理并优化部署流程，搭建自动化部署流⽔线（如 Jenkins CI/CD），指导开发团队使用，缩短上线周期。
5、搭建服务器、数据库、网络、业务系统的监控体系（Prometheus+Grafana），优化告警策略，提升故障响应速度。
6、制定服务器、数据库安全策略（权限管理、防火墙、漏洞扫描），定期安全巡检，保障数据安全合规。
任职要求：
1、3 年及以上专职运维经验，有互联网或中小型团队运维经验、独立搭建服务器集群 / 自动化部署流程者优先；
2、熟悉 Linux/Unix 系统运维与调优，能独立完成服务器初始化；了解阿里云 / 腾讯云等云服务器配置；
3、掌握 MySQL 安装、备份与性能优化，了解 MongoDB、Redis 运维；熟悉 TCP/IP 协议，能排查常见网络故障；
4、熟练使用 Ansible/SaltStack 等自动化工具，了解 Jenkins/GitLab CI，能搭建自动化部署流水线；
5、熟悉 Prometheus/Zabbix 等监控工具，具备服务器、数据库、网络故障快速排查能力；
6、能主动发现运维痛点并提出优化方案，有良好沟通协作能力、自驱力与风险意识，关注运维新技术。

description_english:
Job Responsibilities:
1. Maintain servers (physical machines / cloud servers) and network equipment; responsible for configuration, monitoring, troubleshooting, and regular inspections to ensure infrastructure stability.
2. Responsible for the installation, backup, recovery, and performance optimization of databases such as MySQL; solve slow query and high load issues to prevent data loss.
3. Develop / optimize automated operations and maintenance tools (e.g., batch management, monitoring and alerting tools), maintain existing tools, and reduce manual costs.
4. Streamline and optimize deployment processes, build automated deployment pipelines (e.g., Jenkins CI/CD), guide the development team in their use, and shorten the release cycle.
5. Build a monitoring system for servers, databases, networks, and business systems (Prometheus+Grafana); optimize alerting strategies to improve fault response speed.
6. Formulate security policies for servers and databases (permission management, firewalls, vulnerability scanning); conduct regular security inspections to ensure data security and compliance.
Job Requirements:
1. 3+ years of full-time DevOps experience; experience in internet or small-to-medium-sized team operations, or independently building server clusters / automated deployment processes is preferred.
2. Familiar with Linux/Unix system operations, maintenance, and tuning; able to independently complete server initialization; knowledgeable about cloud server configurations such as Alibaba Cloud / Tencent Cloud.
3. Proficient in MySQL installation, backup, and performance optimization; familiar with MongoDB and Redis operations; familiar with the TCP/IP protocol and able to troubleshoot common network faults.
4. Proficient in using automation tools such as Ansible/SaltStack; familiar with Jenkins/GitLab CI; able to build automated deployment pipelines.
5. Familiar with monitoring tools such as Prometheus/Zabbix; capable of quickly troubleshooting server, database, and network faults.
6. Able to proactively identify pain points in operations and propose optimization plans; possess good communication and collaboration skills, self-drive, risk awareness, and a focus on new DevOps technologies.

title: 数据仓库工程师（远程办公）
team: 奥拉帕迪（广州）科技有限公司
summary: 要求实时数仓经验,Hive,ETL开发经验,非外包类,要求有数仓开发经验,SQL
summary_chinese: 大数据平台建设,移动应用,数据仓库模型设计,ETL开发与优化,SQL/Hive,Hadoop生态
summary_english: Big Data Platform Construction,Mobile Applications,Data Warehouse Modeling,ETL Development and Optimization,SQL/Hive,Hadoop Ecosystem
description:
岗位职责
1、负责公司企业大数据平台建设，搭建层次合理、灵活、可扩展的企业大数据平台；
2、理解业务分析需求，设计和开发对应的数据仓库/数据集市，ETL开发和优化工作，完成结构层次合理、灵活、可扩展的数据仓库；
3、负责数据仓库模型设计、报表开发和维护；
4、负责数据仓库系统性能，模型性能设计与调优；
5、和数据产品经理一起，解决业务数据分析、数据报表、数据异常相关的技术问题；
6、深刻理解业务模型，数据模型，系统模型，提升系统生产效率。
任职要求：
1、计算机、数学或统计学相关专业本科以上学历；熟悉互联网行业，3年以上DW/ETL/BI工作经验；熟练掌握至少一种主流ETL/BI解决方案；
2、精通数据仓库架构及原理，具备大型数据仓库架构设计、模型设计和处理性能调优等相关经验；精通SQL/Hive，有较好的SQL性能调优经验，有Java/Python开发经验者优先；
3、能够熟练应用一种或多种主流数据库（如：Oracle、MySQL等），有数据库设计经验者优先；
4、有大数据分布式计算平台开发经验,熟悉Hadoop, Hive生态产品原理及应用；
5、工作认真、负责、仔细，有良好的团队合作精神，良好的分析能力、沟通技巧。
Ola Party 是一家专注于移动应用领域的国际化科技公司，是全球发展最快的科技型企业之一，Ola Party 拥有一流的科技研发团队、领先的核心技术和产品、丰富的科技业态和资源。在多个国家和地区设有分公司和业务机构，在全球各地拥有近2000余名员工。

title: 【远程办公】开发leader
team: 重庆波士科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 系统架构设计与研发,区块链行业,Java,分布式架构,高性能低延迟系统,十三薪,绩效奖金
summary_english: System Architecture Design & R&D,Blockchain Industry,Java,Distributed Architecture,High-Performance Low-Latency Systems,13th-Month Salary,Performance Bonus
description:
薪资面议
岗位职责：
 1. 负责系统的架构设计与核心模块研发。
 2. 推进系统高吞吐、低延迟、高可⽤架构升级。
 3. 主导业务的技术⽅案评审、性能优化、故障治理，识别系统瓶颈并给出可落地的改进⽅案。
 4. 与产品、风控、运营等团队紧密协作，确保业务功能的稳定、安全、合规落地。
 5. 引领团队工程能力提升：代码规范、单元测试体系、技术风险前置、SLA/稳定性体系建设。
 6. 参与或主导团队培养与管理⼯作（如具备管理经验可参与团队带教、架构治理、专项项目推动）。
 7. 持续关注行业前沿技术，推动系统能力演进。
任职要求：
 1. 计算机、软件工程等相关专业本科及以上学历。
 2. 5 年以上后端研发经验，3 年以上区块链领域经验。
 3. 熟悉Java语言；具备 高性能、低延迟系统开发 经验。
 4. 精通微服务、分布式架构、异步模型（如 Aeron、Disruptor、Kafka 等）者优先。
 5. 良好的沟通能力、问题分析能力，能在压力下保持高水平产出。
 6. 具备复杂系统调优能力，如 GC、锁优化、网络延迟、存储与缓存设计等。
 7. 具备大型互联网/区块链经验。
 8. 具备 项目管理或团队管理经验 者加分。
【企业概况】
波士科技是北京哈希智算科技有限公司旗下品牌（下称“波士科技”），波士科技成立于2018年3月，是一家专注于海外招聘的人力资源服务公司，从成立伊始，就投入大量资源开发自有技术平台，专注于海外互联网产品研发，拥有一支高效的自主研发团队，以产品研发和国际化市场需求为导向，持续高效研发出符合国际化趋势的移动互联网产品。
我们致力于为全球用户提供效率工具、互动娱乐、文化生活等服务。波士科技旗下拥有多款海外移动互联网产品，拥有10+项自主研发产权和软著，全网累积用户超5000万+，获得多项荣誉。

【福利待遇】
1、国际化事业发展舞台
公司为优秀员工提供国际化视野及国际化产品经验机会；
2、多元化学习提升机制
通过大佬培训等机制帮助新进员工快速成长，实现自我价值；
3、全方位员工关怀机制
下午茶+节日礼品+红包购物卡+绩效奖金+十三薪+旅游团建+按摩券+白领体检礼包。

我们致力于为全球用户提供效率工具、互动娱乐、文化生活等服务。波士科技旗下拥有多款海外移动互联网产品，拥有10+项自主研发产权和软著，全网累积用户超5000万+，获得多项荣誉。

【福利待遇】
1、国际化事业发展舞台
公司为优秀员工提供国际化视野及国际化产品经验机会；
2、多元化学习提升机制
通过大佬培训等机制帮助新进员工快速成长，实现自我价值；
3、全方位员工关怀机制
下午茶+节日礼品+红包购物卡+绩效奖金+十三薪+旅游团建+按摩券+白领体检礼包。
description_english:
Salary negotiable
Responsibilities:
 1. Responsible for system architecture design and core module R&D.
 2. Drive upgrades to the system's architecture for high throughput, low latency, and high availability.
 3. Lead technical solution reviews, performance optimization, and fault management for business operations, identifying system bottlenecks and providing feasible improvement plans.
 4. Collaborate closely with product, risk control, operations, and other teams to ensure the stable, secure, and compliant implementation of business functions.
 5. Lead the enhancement of the team's engineering capabilities: code standards, unit testing systems, proactive technical risk management, and SLA/stability system construction.
 6. Participate in or lead team development and management work (e.g., mentoring, architectural governance, and driving special projects if you have management experience).
 7. Continuously monitor cutting-edge industry technologies and promote the evolution of system capabilities.
Requirements:
 1. Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related fields.
 2. Over 5 years of backend development experience, with over 3 years in the blockchain domain.
 3. Proficient in Java; experience in developing high-performance, low-latency systems.
 4. Expertise in microservices, distributed architecture, and asynchronous models (such as Aeron, Disruptor, Kafka, etc.) is preferred.
 5. Strong communication and problem-analysis skills, with the ability to maintain high-quality output under pressure.
 6. Capable of complex system tuning, such as GC, lock optimization, network latency, storage, and cache design.
 7. Experience with large-scale internet/blockchain companies.
 8. Experience in project management or team management is a plus.
【Company Overview】
Boshi Technology is a brand under Beijing Hash Zhisuan Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Boshi Technology"). Founded in March 2018, Boshi Technology is a human resources service company specializing in overseas recruitment. Since its inception, it has invested heavily in developing its own technology platform, focusing on the R&D of overseas internet products. It has an efficient in-house R&D team that, guided by product development and international market demands, continuously and efficiently develops mobile internet products that align with global trends.
We are dedicated to providing efficiency tools, interactive entertainment, and cultural life services to users worldwide. Boshi Technology owns multiple overseas mobile internet products, holds over 10 proprietary intellectual property rights and software copyrights, has accumulated over 50 million users across all networks, and has received numerous honors.

【Benefits】
1. International Career Development Platform
We provide outstanding employees with opportunities for an international perspective and experience with global products.
2. Diverse Learning and Growth Mechanisms
We help new employees grow quickly and realize their potential through training from industry experts and other mechanisms.
3. Comprehensive Employee Care Program
Afternoon tea + holiday gifts + red envelopes/shopping cards + performance bonuses + 13th-month salary + team-building trips + massage vouchers + white-collar health check-up packages.

title: Java开发（远程办公）
team: 北京瑞升德胜信息咨询服务有限公司
summary: JVM,Java,微服务经验,MySQL,Spring,接受居家办公
summary_chinese: 交易系统后端开发,金融科技,区块链,高并发,分布式系统,Spring Boot
summary_english: Trading System Backend Development,FinTech,Blockchain,High Concurrency,Distributed Systems,Spring Boot
description:
岗位职责
1、参与公司交易系统核心后端模块的设计与开发，包括交易撮合、资金管理、风控引擎等关键功能；
2、深入理解业务需求，主导技术方案设计与落地，确保系统的⾼可⽤、⾼性能与可扩展；
3、负责与第三方服务（如主流交易所、链上节点、风控平台）进行⾼效对接与数据协同；
4、优化现有系统架构与性能，推动系统稳定性、处理效率的持续提升；
5、配合产品、测试、运维等多方，完成从开发到上线全过程的协作与交付；
6、持续关注区块链及数字资产领域的技术动态，为系统演进提供技术支撑与创新思路。
岗位要求
1、本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业，3年以上Java后端开发经验，熟悉微服务架构与分布式系统设计；
2、精通Spring Boot、MyBatis、Redis、Kafka、MySQL、Nacos、Sharding-JDBC等主流框架及中间件；
3、熟悉高并发、高可用系统的开发模式，具备良好的系统性能优化与故障排查能力；
4、有实际参与过金融类系统开发者优先，尤其是交易、结算、账户、风控等方向；
5、对数字资产、区块链技术具备浓厚兴趣，有相关项目经验者优先；
6、沟通能力强，责任心强，具备良好的团队协作与工程思维。
