title: 高级java开发（远程办公）
team: 郑州蓝语荣新网络科技有限公司
summary: Java,接受居家办公
summary_chinese: 服务端微服务开发,分布式系统架构,Spring Cloud,MySQL性能调优,Redis/Kafka/RocketMQ,5年以上经验
summary_english: Server-side Microservice Development,Distributed System Architecture,Spring Cloud,MySQL Performance Tuning,Redis/Kafka/RocketMQ,5+ years of experience
description:
职位描述：
1.负责项目核心系统的设计、开发和维护，确保系统高性能、高可⽤和⾼扩展性。 
2.根据业务需求，完成服务端 java 微服务架构的开发和优化。 编写⾼质量、可维护的代码，参与系统架构设计和性能优化。 
3.参与项目需求分析、系统设计、技术选型和风险评估。 排查并解决系统问题，提供持续的技术支持。 
4.跟进 java技术发展趋势，持续优化系统。
5.协助产品经理及前端开发协同推进业务落地。
职位要求:
1.计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，5年以上Java后端开发经验；
2.Java基础扎实，熟悉JVM原理，熟练掌握多线程编程、并发控制及线程池相关原理，有实际应⽤经验；
3.熟悉Spring、MyBatis、Spring Boot，Spring Cloud等主流开发框架；
4.精通MySQL数据库，熟练编写复杂SQL语句，具备良好的索引优化与性能调优能力；
5.熟悉分布式系统架构，具备Redis、Kafka、RocketMQ等中间件的实际使用经验；
6.具备良好的沟通能力及团队合作意识，责任心强，抗压能力强。
description_chinese:
职位描述：
1.负责项目核心系统的设计、开发和维护，确保系统高性能、高可用和高扩展性。
2.根据业务需求，完成服务端 java 微服务架构的开发和优化。 编写高质量、可维护的代码，参与系统架构设计和性能优化。
3.参与项目需求分析、系统设计、技术选型和风险评估。 排查并解决系统问题，提供持续的技术支持。
4.跟进 java技术发展趋势，持续优化系统。
5.协助产品经理及前端开发协同推进业务落地。
职位要求:
1.计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，5年以上Java后端开发经验；
2.Java基础扎实，熟悉JVM原理，熟练掌握多线程编程、并发控制及线程池相关原理，有实际应用经验；
3.熟悉Spring、MyBatis、Spring Boot，Spring Cloud等主流开发框架；
4.精通MySQL数据库，熟练编写复杂SQL语句，具备良好的索引优化与性能调优能力；
5.熟悉分布式系统架构，具备Redis、Kafka、RocketMQ等中间件的实际使用经验；
6.具备良好的沟通能力及团队合作意识，责任心强，抗压能力强。
description_english:
Job Description:
1. Responsible for the design, development, and maintenance of the project's core systems, ensuring high performance, high availability, and high scalability.
2. Develop and optimize the server-side Java microservice architecture based on business requirements. Write high-quality, maintainable code, and participate in system architecture design and performance optimization.
3. Participate in project requirement analysis, system design, technology selection, and risk assessment. Troubleshoot and resolve system issues, providing ongoing technical support.
4. Keep up with Java technology development trends and continuously optimize the system.
5. Collaborate with product managers and frontend developers to facilitate business implementation.
Job Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or a related field, with over 5 years of Java backend development experience.
2. Solid foundation in Java, familiar with JVM principles, proficient in multithreaded programming, concurrency control, and thread pool principles, with practical application experience.
3. Familiar with mainstream development frameworks such as Spring, MyBatis, Spring Boot, and Spring Cloud.
4. Proficient in MySQL databases, skilled in writing complex SQL statements, with excellent index optimization and performance tuning capabilities.
5. Familiar with distributed system architecture, with practical experience using middleware such as Redis, Kafka, and RocketMQ.
6. Possess good communication skills and a sense of teamwork, with a strong sense of responsibility and the ability to work under pressure.

title: web3前端开发（远程办公）
team: 北京某小型互联网金融公司
summary: 接受居家办公,React,前端开发经验
summary_chinese: 插件钱包开发,区块链行业,React,TypeScript,Chrome插件开发,多链钱包
summary_english: Plugin Wallet Development,Blockchain Industry,React,TypeScript,Chrome Plugin Development,Multi-chain Wallet
description:
岗位优势：
该岗位采用前沿的远程办公模式，您可以不受城市和交通的困扰，选择心仪的宜居地，脱离一线城市的压力，快乐生活舒适工作，欢迎全国各地优秀人才投递~
岗位职责：
1，负责插件钱包核心功能的研发与维护，确保交互体验与安全性；
2，主导多链账户管理逻辑的设计与实现，支持包括 EVM 兼容链在内的多种主流区块链网络；
3，参与插件内置 DApp 浏览器的开发与优化，提升 DApp 使用体验与兼容性；
4，深入分析并优化插件在不同浏览器环境中的性能表现，提升加载速度与交互流畅度；
5，参与插件整体架构设计与核心模块的重构，推动工程代码的模块化、可维护性与扩展性建设；
6，与产品、后端及安全团队紧密合作，推动插件功能的持续迭代与用户体验优化。
任职要求：
1，本科及以上学历，3年以上前端开发经验，熟练掌握JavaScript/TypeScript，熟悉 React等现代前端框架及 MVVM 编程范式；
2，具备 Chrome 插件或插件钱包开发经验，熟悉浏览器扩展架构与通信机制（background/service/content script）；
3，深入理解 Web3 钱包业务逻辑，具备多链钱包对接、账户管理、交易构造与签名流程的实际经验；
4，熟练使用 Chrome DevTools、Lighthouse、Performance Profiler 等工具进行性能分析与优化；
5，拥有良好的编码规范与架构设计能力，能够编写高质量、可维护、可扩展的前端工程代码；
6，具备插件系统、浏览器内核原理、前端编译优化经验者优先考虑；
加分项：了解钱包安全机制（助记词加密、本地存储隔离、权限隔离等）、具备移动端插件适配经验。

负责我们的衍生品交易平台中多个基于微服务的组件的全栈设计、开发和产品及解决方案的实施

分析并解决跨技术栈的问题；
与安全团队紧密合作，构建和运营高安全性和可扩展的基础设施及后端服务；

5年以上 Java 编程经验

有衍生品相关经验者优先

title: 在线班主任（远程办公）
team: 北京学为贵教育科技有限公司
summary: 大学/大专生,熟练使用办公软件,小班教学（3-25人）,培训机构,线下教育,线上教育,有耐心,成人/通用,不授课,社群运营,中学生,不坐班,亲和力高,沟通能力强,普通话发音标准,大班教学（25人以上）
summary_chinese: 学员服务与二次销售,在线教育,线上带班管理,家校沟通,长期兼职,有销售经验优先
summary_english: Student Service & Upselling,Online Education,Online Class Management,Parent-Teacher Communication,Long-term Part-time,Sales Experience Preferred
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：5天及以上
工作时间：不限
工作时段：不限
结算方式：月结
招聘截止时间：2026-01-30
【工作职责】
1、负责班主任日常线上带班工作；
2、课前开班会、制作班级课表、帮学员签订学员服务协议等；
3、上课期间跟助教配合带班，帮助学员解答非学术性问题；
4、跨部门沟通：协助教学、教务等辅助类工作；
5、负责与顾问和学生家长对接学员学习情况，重点关注年龄段偏小的学生；
6、对学员的日常维护及展开二销（续费、转介绍、扩课）等工作。
【任职要求】
1、热情、耐心，善于变通对学生工作有一定了解，接受繁琐的工作性质；
2、责任感强以及解决问题的及时性，积极帮学员解决问题；
3、有销售经验加分，会有二次销售或续费要求，另有额外激励提成；
4、不坐班工作地点时间相对自由，能及时回复消息，需要稳定性强；
5、工作时间，一般9:00-21:30如有消息都要回复。
学为贵教育集团，由英语教育家刘洪波创办，汇集海内外语言教育精英，创立GETS英语真经教学体系，其服务涵盖雅思、托福、GMAT、SAT、青少英语、四六级等英语培训及出国留学服务，是雅思考试官方白金级合作伙伴及托福联盟项目成员。多年学术沉淀，上百本原创英语教材；多款移动App为学员提供个性化、互动化、智能化的学习体验。

工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：5天及以上
工作时间：不限
工作时段：不限
结算方式：月结
招聘截止时间：2026-01-30
【工作职责】
1、负责班主任日常线上带班工作；
2、课前开班会、制作班级课表、帮学员签订学员服务协议等；
3、上课期间跟助教配合带班，帮助学员解答非学术性问题；
4、跨部门沟通：协助教学、教务等辅助类工作；
5、负责与顾问和学生家长对接学员学习情况，重点关注年龄段偏小的学生；
6、对学员的日常维护及展开二销（续费、转介绍、扩课）等工作。
【任职要求】
1、热情、耐心，善于变通对学生工作有一定了解，接受繁琐的工作性质；
2、责任感强以及解决问题的及时性，积极帮学员解决问题；
3、有销售经验加分，会有二次销售或续费要求，另有额外激励提成；
4、不坐班工作地点时间相对自由，能及时回复消息，需要稳定性强；
5、工作时间，一般9:00-21:30如有消息都要回复。
学为贵教育集团，由英语教育家刘洪波创办，汇集海内外语言教育精英，创立GETS英语真经教学体系，其服务涵盖雅思、托福、GMAT、SAT、青少英语、四六级等英语培训及出国留学服务，是雅思考试官方白金级合作伙伴及托福联盟项目成员。多年学术沉淀，上百本原创英语教材；多款移动App为学员提供个性化、互动化、智能化的学习体验。

title: 全栈工程师（远程办公）
team: 某小型互联网社交平台公司
summary: Agent,全栈侧重后端,AI,工具,Node.js,LLM,工程
summary_chinese: Web全栈开发,AI效率工具,Node.js,AI Agent/LLM,分布式系统,创业型公司
summary_english: Web Full-Stack Development,AI Productivity Tools,Node.js,AI Agent/LLM,Distributed Systems,Startup Company
description:
全栈岗位要求：
3 年及以上 Web / 全栈开发经验，有线上产品
能适应创业型环境：需求不完全确定，需要一起推方案
不局限“只前端 / 只后端”，愿意跨边界协作
对 AI Agent / 自动化 / 效率工具 有真实兴趣
希望做的是「产品 + ⼯程」，⽽不仅是接需求写代码
技术要求
1、以 Node.js 为主（nextjs / NestJS / Express / Fastify）
2、了解分布式系统的基本概念（服务拆分、状态⼀致性、重试等）
3、具备基础的线上运维与问题排查能力（日志、监控、报警、线上问题定位） 
4、扎实的⼯程基础：异步、接口设计、状态管理
5、能参与 Agent / LLM 相关业务逻辑的工程实现
6、熟悉 OAuth 2.0 授权流程与权限设计

description_english:
Full-Stack Position Requirements:
3+ years of Web / Full-Stack development experience, with live products
Able to adapt to a startup environment: requirements are not fully defined, need to collaborate on solutions
Not limited to 'frontend only / backend only', willing to collaborate across boundaries
Genuine interest in AI Agent / Automation / Productivity Tools
Aspire to do 'Product + Engineering', not just taking requirements and writing code

Technical Requirements
1. Primarily proficient in Node.js (Next.js / NestJS / Express / Fastify)
2. Understand the basic concepts of distributed systems (service splitting, state consistency, retries, etc.)
3. Possess basic online operation, maintenance, and troubleshooting skills (logs, monitoring, alerting, online issue diagnosis)
4. Solid engineering fundamentals: asynchronous programming, API design, state management
5. Capable of participating in the engineering implementation of business logic related to Agent / LLM
6. Familiar with OAuth 2.0 authorization flow and permission design

title: 前端架构（远程办公）
team: 北京某中型互联网金融科技公司
summary: JavaScript,接受居家办公,前端开发经验,架构师经验
summary_chinese: 前端架构设计与升级,Web3,React+TypeScript,前端工程化,Serverless架构,Node.js/Rust/Java,AI工具提效
summary_english: Frontend Architecture Design & Upgrade,Web3,React+TypeScript,Frontend Engineering,Serverless Architecture,Node.js/Rust/Java,AI Tools for Efficiency
description:
工作职麦
技术设计与升级:主导前端技术架构方案的设计，推动技术栈的升级及工程化体系的建设。
国际化与跨站组件共享:设计国际化架构平台，具备在自定义SSR架构下设计微前端⽅案的能⼒。
前端⼩程序容器化:推动前端小程序的容器化建设，具备自定义DSL和前端编译、解析和⽣成相关能力。
性能优化:深入理解浏览器原理优化前端页面性能，确保在高并发场景下的稳定性与流畅度，提高用户体验。
前端安全:跟踪最新的安全威胁、漏洞趋势和常见攻击手法，制定和实施前端安全最佳实践和标准。
任职要求
经验要求:6年以上前端开发经验，具有互联网大厂或者同行业经验者优先。技术能力:
深入理解 TypeScript 和 React，熟练使用 Tailwind Css 和 Jotai 等前端工具，掌握原子化 CSS 和状态管理。
深入理解一个或者多个前端构建工具如Webpack、Vite、 Parcel、Bun 等。
深入理解 Web3.js、Wgmi、Viem 等前端技术库，了解常规公链、数字钱包及加密技术。
掌握 Nodejs 或具备 Rust、Java 任意一门后端语言并有实际项目以及高并发经验。
推动serverless架构的最佳实践，有使用 Cloudflare Workers/AWS Lambda/阿里云 FC+ER的实际项目经验。
问题解决能力:能够深度思考业务与技术，主动发现并推动问题的解决。
AI工具应用:熟练使用 AI 工具提升开发效率，了解其在前端的应用。
沟通协作:具备优秀的沟通能力和团队合作精神。

description_english:
Responsibilities
Technical Design and Upgrade: Lead the design of front-end technical architecture solutions, and promote the upgrade of the technology stack and the construction of the engineering system.
Internationalization and Cross-Site Component Sharing: Design an internationalization architecture platform, with the ability to design micro-frontend solutions under a custom SSR architecture.
Frontend Mini-Program Containerization: Promote the containerization of front-end mini-programs, with capabilities related to custom DSL and front-end compilation, parsing, and generation.
Performance Optimization: Deeply understand browser principles to optimize front-end page performance, ensuring stability and smoothness in high-concurrency scenarios to enhance user experience.
Front-end Security: Track the latest security threats, vulnerability trends, and common attack methods; formulate and implement front-end security best practices and standards.
Requirements
Experience Requirement: 6+ years of front-end development experience; candidates with experience in major internet companies or the same industry are preferred.
Technical Skills:
In-depth understanding of TypeScript and React, proficient in using front-end tools such as Tailwind CSS and Jotai, and mastery of atomic CSS and state management.
In-depth understanding of one or more front-end build tools such as Webpack, Vite, Parcel, Bun, etc.
In-depth understanding of front-end technical libraries such as Web3.js, Wgmi, Viem, etc., with knowledge of conventional public chains, digital wallets, and encryption technologies.
Proficiency in Node.js or possession of any one back-end language like Rust or Java, with practical project and high-concurrency experience.
Promote best practices for serverless architecture, with practical project experience using Cloudflare Workers/AWS Lambda/Alibaba Cloud FC+ER.
Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to think deeply about business and technology, proactively identify and drive the resolution of problems.
AI Tool Application: Proficient in using AI tools to improve development efficiency and understand their application in the front-end.
Communication and Collaboration: Possess excellent communication skills and a spirit of teamwork.

title: 前端开发工程师（远程办公）
team: 天擎千鑫（北京）科技有限公司
summary_chinese: React前端开发,医药行业,Webpack/Babel,Git,美企,外包岗位
summary_english: React Frontend Development,Pharmaceutical Industry,Webpack/Babel,Git,US Company,Contractor Position
description:
Frontend Engineer
此岗位为劳务派遣（外包形式Contractor），客户是美资上市药企
Responsibilities:
• Develop strong frontend applications that meet project specifications and deliver
 exceptional user experiences.
• Use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create user-friendly interfaces and efficient, reliable code.
• Collaborate with product and design teams to clearly define requirements and devise
 solutions.
• Partner with backend developers to integrate systems and elevate product quality.
• Write, test, and maintain high-performance code compatible across various browsers and
 devices.
• Analyze page performance and suggest improvements for optimization.
• Participate in code reviews to improve code quality.
Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
• 3-5 years of frontend development experience.
• Proficiency in at least one modern JavaScript framework or library (React preferred).
• Experience with Git or similar version control systems.
• Strong understanding of front-end engineering tools, including Webpack and Babel.
• Basic knowledge of databases and backend development processes.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with effective communication abilities.
Preferred skills:
• Experience with a backend programming language.
• Experience with Test-Driven Development (TDD) or Behavior-Driven Development (BDD).
• Familiarity with DevOps and CI/CD practices.

description:
岗位描述：
我们正在寻找一位经验丰富的前端架构工程师，负责设计和开发高性能的交易平台前端应用。您将参与核⼼模块的开发、技术⽅案的设计与升级，推动微前端架构的实施，并确保在⾼并发场景下的稳定性与流畅度。

技术设计与升级：主导前端技术架构方案的设计，推动技术栈的升级及⼯程化体系的建设。
国际化与跨站组件共享：设计国际化架构平台，具备在自定义SSR架构下设计微前端方案的能力。

深入理解 TypeScript 和 React，熟练使用 Tailwind CSS 和 Jotai 等前端工具，掌握原子化 CSS 和状态管理。
深入理解一个或者多个前端构建工具如 TurboPack、Bun、Webpack、Vite 等。
深入理解 Web3.js、Wgmi、Viem 等前端技术库，了解常规公链、数字钱包及加密技术。

description_english:
Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced Frontend Architect to design and develop high-performance front-end applications for our trading platform. You will participate in the development of core modules, the design and upgrade of technical solutions, drive the implementation of a micro-frontend architecture, and ensure stability and smoothness in high-concurrency scenarios.
Responsibilities
Technical Design and Upgrades: Lead the design of the frontend technical architecture, and drive the upgrade of the technology stack and the construction of the engineering system.
Internationalization and Cross-site Component Sharing: Design an internationalization architecture platform, with the ability to design micro-frontend solutions under a custom SSR architecture.
Frontend Mini-program Containerization: Drive the containerization of frontend mini-programs, with capabilities in custom DSL, frontend compilation, parsing, and generation.
Performance Optimization: Leverage a deep understanding of browser principles to optimize frontend page performance, ensuring stability and smoothness in high-concurrency scenarios to enhance user experience.
Frontend Security: Keep track of the latest security threats, vulnerability trends, and common attack methods; formulate and implement frontend security best practices and standards.
Requirements:
Experience: 5+ years of frontend development experience. Experience in financial trading systems or related industries is a plus.
Technical Skills:
In-depth understanding of TypeScript and React, proficient with frontend tools like Tailwind CSS and Jotai, with a grasp of atomic CSS and state management.
In-depth understanding of one or more frontend build tools such as TurboPack, Bun, Webpack, Vite, etc.
In-depth understanding of frontend libraries like Web3.js, Wgmi, Viem, and familiarity with common public chains, digital wallets, and cryptographic technologies.
Proficiency in Node.js or practical project experience with at least one backend language such as Rust or Java.
Drive best practices for serverless architecture, with practical project experience using Cloudflare Workers or AWS Lambda.
Industry Experience: Experience with financial trading systems (securities, futures, cryptocurrency exchanges) or DeFi/DEX projects. Candidates with a background from major internet companies will also be considered.
Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to think deeply about business and technology, proactively identify issues, and drive them to resolution.
AI Tool Application: Proficient in using AI tools to improve development efficiency, with an understanding of their applications in the frontend.
Communication and Collaboration: Excellent communication skills and a strong spirit of teamwork.

team: 北京某中型互联网金融公司
summary: CSS,JavaScript,接受居家办公,React
summary_chinese: 产品功能开发,React,TypeScript,Next.js,微前端,性能优化
summary_english: Product Feature Development,React,TypeScript,Next.js,Micro-frontend,Performance Optimization
description:
1、配合产品经理完成产品功能开发和优化。
2、配合交互设计师及视觉设计师实现交互效果，配合后台工程师完成应用开发。
1、本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业。
2、前端基础扎实，熟悉JavaScript、typescript，css等技术， 对函数式编程有一定了解。
3、熟练使用React，熟悉Nextjs，微前端框架；对性能优化有⼀定研究。
4、熟悉babel/webpack/snowpack/vite等相关⼯程化⼯具。
5、经验丰富，开发过中大型 Web 应用程序，良好的 UI 交互实现能⼒者佳。
6、具有一定专研精神，敢于挑战自我，解决各种未知问题。
description_chinese:
1、配合产品经理完成产品功能开发和优化。
2、配合交互设计师及视觉设计师实现交互效果，配合后台工程师完成应用开发。
1、本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业。
2、前端基础扎实，熟悉JavaScript、typescript，css等技术， 对函数式编程有一定了解。
3、熟练使用React，熟悉Nextjs，微前端框架；对性能优化有⼀定研究。
4、熟悉babel/webpack/snowpack/vite等相关⼯程化⼯具。
5、经验丰富，开发过中大型 Web 应用程序，良好的 UI 交互实现能⼒者佳。
6、具有一定专研精神，敢于挑战自我，解决各种未知问题。
description_english:
1. Collaborate with product managers to complete product feature development and optimization.
2. Collaborate with interaction designers and visual designers to implement interactive effects, and work with backend engineers to complete application development.
1. Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or a related major.
2. Solid frontend foundation, familiar with technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, and have some understanding of functional programming.
3. Proficient in using React, familiar with Next.js and micro-frontend frameworks; have some research on performance optimization.
4. Familiar with related engineering tools such as Babel, Webpack, Snowpack, Vite.
5. Rich experience in developing medium to large-scale Web applications, with excellent UI interaction implementation skills.
6. Possess a spirit of research, dare to challenge oneself, and solve various unknown problems.

title: 前端工程师-远程办公
team: 北京时代传浮科技有限公司
summary: 接受居家办公,前端开发经验,计算机/软件工程相关专业
summary_chinese: 跨平台产品开发,AIGC,React,TypeScript,Stable Diffusion,全球化创业公司
summary_english: Cross-platform Product Development,AIGC,React,TypeScript,Stable Diffusion,Global Startup
description:
岗位职责​
1、负责跨平台产品的需求研发，高精度还原UI，保证用户体验​
2、优化前端项目，保证产品的性能和稳定性​
3、与后端一同讨论并设计新功能的技术⽅案​
任职要求​
1、全⽇制本科及以上学历，计算机、通信等相关专业优先​
2、⾄少三年的开发经验​
3、精通 TypeScript 和 CSS，熟练掌握 React Hooks​
4、熟练掌握面向对象编程，有架构设计能力​
5、精通基础的数据结构和算法，熟悉基础⽹络知识​
6、熟练掌握响应式布局，有跨平台产品的研发经验​
7、优秀的分析能力和学习能力​
8、强烈的责任心和团队精神，善于沟通和合作​
加分项​
1、对 stable diffusion，control net 等 GenAI 项目有经验​
2、热爱 ACG，对二次元文化有浓厚的兴趣，资深二次元爱好者优先​
3、全面优秀的英语沟通能力（TOEFL 100+），较强的日语能力（N2+）
我们是一家目前专注于研究generative AI的A轮创业公司，目前正研发虚拟角色方向的text-to-image AI生成和讨论相关的site。我们是一家全球性公司，总部位于新加坡，在湾区设有办事处，也拥有国内的实体。当前团队成员来自腾讯、微软、字节跳动等公司，并多数具有海外学术背景。目前已获得多家海内外一线美元基金的数轮投资。 我们的管理风格扁平而灵活，专注于效率与产出。 希望寻找与我们有着共同愿景的充满激情的伙伴，共同打造全新的跨时代产品。
【我们的产品】我们是一家专注于研究生成式AI的创业公司，目前已研发上线的text-to-image AI生成和消费平台已成为海外头部产品，用户量和市场占有率迅速增长中。
【我们的资本背景】现已获得红杉，五源，monolith，makers fund等海内外多家一线顶级机构的多轮投资，目前估值上亿美元。
【我们的团队】公司总部位于新加坡，五湖四海的小伙伴同样支持远程办公。公司团队成员背景丰富，技术能力扎实，没有无聊的潜规则，实习小天才和大师傅都能尽情发挥和学习。
【你能得到】获得赛道最前沿技术/产品认知，一起work on一个产品，切实体验让想象成为现实的经历，一段有意义且实现自身价值的工作。

1、负责跨平台产品的需求研发，高精度还原UI，保证用户体验
2、优化前端项目，保证产品的性能和稳定性
3、与后端一同讨论并设计新功能的技术方案
任职要求
1、全日制本科及以上学历，计算机、通信等相关专业优先
2、至少三年的开发经验
3、精通 TypeScript 和 CSS，熟练掌握 React Hooks
4、熟练掌握面向对象编程，有架构设计能力
5、精通基础的数据结构和算法，熟悉基础网络知识
6、熟练掌握响应式布局，有跨平台产品的研发经验
7、优秀的分析能力和学习能力
8、强烈的责任心和团队精神，善于沟通和合作

【我们的团队】公司总部位于新加坡，五湖四海的小伙伴同样支持远程办公。公司团队成员背景丰富，技术能力扎实，没有无聊的潜规则，实习小天才和大师傅都能尽情发挥和学习。
【你能得到】获得赛道最前沿技术/产品认知，一起work on一个产品，切实体验让想象成为现实的经历，一段有意义且实现自身价值的工作。
description_english:
Responsibilities
1. Responsible for the requirement development of cross-platform products, ensuring high-fidelity UI restoration and a great user experience.
2. Optimize front-end projects to ensure product performance and stability.
3. Discuss and design technical solutions for new features with the backend team.
Requirements
1. Full-time bachelor's degree or above, with a preference for majors in computer science, communications, or related fields.
2. At least three years of development experience.
3. Proficient in TypeScript and CSS, with a strong command of React Hooks.
4. Proficient in object-oriented programming with architectural design capabilities.
5. Proficient in fundamental data structures and algorithms, familiar with basic network knowledge.
6. Proficient in responsive layout, with experience in developing cross-platform products.
7. Excellent analytical and learning abilities.
8. Strong sense of responsibility and team spirit, skilled in communication and collaboration.
Bonus Points
1. Experience with GenAI projects such as stable diffusion, control net, etc.
2. A passion for ACG, a strong interest in anime/manga culture; senior enthusiasts are preferred.
3. Comprehensive and excellent English communication skills (TOEFL 100+), strong Japanese ability (N2+).
We are a Series A startup currently focused on researching generative AI, developing a text-to-image AI generation and discussion-related site centered on virtual characters. We are a global company headquartered in Singapore, with offices in the Bay Area and a domestic entity in China. Our current team members come from companies like Tencent, Microsoft, and ByteDance, with many holding overseas academic backgrounds. We have secured several rounds of investment from top-tier USD funds both domestically and internationally. Our management style is flat and flexible, focusing on efficiency and output. We hope to find passionate partners who share our vision to jointly create a new, era-defining product.
[Our Product] We are a startup focused on researching generative AI. Our currently launched text-to-image AI generation and consumption platform has become a leading product overseas, with rapidly growing user numbers and market share.
[Our Capital Background] We have received multiple rounds of investment from top-tier institutions at home and abroad, including Sequoia, 5Y Capital, Monolith, and Makers Fund, with a current valuation in the hundreds of millions of USD.
[Our Team] Our company is headquartered in Singapore, and we support remote work for team members from all over the world. Our team members have diverse backgrounds and solid technical skills. There are no tedious unspoken rules; both brilliant interns and seasoned experts can fully contribute and learn.
[What You Will Get] Gain cutting-edge technical/product knowledge in the field, work on a product together, truly experience turning imagination into reality, and have a meaningful job that fulfills your personal value.

title: 高级前端工程师（远程办公）
team: 某大型企业服务公司
summary_chinese: 核心组件开发,在线协作工具,React,TypeScript,PWA,编辑器开发
summary_english: Core Component Development,Online Collaboration Tools,React,TypeScript,PWA,Editor Development
description:
职位内容：
1. 作为大前端一员参与到公司核心业务组件的重构与开发，包括 Web、客户端和编辑器等；
2. 探索和尝试 PWA, WebAssembly 和 Server Push 等前沿技术提升产品体验；
3. 持续思考提升工程质量的⽅式，如果 TypeScript、Code Review 和⾃动化测试等；
4. 通过实现 SSO、渐进增强、代码复⽤等方式帮助推动石墨⽂档平台化；
5. 分享和推动更科学的项目管理方式，帮助项目更好地成功。
职位要求：
1. 有良好的逻辑思维能力；
2. 具备扎实且与时俱进的 Javascript 基础；
3. 关注前端动态，至少非常熟练使用一种前端框架，包括但不限于：React, Vue, Angular ...；
了解状态管理；
4. 熟练的调试和工程化功底；
5. 有写测试的习惯，且在项目中有过实践经历；
6. 如果你是前端 leader，当然需要具备组建团队和项目管理的能力啦。
加分点
熟悉或了解 React Native ；
GitHub 有 500 以上 star 的前端项目；
了解 Node.js ，有后端开发的经验；
有网页可视化编辑器的开发经验；

title: Java后台开发工程师（远程办公）
team: 上海往联互联网上网服务有限公司
summary: Java,SpringCloud,MySQL,中间件,分布式系统设计,大规模系统开发
summary_chinese: 后端系统设计与开发,分布式系统,高并发,微服务架构,SpringCloud,数据库优化,中间件
summary_english: Backend System Design and Development,Distributed Systems,High Concurrency,Microservices Architecture,SpringCloud,Database Optimization,Middleware
description:
岗位职责
核心系统开发：负责公司核心业务后端系统的设计、开发和迭代，确保代码质量和系统稳定性。
性能与架构优化：主导或参与系统架构的持续优化，解决高性能、高并发、分布式环境下的技术难题，包括JVM调优、数据库优化、中间件治理等。
分布式系统构建：设计和实现微服务架构，精通服务治理、链路追踪、熔断降级等分布式场景下的关键技术和解决⽅案。
数据库与存储⽅案：负责数据库的设计、SQL优化，并设计和实施分库分表、读写分离、主从同步等解决⽅案，保障数据安全与访问效率。
系统安全防护：负责后端服务的安全架构设计，能够有效防范和处理DDoS攻击、SQL注入、XSS等常见安全威胁，保障业务数据安全。
技术攻坚与传承：解决线上重大技术问题，编写技术⽂档，分享最佳实践，指导和培养初级工程师，提升团队整体技术水平。
任职要求
技术基础：
计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，5年以上Java后端开发经验。
Java基础扎实，深刻理解JVM内存模型、垃圾回收机制，具备丰富的JVM配置、优化和调优实战经验。
精通IO、多线程及并发编程，熟悉Java并发框架（如JUC）的使用和原理。
框架熟练：
熟练掌握SpringBoot、SpringCloud等主流开源框架，并理解其核心原理，具备基于微服务架构的完整项目开发和部署经验。
架构经验：
具备分布式系统的设计与开发经验，对分布式事务、一致性协议等有深入理解。
拥有高并发、大规模系统的开发、调优和稳定性保障经验，能系统性思考性能瓶颈。
数据库能力：
精通数据库设计与优化，有丰富的SQL优化经验。
熟悉分库分表、主从同步等分布式数据库设计与实践。
中间件掌握：
熟悉常用中间件，如MQ（消息队列）、RPC框架、缓存（如Redis） 等，了解其使用场景、原理及常见问题解决方案。
安全意识：
熟悉后端安全措施，能够有效处理DDoS、SQL注入等常见攻击风险，具备安全编码意识。
加分项（具备以下经验者优先）
对 RocketMQ、Kafka 等主流消息队列有深度使用或调优经验，甚至具备源码级别的理解。
熟悉 Kubernetes (k8s) 容器编排技术，有实际的容器化应用部署、运维和管理经验。
有大规模分布式缓存（Redis Cluster）的规划、部署和优化经验。
在知名开源项目中有贡献，或有技术博客、GitHub项目等能体现技术深度的成果。

熟悉后端安全措施，能够有效处理DDoS、SQL注入等常见攻击风险，具备安全编码意识。
加分项（具备以下经验者优先）
对 RocketMQ、Kafka 等主流消息队列有深度使用或调优经验，甚至具备源码级别的理解。

在知名开源项目中有贡献，或有技术博客、GitHub项目等能体现技术深度的成果。
description_english:
Responsibilities
Core System Development: Responsible for the design, development, and iteration of the company's core business backend systems, ensuring code quality and system stability.
Performance and Architecture Optimization: Lead or participate in the continuous optimization of the system architecture, solving technical challenges in high-performance, high-concurrency, and distributed environments, including JVM tuning, database optimization, middleware governance, etc.
Distributed System Construction: Design and implement microservices architecture, proficient in key technologies and solutions in distributed scenarios such as service governance, link tracing, circuit breaking, and service degradation.
Database and Storage Solutions: Responsible for database design, SQL optimization, and designing and implementing solutions such as database sharding, table splitting, read-write splitting, and master-slave replication to ensure data security and access efficiency.
System Security Protection: Responsible for the security architecture design of backend services, capable of effectively preventing and handling common security threats such as DDoS attacks, SQL injection, and XSS to ensure business data security.
Technical Problem Solving and Mentorship: Solve major online technical issues, write technical documentation, share best practices, guide and train junior engineers, and improve the overall technical level of the team.
Requirements
Technical Foundation:
Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related fields, with over 5 years of Java backend development experience.
Solid foundation in Java, with a deep understanding of the JVM memory model and garbage collection mechanisms, and extensive practical experience in JVM configuration, optimization, and tuning.
Proficient in IO, multithreading, and concurrent programming, familiar with the use and principles of Java concurrency frameworks (such as JUC).
Framework Proficiency:
Proficient in mainstream open-source frameworks such as SpringBoot and SpringCloud, understanding their core principles, and having complete project development and deployment experience based on microservices architecture.
Architecture Experience:
Experience in designing and developing distributed systems, with a deep understanding of distributed transactions, consistency protocols, etc.
Experience in developing, tuning, and ensuring the stability of high-concurrency, large-scale systems, with the ability to systematically analyze performance bottlenecks.
Database Skills:
Proficient in database design and optimization, with extensive experience in SQL optimization.
Familiar with the design and practice of distributed databases, including database sharding, table splitting, and master-slave replication.
Middleware Mastery:
Familiar with common middleware such as MQ (Message Queue), RPC frameworks, caching (e.g., Redis), understanding their use cases, principles, and common problem-solving solutions.
Security Awareness:
Familiar with backend security measures, capable of effectively handling common attack risks such as DDoS and SQL injection, and possessing a security-conscious coding mindset.
Bonus Points (candidates with the following experience are preferred)
In-depth experience in using or tuning mainstream message queues like RocketMQ or Kafka, even to the level of understanding their source code.
Familiarity with Kubernetes (k8s) container orchestration technology, with practical experience in deploying, operating, and managing containerized applications.
Experience in planning, deploying, and optimizing large-scale distributed caching (Redis Cluster).
Contributions to well-known open-source projects, or having a technical blog, GitHub projects, or other achievements that demonstrate technical depth.

title: 前端开发工程师（远程办公）
team: 某大型社交网络与媒体公司
summary: CSS,JavaScript,HTML5,接受居家办公,计算机/软件工程相关专业
summary_chinese: Web应用开发,人工智能,React,数据驱动,前端架构,CI/CD
summary_english: Web Application Development,Artificial Intelligence,React,Data-driven,Frontend Architecture,CI/CD
description:
关于 MyShell
https://myshell.ai
MyShell 正在通过为原生人工智能应用构建一个开放的生态系统来革新人工智能领域。我们强大的平台和直观的工具包使任何人都能够创建、访问并受益于人工智能驱动的应用程序。MyShell 于 2023 年 4 月推出，迅速在全球获得关注，吸引了多元化的创作者和用户群体。
 
我们的团队由来自麻省理工学院、普林斯顿大学和牛津大学等顶尖学府的才华横溢的人才组成，致力于在支持和透明的工作环境中促进创新。在领先的风险投资公司的资助下，MyShell 准备重塑人工智能的未来，使其易于获取并融入每个人的日常生活。加入我们这激动人心的旅程，共同重新定义人工智能的可能性。
岗位职责：
1、主导复杂前端应用的开发，确保良好的响应性与跨平台兼容性；
2、设计并实现可扩展、可维护的 Web 应用，遵循高质量代码标准与最佳实践；
3、与产品经理合作，利用埋点与数据看板工具分析用户行为，驱动产品迭代；
4、与产品经理、设计师、后端工程师协作，定义 API 并与 UI 组件无缝对接；
5、针对性能进行优化，最大化速度与体验流畅度；
6、指导与培养初级开发者，营造持续学习与知识分享的团队文化；
7、持续关注前端技术与最佳实践，并将其融入技术栈以推动创新。
岗位要求：
1、计算机科学相关专业本科或硕士学历，或具备同等经验；
2、至少 1–3 年前端开发经验，并有高质量 Web 应用的可验证成果；
3、具备用户行为追踪、数据分析与数据看板经验，能够与产品团队开展数据驱动协作；
4、深入掌握 React、HTML5、CSS3、ES6+，熟悉现代前端架构与设计模式；
5、熟练使用状态管理库，并对 RESTful API 有扎实理解；
6、熟悉构建工具、版本控制（如 Git）与 CI/CD 流程；
7、具备能展示视觉与交互能力的高质量作品集；
8、具备优秀的沟通能力，能在快节奏的跨职能环境中高效协作；"

title: 大前端全栈工程师（远程办公）
team: 上海合溢网络科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 跨端架构与研发,Flutter,Android/iOS,移动端性能优化,架构设计,8年以上经验
summary_english: Cross-platform Architecture & Development,Flutter,Android/iOS,Mobile Performance Optimization,Architecture Design,8+ Years of Experience
description:
岗位职责：
1.  负责公司大前端（Android/IOS + Flutter/Web端）核心业务的研发与架构优化，主导重要模块的技术方案设计与落地。
2.  负责高性能渲染、复杂交互、⽹络及系统底层能⼒的开发与优化，保障 App 的稳定性与流畅度。
3.  深度参与跨端架构建设，推动 Flutter 在业务线的落地，包括性能治理、框架定制化、⼯程体系优化等。
4.  与产品、设计、后端团队紧密协作，推动体验、性能、稳定性持续提升。
5.  负责技术预研，包括 Jetpack、Flutter 引擎机制、AOT/JIT 优化、新版本差异分析，及时产出可落地方案。
6.  在团队中承担 Mentor 角色，提升整体⼯程质量与交付效率。
 
任职要求：
1.  本科及以上学历，8 年以上Android /IOS/Web/Flutter开发经验，3 年以上实战经验。
2.  基础扎实，熟悉 Kotlin/Java，精通常用架构（MVVM/MVI）、Jetpack 组件、渲染流程、性能分析。
3.  精通 Flutter 框架机制，包含构建、渲染、状态管理（Bloc/Provider/GetX/Redux 等）、Flutter 与原生混编。
4.  熟悉 Dart 异步模型、Isolate、多线程、内存管理与性能调优。
5.  有复杂业务架构经验，如多模块拆分、动态化、插件化、Flutter Engine 优化者优先。
6.  主导过大型项目或核心技术改造，有优秀的沟通能力与推动力。
7.  对技术有追求，有强烈的 Owner 意识，愿意在工程体系建设和跨平台方向持续投入。
加分项：
-  有 Flutter Engine、FML、Skia、Binding 层调优经验。
-  有多端统一方案经验（如 Flutter + H5 + 原生）。 
-  有性能治理经验，如卡顿、内存抖动、包体积、首屏、渲染优化等。
-  有开源作品、技术博客或社区贡献者优先。

2.  负责高性能渲染、复杂交互、⽹络及系统底层能⼒的开发与优化，保障 App 的稳定性与流畅度。

2.  基础扎实，熟悉 Kotlin/Java，精通常用架构（MVVM/MVI）、Jetpack 组件、渲染流程、性能分析。
3.  精通 Flutter 框架机制，包含构建、渲染、状态管理（Bloc/Provider/GetX/Redux 等）、Flutter 与原生混编。
4.  熟悉 Dart 异步模型、Isolate、多线程、内存管理与性能调优。
5.  有复杂业务架构经验，如多模块拆分、动态化、插件化、Flutter Engine 优化者优先。
6.  主导过大型项目或核心技术改造，有优秀的沟通能力与推动力。

加分项：
-  有 Flutter Engine、FML、Skia、Binding 层调优经验。
-  有多端统一方案经验（如 Flutter + H5 + 原生）。 
-  有性能治理经验，如卡顿、内存抖动、包体积、首屏、渲染优化等。
-  有开源作品、技术博客或社区贡献者优先。
description_english:
Responsibilities:
1.  Responsible for the R&D and architectural optimization of the company's core front-end business (Android/IOS + Flutter/Web), leading the technical solution design and implementation of key modules.
2.  Responsible for the development and optimization of high-performance rendering, complex interactions, networking, and underlying system capabilities to ensure the stability and smoothness of the App.
3.  Deeply involved in cross-platform architecture construction, promoting the adoption of Flutter in business lines, including performance governance, framework customization, and engineering system optimization.
4.  Collaborate closely with product, design, and backend teams to continuously improve user experience, performance, and stability.
5.  Responsible for technical research, including Jetpack, Flutter engine mechanisms, AOT/JIT optimization, and analysis of new version differences, to promptly produce implementable solutions.
6.  Serve as a Mentor within the team to enhance overall engineering quality and delivery efficiency.
 
Requirements:
1.  Bachelor's degree or above, with over 8 years of development experience in Android/IOS/Web/Flutter, and over 3 years of hands-on experience.
2.  Solid foundation, familiar with Kotlin/Java, proficient in common architectures (MVVM/MVI), Jetpack components, rendering pipelines, and performance analysis.
3.  Proficient in Flutter framework mechanisms, including build, rendering, state management (Bloc/Provider/GetX/Redux, etc.), and hybrid development with native code.
4.  Familiar with Dart's asynchronous model, Isolate, multi-threading, memory management, and performance tuning.
5.  Experience with complex business architectures, such as multi-module splitting, dynamic features, plugin development, and Flutter Engine optimization is a plus.
6.  Experience leading large-scale projects or core technology transformations, with excellent communication and driving skills.
7.  Passionate about technology, with a strong sense of ownership, and willing to continuously invest in engineering systems and cross-platform development.
Bonus Points:
-  Experience in tuning the Flutter Engine, FML, Skia, or Binding layers.
-  Experience with multi-platform unified solutions (e.g., Flutter + H5 + Native).
-  Experience in performance governance, such as optimizing for lag, memory jitter, package size, first-screen load time, and rendering.
-  Contributors to open-source projects, technical blogs, or communities are preferred.

title: 不卡年龄-Android架构开发-远程办公
team: 某知名互联网公司
summary: Vue,Node.js,接受居家办公,React,前端开发经验,架构师经验
summary_chinese: 前端架构设计,Web3,React,TypeScript,Serverless,小程序
summary_english: Frontend Architecture Design,Web3,React,TypeScript,Serverless,Mini Programs
description:
工作职责
技术设计与升级：主导前端技术架构方案的设计，推动技术栈的升级及工程化体系的建设。
国际化与跨站组件共享：设计国际化架构平台，具备在自定义SSR架构下设计微前端⽅案的能⼒。
前端⼩程序容器化：推动前端小程序的容器化建设，具备自定义DSL和前端编译、解析和⽣成相关能力。
性能优化：深入理解浏览器原理优化前端页面性能，确保在高并发场景下的稳定性与流畅度，提高用户体验。
前端安全：跟踪最新的安全威胁、漏洞趋势和常见攻击手法，制定和实施前端安全最佳实践和标准
任职要求
经验要求：6年以上前端开发经验，具有互联网大厂或者同行业经验者优先。
技术能力： 
深入理解 TypeScript 和 React，熟练使用 Tailwind CSS 和 Jotai 等前端工具，掌握原子化 CSS 和状态管理。
深入理解一个或者多个前端构建工具如Webpack、Vite 、 Parcel、Bun 等。
深入理解 Web3.js、Wgmi、Viem 等前端技术库，了解常规公链、数字钱包及加密技术。
掌握 Node.js 或具备 Rust、Java 任意一门后端语言并有实际项目以及高并发经验。
推动serverless架构的最佳实践，有使用 Cloudflare Workers / AWS Lambda / 阿里云 FC + ER的实际项目经验。
问题解决能力：能够深度思考业务与技术，主动发现并推动问题的解决。
AI工具应用：熟练使用 AI 工具提升开发效率，了解其在前端的应用。
沟通协作：具备优秀的沟通能力和团队合作精神。
description_chinese:
工作职责
技术设计与升级：主导前端技术架构方案的设计，推动技术栈的升级及工程化体系的建设。
国际化与跨站组件共享：设计国际化架构平台，具备在自定义SSR架构下设计微前端方案的能力。

任职要求

深入理解 TypeScript 和 React，熟练使用 Tailwind CSS 和 Jotai 等前端工具，掌握原子化 CSS 和状态管理。
深入理解一个或者多个前端构建工具如Webpack、Vite 、 Parcel、Bun 等。
深入理解 Web3.js、Wgmi、Viem 等前端技术库，了解常规公链、数字钱包及加密技术。
掌握 Node.js 或具备 Rust、Java 任意一门后端语言并有实际项目以及高并发经验。
推动serverless架构的最佳实践，有使用 Cloudflare Workers / AWS Lambda / 阿里云 FC + ER的实际项目经验。

description_english:
Responsibilities
Technical Design and Upgrade: Lead the design of frontend technical architecture solutions, and promote the upgrade of the tech stack and the construction of the engineering system.
Internationalization and Cross-Site Component Sharing: Design an internationalization architecture platform, with the ability to design micro-frontend solutions under a custom SSR architecture.
Frontend Mini-Program Containerization: Promote the containerization of frontend mini-programs, with capabilities related to custom DSLs and frontend compilation, parsing, and generation.
Performance Optimization: Deeply understand browser principles to optimize frontend page performance, ensuring stability and smoothness in high-concurrency scenarios to improve user experience.
Frontend Security: Track the latest security threats, vulnerability trends, and common attack methods; formulate and implement frontend security best practices and standards.
Requirements
Experience Requirement: 6+ years of frontend development experience; experience in major internet companies or the same industry is preferred.
Technical Skills:
In-depth understanding of TypeScript and React, proficient in using frontend tools like Tailwind CSS and Jotai, and mastery of atomic CSS and state management.
In-depth understanding of one or more frontend build tools such as Webpack, Vite, Parcel, Bun, etc.
In-depth understanding of frontend libraries like Web3.js, Wgmi, Viem, etc., and familiarity with conventional public chains, digital wallets, and cryptographic technologies.
Proficiency in Node.js or experience with any one backend language like Rust or Java, with practical project and high-concurrency experience.
Promote best practices for serverless architecture, with practical project experience using Cloudflare Workers / AWS Lambda / Alibaba Cloud FC + ER.
Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to think deeply about business and technology, proactively identify and drive the resolution of problems.
AI Tool Application: Proficient in using AI tools to improve development efficiency and understand their application in the frontend.
Communication and Collaboration: Possess excellent communication and teamwork skills.

title: 【远程办公】java交易系统开发工程师

5年以上后端开发经验
2-具备⾄少 1 年中⼼化交易所技术背景
3-对交易所技术栈有深入理解，包括订单撮合引擎、低延迟通信、金融级⼀致性方案
4-有大型分布式高并发系统的研发经验，熟悉高可用、容灾、限流降级等稳定性保障手段
5-具备较强的沟通能力和团队合作能力
6-具备较强的问题解决能力和目标导向的思维方式，有较强的抗压能力
description_chinese:
岗位职责：
1-负责合约交易系统的开发、维护和系统优化，并在有必要的情况下进行部分系统重构，满足线上高并发场景的交易需求
2-配合公司业务发展需要，负责制定相关区块链业务技术解决方案
3-针对现有架构的薄弱环节进⾏优化，解决潜在的性能瓶颈和故障问题
岗位要求：
1-计算机科学、软件⼯程或相关专业本科及以上学历
5年以上后端开发经验
2-具备⾄少 1 年中⼼化交易所技术背景
3-对交易所技术栈有深入理解，包括订单撮合引擎、低延迟通信、金融级⼀致性方案
4-有大型分布式高并发系统的研发经验，熟悉高可用、容灾、限流降级等稳定性保障手段
5-具备较强的沟通能力和团队合作能力
6-具备较强的问题解决能力和目标导向的思维方式，有较强的抗压能力
description_english:
Responsibilities:
1- Responsible for the development, maintenance, and optimization of the contract trading system, and performing partial system refactoring when necessary to meet the trading demands of high-concurrency online scenarios.
2- In line with the company's business development needs, responsible for formulating relevant blockchain business technology solutions.
3- Optimize weak points in the existing architecture to resolve potential performance bottlenecks and failure issues.
Requirements:
1- Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related major.
5+ years of backend development experience.
2- At least 1 year of technical background in a centralized exchange.
3- In-depth understanding of the exchange technology stack, including order matching engines, low-latency communication, and financial-grade consistency solutions.
4- Experience in developing large-scale distributed, high-concurrency systems; familiar with stability assurance measures such as high availability, disaster recovery, rate limiting, and service degradation.
5- Strong communication and teamwork skills.
6- Strong problem-solving abilities, a goal-oriented mindset, and the ability to work well under pressure.

title: 前端架构师--远程办公
team: 相信光（重庆）网络科技有限公司
summary: CSS,JavaScript,HTML5,Vue,金融、证券,接受居家办公,React,计算机/软件工程相关专业,前端开发经验,架构师经验
summary_chinese: 前端技术架构设计,互联网行业,Web性能优化,高并发高性能场景,SEO优化,团队技术指导
summary_english: Frontend Technical Architecture Design,Internet Industry,Web Performance Optimization,High Concurrency & High Performance Scenarios,SEO Optimization,Team Technical Guidance
description:
资深Web前端架构师
岗位职责：
- 主导前端技术架构设计和优化，确保技术架构的先进性和可扩展性。
- 深入研究 Web 性能优化方法，全面优化网站性能，提升页⾯加载速度和交互体验。
- 解决前端技术难题，负责攻克⾼并发、⾼性能场景下的技术难关。
- 有全球复杂网络下的前端工程优化能⼒。
- 夯实前端安全护城河，从网站、流程、规范等层面为团队保驾护航。
- 为团队成员提供技术指导和培训，提升团队整体技术能力。
任职要求：
- 计算机相关专业本科及以上学历。
- 八年以上前端开发经验，五年以上前端架构设计经验；有大型互联网行业的前端架构经验优先。
- 精通主流前端框架，对源码实现了若指掌，深入理解相关生态系统，具备扎实的前端基础。
- 精通 Web 前端性能优化技术，能够从代码、网络、渲染等多方面进行全面优化；能够深入诊断和优化前端性能。
- 具备 SEO 优化经验，熟悉搜索引擎的工作原理和优化策略。
- 具有出色的沟通和协调能力，有良好的团队领导能力，能够指导团队成员工作，并提升团队整体技术水平。

description_english:
Senior Web Frontend Architect
Responsibilities:
- Lead the design and optimization of frontend technical architecture, ensuring its advanced nature and scalability.
- Conduct in-depth research on Web performance optimization methods, comprehensively optimize website performance, and improve page loading speed and user interaction experience.
- Solve complex frontend technical problems and take charge of overcoming technical challenges in high-concurrency and high-performance scenarios.
- Possess the ability to optimize frontend engineering under complex global network conditions.
- Solidify the frontend security moat, safeguarding the team from the aspects of website, processes, and standards.
- Provide technical guidance and training for team members to enhance the team's overall technical capabilities.
Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related majors.
- Over 8 years of frontend development experience, with over 5 years in frontend architecture design; experience in frontend architecture for large-scale internet companies is preferred.
- Proficient in mainstream frontend frameworks, with a deep understanding of their source code and related ecosystems, and possess a solid frontend foundation.
- Proficient in Web frontend performance optimization techniques, capable of comprehensive optimization from multiple aspects such as code, network, and rendering; able to deeply diagnose and optimize frontend performance.
- Possess SEO optimization experience, familiar with the working principles and optimization strategies of search engines.
- Excellent communication and coordination skills, with strong team leadership abilities, capable of guiding team members and improving the team's overall technical level.

title: 【硅谷外企 远程办公】高级后端/全栈工程师
team: 北京捷瑞网络技术有限公司
summary: Golang,后端开发经验,CSS,全栈侧重后端,Node.js,计算机相关专业,前端开发经验,全栈项目经验,TypeScript,C/C++,JavaScript,MySQL/Redis/MongoDB,Python
summary_chinese: 大规模复杂系统开发,汽车金融科技,Node.js,GraphQL,AWS,硅谷外企,LLM经验加分
summary_english: Large-scale Complex System Development,Auto Fintech,Node.js,GraphQL,AWS,Silicon Valley Foreign Enterprise,LLM Experience is a plus
description:
Jerry.ai 是总部位于硅谷的明星 Ai 汽车金融产品互联网高科技公司。 聚焦万亿级市场，以⽤技术解决问题为准则，以创造真正有价值的产品为驱动⼒，我们为数百万⽤户提供最佳汽车金融产品选购平台。近来，公司完成了新一轮上亿元级别融资, 并被领英列为全美⾼科技新兴公司 50 强,同时荣登福布斯2021 年度最佳新兴雇主排行榜。
加入我们，一起迎接职业生涯爆发黄金时期。
关于我们:
1、全美高科技新兴公司 50 强，福布斯 2021 年度最佳新兴雇主，聚焦万亿级朝阳市场，获得硅谷顶级风投上亿级融资
2、北美最佳Ai汽车金融产品平台，致力打造移动+AI 时代的最优汽车金融产品
3、直击用户痛点，提供绝佳用户体验，APP 业内排名第一，季度营收指数增长
4、国际化多元文化，团队来自全球多个国家， 开放透明平等
5、一群崇尚极客精神，热爱技术的同事（我们的成员来自于：Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, Linkedin, Nvidia, 阿里巴巴, 字节跳动等）
加入我们，您将：
1.感受极客氛围，拥抱前沿创新技术
2.全面参加从用户沟通、需求讨论、产品开发、到上线部署的每个环节，参与一个产品创新和用户高速成长的过程。您不仅仅作为一个终端执行者，而是可以提供作为产品的设计者和规划者参与其中
我们希望你:
1.你热爱挑战复杂的问题，并能产出清晰稳定、可扩展的解决方案。
2.对设计与实施优雅的软件解决方案，你有着真正的热情。
3.你熟知并跟踪最新的开发生态环境，并在选择适当的工具或库时能做出明智的决策。
4.你会在整个产品栈中贡献，并共同监督代码库的完整性。
我们想要你解决的问题:
1.与产品经理、设计师和其他工程师合作，定义技术需求，创建软件架构，并开发软件组件。
2.挖掘软件系统以及开发流程中的问题并提出可靠的解决方案，确保软件系统的稳定性、可扩展性和安全性。
3.参与新功能和自动化开发，编写单元测试、自我测试和质量保证软件，确保工程成果持续高质量交付。
4.日常进行代码审查，始终维持高标准的代码质量，不断优化软件和工具。
5.定期参与产品和工程规格的审查，从商业和技术双重视角为团队提供洞见。
6.不断收集客户及团队反馈，定期根据反馈优化产品。
7.日常积极监控软件错误和警报，确保迅速解决关键问题。
8.创建和维护开发、故障排除和培训文档。
9.理解并朝着公司的目标、战略、哲学以及盈利目标努力。
10.支持并培养初级工程师，营造持续学习和改进的文化氛围。
11.识别并解决软件系统中的性能瓶颈、可扩展性问题和其他潜在难题。
12.日常开发中关注现有代码的审查和优化，如消除重复代码、移除无效代码，以及改进一些不符合最佳实践的代码。
13.理解代码的性能和可扩展性影响。
14.设计和实施大规模复杂系统。
15.识别技术债务并实施解决方案，提升代码质量和可维护性。
16.关注行业动态，不断研究和采纳新技术、工具和最佳实践，提升软件开发效率和有效性。
我们需要你具备:
1.你具备4年以上的全职软件开发经验，本科及以上学历，且专业为计算机科学或相关领域。
2.你对软件开发的基本原理（例如数据结构，算法等）有深厚的了解。
3.你具备现代web的实践经验，了解开源web框架和常用基础设施（包括但不限于 NodeJS / GraphQL / PostgreSQL / Redis / Kubernetes）。
4.你对云端基础设施有比较熟悉的了解和使用经验（包括但不限于 AWS、Azure、阿里云 等）
5.你能理解并运用JavaScript的最佳实践，认识并能使用常用的设计模式，编写符合习惯的JavaScript代码。（擅长其他语言的希望能够具有快速学习的能力）
6.对于代码性能问题，可扩展性以及故障排查，你有深入的了解。
7.面对疑难杂症，你能够建立清晰的排查方案，找到切入点。
8.你热衷于编写有意义的测试，维持全面的测试覆盖。
9.你有设计、分析、调试分布式系统或大型web应用的经验。
加分项目:
对于LLM具有一些了解
对于CICD、devOps具有一些经验
熟练掌握React Native, GraphQL以及Apollo。
有写技术Blog的习惯，活跃于技术社区，参与开源项目等。
Jerry.ai 是总部位于硅谷的明星Ai汽车金融产品互联网高科技公司。 聚焦朝阳行业，以用技术解决问题为准则，以创造真正有价值的产品为驱动力，我们为数百万用户提供一站式汽车金融产品选购平台。近来，公司完成了新一轮上亿元级别融资, 并被评为全美高科技新兴公司50强，同时荣登福布斯列 2021 年度最佳新科技雇主排行榜。我们正在致力于大规模的产研团队扩建，希望寻找喜爱挑战的优秀人才加入我们的团队。

加入我们，您将：
* 感受极客氛围，拥抱前沿创新技术
* 全面参加从用户沟通、需求讨论、产品开发、到上线部署的每个环节，参与一个产品创新和用户高速成长的过程。您不仅仅作为一个终端执行者，而是可以提供作为产品的设计者和规划者参与其中
* 来硅谷总部和加拿大分公司出差和转岗的机会，结识一大群有理想、有热情的战斗伙伴

加入我们，您将：

* 全面参加从用户沟通、需求讨论、产品开发、到上线部署的每个环节，参与一个产品创新和用户高速成长的过程。您不仅仅作为一个终端执行者，而是可以提供作为产品的设计者和规划者参与其中
* 来硅谷总部和加拿大分公司出差和转岗的机会，结识一大群有理想、有热情的战斗伙伴
description_english:
Jerry.ai is a star AI auto finance product high-tech internet company headquartered in Silicon Valley. Focusing on a trillion-dollar market, we operate on the principle of solving problems with technology and are driven by creating truly valuable products. We provide millions of users with the best platform for selecting auto finance products. Recently, the company completed a new round of financing in the hundreds of millions and was listed by LinkedIn as one of the top 50 high-tech emerging companies in the United States, while also being featured on Forbes' 2021 list of Best Startup Employers.
Join us and embrace a golden era of career growth.
About us:
1. Top 50 high-tech emerging company in the U.S., Forbes 2021 Best Startup Employer, focusing on a trillion-dollar growth market, and having secured hundreds of millions in financing from top Silicon Valley venture capitalists.
2. The best AI auto finance product platform in North America, dedicated to creating the optimal auto finance product for the mobile + AI era.
3. Directly addressing user pain points, providing an excellent user experience, with our app ranking first in the industry and achieving exponential quarterly revenue growth.
4. International and multicultural, with a team from various countries around the world, promoting openness, transparency, and equality.
5. A group of colleagues who admire the geek spirit and love technology (our members come from: Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, Linkedin, Nvidia, Alibaba, ByteDance, etc.).
By joining us, you will:
1. Experience a geek atmosphere and embrace cutting-edge innovative technologies.
2. Fully participate in every stage from user communication, requirement discussion, product development, to online deployment, and be part of a process of product innovation and rapid user growth. You will not just be an executor, but can also participate as a designer and planner of the product.
We hope you:
1. Love tackling complex problems and can produce clear, stable, and scalable solutions.
2. Have a real passion for designing and implementing elegant software solutions.
3. Are familiar with and keep track of the latest development ecosystem, and can make wise decisions when selecting appropriate tools or libraries.
4. Will contribute across the entire product stack and jointly oversee the integrity of the codebase.
Problems we want you to solve:
1. Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to define technical requirements, create software architecture, and develop software components.
2. Identify problems within the software system and development process and propose reliable solutions to ensure the stability, scalability, and security of the software system.
3. Participate in the development of new features and automation, writing unit tests, self-tests, and quality assurance software to ensure the continuous high-quality delivery of engineering results.
4. Conduct daily code reviews, always maintaining high standards of code quality, and continuously optimizing software and tools.
5. Regularly participate in reviews of product and engineering specifications, providing insights to the team from both business and technical perspectives.
6. Continuously collect feedback from customers and the team, and regularly optimize the product based on feedback.
7. Actively monitor software errors and alerts daily to ensure critical issues are resolved promptly.
8. Create and maintain documentation for development, troubleshooting, and training.
9. Understand and work towards the company's goals, strategies, philosophy, and profitability targets.
10. Support and mentor junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
11. Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, scalability issues, and other potential challenges in the software system.
12. In daily development, focus on reviewing and optimizing existing code, such as eliminating duplicate code, removing dead code, and improving code that does not follow best practices.
13. Understand the performance and scalability implications of code.
14. Design and implement large-scale complex systems.
15. Identify technical debt and implement solutions to improve code quality and maintainability.
16. Stay updated with industry trends, continuously researching and adopting new technologies, tools, and best practices to enhance software development efficiency and effectiveness.
We need you to have:
1. Over 4 years of full-time software development experience, with a Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or a related field.
2. A deep understanding of the fundamental principles of software development (e.g., data structures, algorithms, etc.).
3. Practical experience with modern web technologies, and knowledge of open-source web frameworks and common infrastructure (including but not limited to NodeJS / GraphQL / PostgreSQL / Redis / Kubernetes).
4. Familiarity and experience with cloud infrastructure (including but not limited to AWS, Azure, Alibaba Cloud, etc.).
5. The ability to understand and apply JavaScript best practices, recognize and use common design patterns, and write idiomatic JavaScript code. (Those proficient in other languages should have the ability to learn quickly).
6. A deep understanding of code performance issues, scalability, and troubleshooting.
7. The ability to establish clear troubleshooting plans and find entry points when facing difficult problems.
8. A passion for writing meaningful tests and maintaining comprehensive test coverage.
9. Experience in designing, analyzing, and debugging distributed systems or large-scale web applications.
Bonus points:
Some understanding of LLM
Experience with CICD, DevOps
Proficiency in React Native, GraphQL, and Apollo.
Habit of writing technical blogs, active in technical communities, contributing to open-source projects, etc.
Jerry.ai is a star AI auto finance product high-tech internet company headquartered in Silicon Valley. Focusing on a growth industry, we operate on the principle of solving problems with technology and are driven by creating truly valuable products. We provide millions of users with a one-stop platform for selecting auto finance products. Recently, the company completed a new round of financing in the hundreds of millions and was named one of the top 50 high-tech emerging companies in the U.S., while also being featured on Forbes' 2021 list of Best New Tech Employers. We are committed to a large-scale expansion of our product and research teams and are looking for talented individuals who love challenges to join our team.

By joining us, you will:
* Experience a geek atmosphere and embrace cutting-edge innovative technologies
* Fully participate in every stage from user communication, requirement discussion, product development, to online deployment, and be part of a process of product innovation and rapid user growth. You will not just be an executor, but can also participate as a designer and planner of the product
* Have opportunities for business travel and relocation to our Silicon Valley headquarters and Canadian branch, and meet a large group of idealistic and passionate comrades-in-arms

title: 前端开发工程师（支付方向，可远程办公）
title_chinese: 前端开发工程师（支付方向）
team: 某中型金融科技公司
summary: JavaScript,Vue,交易所经验,接受居家办公,React,计算机/软件工程相关专业,前端开发经验,跨境支付
summary_chinese: 支付收银台前端开发,支付行业,React/Vue/TypeScript,服务端渲染(SSR),支付系统经验,金融科技
summary_english: Payment Cashier Frontend Development,Payments Industry,React/Vue/TypeScript,Server-Side Rendering (SSR),Payment System Experience,FinTech
description:
岗位职责：
1. 负责支付收银台的前端开发、迭代与维护，包括用户界面设计、交互逻辑实现和多端适配（PC/移动端）。
2. 与产品、设计、后端及安全团队紧密协作，分析业务需求（如支付流程、风控集成），提供前端技术解决⽅案，并实现⾼性能、响应式的交互原型。
3. 优化⽀付页面的加载速度、SEO和Web性能（如SSR应用、CDN加速），确保在⾼并发场景下的稳定性和用户体验。
4. 集成niche技术栈，如支付SDK、iframe跨域通信、防欺诈工具、浏览器扩展API（与钱包交互），并处理区块链/支付网关的兼容性问题。
任职要求：
1. 5-10年前端开发经验，熟练掌握主流前端框架（如 React、Vue、Next.js、Nuxt 等），具备扎实的 JavaScript / TypeScript 基础。
2. 具备服务端渲染（SSR）经验，对前后端同构、性能优化有一定理解。
3. 熟悉前端工程化、模块化开发流程，了解构建工具（Webpack、Vite 等）。
4. 注重代码质量与可维护性，具备良好的组件化、状态管理设计能力。
5. 具备良好的沟通协作能力和自我驱动精神。
6. 有支付系统、on/off ramp 或类似金融/加密货币项目经验者优先。
加分项：
1. 有后端开发经验（如 Node.js、NestJS、Go、Java 等），能处理全栈支付集成。
2. 有实际项目或个人作品展示（GitHub、作品集、上线项目等），尤其是支付/区块链相关。
3. 对 SEO、Web 性能优化、CDN、CI/CD 有经验或了解；熟悉支付安全（如PCI DSS合规）或区块链交互（如EVM链、钱包SDK）者加分。

description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for the frontend development, iteration, and maintenance of the payment cashier, including user interface design, interaction logic implementation, and multi-device adaptation (PC/Mobile).
2. Collaborate closely with product, design, backend, and security teams to analyze business requirements (such as payment flows, risk control integration), provide frontend technical solutions, and implement high-performance, responsive interactive prototypes.
3. Optimize the loading speed, SEO, and web performance of payment pages (e.g., SSR applications, CDN acceleration) to ensure stability and user experience in high-concurrency scenarios.
4. Integrate niche technology stacks, such as payment SDKs, iframe cross-domain communication, anti-fraud tools, browser extension APIs (for wallet interaction), and handle compatibility issues with blockchain/payment gateways.
Requirements:
1. 5-10 years of frontend development experience, proficient in mainstream frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Vue, Next.js, Nuxt), with a solid foundation in JavaScript / TypeScript.
2. Experience with Server-Side Rendering (SSR), with a certain understanding of isomorphic front-end and back-end architecture and performance optimization.
3. Familiar with frontend engineering and modular development processes, with knowledge of build tools (Webpack, Vite, etc.).
4. Focus on code quality and maintainability, with good skills in component-based design and state management.
5. Possess good communication, collaboration skills, and a self-driven spirit.
6. Experience with payment systems, on/off ramp, or similar financial/cryptocurrency projects is a plus.
Bonus Points:
1. Backend development experience (e.g., Node.js, NestJS, Go, Java), capable of handling full-stack payment integration.
2. Can showcase actual projects or personal works (GitHub, portfolio, live projects, etc.), especially related to payments/blockchain.
3. Experience or knowledge in SEO, web performance optimization, CDN, CI/CD; familiarity with payment security (e.g., PCI DSS compliance) or blockchain interaction (e.g., EVM chains, wallet SDKs) is a plus.

summary_english: AI Marketing SaaS R&D,AI Marketing SaaS,React+Java/Python,Big Data/AI Experience,Startup Company,Cross-timezone Collaboration
description:
亚洲时区（含中国）的候选人勿扰！！
不是外派，是你自己【已经】住在北美当地，仅限美西时区（加州、华州、内华达州、温哥华等），需要英文⽆障碍沟通。
全栈⼯程师
## ⼯作技能要求
前端（React）、后端（Java、Python）、数仓（SQL、ETL）
前后端都需要有生产经验
优先有电商，增长，营销、大数据经验的
优先有AI项⽬经验的
## 工作环境
英语&汉语，要求英语沟通无障碍
要求在美西时区
虽然北美地区有PM，有客户，大部分工作可在北美时区内闭环，但也会有和中国时区研发、PM跨时区沟通的情况。
## 公司业务
创业公司，A轮，海外AI营销SaaS平台、AI Agent业务，营收情况量好，业务加速扩张。给一个业务方向，要能独当一面。
全球化Team（中国、美国为主），团队多大厂出身（字节、阿里、Meta、Google），注重个人成长与业务产出双赢。
创业公司，A轮，海外AI营销SaaS平台、AI Agent业务，营收情况良好，业务加速扩张。给一个业务方向，要能独当一面。
全球化Team（中国、美国为主），团队多大厂出身（Meta、Google、字节、阿里），注重个人成长与业务产出双赢。

description_english:
Candidates in Asian time zones (including China) should not apply!
This is not an expatriate position. You must [already] be residing in North America, limited to the West Coast time zone (California, Washington, Nevada, Vancouver, etc.). Fluent English communication is required.

## Required Skills
Frontend (React), Backend (Java, Python), Data Warehouse (SQL, ETL)
Production experience is required for both frontend and backend.
Experience in e-commerce, growth, marketing, or big data is preferred.
Experience with AI projects is preferred.

## Work Environment
English & Chinese, fluent English communication is required.
Must be in the US West Coast time zone.
Although there are PMs and clients in North America, and most work can be completed within the North American time zone, there will be instances of cross-timezone communication with R&D and PMs in the China time zone.

## Company Business
A Series A startup company focused on an overseas AI marketing SaaS platform and AI Agent business. Revenue is strong, and the business is expanding rapidly. You will be expected to take full ownership of a business direction.
Global team (primarily China and the US), with many members from major tech companies (Meta, Google, ByteDance, Alibaba). We focus on a win-win for both personal growth and business output.

全栈AI工程师（LLM应用/检索方向）
职位概述
我们正在寻找一位经验丰富的全栈⼯程师，加⼊我们充满活⼒的技术团队。该职位专注于AI应用开发，特别是LLM相关应用的设计和实现。我们提供灵活的⼯作地点选择和具有竞争力的国际发展机会。

参与LLM应用架构设计，包括检索增强生成(RAG)系统的实现
设计和开发AI Agent系统，提升用户交互体验

精通前端技术栈（如React、Vue等）和后端开发（如Python、Node.js等）
具备完整的AI应用开发经验，特别是LLM应用落地经验
熟悉检索系统、RAG架构设计和实现
具备独立架构设计能力和问题解决能力

日语交流能力

AI Agent开发经验

description_english:
Full-stack AI Engineer (LLM Application/Retrieval Focus)
Job Overview
We are looking for an experienced Full-stack Engineer to join our dynamic technical team. This position focuses on AI application development, especially the design and implementation of LLM-related applications. We offer flexible work location options and competitive international development opportunities.
Responsibilities
Responsible for the design and development of front-end and back-end systems for AI application products
Participate in LLM application architecture design, including the implementation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems
Design and develop AI Agent systems to enhance user interaction experience
Optimize system performance to ensure product scalability and stability
Mentor junior engineers and participate in technical decision-making
Requirements
Must-haves
Over 3 years of software engineering development experience, with a background in well-known technology companies preferred
Proficient in front-end technology stacks (e.g., React, Vue) and back-end development (e.g., Python, Node.js)
Possess complete experience in AI application development, especially in deploying LLM applications
Familiar with retrieval systems, RAG architecture design, and implementation
Possess independent architecture design and problem-solving abilities
Good English communication skills
Nice-to-haves
Active personal projects on GitHub
Japanese communication skills
Experience leading a team
Experience contributing to open-source projects
AI Agent development experience

description:
主要职责
使用React和TypeScript设计、开发并维护高性能的React应用程序
利用TradingView和D3.js实现复杂的图表和数据可视化
设计并实现实时数据交互解决⽅案，使⽤WebSocket技术处理实时数据流
优化应⽤的性能，确保交易执行的速度和数据的实时更新
编写可测试的高质量代码，并进⾏代码审查以保证开发标准
在前端项目中实施最佳实践，提高代码质量和团队协作效率
密切关注最新前端技术趋势，引入创新技术以保持平台的竞争力
职位要求
拥有211或985高校的优先考虑，计算机科学或相关领域的学士或硕士学位
良好的英语口语能力，能够阅读和理解技术文档

深入理解和实践经验使用TradingView和D3.js

强大的问题解决能力，优秀的团队合作和沟通技巧
有在高并发、高性能系统中工作的经验者优先
加分项
在金融行业的前端开发中有实际项目经验，有bsc链的优先。
对后端技术有一定了解，例如Node.js。
具有领导小型团队或管理项目的经验。
我们是一家在金融科技领域全球领先的创新型企业，专注于去中心化金融与智能算法的研发和应用。核心团队由经验丰富的金融科技专家和技术精英组成，在数字资产管理、量化模型构建及金融工程领域拥有超过五年的技术和经验沉淀。

公司依托自主研发的智能合约系统与交易架构，为全世界专业机构客户提供安全可靠的数字金融解决方案。现已形成包含底层协议、高并发应用、智能风控体系在内的完整技术研发和积累。公司目前产品、用户和营收都很稳定，各项数据呈稳健增长。顶级行业资源，拿过多家Tier 1美元基金投资，正处于业务和生产力的快速扩张阶段，因此在寻找更多有意于去中心化金融的同学加入。

我们希望候选人能够拥有对前沿技术和具体应用有长期的热情、较强自驱力和对新事物的自学能力。我们相信我们能够为员工提供广阔的发展空间和丰富的学习机会。
description_chinese:
主要职责
使用React和TypeScript设计、开发并维护高性能的React应用程序
利用TradingView和D3.js实现复杂的图表和数据可视化
设计并实现实时数据交互解决⽅案，使⽤WebSocket技术处理实时数据流
优化应⽤的性能，确保交易执行的速度和数据的实时更新
编写可测试的高质量代码，并进⾏代码审查以保证开发标准
在前端项目中实施最佳实践，提高代码质量和团队协作效率
密切关注最新前端技术趋势，引入创新技术以保持平台的竞争力
职位要求
拥有211或985高校的优先考虑，计算机科学或相关领域的学士或硕士学位
良好的英语口语能力，能够阅读和理解技术文档
至少5年的前端开发经验，其中至少3年使用React和TypeScript
深入理解和实践经验使用TradingView和D3.js
熟悉WebSocket及相关的实时数据处理技术
强大的问题解决能力，优秀的团队合作和沟通技巧
有在高并发、高性能系统中工作的经验者优先
加分项
在金融行业的前端开发中有实际项目经验，有bsc链的优先。
对后端技术有一定了解，例如Node.js。
具有领导小型团队或管理项目的经验。
我们是一家在金融科技领域全球领先的创新型企业，专注于去中心化金融与智能算法的研发和应用。核心团队由经验丰富的金融科技专家和技术精英组成，在数字资产管理、量化模型构建及金融工程领域拥有超过五年的技术和经验沉淀。

公司依托自主研发的智能合约系统与交易架构，为全世界专业机构客户提供安全可靠的数字金融解决方案。现已形成包含底层协议、高并发应用、智能风控体系在内的完整技术研发和积累。公司目前产品、用户和营收都很稳定，各项数据呈稳健增长。顶级行业资源，拿过多家Tier 1美元基金投资，正处于业务和生产力的快速扩张阶段，因此在寻找更多有意于去中心化金融的同学加入。

我们希望候选人能够拥有对前沿技术和具体应用有长期的热情、较强自驱力和对新事物的自学能力。我们相信我们能够为员工提供广阔的发展空间和丰富的学习机会。
description_english:
Main Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain high-performance React applications using React and TypeScript
Implement complex charts and data visualizations using TradingView and D3.js
Design and implement real-time data interaction solutions, using WebSocket technology to handle real-time data streams
Optimize application performance to ensure the speed of transaction execution and real-time data updates
Write high-quality, testable code and conduct code reviews to ensure development standards
Implement best practices in frontend projects to improve code quality and team collaboration efficiency
Closely follow the latest frontend technology trends and introduce innovative technologies to maintain the platform's competitiveness
Job Requirements
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field; graduates from 211 or 985 universities are preferred
Good oral English skills, with the ability to read and understand technical documents
At least 5 years of frontend development experience, with at least 3 years using React and TypeScript
In-depth understanding and practical experience with TradingView and D3.js
Familiarity with WebSocket and related real-time data processing technologies
Strong problem-solving skills, excellent teamwork and communication skills
Experience working in high-concurrency, high-performance systems is a plus
Bonus Points
Practical project experience in frontend development within the financial industry, with experience in the BSC chain being a plus.
Some understanding of backend technologies, such as Node.js.
Experience leading small teams or managing projects.
We are a globally leading innovative enterprise in the FinTech sector, focusing on the R&D and application of decentralized finance and intelligent algorithms. Our core team consists of experienced FinTech experts and tech elites, with over five years of technology and experience accumulated in digital asset management, quantitative model building, and financial engineering.

Leveraging our independently developed smart contract systems and trading architecture, the company provides secure and reliable digital financial solutions to professional institutional clients worldwide. We have established a complete technology R&D and accumulation, including underlying protocols, high-concurrency applications, and intelligent risk control systems. Currently, our products, users, and revenue are stable, with all metrics showing steady growth. With top-tier industry resources and investments from multiple Tier 1 USD funds, we are in a rapid expansion phase of business and productivity, and are therefore looking for more individuals interested in decentralized finance to join us.

We hope that candidates will have a long-term passion for cutting-edge technologies and their practical applications, strong self-drive, and the ability to self-learn new things. We believe we can provide our employees with broad development space and rich learning opportunities.

title: 资深 React native 工程师（web3/remote）
team: 某中型区块链技术服务公司
summary_chinese: RN应用性能优化,Web3,性能分析,原生开发经验,React Native,TypeScript
summary_english: RN App Performance Optimization,Web3,Performance Analysis,Native Development Experience,React Native,TypeScript
description:
核心职责
性能诊断与优化：
深入分析和定位现有React Native应用的性能瓶颈（JavaScript线程、UI线程、内存、网络、包体积等）。
主导解决⾼优先级性能问题，如应⽤启动时间优化、列表（FlatList/SectionList）滚动性能、图⽚加载与内存管理、动画卡顿、UI响应迟缓等。
使用性能分析工具（如React DevTools, Flipper, Android Studio Profiler, Xcode Instruments, Hermes Profiler）进⾏深度性能剖析。
架构与编码实践：
设计和实施高性能的React Native组件与架构方案。
优化数据流管理（如与Redux, MobX, Context API等的结合使用），减少不必要的重渲染。
编写高效、可维护且性能敏感的JavaScript/TypeScript及原生桥接代码。
进行包体积分析及优化（代码分割、动态导入、资源优化等）。
性能体系建设：
建立并维护应用的性能监控指标体系（如APM集成），设定性能基线（Benchmark）。
推动性能测试流程的标准化，确保性能回归在CI/CD流程中被及时发现。
编写性能优化指南、最佳实践文档，并在团队内进行知识分享和布道。
跨团队协作：
与产品经理、设计师、后端工程师及测试工程师紧密合作，从技术侧为产品体验提供性能层面的输入与保障。
指导中级及初级工程师，提升团队整体的性能意识和技术能力。
任职要求
必备条件：
经验： 5年以上前端/移动端开发经验，其中至少3年以上专注于React Native开发，并有多个成功的大中型React Native App性能优化项目实践经验。
技术深度：
精通React Native框架原理，深刻理解其线程模型（JS线程、UI线程、原生模块）、渲染机制、以及与原生iOS/Android的通信机制。
熟练掌握React Hooks、高阶组件、性能API（如memo, useMemo, useCallback）及避免重渲染的策略。
精通JavaScript/TypeScript，熟悉现代ES6+语法和异步编程。
具备必要的原生（iOS - Objective-C/Swift 或 Android - Java/Kotlin）知识，能够阅读、调试甚至编写简单的原生模块以辅助性能优化。
丰富的性能分析工具使用经验和实战排查能力。
解决问题能力： 出色的逻辑分析、问题定位和解决复杂技术难题的能力，对性能瓶颈有敏锐的嗅觉和系统性解决方案。

核心职责
性能诊断与优化：
深入分析和定位现有React Native应用的性能瓶颈（JavaScript线程、UI线程、内存、网络、包体积等）。

任职要求

经验： 5年以上前端/移动端开发经验，其中至少3年以上专注于React Native开发，并有多个成功的大中型React Native App性能优化项目实践经验。
技术深度：
精通React Native框架原理，深刻理解其线程模型（JS线程、UI线程、原生模块）、渲染机制、以及与原生iOS/Android的通信机制。
熟练掌握React Hooks、高阶组件、性能API（如memo, useMemo, useCallback）及避免重渲染的策略。
精通JavaScript/TypeScript，熟悉现代ES6+语法和异步编程。
具备必要的原生（iOS - Objective-C/Swift 或 Android - Java/Kotlin）知识，能够阅读、调试甚至编写简单的原生模块以辅助性能优化。
丰富的性能分析工具使用经验和实战排查能力。
解决问题能力： 出色的逻辑分析、问题定位和解决复杂技术难题的能力，对性能瓶颈有敏锐的嗅觉和系统性解决方案。
description_english:
Core Responsibilities
Performance Diagnosis & Optimization:
In-depth analysis and localization of performance bottlenecks in existing React Native applications (JavaScript thread, UI thread, memory, network, bundle size, etc.).
Lead the resolution of high-priority performance issues, such as application startup time optimization, list (FlatList/SectionList) scrolling performance, image loading and memory management, animation stuttering, slow UI response, etc.
Use performance analysis tools (such as React DevTools, Flipper, Android Studio Profiler, Xcode Instruments, Hermes Profiler) for deep performance profiling.
Architecture & Coding Practices:
Design and implement high-performance React Native components and architectural solutions.
Optimize data flow management (e.g., in conjunction with Redux, MobX, Context API) to reduce unnecessary re-renders.
Write efficient, maintainable, and performance-sensitive JavaScript/TypeScript and native bridge code.
Conduct bundle size analysis and optimization (code splitting, dynamic imports, resource optimization, etc.).
Performance System Development:
Establish and maintain an application performance monitoring indicator system (e.g., APM integration) and set performance benchmarks.
Promote the standardization of performance testing processes to ensure performance regressions are detected promptly in the CI/CD pipeline.
Write performance optimization guides, best practice documents, and share knowledge within the team.
Cross-team Collaboration:
Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, backend engineers, and test engineers to provide performance-level input and assurance for the product experience from a technical perspective.
Mentor mid-level and junior engineers to enhance the team's overall performance awareness and technical capabilities.
Job Requirements
Prerequisites:
Experience: Over 5 years of frontend/mobile development experience, with at least 3 years focused on React Native development, and practical experience in multiple successful large-to-medium-scale React Native app performance optimization projects.
Technical Depth:
Proficient in the principles of the React Native framework, with a deep understanding of its threading model (JS thread, UI thread, native modules), rendering mechanism, and communication mechanism with native iOS/Android.
Skilled in React Hooks, higher-order components, performance APIs (such as memo, useMemo, useCallback), and strategies to avoid re-renders.
Proficient in JavaScript/TypeScript, familiar with modern ES6+ syntax and asynchronous programming.
Possess necessary native (iOS - Objective-C/Swift or Android - Java/Kotlin) knowledge, with the ability to read, debug, and even write simple native modules to assist in performance optimization.
Extensive experience with performance analysis tools and practical troubleshooting skills.
Problem-Solving Ability: Excellent logical analysis, problem localization, and ability to solve complex technical challenges, with a keen sense for performance bottlenecks and systematic solutions.

title: Java（remote）
team: 某中型大数据服务上市公司
summary: Java,MySQL,Kafka,架构设计经验,Spring,区块链经验
summary_chinese: 后端架构设计,高并发系统设计,分布式系统,微服务架构,Java/Golang,Spring Cloud
summary_english: Backend Architecture Design,High Concurrency System Design,Distributed Systems,Microservices Architecture,Java/Golang,Spring Cloud
description:
岗位职责：
- 设计和优化后端架构，确保系统的高性能、高可靠性和可扩展性。
- 主导团队技术方向，制定技术规范和开发标准，提升团队整体技术水平。
- 与产品团队紧密合作，理解业务需求，制定技术解决方案，并推动项目实施。
- 进行代码评审、性能分析和压力测试，优化系统性能。
- 指导团队进行问题排查和解决，确保系统的稳定运行。
职位要求：
- 计算机科学或相关专业本科及以上学历，8年以上工作经验，至少5年架构经验；有顶级互联网公司行业经验者优先。
- 精通Java或者Golang等，具备扎实的计算机科学基础。
- 丰富的系统设计和架构经验，熟悉高并发、高可用性系统的设计和优化。
- 深入理解分布式系统、微服务架构和云计算技术。
- 熟悉Spring Boot、Spring Cloud等框架，具备大型分布式系统设计和稳定性维护经验。
- 精通MySQL、Redis、Kafka等中间件，具备性能调优经验。
- 出色的技术领导力和团队合作精神，能够有效地指导和提升团队。
- 具备强大的逻辑思维、问题分析和解决能力，具有强烈的责任心。
- 对于新技术和行业趋势保持敏锐，能够快速学习和应用新知识。

- 设计和优化后端架构，确保系统的高性能、高可靠性和可扩展性。

description_english:
Responsibilities:
- Design and optimize backend architecture to ensure high performance, high reliability, and scalability of the system.
- Lead the team's technical direction, establish technical specifications and development standards, and improve the overall technical level of the team.
- Collaborate closely with the product team to understand business requirements, formulate technical solutions, and drive project implementation.
- Conduct code reviews, performance analysis, and stress testing to optimize system performance.
- Guide the team in troubleshooting and resolving issues to ensure the stable operation of the system.
Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related fields, with over 8 years of work experience and at least 5 years of architectural experience; experience in top-tier internet companies is preferred.
- Proficient in Java or Golang, with a solid foundation in computer science.
- Rich experience in system design and architecture, familiar with the design and optimization of high-concurrency and high-availability systems.
- In-depth understanding of distributed systems, microservices architecture, and cloud computing technologies.
- Familiar with frameworks such as Spring Boot and Spring Cloud, with experience in designing and maintaining the stability of large-scale distributed systems.
- Proficient in middleware such as MySQL, Redis, and Kafka, with experience in performance tuning.
- Excellent technical leadership and teamwork skills, capable of effectively guiding and developing the team.
- Strong logical thinking, problem analysis, and problem-solving skills, with a strong sense of responsibility.
- Keen on new technologies and industry trends, able to quickly learn and apply new knowledge.

title: 【创业公司】remote全栈
team: 某大型人工智能公司
summary: Java,C/C++,CSS,JavaScript,PHP,全栈无侧重,HTML,计算机相关专业,英语读写能力良好,Python
summary_chinese: 前后端开发,数据工程,大语言模型,C9院校背景,创业公司
summary_english: Frontend and Backend Development,Data Engineering,Large Language Models,C9 League University Background,Startup Company
description:
任职要求
  1. 教育背景：C9 计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，优秀应届生亦可。
  2. 专业技能 ：
      全栈开发能力，熟练掌握一门前、后端技术栈。
      数据工程师需具备扎实的数据结构与算法基础。
      机器学习方向要对大型语言模型原理有深入理解。
  3. 综合素质 ：具备较强的问题解决能力，善于沟通协作，能接受挑战，有创业热情，愿意与公司共同成长。
岗位职责
►【全栈】
- 负责前后端开发工作，从前端的交互设计到后端的数据库搭建，打造流畅用户体验。
- 与产品、设计团队紧密协作，将创意转化为实际产品功能。
►【data engineer 方向】
- 构建与优化数据管道，确保数据高效、准确地在系统中流转。
- 开发数据模型，挖掘数据价值，为业务决策提供支持。
►【Machine learning-llm 方向】
- 参与大型语言模型的训练与优化，提升模型性能与准确性。
- 探索机器学习在业务场景中的创新应用，推动技术落地。

- 探索机器学习在业务场景中的创新应用，推动技术落地。
description_english:
Job Requirements
  1. Educational Background: Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related fields from C9 League universities. Outstanding fresh graduates are also welcome.
  2. Professional Skills:
      Full-stack development capabilities, proficient in one frontend and one backend technology stack.
      Data engineers must have a solid foundation in data structures and algorithms.
      The machine learning track requires a deep understanding of the principles of large language models.
  3. General Qualities: Strong problem-solving skills, good at communication and collaboration, able to take on challenges, passionate about entrepreneurship, and willing to grow with the company.
Job Responsibilities
►【Full-stack】
- Responsible for front-end and back-end development, from front-end interaction design to back-end database setup, to create a smooth user experience.
- Collaborate closely with product and design teams to turn creative ideas into actual product features.
►【Data Engineer Track】
- Build and optimize data pipelines to ensure efficient and accurate data flow within the system.
- Develop data models and mine data value to support business decisions.
►【Machine Learning-LLM Track】
- Participate in the training and optimization of large language models to improve model performance and accuracy.
- Explore innovative applications of machine learning in business scenarios and promote technology implementation.

team: 某中型互联网金融公司

title: web3前端开发工程师-remote办公
team: 某大型金融集团公司
summary: CSS,HTML5,Vue,JavaScript,Node.js,接受居家办公,前端开发经验,计算机/软件工程相关专业
summary_chinese: DApp前端开发,区块链行业,React+TypeScript,ethers.js/wagmi,DeFi/NFT,钱包集成
summary_english: DApp Frontend Development,Blockchain Industry,React+TypeScript,ethers.js/wagmi,DeFi/NFT,Wallet Integration
description:
职位描述：
我们正在寻找一位对 Web3 充满热情的前端开发工程师。你将负责构建直观、安全且高性能的去中心化应⽤前端，直接参与塑造下⼀代互联⽹产品。如果你渴望在区块链技术的前沿领域工作，并创造真正属于用户的产品，那么这个职位⾮常适合你。
岗位职责：
负责公司核心 Web3 产品（如 DApp、官网、管理平台等）的前端架构设计、开发和迭代优化。
与产品经理、设计师和后端工程师紧密协作，全程参与产品需求讨论、方案评审与高质量落地。
实现复杂的 Web3 前端功能，包括但不限于：多链钱包连接与交互、智能合约调用、链上数据实时展示与更新、交易签名与状态管理等。
参与前端工程化体系建设，进行组件库封装、性能优化与用户体验提升，保障应用的稳定、安全与高效。
对线上产品进行持续监控、维护和故障排查，快速响应并解决技术问题。
关注前端与 Web3 技术发展，将优秀的技术和工具引入团队，推动技术革新。
任职要求：
计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，1-5年以上前端开发经验，具备成熟的 Web3 DApp 前端开发经验。
技术栈扎实：精通 HTML5、CSS3、JavaScript (ES6+)，熟练掌握 React 及其核心生态（如 Hooks, Redux/Mobx, Router等），并了解 TypeScript 的实际应用。
Web3 技术熟练：深入理解以太坊生态系统，熟练掌握 ethers.js / wagmi 等至少一种主流 Web3 库，并有 MetaMask, WalletConnect 等钱包集成的实际项目经验。
拥有完整的链上交互功能开发经验，如钱包授权、资产展示、交易发起、签名、NFT 铸造/交易等。
具备良好的团队协作精神、沟通能力和责任心，能够主动推进项目，对代码质量和用户体验有极致追求。
（加分）有 Webflow、Figma 等设计或无代码工具使用经验，具备良好的设计审美。
（加分）有金融、DeFi、NFT Marketplace 或高并发活动页面开发经验者优先。
加分项：
提供可访问的 GitHub 主页、技术博客或个人作品集。
拥有从 0 到 1 主导或深度参与 Web3 产品开发并成功上线的完整项目经验。
熟悉常见的区块链协议与标准，如 ERC-20, ERC-721, ERC-1155 等。
对 DeFi、NFT、GameFi、SocialFi 或 DAO 等 Web3 核心领域有浓厚的兴趣和深入的见解。
有前端性能监控、安全防护或单元测试等方面的实践经验。

description_english:
Job Description:
We are looking for a Frontend Development Engineer who is passionate about Web3. You will be responsible for building intuitive, secure, and high-performance decentralized application frontends, directly participating in shaping the next generation of internet products. If you are eager to work at the forefront of blockchain technology and create products that truly belong to users, this position is perfect for you.
Responsibilities:
Responsible for the frontend architecture design, development, and iterative optimization of the company's core Web3 products (such as DApps, official website, admin platforms, etc.).
Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and backend engineers, participating throughout the entire process of product requirement discussions, solution reviews, and high-quality implementation.
Implement complex Web3 frontend features, including but not limited to: multi-chain wallet connection and interaction, smart contract calls, real-time display and updates of on-chain data, transaction signing, and state management.
Participate in the construction of the frontend engineering system, including component library encapsulation, performance optimization, and user experience improvement, to ensure the application's stability, security, and efficiency.
Continuously monitor, maintain, and troubleshoot online products, responding quickly to and resolving technical issues.
Stay updated on frontend and Web3 technology developments, introduce excellent technologies and tools to the team, and drive technological innovation.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or a related field, with 1-5+ years of frontend development experience and mature experience in Web3 DApp frontend development.
Solid technical stack: Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), skilled in React and its core ecosystem (e.g., Hooks, Redux/Mobx, Router), and familiar with the practical application of TypeScript.
Proficient in Web3 technologies: In-depth understanding of the Ethereum ecosystem, proficient with at least one mainstream Web3 library such as ethers.js / wagmi, and have practical project experience with wallet integrations like MetaMask, WalletConnect.
Possess complete development experience with on-chain interaction features, such as wallet authorization, asset display, transaction initiation, signing, NFT minting/trading, etc.
Possess excellent teamwork spirit, communication skills, and a sense of responsibility; able to proactively drive projects and have an ultimate pursuit of code quality and user experience.
(Bonus) Experience with design or no-code tools like Webflow, Figma, and a good sense of design aesthetics.
(Bonus) Experience in finance, DeFi, NFT Marketplaces, or developing high-concurrency event pages is preferred.
Bonus Points:
Provide an accessible GitHub profile, technical blog, or personal portfolio.
Have complete project experience leading or deeply participating in the development of a Web3 product from 0 to 1 and successfully launching it.
Familiar with common blockchain protocols and standards, such as ERC-20, ERC-721, ERC-1155, etc.
Have a strong interest in and deep understanding of core Web3 areas such as DeFi, NFT, GameFi, SocialFi, or DAO.
Have practical experience in frontend performance monitoring, security protection, or unit testing.

title: Java架构师-remote
team: 相信光（重庆）网络科技有限公司
summary: 账户,Java,团队管理经验,高并发,支付,SpringCloud,增长,SQL Server,接受居家办公,Spring,微服务经验,MySQL,架构设计经验
summary_chinese: 后端架构设计与优化,Java/Golang,分布式系统,高并发/高可用,Spring Boot/Cloud,8年以上经验
summary_english: Backend Architecture Design & Optimization,Java/Golang,Distributed Systems,High Concurrency/High Availability,Spring Boot/Cloud,8+ Years of Experience
description:
后端架构师---远程办公
岗位职责：
1、设计和优化后端架构，确保系统的高性能、高可靠性和可扩展性。
2、主导团队技术方向，制定技术规范和开发标准，提升团队整体技术水平。
3、与产品团队紧密合作，理解业务需求，制定技术解决方案，并推动项目实施。
4、进行代码评审、性能分析和压力测试，优化系统性能。
5、指导团队进行问题排查和解决，确保系统的稳定运行。
职位要求：
1、计算机科学或相关专业本科及以上学历，8年以上工作经验，至少5年架构经验；有顶级互联网公司行业经验者优先。
2、精通Java或者Golang等，具备扎实的计算机科学基础。
3、丰富的系统设计和架构经验，熟悉高并发、高可用性系统的设计和优化。
4、深入理解分布式系统、微服务架构和云计算技术。
5、熟悉Spring Boot、Spring Cloud等框架，具备大型分布式系统设计和稳定性维护经验。
6、精通MySQL、Redis、Kafka等中间件，具备性能调优经验。
7、出色的技术领导力和团队合作精神，能够有效地指导和提升团队。
8、具备强大的逻辑思维、问题分析和解决能力，具有强烈的责任心。
9、对于新技术和行业趋势保持敏锐，能够快速学习和应用新知识。
