Athena Labs是一家专注于人工智能与前沿技术研发的创新驱动型企业。作为行业领先的技术实验室，我们以**“科技赋能未来”**为使命，致力于为全球企业和个人开发智能化解决方案。无论是构建下一代AI模型，还是探索未知技术领域，Athena Labs始终站在技术革新的最前沿。

为什么选择 Athena Labs？

1. 专注创新，挑战极限
在Athena Labs，您将与一群志同道合的技术专家和行业领袖共同工作，推动人工智能和高科技的边界，参与全球最前沿的技术研发项目。

2. 全球影响力
我们的技术已成功服务于多个行业领域，从金融科技到医疗健康，从智能制造到智能城市。加入我们，您的工作将对全球产生深远影响。

3. 学习与成长
我们为员工提供持续学习的机会，包括全球顶级学术资源、技术培训以及国际交流机会，助您快速成长为行业内的顶尖人才。

4. 开放的企业文化
Athena Labs以“合作、创新、包容”为核心价值观，营造开放、多元的工作氛围，让每一位员工都能充分发挥潜力。

5. 有吸引力的薪酬与福利
我们提供极具竞争力的薪酬体系、灵活的远程办公政策以及丰富的职业发展路径，确保您的职业发展无后顾之忧。

加入 Athena Labs，改变世界的未来

Athena Labs期待与有梦想、有创造力、有激情的您一起，创造技术奇迹，共同推动全球科技进步。无论您是经验丰富的行业专家，还是渴望改变世界的新人，只要您愿意探索科技的无限可能，这里就是您实现梦想的舞台。

立即加入我们，书写属于您的科技传奇！
description_english:
[Core Responsibilities]
Tool Development & Automation
Design and develop full-stack infrastructure tools (e.g., CI/CD pipelines, observability platforms) to enhance the engineering team's efficiency.
Write highly maintainable code (Node.js/Python) and Infrastructure as Code (Terraform).
Service Governance & Monitoring
Build a service health monitoring framework, integrating log tracing and event management tools.
Implement security compliance (SOC2/GDPR) and cost optimization (FinOps) solutions.
Standardization & Scalability
Establish API design specifications and microservice governance standards, and develop modular toolchains to accelerate workflows.
AI-Driven Innovation
Explore the application of AI/ML in scenarios such as anomaly detection and root cause analysis, and develop intelligent operations tools.

[Job Requirements]
Over 3 years of full-stack development experience, with proficiency in Node.js/Python/Go and frameworks like Nest/Spring.
Familiarity with cloud-native technologies such as Kubernetes and Docker, with the ability to design distributed systems.
Skilled in building developer tools that balance flexibility and governance (e.g., Policy-as-Code).
A Bachelor's degree in a computer-related field, with a focus on code simplicity and user experience optimization.

[Preferred Qualifications]
Experience with integrating AI/ML and operations tools (e.g., NLP analysis of logs).
Familiarity with service mesh (Istio/Linkerd) or observability stacks (Prometheus/Grafana).

[Benefits Package]
Competitive salary + stock options + performance bonuses.
Standard equipment includes a 5K monitor, Herman Miller chair, and MacBook.
Global team collaboration and promotion channels.
Join Athena Labs, innovate with us, and explore the infinite possibilities of the future!

Athena Labs is an innovation-driven enterprise focused on artificial intelligence and cutting-edge technology R&D. As an industry-leading tech lab, our mission is **"Empowering the Future with Technology,"** and we are dedicated to developing intelligent solutions for businesses and individuals worldwide. Whether building the next generation of AI models or exploring uncharted technological territories, Athena Labs is always at the forefront of technological innovation.

Why choose Athena Labs?

1. Focus on Innovation, Challenge the Limits
At Athena Labs, you will work with a group of like-minded technical experts and industry leaders to push the boundaries of artificial intelligence and high-tech, participating in the world's most cutting-edge R&D projects.

2. Global Impact
Our technology has successfully served various industries, from FinTech to healthcare, from smart manufacturing to smart cities. Join us, and your work will have a profound impact globally.

3. Learning and Growth
We provide employees with continuous learning opportunities, including access to top global academic resources, technical training, and international exchange opportunities, helping you quickly grow into a top talent in the industry.

4. Open Corporate Culture
Athena Labs upholds the core values of "Collaboration, Innovation, and Inclusivity," fostering an open and diverse work atmosphere where every employee can fully realize their potential.

5. Attractive Compensation and Benefits
We offer a highly competitive compensation system, flexible remote work policies, and abundant career development paths to ensure your professional growth is well-supported.

Join Athena Labs, Change the Future of the World

Athena Labs looks forward to creating technological marvels with you—someone with dreams, creativity, and passion—to jointly advance global technological progress. Whether you are an experienced industry expert or a newcomer eager to change the world, as long as you are willing to explore the infinite possibilities of technology, this is the stage for you to realize your dreams.

Join us now and write your own tech legend!

title: 资深后端开发工程师（remote）
team: 四川暗色科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 核心后端系统研发,金融科技,高并发分布式系统,Java/Go/C++,MySQL/Redis/Kafka,全栈能力加分
summary_english: Core Backend System R&D,FinTech,High-Concurrency Distributed Systems,Java/Go/C++,MySQL/Redis/Kafka,Full-Stack Skills a Plus
description:
岗位职责：
1、负责公司核心后端系统的架构设计、研发与实施。
2、负责现有系统的维护、性能优化与迭代升级，解决高并发、系统稳定性、海量数据处理等技术挑战。
3、参与业务架构重构与技术方案讨论，能独立提出可⾏性解决⽅案并编写规范的技术⽂档。
4、跟踪并研究前沿技术趋势，参与技术选型与实践，推动及规划平台未来技术架构演进。
任职要求：
1、统招本科及以上学历，计算机、软件工程或相关专业背景，具备5年以上后端开发经验。
2、JAVA基础扎实，精通IOT、多线程、集合等基础框架，研究过优秀开源软件的源码并有心得者优先。
3、熟悉常见设计模式，熟悉Spring MVC，MyBatis/IBatis等流⾏开源框架；。
4、精通MySQL开发，熟悉数据库原理及常用优化技术； 
5、精通Nosql缓存、消息队列、搜索引擎，如：Redis、kafka、Elasticsearch等；
6、擅长系统分析与设计、代码重构，有大型项目基础及应用架构设计经验；
7、熟悉大流量、高并发、高性能的分布式系统的设计及应用，擅长性能调优者优先；
8、精通 C++/Java/Go 中的一种或者以上开发语言
9、全栈技术专家可加分；
加分项：
1、具备全栈开发能力或经验。
2、对金融交易相关概念及系统有了解；若缺乏此领域经验，则需具备知名互联网或科技公司核心系统开发经验。
我们提供：
具有竞争力的薪酬福利与广阔的职业发展空间。
参与核心业务系统建设，挑战复杂技术难题的机会。
与优秀团队共同成长的技术氛围。

description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for the architecture design, R&D, and implementation of the company's core backend systems.
2. Responsible for the maintenance, performance optimization, and iterative upgrades of existing systems, solving technical challenges such as high concurrency, system stability, and massive data processing.
3. Participate in business architecture reconstruction and technical solution discussions; able to independently propose feasible solutions and write standardized technical documents.
4. Track and research cutting-edge technology trends, participate in technology selection and practice, and promote and plan the future evolution of the platform's technical architecture.
Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above from a nationally recognized university in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, with over 5 years of backend development experience.
2. Solid foundation in JAVA, proficient in basic frameworks like I/O, multi-threading, and collections. Experience in studying the source code of excellent open-source software is a plus.
3. Familiar with common design patterns, and popular open-source frameworks like Spring MVC, MyBatis/IBatis.
4. Proficient in MySQL development, familiar with database principles and common optimization techniques.
5. Proficient in NoSQL caches, message queues, and search engines, such as Redis, Kafka, Elasticsearch, etc.
6. Skilled in system analysis and design, and code refactoring; experience in the foundational and application architecture design of large-scale projects.
7. Familiar with the design and application of high-traffic, high-concurrency, high-performance distributed systems; expertise in performance tuning is a plus.
8. Proficient in one or more of the following development languages: C++/Java/Go.
9. Full-stack technical experts are a plus.
Bonus Points:
1. Possess full-stack development capabilities or experience.
2. Understanding of financial trading concepts and systems; if lacking experience in this field, experience in developing core systems at well-known internet or technology companies is required.
What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits with broad career development opportunities.
The opportunity to participate in building core business systems and tackle complex technical challenges.
A technical atmosphere to grow with an outstanding team.

title: 前端开发工程师（Remote）
team: 某中型人力资源服务公司
summary_chinese: 前端界面开发,Web3,DeFi,React/Vue.js/Next.js,区块链,6年以上经验
summary_english: Frontend Interface Development,Web3,DeFi,React/Vue.js/Next.js,Blockchain,6+ years of experience
description:
Job Responsibilities
- Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to design and develop beautiful, user-friendly frontend interfaces.
- Develop, test, and maintain stable, high-quality frontend code.
- Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation, including technical specifications and project details.
- Provide technical input and knowledge to the planning, design, and requirements process for new products and features.
 
Job Requirements
- At least 6 years of frontend development experience.
- Proficiency in frontend development technologies, with experience in frameworks such as React, Vue.js, or Next.js
- Strong UI/UX design sense, with the ability to create beautiful, consistent, and intuitive user interfaces from high-level wireframes, along with experience collaborating with design teams to implement design specifications.
- Hands-on experience with DeFi and Web3 projects, with expertise in interacting with the blockchain, including calling smart contract and familiarity with wallet signature workflows.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs, and experience integrating frontend applications with backend services.
- Proactive in researching and adopting new technologies to improve our products and codebase.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
description_chinese:
工作职责
- 与产品经理、设计师和其他工程师合作，设计和开发美观、用户友好的前端界面。
- 开发、测试和维护稳定、高质量的前端代码。
- 维护清晰且最新的文档，包括技术规范和项目细节。
- 为新产品和功能的规划、设计和需求流程提供技术输入和知识。

任职要求
- 至少6年前端开发经验。
- 精通前端开发技术，具有React、Vue.js或Next.js等框架的经验。
- 具备较强的UI/UX设计感，能够根据高级线框图创建美观、一致且直观的用户界面，并有与设计团队合作实施设计规范的经验。
- 具备DeFi和Web3项目的实践经验，精通与区块链的交互，包括调用智能合约和熟悉钱包签名工作流程。
- 熟悉RESTful API，并有将前端应用程序与后端服务集成的经验。
- 积极主动研究和采用新技术以改进我们的产品和代码库。
- 优秀的问题解决能力，并能在快节奏、动态的环境中工作。
- 较强的沟通能力和与跨职能团队有效协作的能力。

title: Graphic Designer - Remote
team: 启猿文化创意（北京）有限公司
summary: 图文快印经验,PS,周末双休,远程办公,AI,品牌设计,擅长手绘,包装设计,3-5年平面设计经验,带薪假期,文创设计,甲方公司,1-3年平面设计经验
summary_chinese: 品牌与包装设计,区块链行业,Adobe Creative Suite,印刷文件制作,品牌IP视觉
summary_english: Brand and Packaging Design,Blockchain Industry,Adobe Creative Suite,Print File Preparation,Brand IP Visuals
description:
Company: Nervape 
Position: Graphic Designer 
Location: Remote Hangzhou/Shanghai or Beijing, China
Team: Brand & Creative
### About the Role
Nervape lives at the intersection of digital and physical art, storytelling, and blockchain technology. We are building a **creator ecosystem** that deeply values freedom, trust, and creativity to foster long-term, sustainable collaboration.
We’re seeking a Graphic Designer with a strong sense of brand aesthetics and hands-on experience in packaging design. You’ll work across brand visuals, packaging, and offline materials — from concept to production — ensuring our IP comes to life both on screen and on shelf.
### Responsibilities
- Design packaging, printed materials, and key visuals aligned with Nervape’s brand and IP
- Create production-ready files for merch, pop-ups, and limited-edition drops
- Collaborate with suppliers and factories to manage specs, materials, and printing processes
- Ensure consistency across digital and physical brand expressions
### Requirements
- 2+ years of experience in branding, packaging, or lifestyle/fashion design
- Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (especially Illustrator & Photoshop)
- Experience preparing print files and communicating with vendors/factories
- Strong attention to detail, layout, color, and material selection
- Familiar with production timelines and quality control for printed goods
### More about us
- Website：nervape.com
- Blog：⋐-⋑链接存在风险-/@nervape
If you’re passionate about blockchain, NFTs, and collectible culture, and are eager to drive global growth. Join us to create an exciting future for Nervape!
Nervape is a character-driven universe where art, storytelling, and design collide. We create collectibles, experiences, and collaborations that seamlessly bridge the digital and physical worlds. Every piece is part of a larger narrative—whether it’s a streetwear drop, a character figurine, or an immersive exhibition.

Rooted in youth culture and fueled by bold creativity, Nervape speaks the language of the next generation: culturally fluent, visually iconic, and community-first. We’re not here to chase trends—we’re here to build worlds worth belonging to.
description_chinese:
公司：Nervape
职位：平面设计师
地点：远程 中国杭州/上海或北京
团队：品牌与创意
### 关于此职位
Nervape 处于数字与实体艺术、故事叙述和区块链技术的交汇点。我们正在构建一个深度重视自由、信任和创造力的**创作者生态系统**，以促进长期、可持续的合作。
我们正在寻找一位具有强烈品牌美感和包装设计实践经验的平面设计师。您将负责品牌视觉、包装和线下物料——从概念到生产——确保我们的 IP 在屏幕上和货架上都能生动呈现。
### 职责
- 设计符合 Nervape 品牌和 IP 的包装、印刷品和主视觉
- 为周边商品、快闪店和限量版产品创建可用于生产的文件
- 与供应商和工厂合作，管理规格、材料和印刷流程
- 确保数字和实体品牌表达的一致性
### 要求
- 2年以上品牌、包装或生活方式/时尚设计经验
- 精通 Adobe Creative Suite（尤其是 Illustrator & Photoshop）
- 具备准备印刷文件以及与供应商/工厂沟通的经验
- 对细节、布局、色彩和材料选择有敏锐的洞察力
- 熟悉印刷品的生产时间和质量控制
### 关于我们
- 网站：nervape.com
- 博客：⋐-⋑链接存在风险-/@nervape
如果您对区块链、NFT 和收藏文化充满热情，并渴望推动全球增长，请加入我们，为 Nervape 创造一个激动人心的未来！
Nervape 是一个由角色驱动的宇宙，在这里艺术、故事和设计相互碰撞。我们创造的收藏品、体验和合作无缝地连接了数字和物理世界。每一件作品都是一个更大叙事的一部分——无论是一次街头服饰的发售、一个角色手办，还是一个沉浸式展览。

植根于青年文化，并以大胆的创造力为动力，Nervape 使用着下一代的语言：文化上流畅、视觉上具有标志性，并以社区为先。我们不是来追逐潮流的——我们是来创造值得归属的世界的。

title: P2P资深产品经理（web3，remote）
team: 某大型互联网金融公司
summary: 金融从业经验,用户体验,分期业务经理,互联网,金融中介服务/互联网金融,支付产品经理,贷款产品经理,P2P
summary_chinese: P2P产品全生命周期管理,Web3行业,支付与交易,数据驱动决策,跨时区协作,AI赋能产品
summary_english: P2P Product Lifecycle Management,Web3 Industry,Payments & Trading,Data-driven Decision Making,Cross-timezone Collaboration,AI-enabled Products
description:
Responsibilities
Own the full P2P product lifecycle (end-to-end) for global fiat and Web3 user products on mobile — from strategy and roadmap to execution and iteration.
Develop and execute product strategies that drive user activation, retention, and transaction growth, ensuring alignment with global business goals.
Lead data-driven decision-making — define key metrics, analyze user behavior, and translate insights into actionable growth initiatives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (engineering, design, compliance, risk, BD, and marketing) to ship high-impact global features and ensure operational excellence.
Conduct market research and competitor analysis across regions to identify emerging trends, regulatory nuances, and local product opportunities.
Partner with local operations to design market-fit solutions that enhance liquidity, conversion, and engagement.
Gather and synthesize customer feedback to continuously refine the product experience and optimize transaction journeys.
Leverage AI and automation tools to improve operational efficiency and user experience quality.
Work independently as an individual contributor (IC), demonstrating strategic ownership, execution discipline, and proactive leadership in a fast-paced environment.
Requirements
8+ years of experience in product management, ideally with exposure to payments, trading, or Web3 ecosystems.
Proven track record in managing complex, global product launches with measurable business impact.
Strong analytical mindset — experienced in using data and experimentation (A/B tests, funnels, cohorts) to guide strategy.
Capable of designing intuitive user flows that influence users to trade and transact more effectively.
Solid technical understanding; comfortable working with backend, API, and app engineers.
Strong stakeholder management and communication skills across regions and time zones.
Self-driven, outcome-oriented, able to handle multiple projects with minimal supervision.
Nice to have:
Experience in P2P, payments, or remittance products.
Familiarity with Web3 and DeFi ecosystems, protocols, and compliance frameworks (AML/risk).
Hands-on experience with AI-enabled product growth or data analytics tools.
Experience in Web 3 and AI.
description_chinese:
工作职责
负责全球法币和Web3用户移动端P2P产品的完整生命周期（端到端）——从战略和路线图到执行和迭代。
制定并执行产品策略，推动用户激活、留存和交易增长，确保与全球业务目标保持一致。
领导数据驱动的决策——定义关键指标，分析用户行为，并将洞察转化为可行的增长举措。
与跨职能团队（工程、设计、合规、风控、商务拓展和市场营销）协作，推出具有高影响力的全球功能，并确保卓越运营。
进行跨地区的市场研究和竞争对手分析，以识别新兴趋势、监管细微差别和本地产品机会。
与本地运营团队合作，设计适合市场的产品解决方案，以增强流动性、转化率和参与度。
收集并综合客户反馈，以持续改进产品体验并优化交易流程。
利用AI和自动化工具提高运营效率和用户体验质量。
作为独立贡献者（IC）独立工作，在快节奏的环境中展现战略所有权、执行纪律和积极的领导力。

任职要求
8年以上产品管理经验，有支付、交易或Web3生态系统经验者优先。
在管理复杂的全球产品发布方面有良好记录，并取得了可衡量的业务影响。
强大的分析思维——有使用数据和实验（A/B测试、漏斗分析、同期群分析）指导战略的经验。
能够设计直观的用户流程，影响用户更有效地进行交易。
扎实的技术理解能力；能与后端、API和应用工程师顺畅合作。
具备跨地区和跨时区的强大项目相关者管理和沟通技巧。
自我驱动，结果导向，能够在最少的监督下处理多个项目。

加分项：
有P2P、支付或汇款产品经验。
熟悉Web3和DeFi生态系统、协议及合规框架（反洗钱/风控）。
具备AI赋能产品增长或数据分析工具的实践经验。
有Web3和AI领域的经验。
description_english:
Responsibilities
Own the full P2P product lifecycle (end-to-end) for global fiat and Web3 user products on mobile — from strategy and roadmap to execution and iteration.
Develop and execute product strategies that drive user activation, retention, and transaction growth, ensuring alignment with global business goals.
Lead data-driven decision-making — define key metrics, analyze user behavior, and translate insights into actionable growth initiatives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (engineering, design, compliance, risk, BD, and marketing) to ship high-impact global features and ensure operational excellence.
Conduct market research and competitor analysis across regions to identify emerging trends, regulatory nuances, and local product opportunities.
Partner with local operations to design market-fit solutions that enhance liquidity, conversion, and engagement.
Gather and synthesize customer feedback to continuously refine the product experience and optimize transaction journeys.
Leverage AI and automation tools to improve operational efficiency and user experience quality.
Work independently as an individual contributor (IC), demonstrating strategic ownership, execution discipline, and proactive leadership in a fast-paced environment.

Requirements
8+ years of experience in product management, ideally with exposure to payments, trading, or Web3 ecosystems.
Proven track record in managing complex, global product launches with measurable business impact.
Strong analytical mindset — experienced in using data and experimentation (A/B tests, funnels, cohorts) to guide strategy.
Capable of designing intuitive user flows that influence users to trade and transact more effectively.
Solid technical understanding; comfortable working with backend, API, and app engineers.
Strong stakeholder management and communication skills across regions and time zones.
Self-driven, outcome-oriented, able to handle multiple projects with minimal supervision.

Nice to have:
Experience in P2P, payments, or remittance products.
Familiarity with Web3 and DeFi ecosystems, protocols, and compliance frameworks (AML/risk).
Hands-on experience with AI-enabled product growth or data analytics tools.
Experience in Web 3 and AI.

1.Develop high-performance and scalable software solutions using Golang.
2.Utilize advanced concurrency techniques to optimize application performance.

4.Integrate and optimize middleware technologies including MySQL, Redis, and Kafka.

8.Troubleshoot and debug complex issues in production and testing environments.

2.Proficiency in Golang high-concurrency programming and understanding of its principles.
3.Strong proficiency in one or more server-side programming languages such as Java,PHP, C++ or Golang.
4.Extensive experience with GoZero, Gin, and other Golang frameworks.
5.Strong knowledge of middleware technologies including MySQL, Redis, and Kafka, along with their underlying principles.
6.Ability to develop and maintain distributed microservices architecture.
7.Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
8.Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
9.Prior experience in financial products such as stocks, c- etc., is preferred.

title: Android Developer (Remote)
team: 某大型互联网公司
summary: Android客户端产品研发,Flutter,英语,Kotlin
summary_chinese: Android应用开发,Java/Kotlin,MVVM/MVP/Clean,RESTful API,国际化团队,弹性工作,英语工作环境
summary_english: Android Application Development,Java/Kotlin,MVVM/MVP/Clean Architecture,RESTful API,International Team,Flexible Hours,English-speaking Environment
description:
Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain Android applications with a focus on usability, performance, and scalability.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend engineers to deliver high‑quality mobile solutions.
Integrate APIs and third‑party services, ensuring smooth communication between mobile and backend systems.
Optimize applications for different devices, screen sizes, and OS versions.
Implement secure coding practices and ensure compliance with data protection standards.
Participate in code reviews, testing, and continuous integration/deployment processes.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
3+ years of professional experience in Android development.
Strong proficiency in Java/Kotlin and Android SDK.
Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON/XML data handling, and mobile networking.
Familiarity with mobile architecture patterns (MVVM, MVP, or Clean Architecture).
Knowledge of version control (Git) and CI/CD pipelines.
Ability to work independently in a remote environment and manage tasks effectively.
English fluency (spoken and written) as the primary working language.
Preferred Qualifications
Experience with mobile UI/UX design principles and Material Design.
Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, GCP, Azure) and mobile DevOps.
Knowledge of security best practices for mobile applications.
Prior experience in international or distributed teams.
What We Offer
Fully remote work environment with flexible hours.
Competitive salary and performance‑based incentives.
Opportunity to work on impactful projects with global reach.
Collaborative, innovative, and multicultural team culture.

设计、开发和维护Android应用程序，专注于可用性、性能和可扩展性。
与产品经理、设计师和后端工程师合作，提供高质量的移动解决方案。

title: Head of Product（AI,Remote）
team: 某中型互联网初创公司
summary_chinese: 产品策略与路线图,广告科技,AI驱动产品,B2B SaaS,早期初创公司,股票期权,不限制带薪休假
summary_english: Product Strategy & Roadmap,AdTech,AI-driven Products,B2B SaaS,Early-stage Startup,Equity,Unlimited PTO
description:
X  is building the future of performance creative intelligence. Our platform is trusted by highgrowth consumer brands and ad agencies to identify what creative strategies actually driveperformance on platforms like Meta and TikTok. Today, we help growth marketers-fromperformance strategists to media buyers-extract strategic insights from ad data. Tomorrow,we’ll generate the creatives themselves
We’re building toward an agentic system-an “Al-powered creative strategist in a box”-thatcan identify what works, recommend what to test next, and generate the creatives to do it. Ourlong-term model will be deeply aligned with outcomes: the better our ideas perform, the morewe earn.
We’ re currently angel-funded, early-stage, and shipping fast. Our team is product-led anddesign-centric, and we’re looking for a Head of Product who can scale this foundation into atransformative business.
The Role
We’ re hiring our first product leader-someone who can define the strategy, lead execution,and shape the culture of product at X.
You’ ll work directly with the CE0 to decide what we build, why it matters, and how it drivesvalue.
You’ll set the roadmap, define quality standards, and collaborate closely with design andengineering to bring features to life. No backlog management for the sake of it. This is aboutmaking the right decisions, not the most decisions.
What You’ ll own
Define and evolve X’s product strategy alongside the CEO, with clarity around phases(insight extraction→>automation->creative delivery).
Own product prioritization: translate user needs, data patterns, and market dynamics into a fpcused roadmap.
end product execution across design and engineering: write specs, pressure-test use casesd uphold the design + UX bar.
Build and formalize our early product development rituals (not heavy process-just what’sneeded).
Be the internal expert on our customers: creative strategists, media buyers, and growthmarketers at fast-moving tech brands.
Push our thinking on how Al can autonomously identify and produce high-performing adideas.
Eventually, scale the product team and help hire PMs, researchers, and other builders.
We Think You’ ll Thrive lf You...
Have strong first-principles thinking-you don’t default to copying what others are doing
Are a deep, independent thinker with a high quality bar-you push others to raise theirs too
Have 6-10+ years in product roles, ideally with experience in analytics, Al, or B2B SaaS
Have worked in early-stage environments and enjoy the ambiguity, ownership, and speedAre both strategic and executional-just as comfortable setting long-term direction as you。are writing a spec orjumping into Figma.
Have great taste, and care about product usability and clarity ofinsight.
Think and communicate clearly-whether that’s through words, visuals, or structure
Challenge the CE0 (and others) when necessary-not out of ego, but in pursuit of betteioutcomes.
Why This Role ls Exciting
You’ll own the product direction of a company building the future of Al + marketing
You’ll work directly with a sharp founding team who values product quality andindependent thinking.
You’ll shape the team, the roadmap, and the culture from the ground up.
You’ll be designing for a high-intent, high-LTV user-your work will directly impact revenue
You’ll help invent a new categoryof “agentic growth strategist” software, not just iterateon a dashboard.
How we work
High Agency: See a gap, fill it.
Radical Candor: Clear, kind feedback; zero politics.
User Obsession: Every click should make creatives faster and smarter.
Craft & Detail: We sweat the small stuff-because ad performance lives there.
Compensation & benefits
Salary: $100k-$150k USD + meaningful equity.。
Comprehensive health, dental, vision.
Unlimited PTO with a genuine “take-time-off” culture.
*Work with and learn from world-class growth mentors: Gaurav Vohra (Growth Leader.Superhuman and former marketing leader at ClickUp
Diversity &inclusion
X’s mission thrives on diverse perspectives. We’re proud to be an equal-opportunityemployer and welcome applicants of every background, identity, and life experience.
description_chinese:
X正在构建效果创意智能的未来。我们的平台深受高增长消费品牌和广告代理商的信赖，用于识别在Meta和TikTok等平台上实际驱动效果的创意策略。今天，我们帮助增长营销人员——从效果策略师到媒体购买者——从广告数据中提取战略见解。明天，我们将能自行生成创意内容。
我们正在构建一个代理系统——一个“盒子里的AI创意策略师”——它能够识别哪些有效，推荐下一步测试什么，并生成执行所需的创意。我们的长期模式将与成果深度对齐：我们的创意表现越好，我们赚得越多。
我们目前处于天使轮融资的早期阶段，并且产品迭代迅速。我们的团队以产品为主导，以设计为中心，我们正在寻找一位能够将此基础扩展为变革性业务的产品负责人。
职位描述
我们正在招聘我们的第一位产品领导者——一个能够定义策略、领导执行并塑造X产品文化的人。
你将直接与CEO合作，决定我们构建什么、为什么重要以及它如何驱动价值。
你将设定路线图，定义质量标准，并与设计和工程团队紧密合作，将功能变为现实。这里没有为了管理而管理的待办事项。关键是做出正确的决策，而不是最多的决策。
你将负责
与CEO一起定义并发展X的产品策略，明确各个阶段（洞察提取→自动化→创意交付）。
负责产品优先级排序：将用户需求、数据模式和市场动态转化为一个重点突出的路线图。
负责跨设计和工程团队的端到端产品执行：编写规范、压力测试用例并维护设计+用户体验标准。
建立并规范我们早期的产品开发流程（不是繁重的流程——只做必要的事）。
成为我们客户的内部专家：快节奏科技品牌的创意策略师、媒体购买者和增长营销人员。
推动我们思考AI如何能自主识别并产出高效果的广告创意。
最终，扩展产品团队，并帮助招聘产品经理、研究员和其他构建者。
我们认为你会很适合，如果你...
具备很强的第一性原理思维——你不会默认模仿别人的做法。
是一位深刻、独立的思考者，拥有高品质标准——你也会推动他人提高标准。
拥有6-10年以上的产品岗位经验，理想情况下有分析、AI或B2B SaaS领域的经验。
曾在早期创业环境中工作，并享受其中的模糊性、所有权和速度感。
既有战略性又能执行——无论是设定长期方向，还是编写规范或投入Figma，你都同样自如。
有很好的品味，关心产品的可用性和洞察的清晰度。
思维和沟通清晰——无论是通过文字、视觉还是结构。
在必要时挑战CEO（及他人）——不是出于自我，而是为了追求更好的结果。
为什么这个职位令人兴奋
你将主导一家构建AI+营销未来的公司的产品方向。
你将直接与一个重视产品质量和独立思考的精干创始团队合作。
你将从零开始塑造团队、路线图和文化。
你将为高意向、高生命周期价值的用户设计——你的工作将直接影响收入。
你将帮助开创一个全新的“代理式增长策略师”软件类别，而不仅仅是迭代一个仪表盘。
我们的工作方式
高度自主：发现问题，解决问题。
彻底坦率：清晰、善意的反馈；零政治。
用户至上：每一次点击都应让创意工作更快、更智能。
精雕细琢：我们注重细节——因为广告效果就存在于细节之中。
薪酬与福利
薪资：10万-15万美元+可观的股权。
全面的健康、牙科、视力保险。
无限带薪休假，并有真正“鼓励休假”的文化。
*与世界级的增长导师合作并向他们学习：Gaurav Vohra（Superhuman增长负责人，前ClickUp营销负责人）。
多元化与包容性
X的使命因多元化的视角而蓬勃发展。我们自豪地成为一个机会均等的雇主，并欢迎来自各种背景、身份和生活经历的申请人。
description_english:
X is building the future of performance creative intelligence. Our platform is trusted by highgrowth consumer brands and ad agencies to identify what creative strategies actually driveperformance on platforms like Meta and TikTok. Today, we help growth marketers-fromperformance strategists to media buyers-extract strategic insights from ad data. Tomorrow,we’ll generate the creatives themselves
We’re building toward an agentic system-an “Al-powered creative strategist in a box”-thatcan identify what works, recommend what to test next, and generate the creatives to do it. Ourlong-term model will be deeply aligned with outcomes: the better our ideas perform, the morewe earn.
We’ re currently angel-funded, early-stage, and shipping fast. Our team is product-led anddesign-centric, and we’re looking for a Head of Product who can scale this foundation into atransformative business.
The Role
We’ re hiring our first product leader-someone who can define the strategy, lead execution,and shape the culture of product at X.
You’ ll work directly with the CE0 to decide what we build, why it matters, and how it drivesvalue.
You’ll set the roadmap, define quality standards, and collaborate closely with design andengineering to bring features to life. No backlog management for the sake of it. This is aboutmaking the right decisions, not the most decisions.
What You’ ll own
Define and evolve X’s product strategy alongside the CEO, with clarity around phases(insight extraction→>automation->creative delivery).
Own product prioritization: translate user needs, data patterns, and market dynamics into a fpcused roadmap.
end product execution across design and engineering: write specs, pressure-test use casesd uphold the design + UX bar.
Build and formalize our early product development rituals (not heavy process-just what’sneeded).
Be the internal expert on our customers: creative strategists, media buyers, and growthmarketers at fast-moving tech brands.
Push our thinking on how Al can autonomously identify and produce high-performing adideas.
Eventually, scale the product team and help hire PMs, researchers, and other builders.
We Think You’ ll Thrive lf You...
Have strong first-principles thinking-you don’t default to copying what others are doing
Are a deep, independent thinker with a high quality bar-you push others to raise theirs too
Have 6-10+ years in product roles, ideally with experience in analytics, Al, or B2B SaaS
Have worked in early-stage environments and enjoy the ambiguity, ownership, and speedAre both strategic and executional-just as comfortable setting long-term direction as you。are writing a spec orjumping into Figma.
Have great taste, and care about product usability and clarity ofinsight.
Think and communicate clearly-whether that’s through words, visuals, or structure
Challenge the CE0 (and others) when necessary-not out of ego, but in pursuit of betteioutcomes.
Why This Role ls Exciting
You’ll own the product direction of a company building the future of Al + marketing
You’ll work directly with a sharp founding team who values product quality andindependent thinking.
You’ll shape the team, the roadmap, and the culture from the ground up.
You’ll be designing for a high-intent, high-LTV user-your work will directly impact revenue
You’ll help invent a new categoryof “agentic growth strategist” software, not just iterateon a dashboard.
How we work
High Agency: See a gap, fill it.
Radical Candor: Clear, kind feedback; zero politics.
User Obsession: Every click should make creatives faster and smarter.
Craft & Detail: We sweat the small stuff-because ad performance lives there.
Compensation & benefits
Salary: $100k-$150k USD + meaningful equity.。
Comprehensive health, dental, vision.
Unlimited PTO with a genuine “take-time-off” culture.
*Work with and learn from world-class growth mentors: Gaurav Vohra (Growth Leader.Superhuman and former marketing leader at ClickUp
Diversity &inclusion
X’s mission thrives on diverse perspectives. We’re proud to be an equal-opportunityemployer and welcome applicants of every background, identity, and life experience.

title: web3运营经理（remote，13-18k）
team: 上海区艺科技有限公司
summary: 社交平台,粉丝运营,活动运营,内容运营,社群运营
summary_chinese: 内容策略与用户增长,Web3/加密行业,多平台内容运营,活动策划,早期创业公司,一年两次涨薪,工作自主决策权
summary_english: Content Strategy & User Growth,Web3/Crypto Industry,Multi-platform Content Operations,Event Planning,Early-stage Startup,Biannual Salary Raises,High Work Autonomy
description:
【岗位职责】
1、内容策略与全链路运营
  ·   基于项目定位与用户画像，制定小红书、抖音、B 站、YouTube 等多平台内容矩阵策略，涵盖日常选题、热点解读、深度专题规划，打造兼具专业性、趣味性与 Web3 语境的内容体系。
  ·   主导或协同完成社交媒体文案、图文内容、短视频 / AMA 脚本的创作，把控内容调性与品牌一致性；联动设计、剪辑团队推进内容生产落地，优化内容视觉呈现与传播效果。
  ·   负责多平台内容分发、话题运营、粉丝互动与维护，优化发布节奏与策略，提升自然流量、互动率与粉丝粘性；建立内容数据监控体系，跟踪曝光、引流、粉丝增长等核心指标，定期复盘并迭代内容策略。
2、活动策划与用户增长
  ·   策划并执行加密行业用户拉新、促活、留存类专项活动，结合 Web3 热点设计创意玩法，通过多渠道推广提升新用户注册量与初期参与度。
  ·   搭建用户生命周期运营机制，设计日常活动与内容加热方案，激活沉默用户，推动用户从注册到深度参与的正向流转。
  ·   开展市场调研与竞品分析，结合活动数据优化活动策略，定位增长机会并输出可落地的优化方案。
3、跨团队协同与项目管理
  ·   协同产品、设计、技术等团队，推动内容与活动方案从策划到上线的全流程落地，确保项目按时、高质量完成。
【岗位要求】
1、经验要求
  ·   具备1-3 年 Web3 / 加密行业运营经验，有内容运营及活动运营复合经验者优先。
  ·   拥有成功的内容破圈案例或用户增长活动案例者优先；熟悉美股港股、加密合约、全球资产配置等任一赛道者优先。
2、能力要求
  ·   内容能力：网感敏锐，能精准捕捉 Web3 行业热点；擅长将复杂加密概念转化为通俗有趣的传播内容。
  ·   活动能力：熟悉主流用户增长策略与玩法，能独立完成活动策划、执行、监测、复盘全流程，具备较强的成本与 ROI 意识。
  ·   数据能力：具备出色的数据敏感性，能通过数据分析驱动内容与活动策略优化；熟练使用数据分析工具。
  ·   工具与语言能力：熟练运用各类 AI 视频 / 内容工具提效；英语读写能力优异，可完成跨语言内容编译与创作。
  ·   协作与执行能力：思维活跃、创意突出，能高效管理多任务；具备良好的沟通协作与项目推动力，适应 Web3 行业快节奏工作节奏。
【加分项】
  ·   具备基础的图像设计、视频剪辑或信息图制作能力。
  ·   有海外 Web3 项目运营经验，熟悉海外用户偏好与推广渠道。
  ·   对加密行业政策与市场趋势有深刻理解。
【我们提供】
  ·   深度参与 Web3 赛道内容与活动双赛道运营，获得系统化的复合能力提升机会。
  ·   与产品、技术等核心团队紧密协作，快速验证创意并推动落地，拥有较大的工作自主决策权。
  ·   一年两次涨薪机会，清晰的职业发展路径与晋升通道，匹配行业竞争力的薪酬体系与绩效激励机制。
公司背景：
公司由香港资本公司种子孵化，和国内高樟资本天使投资，管理团队成员来自麻省理工学院，多伦多大学等top名校，均有海外工作背景，有200人公司的运作经历。
目前公司处于早期状态，需要短期内迅速扩张，需要人才，诚邀有志之士加入，共创未来。

description_english:
【Job Responsibilities】
1. Content Strategy & Full-Funnel Operations
  ·   Based on project positioning and user personas, develop a multi-platform content matrix strategy for platforms like Xiaohongshu, Douyin, Bilibili, and YouTube, covering daily topics, hot topic analysis, and in-depth special feature planning to build a content system that is professional, engaging, and relevant to the Web3 context.
  ·   Lead or collaborate on the creation of social media copy, graphic content, and scripts for short videos/AMAs, ensuring content tone is consistent with the brand; coordinate with design and editing teams to facilitate content production and optimize visual presentation and communication effectiveness.
  ·   Manage multi-platform content distribution, topic management, and fan interaction/maintenance; optimize publishing schedules and strategies to increase organic traffic, engagement rates, and fan stickiness; establish a content data monitoring system to track key metrics like impressions, traffic acquisition, and follower growth, and regularly review and iterate on content strategy.
2. Event Planning & User Growth
  ·   Plan and execute special campaigns for user acquisition, activation, and retention in the crypto industry, designing creative activities based on Web3 hot topics and promoting through multiple channels to increase new user registrations and initial engagement.
  ·   Build a user lifecycle operation mechanism, design daily activities and content promotion plans to activate dormant users and encourage a positive transition from registration to deep engagement.
  ·   Conduct market research and competitor analysis, optimize event strategies based on activity data, identify growth opportunities, and produce actionable optimization plans.
3. Cross-team Collaboration & Project Management
  ·   Collaborate with product, design, technology, and other teams to drive the entire process of content and event plans from planning to launch, ensuring projects are completed on time and to a high standard.
【Job Requirements】
1. Experience Requirements
  ·   1-3 years of operations experience in the Web3 / crypto industry; candidates with combined experience in content operations and event operations are preferred.
  ·   Candidates with successful cases of viral content or user growth campaigns are preferred; familiarity with any of the following tracks is a plus: US/HK stocks, crypto contracts, global asset allocation.
2. Skill Requirements
  ·   Content Skills: Keen sense of online trends, able to accurately capture hot topics in the Web3 industry; skilled at translating complex crypto concepts into easy-to-understand and engaging content.
  ·   Event Skills: Familiar with mainstream user growth strategies and tactics; able to independently manage the entire process of event planning, execution, monitoring, and review, with a strong sense of cost and ROI.
  ·   Data Skills: Excellent data sensitivity, able to drive optimization of content and event strategies through data analysis; proficient in using data analysis tools.
  ·   Tool & Language Skills: Proficient in using various AI video/content tools to improve efficiency; excellent English reading and writing skills, capable of cross-language content compilation and creation.
  ·   Collaboration & Execution Skills: Active thinker with outstanding creativity, able to manage multiple tasks efficiently; possess strong communication, collaboration, and project-driving skills, adaptable to the fast-paced work environment of the Web3 industry.
【Bonus Points】
  ·   Basic skills in graphic design, video editing, or infographic creation.
  ·   Experience in operating overseas Web3 projects, familiar with the preferences and promotion channels of international users.
  ·   Deep understanding of crypto industry policies and market trends.
【What We Offer】
  ·   Opportunity to be deeply involved in dual-track operations (content and events) in the Web3 space, gaining systematic development of versatile skills.
  ·   Close collaboration with core teams like product and technology to quickly validate and implement ideas, with a high degree of autonomy in decision-making.
  ·   Opportunities for salary increases twice a year, a clear career development path and promotion channels, and a competitive compensation and performance incentive system.
Company Background:
The company was seed-incubated by a Hong Kong capital firm and received angel investment from Gaozhang Capital in China. The management team members are from top universities such as MIT and the University of Toronto, all with overseas work experience and experience operating a 200-person company.
Currently, the company is in its early stage and needs to expand rapidly in the short term. We are in need of talent and sincerely invite ambitious individuals to join us to create the future together.

title: AI Agent 全栈工程师-上海/remote
team: 某大型移动互联网公司
summary: AI native,full -stack,AI agent,Agentic AI,RL
summary_chinese: AI Agent系统开发,模型训练与优化,语音代理,强化学习(RL),监督微调(SFT),AI/ML框架
summary_english: AI Agent System Development,Model Training & Optimization,Voice Agent,Reinforcement Learning (RL),Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT),AI/ML Frameworks
description:
我们正在寻找一位优秀的 AI Agent 全栈工程师，负责设计、开发和部署尖端 AI 驱动解决方案。你将在构建智能代理核心能⼒中发挥关键作⽤，覆盖复杂后端系统到直观⽤户交互的全流程。
岗位职责
设计、搭建并维护顶尖的自主 AI Agent 系统及其底层基础设施。
参与模型开发全生命周期，包括训练后优化、强化学习（RL）及监督微调（SFT）。
深耕语⾳代理领域创新，打造自然高效的对话体验。
与世界级研究人员和工程师团队紧密协作，将 AI 概念转化为实际产品。
任职要求
有愿景的构建者：具备创业精神，志在打造突破性技术。
聪慧务实：拥有出色的问题解决能力，学习能力强，注重行动与成果交付。
动手能力强且积极主动：能在快节奏、动态的环境中高效工作，主动直面复杂技术挑战。
全栈 AI 专业功底：精通现代 AI/ML 框架与编程工具，具备扎实的计算机科学、人工智能或相关领域基础。拥有 AI Agent、模型训练及复杂系统开发的可验证经验者优先。
加分项
经验丰富的创新者：个人作品集（GitHub 项目、学术论文、个人项目等）能充分展现你交付高影响力解决方案的能力。

description_english:
We are looking for an outstanding AI Agent Full Stack Engineer to design, develop, and deploy cutting-edge AI-driven solutions. You will play a key role in building the core capabilities of intelligent agents, covering the entire process from complex backend systems to intuitive user interactions.
Responsibilities
Design, build, and maintain state-of-the-art autonomous AI Agent systems and their underlying infrastructure.
Participate in the full lifecycle of model development, including post-training optimization, Reinforcement Learning (RL), and Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT).
Innovate deeply in the field of voice agents to create natural and efficient conversational experiences.
Collaborate closely with a world-class team of researchers and engineers to transform AI concepts into actual products.
Requirements
A Visionary Builder: Possess an entrepreneurial spirit, dedicated to creating breakthrough technologies.
Smart and Pragmatic: Excellent problem-solving skills, a strong ability to learn, and a focus on action and delivering results.
Hands-on and Proactive: Able to work efficiently in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and proactively tackle complex technical challenges.
Full-Stack AI Expertise: Proficient in modern AI/ML frameworks and programming tools, with a solid foundation in computer science, artificial intelligence, or related fields. Verifiable experience in AI Agents, model training, and complex system development is a plus.
Bonus Points
Experienced Innovator: A personal portfolio (GitHub projects, academic papers, personal projects, etc.) that fully demonstrates your ability to deliver high-impact solutions.

title: Product Engineer(Remote/wfh)-Fintech
team: 某知名互联网公司
summary: JavaScript/TypeScript,Node.js开发经验,全栈,Node.js
summary_chinese: 后端服务开发,金融科技,NodeJS,React+TypeScript,PostgreSQL,tRPC/OpenAPI,5年以上经验
summary_english: Backend Service Development,Fintech,NodeJS,React+TypeScript,PostgreSQL,tRPC/OpenAPI,5+ years of experience
description:
Shape the  Future
At here,you won't just write code-you'll shape the product.As a Product Engineer,you'l own features end-to-end and help redefine what's possible in fintech.
We're building a high-performance,Al-native Fintech Operating System
designed to optimize cost and revenue for digital businesses.Join us on a
multi-year mission to build smarter infrastructure for commerce.
Why Join  Us?
You'l help build an ambitious product from the ground up,with a team that
values speed,craft,and autonomy.If you're ready to make an outsized impact in fintech,we'd love to meet you.
About the  Role
You'll join a fast-moving team building modern web applications that process and optimize financial data at scale.This is a full-stack role with strong emphasis on backend engineering:
What You'll Do
BuiId scaIabIe backend services in NodeJS
DeveIop responsive UIs with React Router v7 
CoIIaborate on API design
Write cIean, weII-tested code across the stack
Optimize database queries and data pipeIines (PostgreSQL)
Improve observabiIity, monitoring, and infrastructure
Contribute to architecturaI decisions and engineering practices  
What We're Looking For
5+ years of experience in product-focused engineering
Strong ownership mindset and startup readiness
Hands-on experience with PostgreSQL, tRPC and OpenAPI
ComfortabIe with React + TypeScript for cross-functionaI work

Payments or fintech experience
Exposure to CIickhouse/Tinybird 
Exposure to AI/ML systems
BuiIt high-performance, Iow-Iatency systems

description_chinese:
塑造未来
在这里，您不只是编写代码——您将塑造产品。作为一名产品工程师，您将端到端地负责功能，并帮助重新定义金融科技的可能性。
我们正在构建一个高性能、AI 原生的金融科技操作系统，
旨在为数字企业优化成本和收入。加入我们，
共同执行一项为期多年的使命，为商业构建更智能的基础设施。
为什么加入我们？
您将与一个重视速度、技艺和自主性的团队一起，从零开始构建一个雄心勃勃的产品。
如果您准备好在金融科技领域产生巨大影响，我们很乐意与您会面。
关于职位
您将加入一个快节奏的团队，构建现代化的 Web 应用程序，以大规模处理和优化金融数据。这是一个全栈职位，重点强调后端工程：
您的工作职责
使用 NodeJS 构建可扩展的后端服务
使用 React Router v7 开发响应式 UI
协作进行 API 设计
在整个技术栈中编写干净、经过良好测试的代码
优化数据库查询和数据管道 (PostgreSQL)
改进可观察性、监控和基础设施
为架构决策和工程实践做出贡献
我们正在寻找
5年以上以产品为中心的工程经验
强烈的责任心和对初创公司的适应能力
具备 PostgreSQL、tRPC 和 OpenAPI 的实践经验
能够熟练使用 React + TypeScript 进行跨职能工作
加分项
支付或金融科技经验
有 Clickhouse/Tinybird 经验
有 AI/ML 系统经验
构建过高性能、低延迟的系统
有 tRPC/OpenAPI 经验
description_english:
Shape the Future
Here, you won't just write code—you'll shape the product. As a Product Engineer, you'll own features end-to-end and help redefine what's possible in fintech.
We're building a high-performance, AI-native Fintech Operating System
designed to optimize cost and revenue for digital businesses. Join us on a
multi-year mission to build smarter infrastructure for commerce.
Why Join Us?
You'll help build an ambitious product from the ground up with a team that
values speed, craft, and autonomy. If you're ready to make an outsized impact in fintech, we'd love to meet you.
About the Role
You'll join a fast-moving team building modern web applications that process and optimize financial data at scale. This is a full-stack role with a strong emphasis on backend engineering:
What You'll Do
Build scalable backend services in NodeJS
Develop responsive UIs with React Router v7
Collaborate on API design
Write clean, well-tested code across the stack
Optimize database queries and data pipelines (PostgreSQL)
Improve observability, monitoring, and infrastructure
Contribute to architectural decisions and engineering practices
What We're Looking For
5+ years of experience in product-focused engineering
Strong ownership mindset and startup readiness
Hands-on experience with PostgreSQL, tRPC and OpenAPI
Comfortable with React + TypeScript for cross-functional work
Bonus Points
Payments or fintech experience
Exposure to Clickhouse/Tinybird
Exposure to AI/ML systems
Built high-performance, low-latency systems
Experience with tRPC/OpenAPI

title: AI大模型算法工程师（remote）
team: 成都创元聚星科技有限公司
summary: 远程不限制base地！,NLP,机器学习
summary_chinese: 大模型风控算法,风控安全,大模型微调,RAG,NLP,PyTorch,LangChain
summary_english: Large Model Risk Control Algorithms,Risk Control & Security,Large Model Fine-tuning,RAG,NLP,PyTorch,LangChain
description:
【主要职责】
1、设计与实现大模型相关的算法方案，涵盖自然语言处理（NLP）、知识检索、向量 search、异常检测等
2、结合业务需求，在风险巡检、研判、策略等环节研发定制化模型（如舆情感知、交易⾏为分析）
3、进⾏⼤模型适配和微调（Fine-tuning），使其适配特定领域的语言与知识
4、建立风控特征知识库，并实现知识增强型推理（Retrieval-Augmented Generation，RAG）
5、开发模型评估体系（命中率、召回率、准确率、延迟等）并持续优化
6、与研发⼯程师协作，实现模型的工程化部署与在线推理
【任职要求】
1、硕士及以上学历，计算机、人工智能、应用数学等相关专业
2、精通机器学习/深度学习算法，熟悉PyTorch/TensorFlow
3、熟悉大语言模型（LLM），具备微调、Prompt设计、向量数据库使用经验
4、有异常检测、风险预测、舆情分析等方向的研究或项目经验
5、优秀的数学功底，能进行算法原型设计和优化
【加分项】
1、熟悉LangChain、LlamaIndex等大模型应用框架
2、有多智能体任务分解与消息协调系统设计经验
3、能独立撰写高质量技术方案并推动落地
description_chinese:
【主要职责】
1、设计与实现大模型相关的算法方案，涵盖自然语言处理（NLP）、知识检索、向量 search、异常检测等
2、结合业务需求，在风险巡检、研判、策略等环节研发定制化模型（如舆情感知、交易⾏为分析）
3、进⾏⼤模型适配和微调（Fine-tuning），使其适配特定领域的语言与知识
4、建立风控特征知识库，并实现知识增强型推理（Retrieval-Augmented Generation，RAG）
5、开发模型评估体系（命中率、召回率、准确率、延迟等）并持续优化
6、与研发⼯程师协作，实现模型的工程化部署与在线推理
【任职要求】
1、硕士及以上学历，计算机、人工智能、应用数学等相关专业
2、精通机器学习/深度学习算法，熟悉PyTorch/TensorFlow
3、熟悉大语言模型（LLM），具备微调、Prompt设计、向量数据库使用经验
4、有异常检测、风险预测、舆情分析等方向的研究或项目经验
5、优秀的数学功底，能进行算法原型设计和优化
【加分项】
1、熟悉LangChain、LlamaIndex等大模型应用框架
2、有多智能体任务分解与消息协调系统设计经验
3、能独立撰写高质量技术方案并推动落地
description_english:
【Key Responsibilities】
1、Design and implement algorithm solutions related to large models, covering Natural Language Processing (NLP), knowledge retrieval, vector search, anomaly detection, etc.
2、Develop customized models for business needs in areas such as risk inspection, analysis, and strategy (e.g., public sentiment analysis, transaction behavior analysis).
3、Perform large model adaptation and fine-tuning to suit the language and knowledge of specific domains.
4、Establish a risk control feature knowledge base and implement Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
5、Develop a model evaluation system (hit rate, recall, accuracy, latency, etc.) and continuously optimize it.
6、Collaborate with R&D engineers to implement model engineering deployment and online inference.
【Job Requirements】
1、Master's degree or above in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Applied Mathematics, or related fields.
2、Proficient in machine learning/deep learning algorithms, familiar with PyTorch/TensorFlow.
3、Familiar with Large Language Models (LLM), with experience in fine-tuning, prompt design, and using vector databases.
4、Research or project experience in areas such as anomaly detection, risk prediction, and public sentiment analysis.
5、Excellent mathematical foundation, capable of designing and optimizing algorithm prototypes.
【Bonus Points】
1、Familiar with large model application frameworks such as LangChain, LlamaIndex.
2、Experience in designing multi-agent task decomposition and message coordination systems.
3、Ability to independently write high-quality technical proposals and drive their implementation.

title: AI初创独角兽-数据运营经理-远程（remote）
team: 某人工智能公司
summary: 视频标注,接受居家办公
summary_chinese: 基础模型数据策略,人工智能,视觉与多模态数据,数据标注管理,个人贡献者,AI初创公司
summary_english: Foundation Model Data Strategy,Artificial Intelligence,Visual and Multimodal Data,Data Annotation Management,Individual Contributor,AI Startup
description:
职位描述 ：
这并非传统的数据管理职位，而是一个身处最前沿、塑造训练基础模型数据的宝贵机会。您将成为驱动我们生成视频技术的数据集架构师，与我们世界一流的研究团队紧密合作，为数以百万计创作者所使用的突破性模型提供动力。请将自己视为原始信息与人工智能卓越能力之间的桥梁——您将构建数据管理策略、标注流程和质量体系，帮助我们的模型更好地观察和理解世界。
工作内容：
1.将研究人员需求转化为可执行的数据标注和管理策略，服务于我们的 SOTA 视觉、3D 和音频模型。
2.全面负责端到端数据流程和标注工作流，与外部合作伙伴及标注团队协作，确保数据最高质量。
3.跨多个数据流程进行统筹管理，在拓展新模态时确保一致性与质量标准。
开发创新的数据管理策略，融合人工标注数据、原始数据与合成数据，解决复杂模型挑战。
4.与研究人员直接合作，诊断模型性能问题，提出数据驱动的解决方案以优化结果。
5.制定数据质量与标注标准，为公司 扩展数据运营奠定基础。
职位要求：
1. 2 年以上在顶尖人工智能公司从事 AI 数据运营、人工数据标注或同类数据核心工作的实践经验。
2.具备将复杂研究人员需求转化为有效数据管理与标注流程的直接经验。
3.具备高度适应性，善于跨职能协作，能够驾驭完整数据流程，而非仅限于人工标注等单一环节。
4.拥有视觉或多模态数据处理经验。
5.您是一位注重实践的个人贡献者，以工作成果为驱动，而非专注于人员管理。
加分项 / 脱颖而出的条件：
1.具备 SOTA 视觉模型知名企业工作经验。
2.拥有顶尖数据标注服务商任职经历。
3.熟悉人工标注之外的其他数据类型，包括原始数据与合成数据。
4.具备管理数据标注供应商合作的经验。
5.适应快节奏的初创环境，并对所负责工作展现出高度自主性。

这并非传统的数据管理职位，而是一个身处最前沿、塑造训练基础模型数据的宝贵机会。您将成为驱动我们生成视频技术的数据集架构师，与我们世界一流的研究团队紧密合作，为数以百万计创作者所使用的突破性模型提供动力。请将自己视为原始信息与人工智能卓越能力之间的桥梁——您将构建数据管理策略、标注流程和质量体系，帮助我们的模型更好地观察和理解世界。

2.拥有顶尖数据标注服务商任职经历。
3.熟悉人工标注之外的其他数据类型，包括原始数据与合成数据。
4.具备管理数据标注供应商合作的经验。
5.适应快节奏的初创环境，并对所负责工作展现出高度自主性。
description_english:
Job Description:
This is not a traditional data management position, but a valuable opportunity to be at the forefront, shaping the data used to train foundation models. You will become the dataset architect driving our generative video technology, working closely with our world-class research team to power the breakthrough models used by millions of creators. Consider yourself the bridge between raw information and the exceptional capabilities of artificial intelligence—you will build data management strategies, annotation processes, and quality systems to help our models better observe and understand the world.
Responsibilities:
1. Translate researcher requirements into executable data annotation and management strategies for our SOTA visual, 3D, and audio models.
2. Take full responsibility for end-to-end data processes and annotation workflows, collaborating with external partners and annotation teams to ensure the highest data quality.
3. Coordinate and manage across multiple data processes, ensuring consistency and quality standards when expanding to new modalities.
4. Develop innovative data management strategies that integrate manually annotated data, raw data, and synthetic data to solve complex model challenges.
5. Collaborate directly with researchers to diagnose model performance issues and propose data-driven solutions to optimize results.
6. Establish data quality and annotation standards, laying the foundation for scaling the company's data operations.
Requirements:
1. 2+ years of hands-on experience in AI data operations, manual data annotation, or similar core data roles at a top AI company.
2. Direct experience in translating complex researcher needs into effective data management and annotation processes.
3. Highly adaptable and skilled in cross-functional collaboration, with the ability to manage the entire data pipeline, not just a single segment like manual annotation.
4. Experience with visual or multimodal data processing.
5. You are a hands-on individual contributor, driven by work outcomes rather than people management.
Bonus Points / What Makes You Stand Out:
1. Experience working at a well-known company with SOTA visual models.
2. Experience working at a top data annotation service provider.
3. Familiarity with other data types beyond manual annotation, including raw and synthetic data.
4. Experience managing collaborations with data annotation vendors.
5. Thrives in a fast-paced startup environment and demonstrates a high degree of ownership over your work.

title: Senior Python Developer (Remote working)
team: 某大型计算机软件公司
summary: Django,PostgreSQL,Pandas,英语面试,Python
summary_chinese: 风险数据后端开发,金融科技,Pandas数据分析,PostgreSQL/Kafka,跨国团队协作,TDD,英语流利
summary_english: Risk Data Backend Development,Fintech,Pandas Data Analysis,PostgreSQL/Kafka,Cross-national Team Collaboration,TDD,Fluent English
description:
Responsibilities
Develop and maintain Python-based backend services to serve real-time and batch risk data at scale.
Build analytics pipelines / dashboards / report using pandas, matplotlib, and plotly for internal stakeholders.
Integrate with data systems such as PostgreSQL, ClickHouse, Kafka, Redis, and manage workflows via Airflow.
Work closely with the product management team and the global developers.
Work closely with the DevOps team to continuously upgrade and improve the technology stack.
Requirements
Strong proficiency in Python: In-depth knowledge of Python syntax, libraries(e.g., pandas, numpy, plotly), and frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask, FastAPI, Dash).
Expertise in SQL: Solid understanding of relational database concepts, SQL querying, and database optimization techniques.
Must have: Python, pandas, matplotlib, plotly, PostgreSQL, Redis, Kafka, Airflow
Nice to have: ClickHouse, Java, Kubernetes/Docker
Preferably experience at an Investment Bank, Hedge Fund or Exchange developing trading applications in Equity, FX or Derivative products in traditional or crypto market,
Proficient in speaking English and experienced in collaboration with global teams.
Adapt and understand TDD methodology, experience on doing automated testing
Strong desire for doing things better and faster, attention to detail and holding strong responsibility to his/her tasks.
Open to challenges and eager to learn.
Able to work under pressure, fast learner and able to adapt changing priorities within a fast-moving industry.
所属部门：Exchange
description_chinese:
职责
开发和维护基于 Python 的后端服务，以大规模提供实时和批量风险数据。
使用 pandas、matplotlib 和 plotly 为内部利益相关者构建分析管道/仪表盘/报告。
与 PostgreSQL、ClickHouse、Kafka、Redis 等数据系统集成，并通过 Airflow 管理工作流。
与产品管理团队和全球开发人员密切合作。
与 DevOps 团队密切合作，不断升级和改进技术栈。
要求
精通 Python：深入了解 Python 语法、库（如 pandas、numpy、plotly）和框架（如 Django、Flask、FastAPI、Dash）。
精通 SQL：对关系型数据库概念、SQL 查询和数据库优化技术有扎实的理解。
必须具备：Python、pandas、matplotlib、plotly、PostgreSQL、Redis、Kafka、Airflow
加分项：ClickHouse、Java、Kubernetes/Docker
最好有在投资银行、对冲基金或交易所开发传统或加密市场中股票、外汇或衍生品交易应用的经验。
英语口语流利，有与全球团队协作的经验。
适应并理解 TDD 方法论，有自动化测试经验。
有强烈意愿把事情做得更好更快，注重细节，对自己的任务有强烈的责任心。
乐于接受挑战，渴望学习。
能够在压力下工作，学习速度快，并能适应快速发展行业中不断变化的优先事项。
所属部门：Exchange

Strong desire for doing things better and faster, attention to detail and holding strong responsibility to his/her tasks.
Open to challenges and eager to learn.
Able to work under pressure, a fast learner and able to adapt to changing priorities within a fast-moving industry.

title: 运营经理（remote）
team: 北京某中型区块链技术服务公司
summary_chinese: 现货业务产品规划,区块链行业,风控规划与设计,金融产品设计,用户体验设计,竞品与市场分析
summary_english: Spot Trading Product Planning,Blockchain Industry,Risk Control Planning & Design,Financial Product Design,User Experience Design,Competitor & Market Analysis
description:
职责：
·负责公司现货业务线产品规划和设计，包括业务流程设计、用户体验设计及新业务模式设计等；
·有良好的风控意识，能够从平台风险角度，在设计交易产品时做好相关风控规划和设计；
·收集来自内外部的产品反馈，并通过定性/定量的逻辑分析方法将其转化成可实施的产品方案；
·关注竞品和行业动态，进行深入市场调研，能够输出有价值的分析成果，寻求投入产出比高的新交易产品方向；
·对项目进度负责，并协调技术、设计、市场、运营等部门间的配合，良好的项目推进和落地能力。
要求：
·3年以上产品工作经验，具备2年及以上qkl平台产品经验，本科及以上学历；
·具备股票、基金、外汇期货、期权等金融产品设计或交易经验者优先；
·对用户体验有深刻理解，能够在用户需求和技术可能性之间找到平衡；
·有创业精神，良好的沟通和团队协作能力，有责任心，抗压能力强。

·对项目进度负责，并协调技术、设计、市场、运营等部门间的配合，良好的项目推进和落地能力。
要求：
·3年以上产品工作经验，具备2年及以上qkl平台产品经验，本科及以上学历；
·具备股票、基金、外汇期货、期权等金融产品设计或交易经验者优先；
·对用户体验有深刻理解，能够在用户需求和技术可能性之间找到平衡；
·有创业精神，良好的沟通和团队协作能力，有责任心，抗压能力强。

title: 合规经理（远程remote）
team: 某中型互联网金融公司
summary_chinese: 许可证申请与维护,金融科技,熟悉AML/KYC流程,监管要求研究分析,合规政策起草更新

成为与项目联系的关键人物，促进内部和外部利益相关者之间的顺畅沟通。

保持对全球法规和行业最佳实践的更新。
支持高级合规官员进行调查和报告。
协助实施和监控AML/CFT政策和程序。
支持监管AML审计和风险评估。
协助起草和更新合规政策、程序和手册。
要求
法律、金融、商业或相关领域的学士学位。
1-3年合规经验，最好是在金融科技领域，接触AML/KYC和许可证申请。
熟悉金融行业的AML/KYC框架和概念，包括合规政策、风险管理策略和监管要求。

Main Responsibilities
Support the preparation, submission, and maintenance of licenses (VASP, MSB, MiFID II, EMI, PSP, etc.).
Serve as a key point of contact for projects, facilitating smooth communication between internal and external stakeholders.
Maintain records of regulatory filings and ensure timely renewals.
Research and analyze regulatory requirements in different regions.
Stay updated on global regulations and industry best practices.
Support senior compliance officers in investigations and reporting.
Assist in the implementation and monitoring of AML/CFT policies and procedures.
Support regulatory AML audits and risk assessments.
Assist in drafting and updating compliance policies, procedures, and manuals.

Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Law, Finance, Business, or a related field.
1-3 years of compliance experience, preferably in the FinTech sector, with exposure to AML/KYC and license applications.
Familiar with AML/KYC frameworks and concepts in the financial industry, including compliance policies, risk management strategies, and regulatory requirements.
Strong analytical and research skills.
Detail-oriented with excellent organizational skills.
English proficiency (ability to understand, communicate, and execute regulatory submissions/engage with law firms/service providers).

description:

月薪 8000-12000 元
五险一金 + 超多福利
岗位职责
1、及时线上答疑服务，高效解决学习过程中的各类问题；
2、密切跟踪学员学习进度与学习效果，结合个体情况提供个性化学习方案调整建议；
3、及时整理、收集学员反馈的问题，形成总结报告并同步相关团队，助力服务优化。
任职要求
1、热爱教育教学事业，责任心强、有耐心，具备良好的亲和力、沟通表达能力及抗压能力；
2、拥有优秀的团队协作意识与服务意识，能积极配合团队完成工作目标；
3、熟练运用 OFFICE 办公软件及各类办公、业务系统，具备高效的线上办公能力。
公司介绍
领研教育集团全资子公司，总部位于北京市，目前业务范围涵盖考博教育、考研教育、学术科研服务等。为适应时代的变化，致吾辈教育立志应用新时代的技术和理念，打造教育服务、教育学习、教育资源整合以及教育平台综合体。
现在与多个高等院校以及教学服务平台达成友好合作关系。
下属子公司2家，在上海市设立5个直营校区，累计服务学员超过1万名。获得学员广泛好评以及信任。在市场竞争日益激烈的今天，致吾辈始终坚持“客户第一”的服务以及教学理念。着力打造让客户满意的产品服务和教学体系!

description_english:
Salary and Benefits
Monthly salary 8,000-12,000 RMB
Five social insurances and one housing fund + many benefits
Job Responsibilities
1. Provide timely online Q&A services, efficiently resolving various issues during the learning process;
2. Closely track students' learning progress and outcomes, providing personalized learning plan adjustment suggestions based on individual situations;
3. Promptly organize and collect student feedback, create summary reports, and sync with relevant teams to help optimize services.
Job Requirements
1. Passionate about the education and teaching profession, with a strong sense of responsibility, patience, and good affinity, communication, expression, and stress management skills;
2. Possess excellent teamwork and service awareness, able to actively cooperate with the team to achieve work goals;
3. Proficient in using OFFICE software and various office and business systems, with efficient online work capabilities.
Company Introduction
A wholly-owned subsidiary of Lingyan Education Group, headquartered in Beijing. Our current business scope covers doctoral entrance exam education, postgraduate entrance exam education, academic research services, etc. To adapt to the changing times, Zhiwubei Education is committed to applying new-era technologies and concepts to create a complex integrating educational services, learning, resource integration, and platforms.
We have now established friendly cooperative relationships with multiple higher education institutions and teaching service platforms.
We have 2 subordinate subsidiaries and have established 5 directly-operated campuses in Shanghai, serving a cumulative total of over 10,000 students. We have received widespread praise and trust from our students. In today's increasingly competitive market, Zhiwubei always adheres to a "Customer First" service and teaching philosophy. We are focused on building product services and teaching systems that satisfy our customers!

team: 某大型全球化互联网公司
summary_chinese: AI Agent系统开发,金融风控,大模型应用开发,Python,Multi-Agent系统,Prompt Engineering,分布式系统
summary_english: AI Agent System Development,Financial Risk Control,Large Model Application Development,Python,Multi-Agent Systems,Prompt Engineering,Distributed Systems
description:
【岗位职责】
1、参与大模型驱动的 AI Agent 系统开发，包括数据接入、模型接口调用、推理服务封装等
2、将风险巡检、研判、策略生成等业务逻辑落地为可运⾏的 AI 应⽤服务
3、优化⼤模型调用的延迟、吞吐与成本（Prompt优化、模型微调部署）
4、设计并实现多Agent间的消息队列、任务调度与协作机制
5、对接内部风控策略引擎和数据平台，实现模型结果的闭环落地
6、编写技术文档与操作⼿册，支持研发过程中的技术验证与上线
【任职要求】
1、计算机或相关专业本科及以上学历，3年以上AI/机器学习研发经验
2、熟悉 Python/Java 等后端开发语言，掌握常用机器学习和深度学习框架（PyTorch、TensorFlow 等）
3、有大模型相关开发经验（OpenAI API、HuggingFace Transformers 等）
4、具备良好的工程化能力，能将AI原型转化为高性能生产应用
5、了解消息队列、微服务架构，具备分布式系统开发经验
6、有交易所、金融风控或数据平台开发经验者优先
【加分项】
1、熟悉 Prompt Engineering 和大模型微调（LoRA/PEFT）
2、有多智能体（Multi-Agent）系统、LangChain、AutoGPT 等相关落地经验
3、对金融风险、交易安全有了解

【岗位职责】

2、熟悉 Python/Java 等后端开发语言，掌握常用机器学习和深度学习框架（PyTorch、TensorFlow 等）
3、有大模型相关开发经验（OpenAI API、HuggingFace Transformers 等）
4、具备良好的工程化能力，能将AI原型转化为高性能生产应用
5、了解消息队列、微服务架构，具备分布式系统开发经验
6、有交易所、金融风控或数据平台开发经验者优先
【加分项】
1、熟悉 Prompt Engineering 和大模型微调（LoRA/PEFT）
2、有多智能体（Multi-Agent）系统、LangChain、AutoGPT 等相关落地经验
3、对金融风险、交易安全有了解
description_english:
【Job Responsibilities】
1. Participate in the development of Large Model-driven AI Agent systems, including data ingestion, model API calls, and inference service encapsulation.
2. Implement business logic such as risk inspection, analysis, and strategy generation into executable AI application services.
3. Optimize the latency, throughput, and cost of large model calls (Prompt optimization, model fine-tuning and deployment).
4. Design and implement message queues, task scheduling, and collaboration mechanisms among multiple Agents.
5. Integrate with internal risk control strategy engines and data platforms to achieve closed-loop implementation of model results.
6. Write technical documents and operation manuals to support technical validation and online deployment during the R&D process.
【Job Requirements】
1. Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related fields, with 3+ years of experience in AI/Machine Learning R&D.
2. Familiar with backend development languages such as Python/Java, and proficient in common machine learning and deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.).
3. Experience in large model-related development (OpenAI API, HuggingFace Transformers, etc.).
4. Possess strong engineering skills, able to transform AI prototypes into high-performance production applications.
5. Understanding of message queues and microservices architecture, with experience in distributed systems development.
6. Experience in exchange, financial risk control, or data platform development is a plus.
【Bonus Points】
1. Familiar with Prompt Engineering and large model fine-tuning (LoRA/PEFT).
2. Experience in implementing Multi-Agent systems, LangChain, AutoGPT, etc.
3. Understanding of financial risk and transaction security.

Responsibilities
Deeply understand quantitative business requirements, write high-performance, high-quality strategy code, and complete backtesting.
Analyze strategy profit and loss based on transaction data, and cooperate with strategists for timely fixes and adjustments.
Maintain the stability of large-scale quantitative strategy systems, responsible for daily production maintenance and strategy iteration/upgrades.

title: 居家办公班主任【远程、高薪、五险一金】
team: 北京智乐活科技有限公司
summary: 不授课,社群运营,小班教学（3-25人）,培训机构,线上教育,学前儿童/小学生,普通话发音标准
summary_chinese: 社群运营与转化,在线教育,用户沟通,销售转化,班级群管理,五险一金,大专及以上
summary_english: Community Operations and Conversion,Online Education,User Communication,Sales Conversion,Class Group Management,Five Insurances and One Fund,College Degree or above
description:
【薪资和晋升】
1.薪资构成：底薪3800-5000+绩效1000-1500+转化提成，绩效95%老师都可以拿满，综合薪资 8-18K+/月；
2.TOP老师每月至少拿到 2W+，上不封顶！
3.双通道晋升：专业/管理方向多维度发展路径，晋升机制公开透明，每年有4次晋升机会，可跳级晋升！具体如下：
a.专业路线：基础薪资涨幅500-1500元！
b.管理路线：储备组长-组长-组长管理
4.横向发展：培训、策略、质检、项目负责人等，支持你未来发展更多可能性！
【工作内容】
1.社群运营管理：负责班级群精细化运营，助力建立家长对阅读的正确认知；
2.沟通转化服务：与家长保持良好沟通，建立紧密粘性，实现低价会员到正价会员的高效转化；
3.多周期社群承接：依据公司业务发展及前端流量变化，灵活承接不同运营周期的社群；
4.数据复盘优化：基于运营数据复盘总结。
【任职条件】
1.大专及以上学历，有3个月以上社群运营相关经验，教育方向优先，热爱销售工作； 
2.普通话标准，具有良好的沟通能力、善于线上沟通，具备强转化意识，能够承担一定的工作压力； 
3.
能够接受打电话，没有通时通次硬性要求；
4.需要自备电脑和手机。
我们是北京智乐活科技有限公司，一个平等自由、年轻有活力的团队。

公司之所以叫智乐活，是因为：我们希望通过智慧的方法帮助人们解决问题、更好地生活，也让团队伙伴在其中享受到工作的快乐。

创始人田敬是北大计算机博士，连续创业者；“酷我音乐”的核心创始成员、“半米线上孕妇学校”创始人；是中国民办教育家奋进奖”得主，CCTV和人民日报报道的优秀企业家。

我们的App Matrix项目中的App在Appstore累计安装上亿人次，曾登上Appstore总榜第4名。
我们的「半米·线上孕妇学校」服务了全国2w+医院（包括全国妇产科最好的北京协和医院），帮助全国上千万孕妇通过线上的方式更便捷地获取免费、专业、有趣的孕期知识。

现在，我们又做了「适趣AI中文」。我们通过最先进的人工智能手段，辅以原创的3000+有趣的阅读材料，帮助孩子提升阅读识字效率，让孩子快乐阅读、爱上阅读。我们已经帮助了几十万3-8岁的孩子自主阅读识字，让中国孩子能提前2~3年进行自主阅读，3岁零基础就能自主、快乐地阅读。
我们正快速发展，急需优秀的你加入，一起帮助更多家长、孩子享受科技的进步。

＃期待你的加入，希望我们带给你的不仅仅是工作＃
description_chinese:
【薪资和晋升】
1.薪资构成：底薪3800-5000+绩效1000-1500+转化提成，绩效95%老师都可以拿满，综合薪资 8-18K+/月；
2.TOP老师每月至少拿到 2W+，上不封顶！
3.双通道晋升：专业/管理方向多维度发展路径，晋升机制公开透明，每年有4次晋升机会，可跳级晋升！具体如下：
a.专业路线：基础薪资涨幅500-1500元！
b.管理路线：储备组长-组长-组长管理
4.横向发展：培训、策略、质检、项目负责人等，支持你未来发展更多可能性！
【工作内容】
1.社群运营管理：负责班级群精细化运营，助力建立家长对阅读的正确认知；
2.沟通转化服务：与家长保持良好沟通，建立紧密粘性，实现低价会员到正价会员的高效转化；
3.多周期社群承接：依据公司业务发展及前端流量变化，灵活承接不同运营周期的社群；
4.数据复盘优化：基于运营数据复盘总结。
【任职条件】
1.大专及以上学历，有3个月以上社群运营相关经验，教育方向优先，热爱销售工作； 
2.普通话标准，具有良好的沟通能力、善于线上沟通，具备强转化意识，能够承担一定的工作压力； 
3.
能够接受打电话，没有通时通次硬性要求；
4.需要自备电脑和手机。
我们是北京智乐活科技有限公司，一个平等自由、年轻有活力的团队。

公司之所以叫智乐活，是因为：我们希望通过智慧的方法帮助人们解决问题、更好地生活，也让团队伙伴在其中享受到工作的快乐。

创始人田敬是北大计算机博士，连续创业者；“酷我音乐”的核心创始成员、“半米线上孕妇学校”创始人；是中国民办教育家奋进奖”得主，CCTV和人民日报报道的优秀企业家。

现在，我们又做了「适趣AI中文」。我们通过最先进的人工智能手段，辅以原创的3000+有趣的阅读材料，帮助孩子提升阅读识字效率，让孩子快乐阅读、爱上阅读。我们已经帮助了几十万3-8岁的孩子自主阅读识字，让中国孩子能提前2~3年进行自主阅读，3岁零基础就能自主、快乐地阅读。
我们正快速发展，急需优秀的你加入，一起帮助更多家长、孩子享受科技的进步。

＃期待你的加入，希望我们带给你的不仅仅是工作＃
description_english:
【Salary and Promotion】
1. Salary Structure: Base salary 3800-5000 + performance bonus 1000-1500 + conversion commission. 95% of teachers can receive the full performance bonus. Comprehensive salary is 8-18K+/month;
2. Top teachers earn at least 20K+ per month, with no upper limit!
3. Dual-channel promotion: Multi-dimensional development paths in professional/management directions. The promotion mechanism is open and transparent, with 4 promotion opportunities per year, including skip-level promotions! Details are as follows:
a. Professional track: Base salary increase of 500-1500 RMB!
b. Management track: Team Leader Trainee - Team Leader - Group Management
4. Lateral development: Opportunities in training, strategy, quality inspection, project leadership, etc., supporting more possibilities for your future development!
【Job Responsibilities】
1. Community Operations Management: Responsible for the refined operation of class groups, helping to establish parents' correct understanding of reading;
2. Communication and Conversion Services: Maintain good communication with parents, build strong relationships, and achieve efficient conversion from low-price members to full-price members;
3. Multi-cycle Community Management: Flexibly manage communities of different operational cycles based on the company's business development and front-end traffic changes;
4. Data Review and Optimization: Summarize and review based on operational data.
【Job Requirements】
1. College degree or above, with more than 3 months of experience in community operations, preferably in the education field; passionate about sales work;
2. Standard Mandarin, with good communication skills, adept at online communication, strong conversion awareness, and able to handle a certain amount of work pressure;
3.
Must be willing to make phone calls, no strict requirements on call duration or frequency;
4. Must provide your own computer and mobile phone.
We are Beijing Zhilehuo Technology Co., Ltd., an equal, free, young, and energetic team.

The reason the company is called Zhilehuo is that we hope to help people solve problems and live better through wise methods, and also let our team members enjoy the happiness of work.

The founder, Tian Jing, is a Peking University Ph.D. in Computer Science and a serial entrepreneur; a core founding member of "Kuwo Music" and the founder of "Banmi Online Maternity School"; he is a winner of the "China Private Educator Endeavor Award" and an outstanding entrepreneur reported by CCTV and People's Daily.

Our apps from the App Matrix project have accumulated over 100 million installations on the App Store and once reached the 4th position on the overall App Store chart.
Our "Banmi Online Maternity School" has served over 20,000 hospitals nationwide (including Beijing Xiehe Hospital, the best obstetrics and gynecology hospital in China), helping tens of millions of pregnant women across the country to more conveniently access free, professional, and interesting pregnancy knowledge online.

Now, we have created "Shiqu AI Chinese." Using the most advanced artificial intelligence methods, supplemented by over 3000 original and interesting reading materials, we help children improve their reading and literacy efficiency, making them enjoy and fall in love with reading. We have already helped hundreds of thousands of children aged 3-8 to read and recognize characters independently, enabling Chinese children to start independent reading 2-3 years earlier. Even a 3-year-old with no prior knowledge can read independently and happily.
We are developing rapidly and urgently need excellent individuals like you to join us and help more parents and children enjoy the progress of technology.

#We look forward to your joining and hope to bring you more than just a job#

title: 资深前端-远程办公
team: 某大型已上市互联网公司
summary: JavaScript,Node.js,React
summary_chinese: Node.js全栈开发,SSR与BFF建设,微前端架构,5年以上前端经验,Next.js,Docker/K8s
summary_english: Node.js Full-stack Development,SSR and BFF Construction,Micro-frontend Architecture,5+ years of frontend experience,Next.js,Docker/K8s
description:
资深前端工程师（Nodejs方向）
职位描述
负责构建高可用、⾼性能的前端技术体系，推动复杂业务场景下的技术架构升级。主导渲染服务调优、微前端架构设计、BFF层建设等核⼼⽅向，提升工程效率与系统稳定性，为业务快速迭代提供可靠的技术保障。
岗位职责
渲染服务调优与容灾
-设计并优化服务端渲染（SSR）架构，实现高性能渲染与动态降级策略，保障⾼并发场景下的
服务可用性。
-构建容灾方案（如多级缓存、兜底数据、流量切换），提升系统的鲁棒性。；
微前端架构设计与实施
-主导同构渲染与微前端技术融合，实现多团队协作下的模块解耦与动态集成。
BFF（Backend for Frontend）层建设
-搭建基于Node.js的BFF中间层，聚合异构后端服务，优化前后端协作模式。
-基于后端基础服务API，抽象并封装面向业务的领域服务层，设计高内聚、低耦合的业务模块
工程质量与自动化
-推动代码规范、自动化测试（单元/集成/E2E）、代码扫描工具链落地，确保工程交付质量。
-设计CI/CD流程优化方案，缩短构建部署时间，实现灰度发布、一键回滚等能力。
可视化搭建服务
-参与低代码/可视化搭建平台建设，构建业务服务标准化接口规范，实现前后端协作解耦，提升业务需求迭代效率。
云组件与版本管理
-搭建组件化开发体系，设计多环境云组件动态版本管理方案。
任职要求：
-学历要求：计算机、软件工程等相关专业本科及以上学历；
技术能力：
-深入理解至少一种主流前端框架（React/Vue/Angular）；
-精通Node.js生态（Express/Koa/NestJS），熟悉高并发、性能调优、内存泄漏排查。
-掌握关系型/非关系型数据库设计原则，能独立完成表结构设计、索引优化及慢查询分析。
-熟悉服务端渲染，有渲染服务系统性建设经验，熟悉Nextjs等主流SSR框架
-熟悉BFF层开发，熟悉RESTful/GraphQL接口设计规范，具备网关层设计经验。
-熟练使用Jenkins、GitLab CI等工具，精通Docker/K8s容器化部署。
-具备复杂系统性能优化经验（如Lighthouse调优、CDN加速、资源加载策略）。
经验要求：
-5年以上前端开发经验，3年以上Node.js中大型项目实战经验；
加分项：
-主导过可视化搭建平台、低代码工具的设计与开发。
-有电商、金融等复杂业务系统开发经验，熟悉分布式事务（Saga/TCC）、最终一致性等解决方案。
-有全栈开发经验，熟悉Java/Go/Python等后端语言。
-熟悉云原生技术（AWS/Aliyun），具备Serverless落地经验。

- 有全栈开发经验，熟悉Java/Go/Python等后端语言。
- 熟悉云原生技术（AWS/Aliyun），具备Serverless落地经验。
description_english:
Senior Frontend Engineer (Node.js Direction)

Job Description
Responsible for building a highly available and high-performance frontend technology system, and promoting the upgrade of the technical architecture in complex business scenarios. Lead core directions such as rendering service optimization, micro-frontend architecture design, and BFF layer construction to improve engineering efficiency and system stability, providing reliable technical support for rapid business iteration.

Responsibilities
Rendering Service Optimization and Disaster Recovery
- Design and optimize the Server-Side Rendering (SSR) architecture to achieve high-performance rendering and dynamic degradation strategies, ensuring service availability in high-concurrency scenarios.
- Build disaster recovery plans (e.g., multi-level caching, fallback data, traffic switching) to enhance system robustness.

Micro-frontend Architecture Design and Implementation
- Lead the integration of isomorphic rendering and micro-frontend technologies to achieve module decoupling and dynamic integration in multi-team collaboration.

BFF (Backend for Frontend) Layer Construction
- Build a BFF middleware layer based on Node.js to aggregate heterogeneous backend services and optimize frontend-backend collaboration models.
- Based on backend fundamental service APIs, abstract and encapsulate a business-oriented domain service layer, designing highly cohesive and loosely coupled business modules.

Engineering Quality and Automation
- Promote the implementation of code standards, automated testing (unit/integration/E2E), and code scanning toolchains to ensure engineering delivery quality.
- Design CI/CD process optimization plans to shorten build and deployment times, enabling capabilities like grayscale release and one-click rollback.

Visual Building Service
- Participate in the construction of low-code/visual building platforms, establish standardized interface specifications for business services, achieve decoupling of frontend-backend collaboration, and improve the iteration efficiency of business requirements.

Cloud Components and Version Management
- Establish a component-based development system and design a dynamic version management solution for cloud components in multiple environments.

Requirements:
- Education Requirement: Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related majors.

Technical Skills:
- In-depth understanding of at least one mainstream frontend framework (React/Vue/Angular).
- Proficient in the Node.js ecosystem (Express/Koa/NestJS), familiar with high concurrency, performance tuning, and memory leak investigation.
- Master the design principles of relational/non-relational databases, able to independently complete table structure design, index optimization, and slow query analysis.
- Familiar with Server-Side Rendering, have systematic construction experience with rendering services, and be familiar with mainstream SSR frameworks like Next.js.
- Familiar with BFF layer development, familiar with RESTful/GraphQL API design specifications, and possess gateway layer design experience.
- Proficient in using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, and proficient in containerized deployment with Docker/K8s.
- Possess experience in complex system performance optimization (e.g., Lighthouse tuning, CDN acceleration, resource loading strategies).

Experience Requirements:
- 5+ years of frontend development experience, 3+ years of practical experience in medium to large-scale Node.js projects.

Bonus Points:
- Led the design and development of visual building platforms or low-code tools.
- Experience in developing complex business systems such as e-commerce or finance, familiar with solutions like distributed transactions (Saga/TCC) and eventual consistency.
- Full-stack development experience, familiar with backend languages such as Java/Go/Python.
- Familiar with cloud-native technologies (AWS/Aliyun), with experience in implementing Serverless.

title: 远程办公 游戏客服
team: 甲骨易（北京）语言科技股份有限公司湖南分公司
summary: 游戏
summary_chinese: 玩家问题解答处理,游戏行业,英语书面交流,长期兼职,月休8天,早中晚班可选
summary_english: Player Issue Resolution,Gaming Industry,English Written Communication,Long-term Part-time,8 Rest Days per Month,Morning/Mid/Night Shifts Available
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：3-4天
工作时间：早班、午班
工作时段：不限
结算方式：月结
招聘截止时间：2025-12-31
岗位职责： 
1、解答&处理游戏玩家相关问题，以英文为主交流； 
2、根据玩家提出的需求，及时反馈和协助处理游戏异常状态； 
3、收集玩家游戏问题及建议，协助研发和运营进行基础调研和数据收集； 
4、监控游戏运行状态，对于游戏及玩家的异常状态具备高敏感度，能快速判断问题严重性及其影响范围。 
任职要求： 
1、英语六级或以上，具备良好的书面读写能力； 
2、逻辑思维良好，并善于总结问题和规律；
3、热爱游戏
福利待遇：
月休8天（不是固定周末休息），入职后签订兼职合同
中班16-24点，120/天，夜班0-8点，170/天，不是轮班，看选什么班次。
甲骨易(北京)翻译股份有限公司(简称"甲骨易",股票代码:870633),是最早被国际认可的成功"走出去"的中国权威语言服务机构之一,是美国翻译协会ATA荣誉会员、中国对外承包工程商会会员。甲骨易深耕影视传媒、国际工程、电力能源、公证认证、金融法律、图书出版等多个业务领域,业务足迹遍及全球30多个国家和地区。经过近二十年的发展,"甲骨易翻译"、"甲骨易译制"、"甲骨易会展"、"甲骨易创新中心心"、"BESTEASY"组成的五大品牌矩阵入人心。自团队初创至2017年在新三板挂牌上市,甲骨易一
直着力打造全球多语服务以及影视译制和海外推广网络,在海内外拥有庞大的客户群。近年来甲骨易译制团队担纲完成了《大黄蜂》、《海王》、《柯南》、《龙猫》、《环太平洋2》、《起跑线》、《小偷家族》、《绿野仙踪》、《印度合伙人》、《绿皮书》等多部脍炙人口的影片翻译和配音任务,获得业界高度认可。更多资讯请关注甲骨易官方网站:http://www.chinabesteasy.com/，我们的未来欢迎您的加入!

任职要求：
