2、逻辑思维良好，并善于总结问题和规律；
3、热爱游戏
福利待遇：
月休8天（不是固定周末休息），入职后签订兼职合同
中班16-24点，120/天，夜班0-8点，170/天，不是轮班，看选什么班次。
甲骨易(北京)翻译股份有限公司(简称"甲骨易",股票代码:870633),是最早被国际认可的成功"走出去"的中国权威语言服务机构之一,是美国翻译协会ATA荣誉会员、中国对外承包工程商会会员。甲骨易深耕影视传媒、国际工程、电力能源、公证认证、金融法律、图书出版等多个业务领域,业务足迹遍及全球30多个国家和地区。经过近二十年的发展,"甲骨易翻译"、"甲骨易译制"、"甲骨易会展"、"甲骨易创新中心心"、"BESTEASY"组成的五大品牌矩阵入人心。自团队初创至2017年在新三板挂牌上市,甲骨易一
直着力打造全球多语服务以及影视译制和海外推广网络,在海内外拥有庞大的客户群。近年来甲骨易译制团队担纲完成了《大黄蜂》、《海王》、《柯南》、《龙猫》、《环太平洋2》、《起跑线》、《小偷家族》、《绿野仙踪》、《印度合伙人》、《绿皮书》等多部脍炙人口的影片翻译和配音任务,获得业界高度认可。更多资讯请关注甲骨易官方网站:http://www.chinabesteasy.com/，我们的未来欢迎您的加入!
description_english:
Work Period: Long-term part-time
Weekly Schedule: 3-4 days
Work Hours: Morning shift, Afternoon shift
Work Time Slots: Not limited
Payment Method: Monthly
Application Deadline: 2025-12-31
Job Responsibilities:
1. Answer & handle game player-related issues, communicating mainly in English;
2. Provide timely feedback and assist in handling abnormal game statuses based on player requests;
3. Collect player game issues and suggestions, and assist R&D and operations with basic research and data collection;
4. Monitor the game's operational status, be highly sensitive to abnormal states of the game and players, and be able to quickly assess the severity and impact of issues.
Job Requirements:
1. CET-6 or above, with good written reading and writing skills;
2. Good logical thinking skills and adept at summarizing problems and patterns;
3. Passionate about games
Benefits:
8 rest days per month (not fixed on weekends), a part-time contract will be signed upon employment
Mid-shift 16:00-24:00, 120/day; Night shift 0:00-8:00, 170/day. These are not rotating shifts; you can choose your shift.
Besteasy (Beijing) Translation Co., Ltd. ("Besteasy", stock code: 870633) is one of the earliest internationally recognized and successful Chinese authoritative language service providers to "go global". It is an honorary member of the American Translators Association (ATA) and a member of the China International Contractors Association. Besteasy has deep expertise in multiple business areas, including film and television media, international engineering, electric power and energy, notarization and certification, financial law, and book publishing, with a business footprint in over 30 countries and regions worldwide. After nearly twenty years of development, the five major brand matrix composed of "Besteasy Translation," "Besteasy Dubbing & Subtitling," "Besteasy MICE," "Besteasy Innovation Center," and "BESTEASY" has become well-established. From its inception to its listing on the NEEQ (New Third Board) in 2017, Besteasy has consistently focused on building a global multilingual service, film and television translation, and overseas promotion network, boasting a large client base both at home and abroad. In recent years, the Besteasy dubbing and subtitling team has undertaken translation and dubbing tasks for many popular films such as "Bumblebee," "Aquaman," "Detective Conan," "My Neighbor Totoro," "Pacific Rim: Uprising," "Hindi Medium," "Shoplifters," "The Wizard of Oz," "Pad Man," and "Green Book," receiving high recognition from the industry. For more information, please visit the official Besteasy website: http://www.chinabesteasy.com/. We welcome you to join our future!

title: SEO-远程办公
team: 四川暗色科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 网站搜索引擎优化,谷歌SEO,SEO数据分析,外链建设,内容策略,1-3年经验
summary_english: Website Search Engine Optimization,Google SEO,SEO Data Analysis,Backlink Building,Content Strategy,1-3 Years of Experience
description:
岗位职责
1. 负责公司网站的搜索引擎优化策略制定与落地，涵盖关键词挖掘、页面优化（标题、描述、内容）建设等核心工作，提升网站在谷歌（重点）等搜索引擎的自然排名。
2. 跟踪分析网站 SEO 数据，包括流量来源、关键词排名、点击率、转化率等，定期输出 SEO 优化报告，并根据数据结果调整优化方案。
3. 开展竞争对手 SEO 策略调研，分析竞品关键词布局、资源、内容结构，提炼可借鉴的优化思路并规避行业常见误区。
4. 协同内容团队产出符合 SEO 规范的优质内容，指导文案人员完成关键词植入、内容排版等工作，确保内容兼具搜索友好性与用户可读性。
5. 维护网站外链资源，拓展高质量友链合作，通过论坛、行业平台、自媒体等渠道搭建合规的外链体系，提升网站域名权重。
6. 关注搜索引擎算法更新动态，及时调整优化策略，规避算法惩罚风险，保障网站自然流量稳定增长。
岗位要求
（一）硬性要求
1. 大专及以上学历，市场营销、电子商务、计算机等相关专业优先，1-3 年 SEO 相关工作经验。
2. 精通百度、谷歌等主流搜索引擎的优化原理和规则，熟练掌握关键词挖掘工具（如 5118、爱站、站长工具）、数据分析工具（如百度统计、Google Analytics）的使用方法。
3. 具备独立完成网站 SEO 诊断、制定优化方案并落地执行的能力，有成功提升网站自然流量和关键词排名的案例。
4. 熟悉 HTML/CSS 基础代码，能够独立完成简单的页面代码优化（如标签调整、nofollow 设置）。
5.具备良好的数据敏感度和分析能力，能够从数据中发现问题并提出针对性的优化建议。
6.有一定文字编辑功底，思维敏捷，创新能力强。
（二）软性要求
1. 工作认真负责，具备较强的执行力和抗压能力，能够高效推进优化项目落地。
2. 具备良好的沟通协作能力，能与内容、技术、运营等团队顺畅配合。
3. 有持续学习的意识和能力，愿意主动关注搜索引擎算法更新和行业最新优化趋势。

description_english:
Responsibilities
1. Responsible for formulating and implementing the company's website SEO strategy, including core tasks such as keyword research, on-page optimization (titles, descriptions, content), and improving the website's natural rankings on search engines like Google (primary focus).
2. Track and analyze website SEO data, including traffic sources, keyword rankings, click-through rates, conversion rates, etc., and regularly produce SEO optimization reports, adjusting strategies based on data results.
3. Conduct research on competitors' SEO strategies, analyzing their keyword layout, resources, and content structure to extract actionable insights and avoid common industry pitfalls.
4. Collaborate with the content team to produce high-quality, SEO-compliant content, guiding copywriters on keyword integration and content formatting to ensure it is both search-friendly and user-readable.
5. Maintain the website's backlink portfolio, develop high-quality link partnerships, and build a compliant backlink system through channels like forums, industry platforms, and social media to enhance domain authority.
6. Monitor search engine algorithm updates, promptly adjust optimization strategies to avoid penalties, and ensure stable growth in organic traffic.
Requirements
(I) Hard Skills
1. Associate degree or higher, preferably in Marketing, E-commerce, Computer Science, or related fields, with 1-3 years of relevant SEO work experience.
2. Proficient in the principles and rules of major search engines like Baidu and Google; skilled in using keyword research tools (e.g., 5118, Aizhan, Webmaster Tools) and data analysis tools (e.g., Baidu Analytics, Google Analytics).
3. Capable of independently conducting website SEO audits, creating optimization plans, and executing them, with a proven track record of successfully improving organic traffic and keyword rankings.
4. Familiar with basic HTML/CSS, able to perform simple on-page code optimizations (such as tag adjustments, nofollow settings).
5. Strong data sensitivity and analytical skills, with the ability to identify problems from data and propose targeted optimization suggestions.
6. Possess some copywriting and editing skills, with agile thinking and strong innovation capabilities.
(II) Soft Skills
1. Conscientious and responsible at work, with strong execution and resilience, able to efficiently drive optimization projects to completion.
2. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, able to work smoothly with content, technical, and operations teams.
3. A mindset and ability for continuous learning, willing to proactively stay updated on search engine algorithm changes and the latest industry optimization trends.

title: 亚马逊运营（可远程办公）
team: 深圳某小型跨国电子商务公司
summary: 店铺运营,亚马逊运营,美国站,精品运营
summary_chinese: 亚马逊店铺运营策略,电商行业,美国站精品运营,新品0到1推广,PPC广告优化,英语读写流利,顾问背景优先
summary_english: Amazon Store Operations Strategy,E-commerce Industry,US Marketplace Boutique Operations,New Product 0-to-1 Launch,PPC Advertising Optimization,Fluent in English Reading & Writing,Consultant Background Preferred
description:
岗位职责
1. 战略咨询
1) 深度诊断客户亚马逊店铺运营现状（侧重美国站），制定针对性优化方案（Listing优化、广告架构、库存规划等）。
2) 为多品类产品线（家居、电子、户外、个护等）提供差异化运营策略，匹配精品运营模式。
2. 新品孵化
1) 主导客户新品从选品验证、上市策划到爆款打造的全程方案设计，具备成功0-1推广案例经验。
2) 制定推广预算、流量获取路径及销售目标拆解模型。
3. 深度优化
1) 指导广告结构升级（SP/SB/SD广告组合）、ACOS优化及关键词反哺策略。
2) 解决合规风险（类目审核、政策预警）、差评治理及品牌保护问题。
4. 数据分析
1) 基于亚马逊后台数据、第三方工具（Helium 10/Jungle Scout等）输出周期性运营健康报告，提出增长杠杆点。
5. 客户赋能
1) 为客户团队提供亚马逊运营培训，包括A9算法机制、广告策略、CPC攻防技巧等实战内容。
2) 输出标准化培训内容、SOP与案例课程，参与内部培训、线上课程、实操指导。
任职要求
1. 5年以上亚马逊美国站运营实战经验，精通精品模式（非铺货），有服务商/顾问背景优先。
2. 具备3个以上跨品类（如消费电子、家居、运动户外）成功运营案例，独立主导过≥3款产品0-1上市并达成月销20万美金+。
3. 英语读写流利（CET-6级或同等能力），可熟练撰写英文Listing、处理客服case等。
4. 精通亚马逊广告系统、PPC优化技巧、BSR排名提升策略及数据化运营模型。

description_english:
Responsibilities
1. Strategic Consulting
1) Conduct in-depth analysis of clients' Amazon store operations (with a focus on the US marketplace) and formulate targeted optimization plans (e.g., Listing optimization, ad structure, inventory planning).
2) Provide differentiated operational strategies for multi-category product lines (e.g., home, electronics, outdoor, personal care) to align with a boutique operations model.
2. New Product Incubation
1) Lead the entire process for clients' new products, from product selection validation and launch planning to creating bestsellers, with proven experience in successful 0-to-1 launch cases.
2) Develop promotion budgets, traffic acquisition paths, and sales target breakdown models.
3. In-depth Optimization
1) Guide the upgrading of advertising structures (SP/SB/SD ad combinations), ACOS optimization, and keyword feedback strategies.
2) Address compliance risks (category approvals, policy warnings), manage negative reviews, and handle brand protection issues.
4. Data Analysis
1) Generate periodic operational health reports based on Amazon backend data and third-party tools (e.g., Helium 10, Jungle Scout), identifying key growth levers.
5. Client Empowerment
1) Provide Amazon operations training for client teams, covering practical topics such as the A9 algorithm, advertising strategies, and CPC offensive/defensive techniques.
2) Produce standardized training materials, SOPs, and case studies; participate in internal training, online courses, and hands-on guidance.
Requirements
1. 5+ years of hands-on experience in Amazon US marketplace operations, proficient in the boutique model (not mass-listing), with an agency/consultant background preferred.
2. Possess at least 3 successful cross-category (e.g., consumer electronics, home, sports & outdoors) operation case studies; have independently led the 0-to-1 launch of ≥3 products, achieving monthly sales of $200k+.
3. Fluent in English reading and writing (CET-6 or equivalent proficiency), capable of skillfully writing English Listings and handling customer service cases.
4. Proficient in the Amazon advertising system, PPC optimization techniques, BSR ranking improvement strategies, and data-driven operational models.

title: 产品经理（KYC）—远程办公
team: 北京某小型互联网金融公司
summary_chinese: KYC产品功能设计,金融科技,熟悉KYC全流程,精通身份认证/OCR,熟悉自动审核与风控,数据分析能力
summary_english: KYC Product Feature Design,FinTech,Familiar with the full KYC process,Proficient in Identity Authentication/OCR,Familiar with Automated Review and Risk Control,Data Analysis Skills
description:
岗位优势：
该岗位采用前沿的远程办公模式，您可以不受城市和交通的困扰，选择心仪的宜居地，脱离一线城市的压力，快乐生活舒适工作，欢迎全国各地优秀人才投递~
岗位职责：
1、主导 KYC 产品的功能设计，优化用户体验，提高 KYC 流程的转化率和准确性
2、建立 KYC 产品的数据指标体系，定期收集和分析产品使用数据，解决转化链路中的痛点
3、关注行业动态和竞争对手的 KYC 产品发展情况，定期收集和分析竞争对手的产品特点、优势和市场策略。
4、研究市场上新兴的 KYC 技术和解决方案，如人工智能身份识别、区块链数据共享等，评估其对公司产品的潜在影响和应用价值
任职要求：
1、本科及以上学历，1年以上KYC经验，熟悉业内KYC全流程，拥有设计KYC秒过的经验
2、精通快速身份认证、OCR 等技术，了解市场上KYC厂商特性和优缺点
3、熟悉自动审核、风控规则，了解KYC 相关法规政策，能准确解读并应用于产品设计
4、具备较强数据分析能力，能运用数据分析方法进行数据挖掘与分析，为产品决策提供支持

1、本科及以上学历，1年以上KYC经验，熟悉业内KYC全流程，拥有设计KYC秒过的经验
2、精通快速身份认证、OCR 等技术，了解市场上KYC厂商特性和优缺点
3、熟悉自动审核、风控规则，了解KYC 相关法规政策，能准确解读并应用于产品设计
4、具备较强数据分析能力，能运用数据分析方法进行数据挖掘与分析，为产品决策提供支持
description_english:
Job Advantages:
This position adopts a cutting-edge remote work model, allowing you to choose your ideal place to live without the constraints of city and traffic, escape the pressures of first-tier cities, and enjoy a happy life with comfortable work. We welcome outstanding talents from all over the country to apply~
Responsibilities:
1. Lead the functional design of KYC products, optimize user experience, and improve the conversion rate and accuracy of the KYC process.
2. Establish a data metric system for KYC products, regularly collect and analyze product usage data, and solve pain points in the conversion funnel.
3. Keep an eye on industry trends and the development of competitors' KYC products, and regularly collect and analyze their product features, advantages, and market strategies.
4. Research emerging KYC technologies and solutions in the market, such as AI-powered identity verification, blockchain data sharing, etc., and evaluate their potential impact and application value for the company's products.
Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above, with over 1 year of KYC experience, familiar with the entire industry KYC process, and experience in designing instant-pass KYC flows.
2. Proficient in technologies such as rapid identity authentication and OCR, with an understanding of the characteristics, strengths, and weaknesses of KYC vendors in the market.
3. Familiar with automated review and risk control rules, knowledgeable about KYC-related laws and policies, and able to accurately interpret and apply them to product design.
4. Strong data analysis skills, able to use data analysis methods for data mining and analysis to support product decisions.

title: 海外电话客服兼职岗位（远程办公）
team: 广州海麦科技有限公司
summary: 远程办公,不含销售的客服工作,跨境电商客服,企业内部客服职位,英语客服,接受居家办公,电商客服
summary_chinese: 英语电话客户服务,跨境电商,英语口语沟通,处理客户投诉,带薪年假,13-14薪,旅游基金
summary_english: English Phone Customer Service,Cross-border E-commerce,English Oral Communication,Handling Customer Complaints,Paid Annual Leave,13-14 Month Salary,Travel Fund
description:
【岗位名称】
海外电话客服兼职岗位（远程办公）
【岗位职责】
一、工作内容
1、接听海外客户来电（英语），进行专业回复或答疑；其他时间段来电的客户进行电话及短信回访；
2、记录客户需求/问题，无法解答的技术型售后问题，引导客户邮件沟通，同时反馈给上级；
3、跟进订单异常情况（如物流延迟、货物破损），协调提供解决方案；
4、处理客户投诉，按标准话术安抚情绪并推动问题闭环；
5、每日汇总高频问题，更新客户咨询至指定系统，确保数据及信息准确性及及时同步；
6、线上/线下定期会议：每月2次月度工作汇报。
二、工作时间与要求
1、‌时段‌：中国时间21:00-23:00、7:00-10:00。
2、‌设备‌：需自备电脑/耳机，稳定网络环境，安静的沟通环境（电话公司提供）。
3、‌技能‌：有良好的英语口语沟通能力，熟悉跨境电商术语，打字速度≥40字/分钟。
【海麦福利】
1、薪酬奖金：有竞争力的薪酬，种类繁多的月度奖金、年度调薪，年终奖金13-14薪；
2、贴心保障：五险一金、婚假、产假、带薪年假；
3、温馨福利：午餐津贴、下午茶、开门红、转正礼、周年礼、生日礼、婚育礼、运动会，节日礼金礼包等；
4、旅游福利：每年每人专属【1000元旅游基金+1天旅游假】，可以自由安排个性化旅程；
5、培训晋升：P线M线晋升、量身定制的个人职业发展计划、在职培训、晋升培训；
6、文化氛围：团队朝气蓬勃，75%为95后，羽毛球活动、提供团建基金。
企业介绍：
海麦科技源于2014年成立的广州白头鹰商贸有限公司，专注于跨境电商领域，总部位于广州荔湾区，在广州、佛山、香港地区均设有子公司。
 
我们目前拥有一支150人+团队，员工75%为95后。公司集自有品牌，产品研发、生产销售于一体，从市场研究、创新研发、产品生产乃至品牌销售全链路自有经营,并通过独立站；Amazon、eBay、AliExpress、Walmart等第三方平台以及线下代理商面向全球消费者提供优质的产品与服务。

我们主要提供两轮机车和四轮越野车用品、汽车用品、运动户外用品以及家居用品。

海麦科技致力于将“中国智造”优质产品与服务带给全球消费者；并期待成为全球消费者和用户最值得信赖的中国品牌；

我们能给您提供：
专业的培训：入职培训、技能晋升、大咖分享、导师带教，拥有完善的晋升机制；
优厚的薪资：午餐补贴、加班餐补、22点后下班打车实报实销、年度有调薪机会，年底13-14薪；
优越的待遇：法定节假日、带薪年假、婚假、产假、陪产假我们通通都有；
丰富的生活：节日礼品&红包、每月下午茶、定期团建一样不落下；
便利的交通：地理位置处于地铁口附近，步行5分钟即到。

我们不仅仅是在招募员工，我们更是在招募志同道合，共同发展的创业合伙人， 只要你能力够，薪资由你来定，别犹豫！加入我们！
欢迎有激情有梦想的您，与我们一起奋斗！

description_english:
【Position Title】
Overseas Phone Customer Service Part-time Position (Remote)
【Job Responsibilities】
I. Job Content
1. Answer incoming calls from overseas customers (in English), providing professional replies or answering questions; conduct phone and SMS follow-ups for customers who call during other time slots.
2. Record customer needs/issues; for technical after-sales problems that cannot be solved, guide customers to communicate via email and report to superiors.
3. Follow up on order abnormalities (such as logistics delays, damaged goods) and coordinate to provide solutions.
4. Handle customer complaints, soothe emotions according to standard scripts, and push for problem resolution.
5. Summarize high-frequency questions daily and update customer inquiries in the designated system to ensure data and information accuracy and timely synchronization.
6. Regular online/offline meetings: 2 monthly work reports per month.
II. Working Hours and Requirements
1. Time Slots: China time 21:00-23:00, 7:00-10:00.
2. Equipment: Must have your own computer/headset, a stable network environment, and a quiet communication environment (phone service provided by the company).
3. Skills: Good oral English communication skills, familiarity with cross-border e-commerce terminology, typing speed ≥40 words/minute.
【Haimai Benefits】
1. Salary and Bonuses: Competitive salary, a wide variety of monthly bonuses, annual salary adjustments, and a 13-14 month year-end bonus.
2. Comprehensive Security: "Five insurances and one housing fund," marriage leave, maternity leave, paid annual leave.
3. Thoughtful Welfare: Lunch allowance, afternoon tea, "opening red envelope," regularization gift, anniversary gift, birthday gift, marriage and childbirth gift, sports events, holiday cash gifts and packages, etc.
4. Travel Benefits: An exclusive [1000 RMB travel fund + 1 day of travel leave] per person per year, allowing for freely arranged personalized trips.
5. Training and Promotion: P-line and M-line promotions, tailor-made personal career development plans, on-the-job training, and promotion training.
6. Cultural Atmosphere: The team is vibrant and energetic, with 75% born after 1995. Badminton activities and team-building funds are provided.
Company Introduction:
Haimai Technology originated from Guangzhou White Eagle Trading Co., Ltd., established in 2014, focusing on the cross-border e-commerce sector. The headquarters is in Liwan District, Guangzhou, with subsidiaries in Guangzhou, Foshan, and Hong Kong.
 
We currently have a team of 150+ people, with 75% of employees born after 1995. The company integrates its own brands, product R&D, and production/sales, operating the entire chain from market research, innovative R&D, and product manufacturing to brand sales. We provide high-quality products and services to global consumers through independent websites, third-party platforms like Amazon, eBay, AliExpress, and Walmart, as well as offline agents.

We mainly offer products for two-wheeled motorcycles and four-wheeled off-road vehicles, automotive supplies, outdoor sports goods, and home goods.

Haimai Technology is committed to bringing high-quality "Intelligently Made in China" products and services to global consumers and aspires to become the most trusted Chinese brand for global consumers and users.

We can offer you:
Professional Training: Onboarding training, skill enhancement, expert sharing, mentorship, and a complete promotion mechanism.
Generous Salary: Lunch subsidies, overtime meal subsidies, taxi fare reimbursement for work ending after 10 PM, annual salary adjustment opportunities, and a 13-14 month year-end salary.
Excellent Benefits: We offer all statutory holidays, paid annual leave, marriage leave, maternity leave, and paternity leave.
Rich Life: Holiday gifts & red envelopes, monthly afternoon tea, and regular team-building activities are all included.
Convenient Transportation: The office is located near a subway station, just a 5-minute walk away.

We are not just recruiting employees; we are recruiting like-minded entrepreneurial partners to grow with us. As long as you have the ability, your salary is up to you. Don't hesitate! Join us!
We welcome you, full of passion and dreams, to strive with us!

title: AI漫剧编导（可远程办公）
team: 广州暖欣网络科技有限公司
summary: 漫剧,导演,AI,编导
summary_chinese: 动态漫剧导演,AIGC,脚本策划,分镜设计,动画制作流程,项目质量把控
summary_english: Motion Comic Directing,AIGC,Script Planning,Storyboard Design,Animation Production Workflow,Project Quality Control
description:
接受异地远程办公
岗位职责：
1、负责动态漫剧的导演工作，从前期构思、脚本策划到镜头设计、成片把控，跟进项目质量审核验收工作；
2、负责AI生成内容的创意策划与脚本改编，设计分镜、动态效果及影调方案，确保画面逻辑与风格一致性；
3、对制作的各环节（如脚本、分镜、原画、动画、后期等）进行全程审核，结合内容创作逻辑与高效制作要求，及时给出专业修改建议与优化方向，确保项目质量；
4、跟踪AIGC行业动态，探索AI工具在动漫创作中的创新应用（如动态漫画、短剧等），提升制作效率与内容质量；
5、协调编剧、技术团队，确保项目高效落地；对最终成片质量负责，符合市场需求与平台传播逻辑；
任职要求：
1、具备一定的导演经验或动态漫画项目经验，熟悉动画制作全流程，有成功的作品案例优先；
2、对AI生成内容有敏锐的审美判断力，能结合市场热点策划创意内容； 
3、具备优先的沟通协调能力，能协调多方资源解决项目问题，推动项目进展； 
4、抗压能力强，适应快节奏创作，持续关注AI技术与动漫行业趋势。

description_english:
Accepts remote work from different locations
Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for directing motion comics, from initial conception and script planning to camera design and final film control, and following up on project quality review and acceptance.
2. Responsible for the creative planning and script adaptation of AI-generated content, designing storyboards, dynamic effects, and color grading plans to ensure consistency in visual logic and style.
3. Conduct full-process reviews of all production stages (such as script, storyboard, key animation, animation, post-production, etc.), providing timely professional modification suggestions and optimization directions based on creative logic and efficient production requirements to ensure project quality.
4. Track AIGC industry trends, explore innovative applications of AI tools in animation creation (such as motion comics, short dramas, etc.) to improve production efficiency and content quality.
5. Coordinate with screenwriters and technical teams to ensure efficient project implementation; responsible for the final film quality, ensuring it meets market demands and platform distribution logic.
Requirements:
1. Possess some directing experience or motion comic project experience, be familiar with the entire animation production workflow; successful work samples are preferred.
2. Have a keen aesthetic judgment for AI-generated content and be able to plan creative content based on market trends.
3. Possess excellent communication and coordination skills, able to coordinate multiple resources to solve project problems and drive project progress.
4. Strong ability to work under pressure, adapt to fast-paced creation, and continuously follow AI technology and animation industry trends.

title: seniorSSC（对接海外团队，国内远程办公）
team: 广州末龙科技有限公司
summary: 考勤管理,劳动关系办理,互联网产品,薪资核算,人事档案管理,海外经验
summary_chinese: 人事共享服务,智能建站,薪酬考勤核算,入转调离流程,HRIS系统,200人数据维护
summary_english: HR Shared Services,Intelligent Website Building,Payroll & Attendance Calculation,Onboarding/Transfer/Offboarding Processes,HRIS Systems,Data Maintenance for 200 Employees
description:
岗位职责：
1.负责所辖站群及项目组员工的入职、转正、异动、离职等人事手续及资料归档；
2.负责考勤、加班、请假数据汇总与核对，确保薪资计算准确；
3.报表整理及人力数据支持，处理基础行政事务与文件流转，维护人事流程图与资料完整性；
4.定期检查系统数据，参与流程优化与标准化建设，支持HRBP与业务部门的沟通协调，确保人事事务及时落地。
任职要求：
1.本科及以上学历，人力资源或管理类专业优先；
2.1年以上人事或共享中心工作经验，熟悉入转调离与薪酬考勤流程；
3.熟练使用Excel、lark/北森/SAP等系统工具；
4.数据敏感度高、细致严谨，具备良好的沟通与时间管理能力，能同时负责约200人数据维护，具备保密意识与责任心。
末龙科技，成立于2024年11月，是一家专注于智能建站解决方案的创新型互联网科技企业，以 “技术赋能商业，智能简化运营” 为核心，凭借在人工智能、及海外服务领域的深耕积累，为全球客户提供智能建站化运营的一站式服务。
目前，在快速发展，现有员工 150 人，业务覆盖广州、上海，深圳、台湾及海外国家；公司现已形成四大业务线协同发展的格局，覆盖业务中台、AI应用落地、海外广告投放及海外内容生态构建等多个领域。

任职要求：
1.本科及以上学历，人力资源或管理类专业优先；
2.1年以上人事或共享中心工作经验，熟悉入转调离与薪酬考勤流程；
3.熟练使用Excel、lark/北森/SAP等系统工具；
4.数据敏感度高、细致严谨，具备良好的沟通与时间管理能力，能同时负责约200人数据维护，具备保密意识与责任心。
末龙科技，成立于2024年11月，是一家专注于智能建站解决方案的创新型互联网科技企业，以 “技术赋能商业，智能简化运营” 为核心，凭借在人工智能、及海外服务领域的深耕积累，为全球客户提供智能建站化运营的一站式服务。
目前，在快速发展，现有员工 150 人，业务覆盖广州、上海，深圳、台湾及海外国家；公司现已形成四大业务线协同发展的格局，覆盖业务中台、AI应用落地、海外广告投放及海外内容生态构建等多个领域。

title: 全栈工程师(remote ai背景 初创)
team: 上海某小型大数据公司
summary: 全栈侧重后端,Python
summary_chinese: AI应用全栈开发,人工智能,大语言模型,React/Vue,Golang/Python,初创公司
summary_english: AI Application Full Stack Development,Artificial Intelligence,Large Language Models,React/Vue,Golang/Python,Startup Company
description:
一）核心技术能力
全栈开发功底：
前端：精通 HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript/TypeScript，熟练掌握至少⼀种主流框架（React/Vue3 优先），具备前端⼯程化（Webpack/Vite、CI/CD）经验。
后端：熟练使⽤至少一种后端语⾔（Golang/Java/Python/Node.js），精通 RESTful API、gRPC 设计与开发，具备分布式系统、微服务架构设计经验。
数据存储：熟练使用 MySQL/PostgreSQL 等关系型数据库，Redis/MongoDB 等 NoSQL 数据库，具备大数据量存储与查询优化能力。
AI 场景技术能力：
具备 AI 相关项目落地经验，熟悉至少一种 AI 技术方向（大语言模型应用、计算机视觉、自然语言处理、推荐系统等）。
了解主流 AI 框架（TensorFlow/PyTorch）、大模型生态（OpenAI API、LangChain、 Llama 系列、文心一言等），能够独立完成 AI 模型的集成、调用与二次开发。
理解 AI 模型部署流程（Docker/K8s 容器化、模型量化、推理加速），具备 AI 服务性能调优经验者优先。
工程化与工具能力：
熟悉 DevOps 流程，掌握 Docker、Kubernetes、Jenkins/GitLab CI 等工具的使用，具备自动化部署与运维经验。
具备良好的代码规范，熟练使用单元测试、集成测试工具（Jest、JUnit、pytest 等），保障代码质量。
（二）软技能与其他要求
3 年以上全栈开发经验，其中至少 1 年 AI 相关产品研发经验（如 AI 对话机器人、智能数据分析工具、AI 生成式产品等）。
具备较强的问题解决能力，能够独立应对全链路技术问题，对 AI 场景下的技术挑战有积极探索态度。
优秀的沟通协作能力，能够跨团队（产品、算法、测试）高效协同，清晰表达技术方案与业务逻辑。
自驱力强，热爱技术创新，关注 AI 与全栈领域的前沿动态，能够快速学习并应用新技术。
本科及以上学历，计算机科学、软件工程、人工智能等相关专业优先；有开源 AI 项目贡献者或个人 AI 相关项目经验者优先。

具备较强的问题解决能力，能够独立应对全链路技术问题，对 AI 场景下的技术挑战有积极探索态度。
优秀的沟通协作能力，能够跨团队（产品、算法、测试）高效协同，清晰表达技术方案与业务逻辑。

本科及以上学历，计算机科学、软件工程、人工智能等相关专业优先；有开源 AI 项目贡献者或个人 AI 相关项目经验者优先。
description_english:
(I) Core Technical Abilities
Full-stack Development Foundation:
Frontend: Proficient in HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript/TypeScript, skilled in at least one mainstream framework (React/Vue3 preferred), with experience in frontend engineering (Webpack/Vite, CI/CD).
Backend: Skilled in at least one backend language (Golang/Java/Python/Node.js), proficient in RESTful API and gRPC design and development, with experience in distributed systems and microservices architecture design.
Data Storage: Skilled in using relational databases like MySQL/PostgreSQL and NoSQL databases like Redis/MongoDB, with the ability to optimize storage and queries for large data volumes.
Technical Abilities in AI Scenarios:
Experience in implementing AI-related projects, familiar with at least one AI technical direction (Large Language Model applications, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, Recommendation Systems, etc.).
Familiar with mainstream AI frameworks (TensorFlow/PyTorch), the large model ecosystem (OpenAI API, LangChain, Llama series, ERNIE Bot, etc.), and able to independently integrate, call, and perform secondary development on AI models.
Understand the AI model deployment process (Docker/K8s containerization, model quantization, inference acceleration), with experience in AI service performance tuning being a plus.
Engineering and Tooling Abilities:
Familiar with DevOps processes, proficient in using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins/GitLab CI, with experience in automated deployment and operations.
Possess good coding standards, skilled in using unit testing and integration testing tools (Jest, JUnit, pytest, etc.) to ensure code quality.
(II) Soft Skills and Other Requirements
Over 3 years of full-stack development experience, with at least 1 year in R&D for AI-related products (such as AI chatbots, intelligent data analysis tools, generative AI products, etc.).
Strong problem-solving skills, able to independently handle end-to-end technical issues, and have a proactive attitude towards exploring technical challenges in AI scenarios.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, able to work efficiently across teams (product, algorithms, testing) and clearly articulate technical solutions and business logic.
Strong self-drive, passionate about technological innovation, keeps up with the latest trends in AI and full-stack fields, and can quickly learn and apply new technologies.
Bachelor's degree or above, with a preference for majors in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, or related fields; contributors to open-source AI projects or those with personal AI-related project experience are preferred.

title: AI全栈——LLM（remote）
team: 某大型计算机软件公司
summary: Golang,Java,Spring/Spring Boot,计算机相关专业,LLM,React,Angular,全栈项目经验,JavaScript,RAG,全栈无侧重,Python,AI Agent
summary_chinese: LLM应用开发,RAG架构设计,AI Agent开发,Python/Node.js,React/Vue,英语交流
summary_english: LLM Application Development,RAG Architecture Design,AI Agent Development,Python/Node.js,React/Vue,English Communication
description:
职位概述
我们正在寻找经验丰富的全栈工程师，加入我们充满活力的技术团队。该职位专注于AI应用开发，特别是LLM相关应⽤的设计和实现。我们提供灵活的⼯作地点选择和具有竞争⼒的国际发展机会。
岗位职责
负责AI应用产品的前端和后端系统设计与开发
参与LLM应用架构设计，包括检索增强⽣成(RAG)系统的实现
设计和开发AI Agent系统，提升用户交互体验
优化系统性能，确保产品的可扩展性和稳定性
指导初级工程师，参与技术决策
必备条件
有知名科技公司工作背景优先
精通前端技术栈（如React、Vue等）和后端开发（如Python、Node.js等）
具备完整的AI应用开发经验，特别是LLM应用落地经验
熟悉检索系统、RAG架构设计和实现
具备独立架构设计能力和问题解决能力
良好的英语交流能力
加分项
活跃的GitHub个人项目
开源项目贡献经验
AI Agent开发经验

description_english:
Overview
We are looking for an experienced Full-Stack Engineer to join our dynamic technical team. This position focuses on AI application development, especially the design and implementation of LLM-related applications. We offer flexible work location options and competitive international development opportunities.
Responsibilities
Responsible for the design and development of frontend and backend systems for AI application products
Participate in LLM application architecture design, including the implementation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems
Design and develop AI Agent systems to enhance user interaction experience
Optimize system performance to ensure product scalability and stability
Mentor junior engineers and participate in technical decision-making
Requirements
Work experience at a well-known tech company is preferred
Proficient in frontend technology stacks (e.g., React, Vue) and backend development (e.g., Python, Node.js)
Possess complete AI application development experience, especially in implementing LLM applications
Familiar with retrieval systems, and the design and implementation of RAG architecture
Possess independent architectural design and problem-solving abilities
Good English communication skills
Plus
Active personal GitHub projects
Experience contributing to open-source projects
Experience in AI Agent development

title: 新媒体文案（Remote）
team: 觉本一乘（广州）文化有限公司
summary: 超高点赞,10w+阅读,网感好,爆文制造机,新媒体文案,接受居家办公
summary_chinese: 旅游内容编辑,小红书,内容创作,探店攻略,基础修图,灵活办公,base广州优先
summary_english: Travel Content Editing,Xiaohongshu,Content Creation,Store Exploration Guides,Basic Photo Editing,Flexible Work Hours,Guangzhou-based Preferred
description:
小红书旅游内容编辑（freelance经验优先）
我们正在寻找一位擅长创作深度旅游攻略、热爱探索与分享的小红书内容编辑！如果你对旅行、探店、生活体验有独特见解，能持续输出高质量内容，欢迎加入我们的灵活协作团队～
岗位职责​
a）内容创作​
- 撰写小红书深度旅游攻略，侧重小众玩法、实用信息、沉浸式体验分享，避免泛泛而谈的流水账。
- 创作探店笔记，需包含店铺环境、特色亮点、真实体验等要素，突出“真实感”与“代入感”。
结合热点或用户需求，策划新颖选题（如“避雷指南”“隐藏玩法”“性价比攻略”等），避免同质化内容。
b）视觉呈现​
- 使用简单工具（如美图秀秀、黄油相机、Canva等）制作小红书封面与配图，确保画面简洁、信息突出。
- 强调图片的真实性与美感，避免过度滤镜，符合平台“生活化”调性。
稳定协作​
- 每月固定输出一定数量的笔记（具体量可协商），需长期稳定，保证内容更新频率。
希望你具备​
c）经验背景​
有小红书旅游/探店类内容创作经验，熟悉平台语言风格（如口语化标题、emoji使用等）。
d）擅长挖掘小众目的地或独特角度，能结合热点（如Citywalk、寺庙旅行等）策划内容。
技能要求​
e）具备基础修图能力，会使用手机软件处理图片、排版图文。
f）具备“网感”，能通过数据（阅读量、互动率等）优化内容策略。
加分项​
- base广州，可偶尔线下交流（非强制，但优先考虑）。
- 有旅游行业相关背景或摄影技能更佳。
福利与支持​
- 远程协作：灵活办公时间，以结果为导向，不坐班
- 稳定合作：按月结算，5-6k/月，另设激励奖金
- 创作支持：可提供选题方向、数据工具辅助及内容反馈，鼓励创意发挥
觉本一乘的主营业务为小红书商家的推广运营与自制视频内容IP的打造，目前有两档中视频节目《PEOPLE人们在干么》、《PEOPLE人们在聊》正在制作运营，其中一档已经上线。除内容制作外，我们还为景区商户做小红书的运营推广，目前已在云南合作多个高质量民宿、餐饮商家。

觉本一乘的主营业务为小红书商家的推广运营与自制视频内容IP的打造，目前有两档中视频节目《PEOPLE人们在干么》、《PEOPLE人们在聊》正在制作运营，其中一档已经上线。除内容制作外，我们还为景区商户做小红书的运营推广，目前已在云南合作多个高质量民宿、餐饮商家。
description_english:
Xiaohongshu Travel Content Editor (freelance experience preferred)
We are looking for a Xiaohongshu content editor who excels at creating in-depth travel guides and loves to explore and share! If you have unique insights into travel, store exploration, and life experiences, and can consistently produce high-quality content, we welcome you to join our flexible collaboration team~
Responsibilities
a) Content Creation
- Write in-depth travel guides for Xiaohongshu, focusing on niche activities, practical information, and immersive experiences, avoiding generic, chronological accounts.
- Create store exploration notes that include elements like the store's environment, special features, and real experiences, emphasizing "authenticity" and an "immersive feel."
- Plan novel topics based on hot trends or user needs (e.g., "Guides to Avoid Pitfalls," "Hidden Gems," "Value-for-Money Guides") to avoid homogenized content.
b) Visual Presentation
- Use simple tools (like Meitu, Butter Camera, Canva, etc.) to create Xiaohongshu covers and accompanying images, ensuring the visuals are clean and the information stands out.
- Emphasize the authenticity and aesthetic appeal of the images, avoiding excessive filters to align with the platform's "lifestyle" tone.
Stable Collaboration
- Produce a fixed number of notes each month (the specific quantity is negotiable), requiring long-term stability to ensure a consistent content update frequency.
We hope you have
c) Experience and Background
- Experience in creating travel/store exploration content on Xiaohongshu, familiar with the platform's linguistic style (e.g., colloquial titles, use of emojis).
d) A knack for discovering niche destinations or unique angles, able to plan content by incorporating hot topics (like Citywalk, temple trips, etc.).
Skills Required
e) Basic photo editing skills, proficient in using mobile apps to process images and lay out graphics and text.
f) A strong sense of what's trending online ("net sense"), able to optimize content strategy based on data (e.g., readership, interaction rates).
Bonus Points
- Based in Guangzhou, available for occasional offline meetings (not mandatory, but preferred).
- A background in the tourism industry or photography skills would be a plus.
Benefits and Support
- Remote Collaboration: Flexible working hours, results-oriented, no fixed office hours.
- Stable Partnership: Monthly payment of 5-6k/month, with additional incentive bonuses.
- Creative Support: We provide topic directions, data tool assistance, and content feedback to encourage creative expression.
Our main business at Jueben Yicheng is managing promotional operations for Xiaohongshu merchants and creating our own video content IPs. We are currently producing two mid-form video series, "PEOPLE Are Doing What" and "PEOPLE Are Talking," one of which is already online. In addition to content production, we also handle Xiaohongshu operational promotions for scenic area businesses and have partnered with several high-quality guesthouses and restaurants in Yunnan.

title: KOL BD （可remote）
team: 火烈鸟网络（广州）股份有限公司
summary_chinese: KOL招募与合作,出海科技,KOL资源丰富,活动策划,英语能力良好,三餐餐补
summary_english: KOL Recruitment & Cooperation,Overseas Tech,Rich KOL Resources,Campaign Planning,Good English Skills,Three Meal Subsidies
description:
岗位职责：
1、识别、招募和加入有影响力的KOL、社区领袖进入我们平台，积累全球的kol资源；
2、根据平台功能、阶段性发展需求及KOL资深属性，设计拉新活动，增强KOL和平台深度绑定；
3、执行并跟进 KOL 营销策略，监测并分析渠道合作效果，持续优化投入产出比；
4、  持续关注行业动态及竞品情况，并制定相应的市场行动方案。
任职要求：
1、2年以上KOL BD经验，有丰富的kol资源；
2、有良好的英语口语、书写能力；
3、自驱力、执行力强，能在快节奏和不确定环境中创造结果。
广州优胜汽车科技有限公司，作为深耕海外市场的创新型高科技企业，以前沿技术驱动多元业务发展，致力于为全球用户提供卓越的数字化解决方案。​
    公司自 2018 年成立以来，精准锚定两大核心业务领域。在汽车诊断领域，依托 AI 云计算智能汽车诊断业务数据中台，我们深度融合大数据产品技术与汽修垂直领域应用，精心打造海外汽修后市场 ToC 汽车诊断产品。凭借先进的技术与丰富的数据积累，为海外车主和汽修从业者提供高效、精准的诊断服务，助力提升汽车维修效率与质量。​
    同时，公司还搭建了海外内容推荐平台，通过智能算法和数据分析，为用户精准推送个性化内容，满足海外用户多样化的信息与娱乐需求，在内容生态领域占据一席之地。​
    未来，优胜科技有限公司将持续创新，深化技术研发，拓展业务版图，以科技赋能行业发展，为全球用户创造更大价值。


【福利待遇】
1、 薪酬激励：绩效奖金、年终奖、年度调薪等；
2、 职业发展：专业序列和管理序列双晋升通道；
3、 餐饮福利：提供三餐餐补；
4、 假期福利：带薪年假、全薪福利病假、特色福利假、以及各类法定婚假、产假等；
5、 住行福利：安居计划、CBD停车补贴及优惠；
6、 活动关怀：年度体检、关怀礼金、各类兴趣协会等。

【公交路线】
①公交站-科韵路棠安路口，可搭乘28路、304路、408路、496路、503路、506路、541路等；
②BRT-学院站，距离700米，步行10分钟/骑行5分钟到达园区；
③地铁-科韵路站（C口）/棠东站（D口），距离1.5-2公里，步行约20分钟/骑行10分钟到达园区。

description_english:
Job Responsibilities:
1. Identify, recruit, and onboard influential KOLs and community leaders to our platform, accumulating global KOL resources.
2. Design user acquisition campaigns based on platform features, phased development needs, and KOL profiles to deepen the bond between KOLs and the platform.
3. Execute and follow up on KOL marketing strategies, monitor and analyze channel cooperation effectiveness, and continuously optimize the return on investment.
4.  Continuously monitor industry dynamics and competitor situations, and formulate corresponding market action plans.

Job Requirements:
1. Over 2 years of experience in KOL BD, with rich KOL resources.
2. Good oral and written English skills.
3. Strong self-drive and execution ability, capable of achieving results in a fast-paced and uncertain environment.

Guangzhou Yousheng Automobile Technology Co., Ltd., as an innovative high-tech enterprise deeply focused on overseas markets, drives diversified business development with cutting-edge technology, committed to providing excellent digital solutions for global users.​
    Since its establishment in 2018, the company has precisely targeted two core business areas. In the automotive diagnostics field, relying on an AI cloud computing intelligent vehicle diagnosis business data mid-end, we deeply integrate big data product technology with vertical applications in the auto repair sector to meticulously create ToC automotive diagnostic products for the overseas auto aftermarket. With advanced technology and rich data accumulation, we provide efficient and accurate diagnostic services for overseas car owners and auto repair practitioners, helping to improve the efficiency and quality of car maintenance.​
    At the same time, the company has also built an overseas content recommendation platform, which uses intelligent algorithms and data analysis to accurately push personalized content to users, meeting the diverse information and entertainment needs of overseas users and securing a place in the content ecosystem.​
    In the future, Yousheng Technology Co., Ltd. will continue to innovate, deepen technological research and development, expand its business footprint, and empower industry development with technology to create greater value for global users.


【Benefits】
1.  Compensation and Incentives: performance bonuses, year-end bonuses, annual salary adjustments, etc.
2.  Career Development: dual promotion channels for both professional and management tracks.
3.  Dining Benefits: provides subsidies for three meals.
4.  Leave Benefits: paid annual leave, full-pay sick leave, special welfare leave, and various statutory leaves such as marriage and maternity leave.
5.  Housing and Commuting Benefits: housing plan, CBD parking subsidies and discounts.
6.  Activities and Care: annual health check-ups, care stipends, various interest clubs, etc.

【Public Transport Routes】
① Bus Stop - Keyun Road Tangan Road Intersection, accessible via routes 28, 304, 408, 496, 503, 506, 541, etc.
② BRT - Xueyuan Station, 700 meters away, a 10-minute walk / 5-minute bike ride to the park.
③ Metro - Keyun Road Station (Exit C) / Tangdong Station (Exit D), 1.5-2 kilometers away, about a 20-minute walk / 10-minute bike ride to the park.

title: java
team: 深圳汇一信息技术有限公司
summary: MVC开发,容器技术,Spring,Framework,GIT,NoSQL,PostgreSQL,MySQL
summary_chinese: 后端应用开发,电商行业,Spring Boot,微服务架构,流利中文沟通,跨时区协作,AWS
summary_english: Backend Application Development,E-commerce Industry,Spring Boot,Microservices Architecture,Fluent Chinese Communication,Cross-timezone Collaboration,AWS
description:
We are seeking an experienced Java Backend Engineer to join our team. As a team member, you will participate in the design, development, and maintenance of our core products, working closely with global teams, particularly the Asia-based team. This role requires solid Java development skills and fluent Chinese communication abilities to ensure seamless collaboration with the Asia team.
Key Responsibilities
- Design, develop, and maintain high-performance Java backend applications and APIs.
- Participate in technical architecture design to ensure system scalability and stability.
- Collaborate closely with the Asia-based development team to coordinate project progress and technical implementation.
- Write high-quality, testable, and maintainable code, and conduct code reviews.
- Identify and resolve complex technical challenges, optimizing system performance.
- Participate in technology selection and the establishment of best practices, driving technological innovation.
- Provide technical guidance and participate in technical decision-making.
Qualifications
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
- 5+ years of Java backend development experience, proficient in Java 8 and above features.
- In-depth understanding of the Spring framework, including Spring Boot, Spring MVC, etc.
- Familiarity with microservices architecture design and implementation.
- Proficient in RESTful API design and development.
- Familiarity with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases.
- Proficient in version control tools (e.g., Git) and CI/CD processes.
- Excellent English communication skills; fluent in spoken and written Chinese.
- Self-driven work ethic and excellent time management skills.
- Prior remote work experience is preferred.
Additional Advantages
- Experience working with Asia-based teams.
- Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
- Knowledge of AWS cloud services.
- Experience in the e-commerce industry.
description_chinese:
我们正在寻找一位经验丰富的Java后端工程师加入我们的团队。作为团队成员，您将参与我们核心产品的设计、开发和维护，并与全球团队，特别是亚洲团队紧密合作。该职位要求扎实的Java开发技能和流利的中文沟通能力，以确保与亚洲团队的无缝协作。
主要职责
- 设计、开发和维护高性能的Java后端应用程序和API。
- 参与技术架构设计，确保系统的可扩展性和稳定性。
- 与亚洲开发团队紧密合作，协调项目进度和技术实现。
- 编写高质量、可测试、可维护的代码，并进行代码审查。
- 识别并解决复杂的技术挑战，优化系统性能。
- 参与技术选型和最佳实践的建立，推动技术创新。
- 提供技术指导并参与技术决策。
任职资格
- 计算机科学、软件工程或相关领域的学士学位（或同等经验）。
- 5年以上Java后端开发经验，精通Java 8及以上版本特性。
- 深入理解Spring框架，包括Spring Boot、Spring MVC等。
- 熟悉微服务架构设计与实现。
- 精通RESTful API的设计与开发。
- 熟悉关系型数据库（如MySQL、PostgreSQL）和NoSQL数据库。
- 熟练使用版本控制工具（如Git）和CI/CD流程。
- 优秀的英语沟通能力；流利的中文口语和书面表达能力。
- 自我驱动的工作精神和出色的时间管理能力。
- 有远程工作经验者优先。
额外优势
- 有与亚洲团队合作的经验。
- 熟悉容器化技术（如Docker、Kubernetes）。
- 了解AWS云服务。
- 有电商行业经验。

title: Deskside Support Engineer
team: 西安蓝快人工智能科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 软硬件问题解决,L2技术支持,Windows/macOS排错,Active Directory,IT资产管理
summary_english: Hardware & Software Troubleshooting,L2 Technical Support,Windows/macOS Troubleshooting,Active Directory,IT Asset Management
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：无要求
工作时间：不限
工作时段：不限
结算方式：日结
招聘截止时间：2026-02-02
Job Summary
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Level 2 Deskside Technician to join our IT Support
Services team. The Level 2 Deskside Technician will provide advanced technical support to
end-users, resolving complex hardware and software issues, and assisting with IT projects
and initiatives. This role requires strong technical expertise, excellent problem-solving
abilities, and a commitment to delivering exceptional customer service.
Key Responsibilities
• Advanced Technical Support: Provide second-level technical support to end-users
for more complex hardware, software, and peripheral issues. Resolve escalated
support tickets in a timely and efficient manner.
• Troubleshooting: Diagnose and troubleshoot advanced hardware, software,
network, and system issues. Perform root cause analysis and implement long-term
solutions to prevent recurrence.
• Installation and Configuration: Assist with the installation, configuration, and
maintenance of desktops, laptops, printers, and other IT equipment. Ensure devices
are set up according to company standards and user requirements.
• User Assistance: Provide in-depth guidance and assistance to end-users on ITrelated issues, including software usage, system navigation, and advanced
troubleshooting steps. Educate users on best practices and security protocols.
• Asset Management: Maintain accurate records of IT assets, including hardware
inventory, software licenses, and equipment assignments. Assist with asset
tracking, deployment, and decommissioning.
• Documentation: Create and maintain documentation for IT support processes,
procedures, and troubleshooting guides. Ensure knowledge base articles are up-todate and accessible to users.
• Escalation: Escalate unresolved issues to higher-level support teams or vendors as
necessary. Follow up on escalated tickets to ensure timely resolution.
• Preventative Maintenance: Perform routine maintenance tasks, such as software
updates, system backups, and hardware inspections, to ensure the reliability and
performance of IT equipment.
• Collaboration: Work closely with IT support teams, network administrators, and
other stakeholders to address and resolve technical issues. Participate in team
meetings and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.
• Customer Service: Deliver exceptional customer service by maintaining a
professional and friendly demeanor. Ensure user satisfaction through effective
communication and prompt resolution of issues.
• Project Support: Assist with IT projects and initiatives, including hardware and
software upgrades, system migrations, and new technology implementations.
Qualifications
• Education: Associate’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a
related field is preferred. Relevant certifications (e.g., CompTIA A+, Microsoft
Certified Professional, CompTIA Network+) are advantageous.
• Experience: 3-5 years of experience in IT support, helpdesk, or deskside technician
roles. Proven experience resolving complex technical issues and supporting
advanced IT environments.
• Technical Skills: Proficiency in troubleshooting hardware and software issues on
Windows and macOS platforms. Strong knowledge of networking principles,
printers, and peripheral devices. Experience with Active Directory, group policies,
and remote support tools.
• Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to
explain technical concepts to non-technical users clearly and concisely.
• Problem-solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to diagnose
issues, identify root causes, and implement effective solutions.
• Customer Focus: Commitment to delivering high-quality customer service. Ability
to handle user inquiries and complaints with patience and professionalism.
• Organizational Skills: Strong organizational and time management skills. Ability to
prioritize tasks and manage multiple support requests simultaneously.
• Adaptability: Ability to adapt to new technologies, processes, and procedures
quickly. Willingness to continuously learn and improve technical skills
description_chinese:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：无要求
工作时间：不限
工作时段：不限
结算方式：日结
招聘截止时间：2026-02-02
职位概述
我们正在寻找一位技术娴熟、经验丰富的二级桌面技术员加入我们的IT支持服务团队。二级桌面技术员将为终端用户提供高级技术支持，解决复杂的硬件和软件问题，并协助IT项目和计划。该职位要求具备强大的技术专长、出色的问题解决能力以及提供卓越客户服务的承诺。
主要职责
• 高级技术支持：为终端用户提供二级技术支持，解决更复杂的硬件、软件和外围设备问题。及时高效地解决上报的支持工单。
• 故障排查：诊断并排除高级硬件、软件、网络和系统问题。进行根本原因分析并实施长期解决方案以防止问题再次发生。
• 安装与配置：协助安装、配置和维护台式机、笔记本电脑、打印机及其他IT设备。确保设备按照公司标准和用户要求进行设置。
• 用户协助：就IT相关问题向终端用户提供深入指导和帮助，包括软件使用、系统导航和高级故障排查步骤。对用户进行最佳实践和安全协议的培训。
• 资产管理：维护IT资产的准确记录，包括硬件库存、软件许可证和设备分配。协助进行资产跟踪、部署和退役。
• 文档记录：创建并维护IT支持流程、程序和故障排查指南的文档。确保知识库文章保持最新并可供用户访问。
• 问题升级：在必要时将未解决的问题上报给更高级别的支持团队或供应商。跟进已上报的工单，确保及时解决。
• 预防性维护：执行日常维护任务，如软件更新、系统备份和硬件检查，以确保IT设备的可靠性和性能。
• 协作：与IT支持团队、网络管理员和其他利益相关者密切合作，解决技术问题。参加团队会议，为持续改进计划做出贡献。
• 客户服务：通过保持专业友好的态度提供卓越的客户服务。通过有效沟通和及时解决问题确保用户满意度。
• 项目支持：协助IT项目和计划，包括硬件和软件升级、系统迁移和新技术实施。
资格要求
• 教育背景：信息技术、计算机科学或相关领域的副学士学位者优先。拥有相关认证（如CompTIA A+、微软认证专家、CompTIA Network+）者优先。
• 工作经验：3-5年IT支持、帮助台或桌面技术员岗位经验。拥有解决复杂技术问题和支持高级IT环境的成熟经验。
• 技术技能：熟练排查Windows和macOS平台上的硬件和软件问题。对网络原理、打印机和外围设备有深入了解。具备Active Directory、组策略和远程支持工具的使用经验。
• 沟通能力：出色的口头和书面沟通能力。能够清晰简洁地向非技术用户解释技术概念。
• 问题解决能力：强大的分析和问题解决能力。能够诊断问题、识别根本原因并实施有效解决方案。
• 客户导向：致力于提供高质量的客户服务。能够耐心、专业地处理用户咨询和投诉。
• 组织能力：强大的组织和时间管理能力。能够确定任务优先级并同时管理多个支持请求。
• 适应能力：能够快速适应新技术、新流程和新程序。愿意持续学习和提升技术技能。
description_english:
Work Period: Long-term part-time
Weekly Workload: No requirement
Work Hours: Unlimited
Work Time Slots: Unlimited
Payment Method: Daily settlement
Application Deadline: 2026-02-02
Job Summary
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Level 2 Deskside Technician to join our IT Support Services team. The Level 2 Deskside Technician will provide advanced technical support to end-users, resolving complex hardware and software issues, and assisting with IT projects and initiatives. This role requires strong technical expertise, excellent problem-solving abilities, and a commitment to delivering exceptional customer service.
Key Responsibilities
• Advanced Technical Support: Provide second-level technical support to end-users for more complex hardware, software, and peripheral issues. Resolve escalated support tickets in a timely and efficient manner.
• Troubleshooting: Diagnose and troubleshoot advanced hardware, software, network, and system issues. Perform root cause analysis and implement long-term solutions to prevent recurrence.
• Installation and Configuration: Assist with the installation, configuration, and maintenance of desktops, laptops, printers, and other IT equipment. Ensure devices are set up according to company standards and user requirements.
• User Assistance: Provide in-depth guidance and assistance to end-users on IT-related issues, including software usage, system navigation, and advanced troubleshooting steps. Educate users on best practices and security protocols.
• Asset Management: Maintain accurate records of IT assets, including hardware inventory, software licenses, and equipment assignments. Assist with asset tracking, deployment, and decommissioning.
• Documentation: Create and maintain documentation for IT support processes, procedures, and troubleshooting guides. Ensure knowledge base articles are up-to-date and accessible to users.
• Escalation: Escalate unresolved issues to higher-level support teams or vendors as necessary. Follow up on escalated tickets to ensure timely resolution.
• Preventative Maintenance: Perform routine maintenance tasks, such as software updates, system backups, and hardware inspections, to ensure the reliability and performance of IT equipment.
• Collaboration: Work closely with IT support teams, network administrators, and other stakeholders to address and resolve technical issues. Participate in team meetings and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.
• Customer Service: Deliver exceptional customer service by maintaining a professional and friendly demeanor. Ensure user satisfaction through effective communication and prompt resolution of issues.
• Project Support: Assist with IT projects and initiatives, including hardware and software upgrades, system migrations, and new technology implementations.
Qualifications
• Education: An Associate’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field is preferred. Relevant certifications (e.g., CompTIA A+, Microsoft Certified Professional, CompTIA Network+) are advantageous.
• Experience: 3-5 years of experience in IT support, helpdesk, or deskside technician roles. Proven experience resolving complex technical issues and supporting advanced IT environments.
• Technical Skills: Proficiency in troubleshooting hardware and software issues on Windows and macOS platforms. Strong knowledge of networking principles, printers, and peripheral devices. Experience with Active Directory, group policies, and remote support tools.
• Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical users clearly and concisely.
• Problem-solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to diagnose issues, identify root causes, and implement effective solutions.
• Customer Focus: Commitment to delivering high-quality customer service. Ability to handle user inquiries and complaints with patience and professionalism.
• Organizational Skills: Strong organizational and time management skills. Ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple support requests simultaneously.
• Adaptability: Ability to adapt to new technologies, processes, and procedures quickly. Willingness to continuously learn and improve technical skills.

title: 网络工程师（外资正编）
team: 某大型银行公司
summary_chinese: 全球网络管理,金融行业,SDWAN,WAN/LAN,网络安全,外企,CCNP/CCIE
summary_english: Global Network Management,Financial Industry,SDWAN,WAN/LAN,Network Security,Foreign Enterprise,CCNP/CCIE
description:
Principal responsibilities
1.	Connectivity Services, Network Endpoint Connectivity (NEC) domain manages Global networks which includes 
2.	Branch and Campus wired and wireless networks.
3.	Domestic Network Connectivity, including remote ATMs.
4.	Global Access Network (International MPLS backbone), including overlay SD-WAN.
Knowledge & Experience / Qualifications:
1.	Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field.
2.	15+ years of hands-on enterprise networking experience, with 3–5 years in a senior leadership/people management role.
3.	Background in financial services or regulated industries with an emphasis on low-latency, high-availability, and compliance-aware environments.
4.	Demonstrated success in managing large-scale infrastructure projects, network transformations, and hybrid environments.
5.	Strong organizational, communication, and negotiation skills with executive presence.
6.	Network technologies including SDWAN, WAN/LAN, Wi-FI, Firewall, Load balancer, Cloud, Automation (CI/CD) experience with Infrastructure as Code tools such as Terraform and Ansible.
7.	Good to have Network Security – Firewall, IDS/IPS, DDoS, Proxy, etc
8.	Network Tools like Monitoring (Links & devices), Device & Performance management, etc
9.	Should be well versed with Agile and DevOps.
10.	Worked in an infrastructure critical environment and understands how technology adds value to the business and ultimately the end customer.
11.	Industry standard certifications in the technology area of work would be preferred (CCNP/CCIE).
12.	Agile Journey Experience with managing Sprint (Scrum/Kanban).
13.	Having any of the following certifications is a plus.
14.	CCNP, CCIE, AWS Networking Specialty, SDWAN.
description_chinese:
主要职责
1.	连接服务，网络端点连接 (NEC) 领域管理全球网络，其中包括
2.	分支机构和园区的有线和无线网络。
3.	国内网络连接，包括远程ATM。
4.	全球接入网络（国际 MPLS 骨干网），包括覆盖型 SD-WAN。
知识与经验/资格要求：
1.	计算机科学或相关领域的学士学位。
2.	15年以上企业网络实践经验，其中3-5年担任高级领导/人事管理职位。
3.	拥有金融服务或受监管行业的背景，重点关注低延迟、高可用性和合规性环境。
4.	在管理大型基础设施项目、网络转型和混合环境方面有成功的经验。
5.	优秀的组织、沟通、谈判能力和高管风范。
6.	网络技术经验，包括 SDWAN、WAN/LAN、Wi-Fi、防火墙、负载均衡器、云、自动化 (CI/CD)，以及使用 Terraform 和 Ansible 等基础设施即代码 (Infrastructure as Code) 工具的经验。
7.	具备网络安全知识者优先 – 防火墙、IDS/IPS、DDoS、代理等。
8.	熟悉网络工具，如监控（链路和设备）、设备与性能管理等。
9.	应精通 Agile 和 DevOps。
10.	曾在基础设施关键环境中工作，理解技术如何为业务及最终客户增值。
11.	拥有工作技术领域的行业标准认证者优先 (CCNP/CCIE)。
12.	拥有管理 Sprint (Scrum/Kanban) 的敏捷开发经验。
13.	拥有以下任何认证者优先。
14.	CCNP、CCIE、AWS Networking Specialty、SDWAN。

title: Project Leader  项目主管
team: 珀科贸易（上海）有限公司
summary: 供应商开发,产品导入,项目管理,成本分析
summary_chinese: 产品开发与供应链管理,家居建材行业,工厂开发与采购,质量控制体系,机械工程背景,外企
summary_english: Product Development & Supply Chain Management,Home Furnishing & Building Materials Industry,Factory Development & Sourcing,Quality Control Systems,Mechanical Engineering Background,Foreign Enterprise
description:
Working way: remote work + business trip
Key Responsibilities 
•	Source and develop oversea and domestic factories for Peak’s new products, and source better quality or better pricing for existing products. 
•	Work closely with Peak in Canada and factories in the development of new and existing products, driving project launching and following output to achieve good targets.
•	Responsible for continuous product and process improvement by simplifying product design, production process, and achieving cost efficiency. 
•	Develop and implement quality control systems in Peak’s partnership factories including all technical documents, engineering drawings, QC programs, standards, etc. 
•	Oversee the test protocols, implementation of test programs and analysis of the testing results. 
•	Conduct social, environmental, and quality compliance audits and training at Peak’s partnership factories. 
•	Conduct business communications and negotiations with factories for Peak’s new and existing product lines. 
•	Perform any other duties as may be assigned from time to time by Peak’s management. 
Qualifications: 
•	Bachelor’s degree and major in mechanical engineering is an asset; knowledge in reading engineering drawings is required. 
•	Demonstrates ability to prioritize, organize, set and meet deadlines, provide status updates, and deliver high-quality results based on the needs each project. Successfully manages time, cost, scope, risk, and quality to achieve desired outcomes. 
•	Solid knowledge and experience in development and implementation of quality control system in factories, preparing technical documents, engineering drawings, QC programs, standards…etc. 
•	Ability to use rigorous logic and methods to address issues and provide solutions creatively, efficiently and successfully. 
•	Proven ability in managing vendor relationships and applying business best practices. 
•	Demonstrate solid experience in sourcing and developing new vendor relationships related to hardware products and managing deliverables of existing vendors. 
•	Able to build strong collaboration within and across teams, functions, and stakeholders to support continuous process, product, and service improvement. 
•	Strong verbal and written communication skills, in both Chinese and English.  
•	Ability to handle tough conversation, building relationships and handling disagreement. 
•	Willing to travel oversea and domestically for business.
比克加拿大公司成立于1998年，珀科贸易（上海）作为加拿大比克集团的全资子公司，成立于2021年。比克集团总部设在加拿大温哥华。公司的宗旨是通过不同层次和背景的人才组合,使用高效的管理,开发顶尖级的产品、创新型的产品和有知识含量的产品,从而满足市场的需求。
比克集团拥有自主的创新能力和知识产权，拥有国际水准的工程师和设计师团队,不断向市场推出新型产品。全球最大的家居销售公司 - 美国的HOME DEPOT已经作为比克集团最大的客户,其销售的产品中有很多来自于比克集团。凭借出色的业绩，比克集团先后被HOME DEPOT 加拿大公司12次评为最佳合作伙伴。并于2020年获得最具创新力殊荣。
比克是加拿大和北美成长最快的提供房屋改善和建筑行业相关产品的公司之一，比克集团由比克制造、比克研发和覆盖整个加拿大的仓库及销售办事处组成。产品范围包括但不限于甲板和栅栏、花园用品、五金和屋顶产品、栏杆和栅栏，铝制品和钢制品等。作为家得宝最大的合作伙伴之一，我们持续创新、开发设计独特和高品质且易安装的家居产品，为客户提供系统解决方案。
description_chinese:
工作方式：远程办公 + 出差
主要职责
•	为Peak的新产品寻找和开发海内外工厂，并为现有产品寻找质量更好或价格更优的供应商。
•	与加拿大Peak团队和工厂紧密合作，推动新产品和现有产品的开发，跟进项目启动和产出，以实现良好目标。
•	负责通过简化产品设计、生产流程和实现成本效益，持续改进产品和流程。
•	在Peak的合作工厂中开发和实施质量控制体系，包括所有技术文件、工程图纸、质检程序、标准等。
•	监督测试协议、测试程序的实施以及测试结果的分析。
•	在Peak的合作工厂进行社会、环境和质量合规性审计及培训。
•	为Peak的新产品和现有产品线与工厂进行商务沟通和谈判。
•	完成Peak管理层随时可能分配的任何其他职责。
任职资格：
•	拥有机械工程学士学位者优先；需要具备阅读工程图纸的知识。
•	具备根据各项目需求，优先排序、组织、设定并达成截止日期、提供状态更新以及交付高质量成果的能力。成功管理时间、成本、范围、风险和质量以实现预期结果。
•	在工厂质量控制体系的开发与实施方面拥有扎实的知识和经验，包括准备技术文件、工程图纸、质检程序、标准等。
•	能够运用严谨的逻辑和方法，创造性地、高效地、成功地解决问题并提供解决方案。
•	具备管理供应商关系和应用商业最佳实践的成熟能力。
•	在寻找和开发与硬件产品相关的新供应商关系以及管理现有供应商的交付成果方面，展现出扎实的经验。
•	能够在团队内部及跨团队、跨职能和利益相关者之间建立强有力的合作，以支持持续的流程、产品和服务改进。
•	具备优秀的中英文口头和书面沟通能力。
•	能够处理棘手的对话、建立关系和处理分歧。
•	愿意因公在海内外岀差。
比克加拿大公司成立于1998年，珀科贸易（上海）作为加拿大比克集团的全资子公司，成立于2021年。比克集团总部设在加拿大温哥华。公司的宗旨是通过不同层次和背景的人才组合,使用高效的管理,开发顶尖级的产品、创新型的产品和有知识含量的产品,从而满足市场的需求。
比克集团拥有自主的创新能力和知识产权，拥有国际水准的工程师和设计师团队,不断向市场推出新型产品。全球最大的家居销售公司 - 美国的HOME DEPOT已经作为比克集团最大的客户,其销售的产品中有很多来自于比克集团。凭借出色的业绩，比克集团先后被HOME DEPOT 加拿大公司12次评为最佳合作伙伴。并于2020年获得最具创新力殊荣。
比克是加拿大和北美成长最快的提供房屋改善和建筑行业相关产品的公司之一，比克集团由比克制造、比克研发和覆盖整个加拿大的仓库及销售办事处组成。产品范围包括但不限于甲板和栅栏、花园用品、五金和屋顶产品、栏杆和栅栏，铝制品和钢制品等。作为家得宝最大的合作伙伴之一，我们持续创新、开发设计独特和高品质且易安装的家居产品，为客户提供系统解决方案。

Peak Canada was founded in 1998, and Peak Trading (Shanghai), as a wholly-owned subsidiary of Peak Group Canada, was established in 2021. The headquarters of Peak Group is located in Vancouver, Canada. The company's mission is to meet market demands by combining talent from different levels and backgrounds, using efficient management to develop top-tier, innovative, and knowledge-intensive products.
Peak Group has its own innovation capabilities and intellectual property, with an international team of engineers and designers, constantly launching new products to the market. The world's largest home improvement retailer - The Home Depot in the US - is the largest customer of Peak Group, and many of the products it sells come from Peak Group. Thanks to its outstanding performance, Peak Group has been named Best Partner by The Home Depot Canada 12 times and received the Most Innovative award in 2020.
Peak is one of the fastest-growing companies in Canada and North America that provides products for the home improvement and construction industry. Peak Group consists of Peak Manufacturing, Peak R&D, and warehouses and sales offices covering all of Canada. The product range includes but is not limited to decks and fences, garden supplies, hardware and roofing products, railings and fences, aluminum and steel products, etc. As one of The Home Depot's largest partners, we continuously innovate, develop unique, high-quality, and easy-to-install home products to provide customers with system solutions.

title: Native Talents for Multiple Languages
team: 山东译道翻译有限公司
summary_chinese: 笔译与本地化,翻译服务,审校与质量把控,母语或近母语水平,熟悉CAT工具,灵活合作
summary_english: Translation and Localization,Translation Services,Proofreading and Quality Control,Native or near-native proficiency,Familiar with CAT tools,Flexible Collaboration
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：无要求
工作时间：不限
工作时段：不限
结算方式：完工结
招聘截止时间：2030-12-12
Native Talents for Multiple Languages
岗位名称：多语种母语涉外人才（翻译方向）
Position: Native Translator
岗位：母语译员（多语种）
Company / 公司： YDS Translation（译道翻译YDS）
Location / 工作地点： 
Remote（远程）
Job Type / 岗位类型：
 Full-time / Part-time / Project-based
全职 / 兼职 / 项目制
Position Overview
岗位简介
中文：
译道翻译YDS正在招募多语种母语涉外人才，主要从事笔译、本地化、审校及相关语言服务工作。我们长期服务国际客户，项目类型稳定，语种覆盖广，支持远程与灵活合作方式，适合希望参与国际项目、具备专业语言能力的优秀人才。
English:
YDS Translation is seeking native language talents for multilingual translation and localization projects. This role involves translation, proofreading, and language quality assurance for international clients. We offer flexible and remote collaboration opportunities and welcome professionals who are passionate about language services and global communication.
Responsibilities
岗位职责
中文：
根据项目要求完成笔译、本地化及语言相关工作
对译文进行审校与质量把控，确保准确性与专业性
保证语言表达符合目标市场的文化与使用习惯
按项目要求按时交付，并与项目管理团队保持沟通
English:
Translate and localize content according to project requirements
Proofread and review translations to ensure accuracy and consistency
Ensure linguistic and cultural appropriateness for target audiences
Communicate with project managers and deliver tasks on time
Requirements
任职要求
中文：
目标语为母语，或具备接近母语水平
具备翻译、语言服务或相关领域经验
熟悉 CAT 工具或翻译流程者优先
责任心强，沟通顺畅，时间管理能力良好
可长期合作或稳定参与项目者优先
English:
Native speaker or near-native proficiency in the target language
Experience in translation or language-related fields preferred
Familiarity with CAT tools or localization workflows is a plus
Strong sense of responsibility, communication, and time management
Availability for long-term or recurring collaboration is preferred
Language Coverage

YDS Translation is seeking native language talents for multilingual translation and localization projects. title: Overseas  Sales
team: 河北如泰贸易有限公司
summary: 汽车
summary_chinese: 开拓海外市场,汽车出口,社交媒体运营,多语言沟通,弹性工作
summary_english: Overseas Market Development,Automobile Export,Social Media Operations,Multilingual Communication,Flexible Work
description:
about our company
we specialize in China car export to all over the world,right now we have two major markets are Middle-east and Middle Asia,and  we want exposing our new Market in Africa and south America.we are a company invested by 58.com which company is well-known in China.
Key Responsibilities:
1.Visit and cooperate with foreign buyer trading companies in port cities.
2.Create social media account IPs for the port and shoot videos. 
3.Collect vehicle information in port cities and assess market trends. 
4. Convert into orders.
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or related fields.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, multicultural team.
Fluency in English or Arabic or Russian，and I hope you can speak Chinese in common communicate cause most of our colleagues can't speak any foreign language even English. language skills (e.g., Spanish, French,) are a plus.
What We Offer:
Opportunities for professional growth in a global, innovative environment.
Flexible work arrangements (remote/hybrid).
Exposure to diverse markets and cutting-edge digital strategies.
公司介绍：河北如泰贸易有限公司于2011年成立，是天津58白菜二手车有限公司的下属公司，办公地址位于滏东北大街208号，公司面积9000平米。公司成立十余年，整体发展稳健。主营豪华进口汽车、二手车、钢材、超市、即时零售等项目。企业倡导家庭文化、部队文化、校园文化，为您提供一个学习成长的平台！公司期待您的加入，共赢个人与公司的发展 !

公司背书：白菜二手车是58集团的内部孵化的创业项目，核心管理团队也均来自58集团，项目已获得B轮融资，融资。总金额超过3亿元，投资方包含真格基金、 Ribbit 、 58 同城、58数科等。
公司经营状况良好，由58同城执行董事长丛林牵头带资入股，未来计划打造中国领先的
一体化二手车交易服务网络
description_chinese:
关于我们公司
我们专注于向世界各地出口中国汽车，目前我们的两大主要市场是中东和中亚，同时我们希望开拓非洲和南美的新市场。我们是一家由中国知名公司58.com投资的公司。

主要职责：
1.拜访港口城市的外国买家贸易公司并与之合作。
2.为港口创建社交媒体账号IP并拍摄视频。
3.收集港口城市的车辆信息并评估市场趋势。
4.将潜在客户转化为订单。

任职资格：
市场营销、传播、数字媒体或相关领域的学士学位。
优秀的沟通能力，能够在快节奏、多文化团队中工作。
流利掌握英语、阿拉伯语或俄语，并希望您能用中文进行日常交流，因为我们大多数同事不会说任何外语，包括英语。其他语言技能（如西班牙语、法语）是加分项。

我们提供：
在全球化的创新环境中获得专业成长的机会。
灵活的工作安排（远程/混合）。
接触多元化市场和前沿数字战略的机会。

公司介绍：河北如泰贸易有限公司于2011年成立，是天津58白菜二手车有限公司的下属公司，办公地址位于滏东北大街208号，公司面积9000平米。公司成立十余年，整体发展稳健。主营豪华进口汽车、二手车、钢材、超市、即时零售等项目。企业倡导家庭文化、部队文化、校园文化，为您提供一个学习成长的平台！公司期待您的加入，共赢个人与公司的发展 !

公司背书：白菜二手车是58集团的内部孵化的创业项目，核心管理团队也均来自58集团，项目已获得B轮融资。总金额超过3亿元，投资方包含真格基金、 Ribbit 、 58 同城、58数科等。
公司经营状况良好，由58同城执行董事长丛林牵头带资入股，未来计划打造中国领先的
一体化二手车交易服务网络
description_english:
About our company
We specialize in exporting Chinese cars to all over the world. Currently, our two major markets are the Middle East and Central Asia, and we hope to develop new markets in Africa and South America. We are a company invested by 58.com, a well-known company in China.

Key Responsibilities:
1.Visit and cooperate with foreign buyer trading companies in port cities.
2.Create social media account IPs for the port and shoot videos.
3.Collect vehicle information in port cities and assess market trends.
4.Convert into orders.

Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or related fields.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, multicultural team.
Fluency in English, Arabic, or Russian is required, and we hope you can use Chinese for daily communication as most of our colleagues do not speak any foreign languages, including English. Other language skills (e.g., Spanish, French,) are a plus.

What We Offer:
Opportunities for professional growth in a global, innovative environment.
Flexible work arrangements (remote/hybrid).
Exposure to diverse markets and cutting-edge digital strategies.

Company Introduction: Hebei Rutai Trading Co., Ltd. was established in 2011 and is a subsidiary of Tianjin 58 Baicai Used Car Co., Ltd. The office is located at No. 208 Fudong North Street, covering an area of 9000 square meters. The company has been established for more than ten years and has shown steady overall development. Its main businesses include luxury imported cars, used cars, steel, supermarkets, and instant retail projects. The company advocates a culture of family, military, and campus, providing you with a platform for learning and growth! The company looks forward to your joining to achieve a win-win development for both you and the company!

Company Backing: Baicai Used Car is an internal incubation startup project of the 58 Group, and its core management team also comes from the 58 Group. The project has received Series B financing. The total amount exceeds 300 million yuan, with investors including ZhenFund, Ribbit, 58.com, 58 Digital, etc.
The company is in good operating condition, with an investment led by Cong Lin, Executive Chairman of 58.com. The future plan is to build China's leading
integrated used car trading service network

title: 全栈工程师
team: 广州佩美网络科技有限责任公司

summary_chinese: 后端AI开发,人工智能,AI Agents & RAG,OpenAI API,全栈开发,股权激励,可兼职
summary_english: Backend AI Development,Artificial Intelligence,AI Agents & RAG,OpenAI API,Full-Stack Development,Stock Options,Part-time Available
description:
人工智能机器人项目，可帮解决香港高才身份问题。
有股权激励架构，欢迎来撩。
接受兼职，remote.
熟练结合 cursor 编程，提高效率。
职位描述： 
1.主要参与智能硬件产品的后端AI部分开发 
2.工作范围涉及公司基础架构、跨端应用、全栈开发、数据可视化、AI Agents 、RAG、AI 模型部署等多个方向 
3.关注 AI 和机器人前沿技术发展，能够将新知识传递给团队，并且转化到潜在项目中
职位要求： 
1.计算机、电子信息、物联网、机器人等相关专业优先
2.计算机基础扎实，了解 JavaScript 、typescript 、nextjs,nodejs 等技术 了解 Python 、mysql 、Linux 等后端技术 
3.具备较强快速自我学习能力，计算机基础扎实，实际需要的技能都可以学习
以下必须：具备 ChatGPT 和 GitHub Copilot 等人工智能辅助编程经验，以及 OpenAI API 的使用经验；
以下非必须：
加分项： 1.熟悉嵌入式应用，有过树莓派，jetson 开发经验优先 2.熟悉电子产品的生产制造流程，具备熟练的焊接和调试能力优先 3.有人机交互，语音交互相关工作项目经验优先 4.熟悉音频信号处理技术(音频降噪，回声消除，自动增益等)优先
广州佩美网络科技有限责任公司，公司成立10年，一直从事 互联网产品的相关运作，
佩美科技的主要团队成员来自互联网、电商、科技行业，平均拥有10年以上的工作资历，拥有扎实的工作经验和广泛的社会资源，是一个充满朝气的、欣欣向荣的团队。
佩美科技是中国电子商务诚信企业、中国互联网诚信示范单位，是中国电子商务协会会员，电子商务协会会员，佩美科技通过持续创新，创造全球最佳客户体验和最优成本效率，赢得了客户的信任，佩美科技将始终坚持“以信赖为基础、以客户为中心的价值创造”这一经营理念，在不同的消费场景和连接终端上，通过强大的供应链、数据、技术、以及营销能力，打造行业闭环商业形态和体系。
description_chinese:
我们是一个人工智能机器人项目，可以协助解决香港高才身份问题。
我们提供股权激励架构，欢迎与我们联系。
此职位接受兼职和远程工作（remote）。
我们鼓励熟练结合 cursor 等AI编程工具以提高效率。

**职位描述：**
1. 主要参与智能硬件产品的后端AI部分开发。
2. 工作范围涉及公司基础架构、跨端应用、全栈开发、数据可视化、AI Agents、RAG、AI模型部署等多个方向。
3. 关注AI和机器人前沿技术发展，能够将新知识传递给团队，并将其转化到潜在项目中。

**职位要求：**
1. 计算机、电子信息、物联网、机器人等相关专业优先。
2. 计算机基础扎实，了解 JavaScript、TypeScript、Next.js、Node.js 等技术，以及 Python、MySQL、Linux 等后端技术。
3. 具备较强的快速自我学习能力，计算机基础扎实，实际工作所需的技能都可以通过学习掌握。

**必备条件：**
*   具备使用 ChatGPT、GitHub Copilot 等人工智能辅助编程工具的经验。
*   具备 OpenAI API 的使用经验。

**加分项（非必须）：**
1. 熟悉嵌入式应用，有树莓派（Raspberry Pi）、Jetson 开发经验者优先。
2. 熟悉电子产品的生产制造流程，具备熟练的焊接和调试能力者优先。
3. 有人机交互（HCI）、语音交互相关项目经验者优先。
4. 熟悉音频信号处理技术（如音频降噪、回声消除、自动增益等）者优先。

**关于公司：**
广州佩美网络科技有限责任公司成立10年，一直从事互联网产品的相关运作。我们的主要团队成员来自互联网、电商和科技行业，平均拥有10年以上的工作资历，拥有扎实的工作经验和广泛的社会资源。我们是一个充满朝气、欣欣向荣的团队。佩美科技是中国电子商务诚信企业、中国互联网诚信示范单位，也是中国电子商务协会的会员。我们通过持续创新，创造全球最佳客户体验和最优成本效率，赢得了客户的信任。我们将始终坚持“以信赖为基础、以客户为中心的价值创造”这一经营理念，在不同的消费场景和连接终端上，通过强大的供应链、数据、技术以及营销能力，打造行业闭环的商业形态和体系。
description_english:
We are an AI robotics project and can assist with the Hong Kong Top Talent Pass Scheme application.
We offer a stock option structure and welcome you to get in touch.
This position accepts part-time and remote work.
We encourage proficiency in using AI programming tools like Cursor to improve efficiency.

**Job Description:**
1. Primarily participate in the development of the backend AI part of smart hardware products.
2. The scope of work covers multiple areas including company infrastructure, cross-platform applications, full-stack development, data visualization, AI Agents, RAG, and AI model deployment.
3. Stay updated on the latest developments in AI and robotics technology, share new knowledge with the team, and apply it to potential projects.

**Job Requirements:**
1. A degree in Computer Science, Electronic Information, Internet of Things, Robotics, or a related field is preferred.
2. Solid computer science fundamentals, with knowledge of technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js, Node.js, as well as backend technologies like Python, MySQL, and Linux.
3. Strong and fast self-learning ability, solid computer science fundamentals, and the capacity to learn any skills required for the job.

**Mandatory Requirements:**
*   Experience with AI-assisted programming tools such as ChatGPT and GitHub Copilot.
*   Experience using the OpenAI API.

**Bonus Points (Not Required):**
1. Familiarity with embedded applications, with experience in Raspberry Pi or Jetson development is a plus.
2. Familiarity with the manufacturing process of electronic products, with proficient soldering and debugging skills is a plus.
3. Project experience in Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) or voice interaction is a plus.
4. Familiarity with audio signal processing technologies (e.g., noise reduction, echo cancellation, automatic gain control) is a plus.

**About the Company:**
Guangzhou Peimei Network Technology Co., Ltd., established 10 years ago, has been engaged in the operation of internet products. Our main team members come from the internet, e-commerce, and technology industries, with an average of over 10 years of professional experience, solid work expertise, and extensive social resources. We are a vibrant and thriving team. Peimei Technology is a certified "China E-commerce Integrity Enterprise," a "China Internet Integrity Demonstration Unit," and a member of the China E-commerce Association. Through continuous innovation, we create the best global customer experiences and optimal cost efficiency, earning the trust of our clients. We will always adhere to the business philosophy of "creating value based on trust and centered on the customer," building a closed-loop business model and system across different consumption scenarios and connection terminals through our strong supply chain, data, technology, and marketing capabilities.

· 扎实的计算机科学基础知识，熟悉操作系统，了解常见数据结构和算法；
· 为人踏实, 善良正直, 热爱学习技术, 关注技术的发展趋势。良好的沟通能力和表达能力、团队协作精神和执行力;
· 优秀的英文听说读写水平，可与外籍员工正常沟通;
· 熟悉或了解区块链相关技术优先。

· 熟悉SQL和NoSQL数据库，如MySQL、mongodb等，具有数据库设计和优化经验；

· 为人踏实, 善良正直, 热爱学习技术, 关注技术的发展趋势。良好的沟通能力和表达能力、团队协作精神和执行力;
· 优秀的英文听说读写水平，可与外籍员工正常沟通;
· 熟悉或了解区块链相关技术优先。

title: 前端开发-远程办公-不卷
team: 某大型已上市互联网公司
summary: React
summary_chinese: 产品前端开发与优化,React/Vue/Angular,TypeScript,前端工程化,响应式Web/PWA开发,不卷文化
summary_english: Product Frontend Development & Optimization,React/Vue/Angular,TypeScript,Frontend Engineering,Responsive Web/PWA Development,No-Overwork Culture
description:
前端开发-远程办公-不卷
专业领域排名全球前10
岗位职责：
1: 持续优化产品的用户体验与性能，确保产品在多设备、多浏览器的稳定性和一致性；
2:负责产品功能的前端开发与实现，配合后端完成接口联调，推动跨团队协作落地；
3: 参与前端组件库开发，维护技术文档，推动代码的规范化和模块化；
4:参与其它基础工具建设，如⼯具链、性能监控等，提升团队效率；
岗位要求：
1:学历要求：计算机、软件⼯程等相关专业本科及以上学历；
2:技术能⼒：
- 熟练掌握 HTML5、CSS3、JavaScript（ES6+），并有扎实的计算机基础；
- 深入理解至少⼀种主流前端框架（#React/#Vue/#Angular），并能独立开发复杂应用；
- 熟悉前端性能优化方法，具备跨浏览器和跨设备开发经验；
- 熟悉 Webpack、Vite 等构建工具，具备工程化能力；
- 对 #TypeScript 有深度应用经验；
- 熟悉响应式web应用、PWA应用开发
- 具备 Node.js 开发能力优先，了解服务端渲染（SSR）；
3:经验要求：
- 3年及以上前端开发经验，熟悉复杂业务系统设计；
- 具备较强的问题分析和解决能力，能够独立排查并解决问题；
- 有主导或参与大中型项目技术方案制定和实施的经验优先；
4:软实力要求：
- 关注用户体验和产品细节，对交付质量有较高要求；
- 良好的沟通和协作能力，能够高效推进与后端、产品及其他团队的合作；
5:加分项：
- 有组件库设计和开发经验；
- 参与过开源项目或拥有高质量技术博客；
- 对用户体验设计有深刻理解并具备落地能力；
- 熟悉微前端架构或 Server Side Rendering (SSR)；
- 了解业内前沿技术（如Micro Frontends、Codeless、FaaS等）
- 具备Nodejs开发经验；

title: 高级Java开发-法币（远程办公）
team: 某知名企业
summary: Java,团队管理经验,MySQL,Spring,接受居家办公,区块链经验
summary_chinese: 法币系统架构设计,金融支付,资金链路安全,高并发清算,分布式系统,Spring Boot
summary_english: Fiat System Architecture Design,Financial Payment,Funding Link Security,High-Concurrency Settlement,Distributed Systems,Spring Boot
description:
岗位职责：
1、独立完成业务模块的需求分析、方案设计、开发及后续维护；
2、主导法币业务系统架构设计，重点把控资金链路安全（数据对账/防资损机制）、三方协议对接（银行/支付机构接口规范）、高并发清算体系等核心模块；
3、负责法币业务服务的日常维护，保障功能稳定性，通过弹性设计、高可用架构等方式不断迭代优化提升系统的稳定性及性能；
4、关注并带领组内人员完成每个季度制定的OKR任务、把控需求优先级，及时沉淀并持续完善技术文档，
任职要求：
1、本科及以上学历，7年以上Java开发经验，3年以上金融支付/资管平台等资金敏感型系统架构经验；
2、精通资金类业务技术方案设计，至少主导过1个完整资金链路系统（涵盖协议对接、对账引擎、异常冲正机制）
3、熟练掌握Java，具有良好的Java IO、多线程、网络等方面的编程能力；熟悉Spring Boot；
4、熟悉MySQL；熟悉Redis、MQ等中间件的使用、特性、及高可用方案；熟悉大型分布式、微服务系统架构；
5、熟悉Linux系统，熟悉JVM机制，熟悉CPU、网络、磁盘等硬件特性；
6、有较强的学习能力和较强的问题定位、分析能力；具备良好的抗压能力，责任心强。

title: Java开发工程师（远程办公）
team: 广西卯时网络科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 后端微服务开发,SpringBoot,SpringCloud,分布式系统,Redis/Kafka/MQ
summary_english: Backend Microservices Development,SpringBoot,SpringCloud,Distributed Systems,Redis/Kafka/MQ
description:
岗位职责：
1、参与产品需求分析，根据项目负责人的需求，完成项目研发工作，保障产品交付质量
2、参与产品设计与评审，能够为产品的优化和改进提供意见;
3、负责项⽬核⼼模块代码编写，解决研发过程中的关键问题和技术难点，确保研发软件的安全、质量和性能;
4、参与⽅案的讨论和技术调研、负责方案升级、更新，协助完成项目的测试、系统交付⼯作和后期维护工作。
任职资格:
1、本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业，2年以上Java开发工作经验；
2、精通Java及Web应用的开发、精通主流的Java开发框架：如Spring，SpringMVC，Mybatis，SpringBoot，SpringCloud等。有Java微服务框架开发经验加分项；
3、熟悉Java语言，理解IO、多线程、集合等基础框架，了解JVM原理；
4、熟悉分布式系统的设计和应用，熟悉分布式、缓存、消息等机制；
5、熟悉并能熟练运用Redis、Kafka、ES、MQ等开源组件；
6、具有高度的责任心与自驱力，良好的沟通协作、应急响应与处理问题的能力。

title: 全栈开发工程师（香港）（远程办公）
team: 聚贤万佳企业管理（深圳）有限公司
summary: CSS,MVC framework,Vue,HTML,全栈无侧重,Node.js,前端技术开发,React,英语读写能力良好,SQL
summary_chinese: 网站与移动端开发,数字营销,Node.js,SQL,Headless Integration,中英文读写,五险一金
summary_english: Website and Mobile Development,Digital Marketing,Node.js,SQL,Headless Integration,Bilingual Chinese & English,Five Social Insurances and One Housing Fund
description:
职位信息：
工作性质: 全职
工作地点：远程办公（签约时需到深圳办公室办理）
工作时间：香港时间 10：00AM-7：00PM（周末双休）
职位描述：
1.负责公司⽹站及移动端⽹站的分析、开发、测试、漏洞修复与部署上线；
2.确保⽹站在多种主流浏览器中的兼容性与用户体验；
3.与项目团队及IT团队紧密协作，理解并实现在线项⽬的业务需求；
4.跟踪并研究网站与移动开发领域的最新技术与趋势；
5.设计、开发并维护各类在线应用程序与系统功能。
任职要求：
1.年龄22-30岁，计算机科学、计算机工程或相关专业本科及以上学历；
2.具备1-2年数字领域开发经验；
3.熟悉MVC Framework；
4.必须熟悉SQL、NodeJs开发；
5.熟悉前端技术开发，例如Headless Integration、SEO实践；
6.精通Go、Python、React.js、Vue.js者优先考虑；
7.有数字营销咨询/代理机构背景者优先；
8.必须具备中英文读写能力，会说粤语者优先考虑；
9.积极主动，有团队精神，富有创造力，对最新技术充满热情。
我们提供：
工作模式：全程远程办公，无需通勤，为您节省宝贵时间。
社会保障：按大陆假期放假，年假8天，缴纳五险一金。
/是一家位於香港的以使命為驅動的創意數位代理商及顧問公司，專注於數位創新、轉型和體驗。我們的團隊由顧問、設計師、內容專家、數據分析師和開發人員組成，致力於打造能夠引起共鳴的成功品牌體驗。
万佳集团创立于2012年，总部位于香港荃湾One Midtown。历经超过十年的拼搏与发展，已为香港超过1,000家企业提供了在香港税务筹划、公司审计、人力招聘及移民身份规划等领域的专业优质服务。

旗下拥有五个主要子公司：万佳企业服务有限公司、聚贤会计师有限公司、万佳人力资源服务有限公司、万佳人才有限公司和聚贤万佳企业管理（深圳）有限公司。

植根香港，放眼世界，紧贴中港两地。

如今我们已为多家中国内地企业在香港IPO上市过程中提供PRE -IPO的财税解决方案、帮助多家中国内地企业在香港成立公司，在会计报税、商业秘书、企业融资、商标注册等领域提供全方位的一站式专业顾问服务。

title: 前端开发工程师（web3远程办公）
team: 某大型互联网金融公司

description:

1.负责金融产品的​​技术架构设计、开发与性能优化​​
2.持续提升页面​​响应速度​​，并确保程序在不同环境下的​​兼容性与运行效率​​
3.与产品经理协同进行​​⽤户体验研究、交互及界⾯设计的改进​​
5.保障Web前端系统的​​稳定性、安全性与⽤户体验​​
​​任职要求​​：
（需要英语可作为工作语言）
1.具备扎实的​​Web技术栈基础​​，熟悉HTML/CSS/JavaScript/ES6/TypeScript/Node.js
2.具备深厚的​​编程功底、算法与计算机基础​​，拥有良好的​​代码风格与最佳实践意识​​
3.具备​​丰富的MV架构实战经验​，熟悉Flux单数据流架构及React框架
4.深⼊理解​​常用Web应用框架​​，如Ant Design、Umi.js等
5.熟悉至少一种​​CSS预编译工具​​（如Sass、Less）及前端​​响应式布局​​
6.精通​​Webpack、Babel、ESLint等工具的配置​​，了解其底层运行机制
7.精通​​HTTP协议​​，熟悉Web安全防护措施（如Cookie管理、XSS、CSRF等）。
（加分项）具备​​Git、CI/CD​​实践经验
（加分项）有​​iOS或Android原生开发经验​​
description_chinese:
岗位职责：
1.负责金融产品的技术架构设计、开发与性能优化
2.持续提升页面响应速度，并确保程序在不同环境下的兼容性与运行效率
3.与产品经理协同进行用户体验研究、交互及界面设计的改进
5.保障Web前端系统的稳定性、安全性与用户体验

任职要求：
（需要英语可作为工作语言）
1.具备扎实的Web技术栈基础，熟悉HTML/CSS/JavaScript/ES6/TypeScript/Node.js
2.具备深厚的编程功底、算法与计算机基础，拥有良好的代码风格与最佳实践意识
3.具备丰富的MV*架构实战经验，熟悉Flux单数据流架构及React框架
4.深入理解常用Web应用框架，如Ant Design、Umi.js等
5.熟悉至少一种CSS预编译工具（如Sass、Less）及前端响应式布局
6.精通Webpack、Babel、ESLint等工具的配置，了解其底层运行机制
7.精通HTTP协议，熟悉Web安全防护措施（如Cookie管理、XSS、CSRF等）。
（加分项）具备Git、CI/CD实践经验
（加分项）有iOS或Android原生开发经验
description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for the technical architecture design, development, and performance optimization of financial products.
2. Continuously improve page response speed and ensure program compatibility and operational efficiency across different environments.
3. Collaborate with product managers on user experience research, interaction, and interface design improvements.
5. Ensure the stability, security, and user experience of the Web frontend system.

Requirements:
(English proficiency required as a working language)
1. Solid foundation in the Web technology stack, familiar with HTML/CSS/JavaScript/ES6/TypeScript/Node.js.
2. Strong programming skills, algorithm and computer science fundamentals, with a good sense of code style and best practices.
3. Extensive practical experience with MV* architecture, familiar with Flux unidirectional data flow architecture and the React framework.
4. In-depth understanding of common Web application frameworks, such as Ant Design, Umi.js, etc.
5. Familiar with at least one CSS pre-compilation tool (e.g., Sass, Less) and frontend responsive layout.
6. Proficient in configuring tools like Webpack, Babel, ESLint, and understanding their underlying mechanisms.
7. Proficient in the HTTP protocol, familiar with Web security measures (e.g., Cookie management, XSS, CSRF, etc.).
(Bonus) Practical experience with Git, CI/CD.
(Bonus) Experience in native iOS or Android development.

title: Java开发工程师-支付（可远程办公）
team: 北京瑞升德胜信息咨询服务有限公司
summary: Java,SpringCloud,MySQL,Spring
summary_chinese: 支付系统开发,支付行业,Java/Golang,Spring Boot/Cloud,高并发微服务,风控/对账/清结算
summary_english: Payment System Development,Payments Industry,Java/Golang,Spring Boot/Cloud,High Concurrency Microservices,Risk Control/Reconciliation/Settlement
description:
职位描述：
负责支付相关系统需求分析、系统设计和安全性设计，承担核心功能代码编写，开发与维护系统核心模块
负责系统性能优化，技术难题攻关，持续提升系统在大规模分布式系统环境下稳定性
解决各类潜在系统技术风险，保证系统的安全、稳定、快速运⾏
积极了解⽀付领域业界发展、研究相关新技术及趋势，促进技术进步和创新
职位要求：
计算机相关专业统招本科及以上学历，5年以上Java开发经验（能⼒优秀者不限）
2年以上支付相关方⾯开发经验，有支付/风控/对账/清结算项目经验
熟练掌握使用Java/Golang常用框架和工具，如 Spring Boot/Cloud、Mybatis等
熟练掌握MySQL/PostgreSQL、Redis、Kafka、Elasticsearch等开源分布式组件
有核心、大规模、高并发微服务架构的开发、服务治理、服务监控等方面经验
对技术充满热情且具有钻研精神，对新技术以及行业动向保持敏感性；具有极强的执行力，高度的责任感、很强的学习、沟通能力
