description_english:
Job Description:
Responsible for the requirements analysis, system design, and security design of payment-related systems; responsible for writing core functional code, and developing and maintaining core system modules
Responsible for system performance optimization, tackling technical challenges, and continuously improving system stability in a large-scale distributed environment
Resolve various potential technical risks to ensure the system's security, stability, and fast operation
Actively keep up with industry developments in the payments domain, research new technologies and trends, and promote technological progress and innovation
Job Requirements:
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or a related field, with 5+ years of Java development experience (exceptions can be made for outstanding candidates)
2+ years of development experience in payment-related fields, with project experience in payments, risk control, reconciliation, or clearing and settlement
Proficient in using common Java/Golang frameworks and tools, such as Spring Boot/Cloud, Mybatis, etc.
Proficient in open-source distributed components such as MySQL/PostgreSQL, Redis, Kafka, Elasticsearch, etc.
Experience in developing, governing, and monitoring core, large-scale, high-concurrency microservice architectures
Passionate about technology with a spirit of in-depth research; sensitive to new technologies and industry trends; possess strong execution, a high sense of responsibility, and excellent learning and communication skills

title: 高级/资深前端开发工程师（远程办公）
title_chinese: 高级/资深前端开发工程师
team: 麦索科技（深圳）有限公司
summary: 技术博客/开源项目有所贡献,DevTools,UI开发,Chrome,接受居家办公,React,计算机/软件工程相关专业
summary_chinese: React应用与图表开发,金融科技,React+TypeScript,数据可视化,WebSocket,区块链
summary_english: React Application & Chart Development,FinTech,React+TypeScript,Data Visualization,WebSocket,Blockchain
description:
主要职责
使用React和TypeScript设计、开发并维护高性能的React应用程序
利用TradingView和D3.js实现复杂的图表和数据可视化
设计并实现实时数据交互解决⽅案，使⽤WebSocket技术处理实时数据流
优化应⽤的性能，确保交易执行的速度和数据的实时更新
编写可测试的高质量代码，并进⾏代码审查以保证开发标准
在前端项目中实施最佳实践，提高代码质量和团队协作效率
密切关注最新前端技术趋势，引入创新技术以保持平台的竞争力
职位要求
职位要求
本科及以上学历，2-5 年 Web 前端开发经验。
具备React, Typescript开发经验，熟练掌握 React 生态核心技术，具备扎实的 HTML、CSS、JavaScript 基础。
拥有独立开发公共组件的实战经验，熟悉组件化开发模式和设计原则，能够从功能、性能、可维护性等多方面考虑组件设计；有开源组件库开发或维护经验者优先。
对 UI 设计有较高的敏感度和审美能力，具备优秀的 UI 还原能力，能够准确理解设计意图；熟练使用 Chrome DevTools 等调试工具，快速定位和解决页面样式、交互等问题。
具备良好的沟通能力和团队协作精神，能够高效参与团队项目开发；有较强的学习能力和问题解决能力，能快速适应新技术和新需求；对前端技术充满热情，有较强的责任心和自我驱动力。
加分项：
有数据可视化开发经验；
有bsc链的优先；
英语能力佳，具备英文技术文档阅读及沟通能力，有雅思7分或托福90+成绩者优先。
我们是一家在金融科技领域全球领先的创新型企业，专注于去中心化金融与智能算法的研发和应用。核心团队由经验丰富的金融科技专家和技术精英组成，在数字资产管理、量化模型构建及金融工程领域拥有超过五年的技术和经验沉淀。

公司依托自主研发的智能合约系统与交易架构，为全世界专业机构客户提供安全可靠的数字金融解决方案。现已形成包含底层协议、高并发应用、智能风控体系在内的完整技术研发和积累。公司目前产品、用户和营收都很稳定，各项数据呈稳健增长。顶级行业资源，拿过多家Tier 1美元基金投资，正处于业务和生产力的快速扩张阶段，因此在寻找更多有意于去中心化金融的同学加入。

我们希望候选人能够拥有对前沿技术和具体应用有长期的热情、较强自驱力和对新事物的自学能力。我们相信我们能够为员工提供广阔的发展空间和丰富的学习机会。

公司依托自主研发的智能合约系统与交易架构，为全世界专业机构客户提供安全可靠的数字金融解决方案。现已形成包含底层协议、高并发应用、智能风控体系在内的完整技术研发和积累。公司目前产品、用户和营收都很稳定，各项数据呈稳健增长。顶级行业资源，拿过多家Tier 1美元基金投资，正处于业务和生产力的快速扩张阶段，因此在寻找更多有意于去中心化金融的同学加入。

description_english:
Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain high-performance React applications using React and TypeScript
Implement complex charts and data visualizations using TradingView and D3.js
Design and implement real-time data interaction solutions, using WebSocket technology to handle real-time data streams
Optimize application performance to ensure the speed of transaction execution and real-time data updates
Write high-quality, testable code and conduct code reviews to ensure development standards
Implement best practices in front-end projects to improve code quality and team collaboration efficiency
Closely follow the latest front-end technology trends and introduce innovative technologies to maintain the platform's competitiveness

Job Requirements
Bachelor's degree or above, with 2-5 years of experience in Web frontend development.
Experience with React and Typescript development, proficient in the core technologies of the React ecosystem, with a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Practical experience in independently developing common components, familiar with component-based development models and design principles, able to consider component design from multiple aspects such as functionality, performance, and maintainability; experience in developing or maintaining open-source component libraries is a plus.
High sensitivity and aesthetic sense for UI design, with excellent ability to replicate UIs and accurately understand design intentions; proficient in using debugging tools like Chrome DevTools to quickly locate and solve page styling, interaction, and other issues.
Good communication skills and team spirit, able to efficiently participate in team project development; strong learning and problem-solving abilities, able to quickly adapt to new technologies and requirements; passionate about front-end technology, with a strong sense of responsibility and self-drive.

Bonus Points:
Experience in data visualization development;
Experience with the BSC chain is a plus;
Excellent English skills, capable of reading and communicating with technical documents in English; candidates with IELTS scores of 7 or TOEFL scores of 90+ are preferred.

We are a globally leading innovative enterprise in the FinTech sector, specializing in the research, development, and application of decentralized finance and intelligent algorithms. Our core team consists of experienced FinTech experts and technology elites with over five years of accumulated technology and experience in digital asset management, quantitative model construction, and financial engineering.

Leveraging our independently developed smart contract systems and trading architecture, the company provides secure and reliable digital financial solutions to professional institutional clients worldwide. We have established a complete technology R&D and accumulation system, including underlying protocols, high-concurrency applications, and intelligent risk control systems. The company's products, user base, and revenue are currently stable, with all data showing steady growth. With top-tier industry resources and investments from multiple Tier 1 US dollar funds, we are in a phase of rapid business and productivity expansion, and are therefore looking for more individuals interested in decentralized finance to join us.

We hope candidates will have a long-term passion for cutting-edge technologies and their practical applications, strong self-motivation, and the ability to self-learn new things. We believe we can offer our employees broad development space and rich learning opportunities.

title: 【全职远程办公】IT技术支持与自动化专员
title_chinese: IT技术支持与自动化专员
title_english: IT Technical Support and Automation Specialist
team: 深圳市思活禾木信息咨询有限公司
summary: 企业内部IT技术支持,IT技术支持经验,ERP/OA/CRM支持经验,计算机/通信相关专业,英文可沟通,IT资产管理
summary_chinese: 业务流程自动化,法律科技,SaaS系统管理,Zapier/Make/n8n,外企,英语沟通,网站运维
summary_english: Business Process Automation,Legal Tech,SaaS System Management,Zapier/Make/n8n,Foreign Enterprise,English Communication,Website Maintenance
description:
我们是一家总部位于澳洲悉尼的移民律师事务所。现招聘一名专业的内部技术专员 (In-house Tech Specialist)，负责公司内部 SaaS 系统的维护与管理，并通过自动化技术优化业务流程。
本岗位为 100% 远程办公 模式，我们寻求具备高度⾃律性与具备英语沟通能⼒的技术⼈才加入我们的国际化团队。
岗位职责
 
SaaS 系统管理与配置：
负责公司核心 SaaS 软体的帐号管理、权限控制及功能配置，包括但不限于：Xero, HubSpot, Actionstep, MS Admin, Hubdoc 等。
深⼊参与 HubSpot, Notion 等 CRM和内部系统的搭建、优化与日常使用支持，确保数据准确与流程顺畅。
业务流程自动化：
利用 Zapier, Make.com, n8m 等工具设计并实施跨平台自动化工作流，实现数据在不同系统间的自动流转（例如：自动将 HubSpot 合约同步发送至 PandaDoc）。
负责特定场景的集成开发，例如实现 Zoom 会议录音/录像自动同步归档至 HubSpot。
IT 基础设施与技术支持：
作为内部技术支持的第一响应人，及时解决团队遇到的软硬体及网络问题（如 Zoom 连接问题、权限故障等）。
负责 SharePoint 平台的搭建与结构优化，使其适配公司的文件管理与协作需求。
网站运维与支持：
负责公司官网的内容更新、日常维护及故障排查。
配合营销需求进行技术支持，如 SEO 代码的插入与部署、网站性能优化等。
 
任职要求
 
语言能力：
英语沟通能力良好（雅思 6.0 分或同等水平及以上）。由于需与海外非中文母语的同事及合作方协作，候选人须具良好的英语沟通能力。
专业背景：
计算机科学、信息管理或相关专业本科及以上学历。
拥有 1-3 年以上系统管理员 (System Admin)、IT 技术支持或网页开发者工作经验。
技术技能：
熟悉 SaaS 软件生态，具备 API, Webhook 基础概念，能独立查阅技术文档解决接口问题。
熟练掌握至少一种自动化工具（n8n, Zapier, Make.com）并有实际操作经验。
有网站维护与运营经验，具备基础的 HTML/CSS 理解能力。
职业素养：
高度自律与结果导向：适应远程工作模式，能够自我驱动，按时保质完成任务。
优秀的沟通与汇报习惯：能够及时向上级汇报项目进度，主动反馈问题并更新需求状态。
 
加分项 (Bonus Skills)
 
熟练使用AI工具。
有外企工作经验或海外项目对接经验者优先。
熟悉法律科技 (Legal Tech) 软件如 Actionstep 者优先。
 
应聘方式：请发送您的简历，并附上您过往成功的自动化流程案例或网站维护案例（如有）。
全职线上数字化澳洲移民及留学业务推广及营销

SaaS 系统管理与配置：
负责公司核心 SaaS 软体的帐号管理、权限控制及功能配置，包括但不限于：Xero, HubSpot, Actionstep, MS Admin, Hubdoc 等。
深⼊参与 HubSpot, Notion 等 CRM和内部系统的搭建、优化与日常使用支持，确保数据准确与流程顺畅。
业务流程自动化：
利用 Zapier, Make.com, n8m 等工具设计并实施跨平台自动化工作流，实现数据在不同系统间的自动流转（例如：自动将 HubSpot 合约同步发送至 PandaDoc）。
负责特定场景的集成开发，例如实现 Zoom 会议录音/录像自动同步归档至 HubSpot。
IT 基础设施与技术支持：
作为内部技术支持的第一响应人，及时解决团队遇到的软硬体及网络问题（如 Zoom 连接问题、权限故障等）。
负责 SharePoint 平台的搭建与结构优化，使其适配公司的文件管理与协作需求。
网站运维与支持：
负责公司官网的内容更新、日常维护及故障排查。
配合营销需求进行技术支持，如 SEO 代码的插入与部署、网站性能优化等。
 
任职要求
 
语言能力：
英语沟通能力良好（雅思 6.0 分或同等水平及以上）。由于需与海外非中文母语的同事及合作方协作，候选人须具良好的英语沟通能力。
专业背景：
计算机科学、信息管理或相关专业本科及以上学历。
拥有 1-3 年以上系统管理员 (System Admin)、IT 技术支持或网页开发者工作经验。
技术技能：
熟悉 SaaS 软件生态，具备 API, Webhook 基础概念，能独立查阅技术文档解决接口问题。
熟练掌握至少一种自动化工具（n8n, Zapier, Make.com）并有实际操作经验。
有网站维护与运营经验，具备基础的 HTML/CSS 理解能力。
职业素养：
高度自律与结果导向：适应远程工作模式，能够自我驱动，按时保质完成任务。
优秀的沟通与汇报习惯：能够及时向上级汇报项目进度，主动反馈问题并更新需求状态。
 
加分项 (Bonus Skills)
 
熟练使用AI工具。
有外企工作经验或海外项目对接经验者优先。
熟悉法律科技 (Legal Tech) 软件如 Actionstep 者优先。
 
应聘方式：请发送您的简历，并附上您过往成功的自动化流程案例或网站维护案例（如有）。
description_english:
We are an immigration law firm headquartered in Sydney, Australia. We are currently hiring a professional In-house Tech Specialist to be responsible for the maintenance and management of the company's internal SaaS systems and to optimize business processes through automation technology.
This is a 100% remote work position. We are looking for a highly self-disciplined technical talent with English communication skills to join our international team.
Job Responsibilities
 
SaaS System Management and Configuration:
Responsible for account management, access control, and feature configuration of the company's core SaaS software, including but not limited to: Xero, HubSpot, Actionstep, MS Admin, Hubdoc, etc.
Deeply involved in the setup, optimization, and daily support of CRM and internal systems like HubSpot and Notion, ensuring data accuracy and smooth workflows.
Business Process Automation:
Design and implement cross-platform automated workflows using tools like Zapier, Make.com, and n8n to achieve automatic data transfer between different systems (e.g., automatically sending HubSpot contracts to PandaDoc).
Responsible for integration development for specific scenarios, such as automatically archiving Zoom meeting recordings/videos to HubSpot.
IT Infrastructure and Technical Support:
Act as the first point of contact for internal technical support, promptly resolving hardware, software, and network issues encountered by the team (e.g., Zoom connection problems, permission failures).
Responsible for the setup and structural optimization of the SharePoint platform to meet the company's file management and collaboration needs.
Website Operations and Support:
Responsible for content updates, daily maintenance, and troubleshooting of the company's official website.
Provide technical support for marketing needs, such as inserting and deploying SEO code, website performance optimization, etc.
 
Job Requirements
 
Language Skills:
Good English communication skills (IELTS 6.0 or equivalent and above). Candidates must have good English communication skills as collaboration with non-native Chinese-speaking colleagues and partners overseas is required.
Professional Background:
Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Information Management, or related fields.
1-3 years of work experience as a System Admin, IT Technical Support, or Web Developer.
Technical Skills:
Familiar with the SaaS software ecosystem, with a basic understanding of APIs and Webhooks, and the ability to independently consult technical documentation to solve interface issues.
Proficient in at least one automation tool (n8n, Zapier, Make.com) with practical experience.
Experience in website maintenance and operations, with a basic understanding of HTML/CSS.
Professional Qualities:
Highly self-disciplined and results-oriented: Adaptable to a remote work model, self-motivated, and able to complete tasks on time and to a high standard.
Excellent communication and reporting habits: Able to report project progress to superiors in a timely manner, proactively provide feedback on issues, and update the status of requirements.
 
Bonus Skills
 
Proficient in using AI tools.
Experience working in foreign enterprises or with overseas projects is a plus.
Familiarity with Legal Tech software such as Actionstep is a plus.
 
How to Apply: Please send your resume and, if available, include case studies of successful automation workflows or website maintenance projects you have worked on.

title: 【远程居家办公+数据平台开发】
team: 某大型互联网公司
summary: Java,MySQL,Spring
summary_chinese: 数据平台架构设计,Java,Spark/Flink,分布式系统,数据仓库建模,从0到1搭建平台
summary_english: Data Platform Architecture Design,Java,Spark/Flink,Distributed Systems,Data Warehouse Modeling,Building Platform from Scratch
description:
岗位职责
1. 负责公司数据平台的整体架构设计，包括数据采集、存储、计算、建模及服务等全链路架构方案规划，确保架构的稳定性、可扩展性与性能。
2. 基于Java技术栈，主导核心系统模块的设计与开发，攻克高并发、⼤数据量场景下的技术难题，优化系统瓶颈。
3. 参与技术选型，评估主流⼤数据框架（如Hadoop、Spark、Flink等）与Java⽣态组件的适配性，引入前沿技术提升平台效率。
4. 制定技术规范与开发标准，指导团队成员开展架构落地与开发工作，把控代码质量与架构⼀致性。
5. 分析业务需求，将其转化为技术架构方案，平衡业务发展与技术实现，保障数据平台对业务的支撑能力。
6. 负责数据安全与隐私保护架构设计，确保数据在流转与存储过程中的合规性。
任职要求
1. 本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业，5年以上Java开发经验，3年以上数据平台或大数据架构设计经验。
2. 精通Java核心技术，深入理解JVM原理、并发编程、集合框架及IO/NIO，具备高性能Java应用开发能力。
3. 熟练掌握大数据技术栈，包括但不限于HDFS、YARN、Spark、Flink、Kafka、Hive、ClickHouse等，有相关框架实战与调优经验。
4. 熟悉分布式系统设计原则，对CAP理论、一致性算法、分布式事务等有深刻理解，能解决分布式环境下的常见问题。
5. 具备丰富的数据库设计与优化经验，精通MySQL、Oracle等关系型数据库，熟悉MongoDB、Redis等NoSQL数据库。
6. 有大型数据平台从0到1搭建或重构经验者优先，熟悉数据仓库建模（如星型模型、雪花模型）者优先。
7. 具备良好的沟通协调能力与团队管理能力，能推动架构方案落地，有技术团队领导经验者优先。
8. 较强的问题分析与解决能力，对技术有热情，能持续关注行业新技术动态并应用于实际工作。

岗位职责
1. 负责公司数据平台的整体架构设计，包括数据采集、存储、计算、建模及服务等全链路架构方案规划，确保架构的稳定性、可扩展性与性能。
2. 基于Java技术栈，主导核心系统模块的设计与开发，攻克高并发、⼤数据量场景下的技术难题，优化系统瓶颈。

任职要求
1. 本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业，5年以上Java开发经验，3年以上数据平台或大数据架构设计经验。
2. 精通Java核心技术，深入理解JVM原理、并发编程、集合框架及IO/NIO，具备高性能Java应用开发能力。
3. 熟练掌握大数据技术栈，包括但不限于HDFS、YARN、Spark、Flink、Kafka、Hive、ClickHouse等，有相关框架实战与调优经验。
4. 熟悉分布式系统设计原则，对CAP理论、一致性算法、分布式事务等有深刻理解，能解决分布式环境下的常见问题。
5. 具备丰富的数据库设计与优化经验，精通MySQL、Oracle等关系型数据库，熟悉MongoDB、Redis等NoSQL数据库。
6. 有大型数据平台从0到1搭建或重构经验者优先，熟悉数据仓库建模（如星型模型、雪花模型）者优先。
7. 具备良好的沟通协调能力与团队管理能力，能推动架构方案落地，有技术团队领导经验者优先。
8. 较强的问题分析与解决能力，对技术有热情，能持续关注行业新技术动态并应用于实际工作。
description_english:
Responsibilities
1. Responsible for the overall architecture design of the company's data platform, including planning the full-link architecture for data collection, storage, computation, modeling, and services, ensuring the architecture's stability, scalability, and performance.
2. Based on the Java technology stack, lead the design and development of core system modules, overcome technical challenges in high-concurrency and large-data-volume scenarios, and optimize system bottlenecks.
3. Participate in technology selection, evaluate the compatibility of mainstream big data frameworks (such as Hadoop, Spark, Flink, etc.) with Java ecosystem components, and introduce cutting-edge technologies to improve platform efficiency.
4. Formulate technical specifications and development standards, guide team members in implementing the architecture and development work, and control code quality and architectural consistency.
5. Analyze business requirements and translate them into technical architecture solutions, balancing business development with technical implementation to ensure the data platform's ability to support the business.
6. Responsible for designing the data security and privacy protection architecture, ensuring compliance during data transfer and storage.
Requirements
1. Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related majors, with 5+ years of Java development experience and 3+ years of experience in data platform or big data architecture design.
2. Proficient in core Java technologies, with a deep understanding of JVM principles, concurrent programming, collection frameworks, and IO/NIO; capable of developing high-performance Java applications.
3. Proficient in the big data technology stack, including but not limited to HDFS, YARN, Spark, Flink, Kafka, Hive, ClickHouse, etc., with practical experience in and optimization of related frameworks.
4. Familiar with distributed system design principles, with a deep understanding of CAP theorem, consensus algorithms, distributed transactions, etc., and able to solve common problems in a distributed environment.
5. Possess extensive experience in database design and optimization, proficient in relational databases such as MySQL and Oracle, and familiar with NoSQL databases like MongoDB and Redis.
6. Experience in building or restructuring large-scale data platforms from scratch is a plus; familiarity with data warehouse modeling (e.g., star schema, snowflake schema) is a plus.
7. Possess good communication, coordination, and team management skills, able to drive the implementation of architectural solutions; experience leading a technical team is a plus.
8. Strong problem analysis and solving skills, passionate about technology, and able to continuously follow industry's new technology trends and apply them to practical work.

title: 兼职文案（线上远程居家办公）
team: 北京海特思文教育科技有限公司
summary: 兼职,无需坐班
summary_chinese: 留学申请文案,国际教育行业,英国院校申请,雅思7.5+,留学行业经验优先,长期兼职
summary_english: Study Abroad Application Copywriting,International Education Industry,UK University Applications,IELTS 7.5+,Study Abroad Industry Experience Preferred,Long-term Part-time
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：无要求
工作时间：不限
工作时段：不限
结算方式：月结
招聘截止时间：2025-12-20
【岗位职责】
1. 负责为学生提供英国院校申请各类文案规划服务；
2. 负责学生文案服务全流程把控，确保学生文案按时输出；
3. 及时和英国留学顾问老师沟通，积极反馈各项目的进展情况；
4. 积极跟进学生英国大学的申请进度；
5. 定期参与部门内部培训，不断学习，更新业务知识；
6. 与英籍文案老师沟通学生申请，匠心打造学生申请文案。
【任职要求】
1.世界大学排名QS前150高校毕业或在读，雅思总分不低于7.5，写作小分不低于7.0，托福等同于总分102-109，写作27-28，有文案写作经验的优先 。及其优秀者可酌情按以下要求：  统招本科， 外语系， 中文系，法律系等相关专业，英语专业八级， 曾在英语系国家留学者优先； 
2.认同企业文化，诚实守信，有较强的责任心; 
3.有实干精神，工作耐心细致，热爱文案工作，并且有着良好的倾听表达能力以及沟通能力，擅于团队合作；
4. 能承受一定的工作压力，积极乐观的为人处事态度；
5. 有1-2年文案工作经验或者留学公司业内（如：留学顾问、留学文案）工作经验者优先。
（注意：仅限本公司使用，严禁搬运）
海特思文（Hitevision）全球国际教育引领者，总部位于北京。​ 秉持“无国界教育”理念，我们构建了覆盖中国大陆、香港及亚非欧核心地区的强大服务网络（近百家门店/分部）。依托顶尖全球资源与深谙本地的国际化团队，我们为学子提供专业、高效、个性化的一站式国际教育服务，助力拥抱多元文化、开拓全球视野、实现世界顶尖学府梦想。 ​ 
公司以“年轻、精进、担当、共赢”为文化，汇聚实干精英，矢志成为学生连接全球机遇的战略伙伴。​ 
加入我们，与全球化精英团队共成长，启迪智慧，照亮世界征程！​    ​

title: 后端开发工程师（初/中/高）远程办公
team: 某移动互联网公司
summary: Golang,Java,MySQL,Spring
summary_chinese: 高并发后端开发,Golang/Java/PHP,高并发高可用,MySQL/Redis,ES/Kafka/RabbitMQ,Spring Cloud/Gin/Laravel

title: web3前端开发（远程办公）
team: 北京云享自控智慧建筑科技有限公司
summary_chinese: Web应用开发,区块链行业,React+TypeScript,Web3.js/Ethers.js,DeFi,基础英语沟通
summary_english: Web Application Development,Blockchain Industry,React+TypeScript,Web3.js/Ethers.js,DeFi,Basic English Communication
description:
职位简介：
通过构建快速、高质量的前端应用，共同塑造 Web3 的未来。作为团队的关键成员，你将负责设计和开发核心功能，打造流畅且响应迅速的用户体验。你将与产品、设计以及区块链团队紧密合作，将创意从概念变为现实。
核⼼职责
使⽤现代前端技术架构、开发并维护⾼性能、响应式的 Web 应用
与产品、设计、区块链团队紧密协作，提供卓越的用户体验
根据 Figma 原型和设计资源，构建像素级还原的 UI 组件
在整个 Web 技术栈中调试和解决问题
任职资格
计算机科学或相关专业本科以上学历，或具备同等经验
2-3年以上前端开发经验，其中⾄少 1 年 Web3 / DeFi 相关经验
精通 JavaScript、TypeScript、React 生态体系
深入理解网页性能优化与最佳实践
熟悉 Web3.js、Ethers.js，并理解 Web3 基础概念（钱包、智能合约等）
软性素质
具备基础的英文口头与书面沟通能力，英语口语敢开口
能在远程、跨职能团队中高效协作
拥有主人翁意识——“你开发的，你负责运行”
具备良好的问题解决能力与细节关注度
能够在快节奏的环境中快速学习与适应
我们是一家区块链技术公司，创始团队由多位业内资深人士，教授和学者组成，他们的经验包括哈佛大学，麻省理工学院和 Algorand。公司的投资方包括BinanceLabs、Alameda、Polychain、Multicoin、ParaFi、CoinFund、Hypersphere、CMS、Spartan、DeFiance 等。同时，我们也是波卡官方 Web3 基金会Grant资助获得者，Substrate Builder Program 成员，伯克利大学区块链加速器成员。
description_chinese:
职位简介：
通过构建快速、高质量的前端应用，共同塑造 Web3 的未来。作为团队的关键成员，你将负责设计和开发核心功能，打造流畅且响应迅速的用户体验。你将与产品、设计以及区块链团队紧密合作，将创意从概念变为现实。
核⼼职责
使⽤现代前端技术架构、开发并维护⾼性能、响应式的 Web 应用
与产品、设计、区块链团队紧密协作，提供卓越的用户体验
根据 Figma 原型和设计资源，构建像素级还原的 UI 组件
在整个 Web 技术栈中调试和解决问题
任职资格
计算机科学或相关专业本科以上学历，或具备同等经验
2-3年以上前端开发经验，其中⾄少 1 年 Web3 / DeFi 相关经验
精通 JavaScript、TypeScript、React 生态体系
深入理解网页性能优化与最佳实践
熟悉 Web3.js、Ethers.js，并理解 Web3 基础概念（钱包、智能合约等）
软性素质
具备基础的英文口头与书面沟通能力，英语口语敢开口
能在远程、跨职能团队中高效协作
拥有主人翁意识——“你开发的，你负责运行”
具备良好的问题解决能力与细节关注度
能够在快节奏的环境中快速学习与适应
我们是一家区块链技术公司，创始团队由多位业内资深人士，教授和学者组成，他们的经验包括哈佛大学，麻省理工学院和 Algorand。公司的投资方包括BinanceLabs、Alameda、Polychain、Multicoin、ParaFi、CoinFund、Hypersphere、CMS、Spartan、DeFiance 等。同时，我们也是波卡官方 Web3 基金会Grant资助获得者，Substrate Builder Program 成员，伯克利大学区块链加速器成员。
description_english:
Job Summary:
Shape the future of Web3 by building fast, high-quality frontend applications. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for designing and developing core features, creating a smooth and responsive user experience. You will work closely with product, design, and blockchain teams to bring ideas from concept to reality.
Core Responsibilities
Architect, develop, and maintain high-performance, responsive web applications using modern frontend technologies
Collaborate closely with product, design, and blockchain teams to deliver an excellent user experience
Build pixel-perfect UI components based on Figma prototypes and design assets
Debug and resolve issues across the entire web technology stack
Qualifications
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent experience
2-3+ years of frontend development experience, with at least 1 year in Web3 / DeFi
Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, and the React ecosystem
In-depth understanding of web performance optimization and best practices
Familiar with Web3.js, Ethers.js, and understand basic Web3 concepts (wallets, smart contracts, etc.)
Soft Skills
Basic oral and written English communication skills, and the confidence to speak
Ability to collaborate effectively in a remote, cross-functional team
Possess a sense of ownership—"you build it, you run it"
Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Ability to learn and adapt quickly in a fast-paced environment
We are a blockchain technology company with a founding team composed of several industry veterans, professors, and scholars with experience from Harvard, MIT, and Algorand. The company's investors include Binance Labs, Alameda, Polychain, Multicoin, ParaFi, CoinFund, Hypersphere, CMS, Spartan, DeFiance, and others. We are also a recipient of the official Polkadot Web3 Foundation Grant, a member of the Substrate Builder Program, and a member of the Berkeley Blockchain Xcelerator.

title: 高级java开发（可远程办公）
team: 深圳中米网络科技有限公司
summary: JVM,Java,团队管理经验,Elasticsearch,微服务经验,MySQL,Kafka,MyBatis,架构设计经验,Spring
summary_chinese: 后端系统设计与开发,互联网电商,AI领域,微服务架构,Spring Cloud,数据库分库分表
summary_english: Backend System Design & Development,Internet E-commerce,AI Field,Microservices Architecture,Spring Cloud,Database Sharding
description:
职责：
1、负责部门产品的设计、开发，能独立完成子系统及模块的工作；
2、参与产品技术讨论，评审等工作，并从专业的角度提出建议与改进措施；
3、参与产品质量的不断优化改进设计等，参与完善后端相应规范设计；
4、持续关注产品技术演进趋势，能一定程度的分享设计经验、赋能到团队，共同提升团队研发技术能力。
AI工具： https://claude.vip
要求：
1、本科及以上学历，3-5年工作经验；具有扎实的Java开发能力，能够将掌握的基础技术体系灵活应用到需求场景中。
2、能够熟练使用Spring/SpringMVC/SpringBoot/MyBatis等开源框架；熟悉Tomcat（或Jetty）常用的WEB容器；熟悉Redis、Kafka、Nginx等常用的开发组件。
3、熟悉分布式系统框架，熟悉spring cloud\dubbo框架，对zookeeper有一定了解。有过微服务开发经验者优先。
4、熟练使用MySQL等常用数据库的开发和结构设计，对NOsql数据库有一定了解，有使用经验者尤佳；熟练使用Sharding-JDBC中间件对数据分库分表，了解动态扩容缩容的分库分表方案。
5、有丰富的项目开发经验，有一定的架构设计思维，对互联网系统有一定的实际架构设计经验者尤佳;
6、有较强的沟通能力，表达能力强，有良好的团队协作精神。
中米公司， 专注互联网电商，AI领域。AI工具： https://claude.vip    官网： https://www.chinami.com/

title: CTO（远程办公）
team: 中国香港某中型互联网金融公司
summary: 高频交易,CTA,c++,套利,低延迟交易系统,量化交易
summary_chinese: 交易系统架构设计,Crypto量化,C++低延迟开发,高频交易,技术团队管理,技术自主权
summary_english: Trading System Architecture Design,Crypto Quant,C++ Low-Latency Development,High-Frequency Trading,Technical Team Management,Technical Autonomy
description:
岗位职责
● 技术架构设计与落地
○ 主导公司整体交易基础设施的设计与开发，重点支持 CEX 内的高频交易、CTA、套利等策略，确保系统低延迟、高并发、高可⽤性。
○ ⾤⽤ C++ 语言构建高性能底层框架，优化内存管理、多线程并⾏处理、网络通信等核心模块，满足微秒级响应需求。
○ 设计支持多 PM（投资组合经理）的系统架构，实现策略隔离、资源动态分配及跨团队协作，提升研发效率与策略迭代速度。
● 团队管理与协作
○ 组建并管理技术团队，制定研发流程与规范，推动技术文档化与代码质量控制。
○ 与投研、交易、风控等部门紧密协作，理解业务需求并转化为技术方案，确保系统与业务目标对齐。
● 系统优化与风险管理
○ 持续监控系统性能，通过负载测试、压力模拟等手段优化延迟与吞吐量，应对市场极端行情下的高并发挑战。
○ 设计并实施风险控制系统，集成实时监控、熔断机制、异常交易拦截等功能，保障资金安全与合规性。
● 技术前沿探索
○ 跟踪加crypto行业技术趋势，探索 DEX、链上数据整合、AI 策略优化等领域的技术应用，为公司提供技术创新方向。 
岗位要求
● 技术能力
○ 精通 C++ 语言，具备扎实的算法与数据结构基础，熟悉高性能计算优化（如SIMD 指令、无锁队列、内存池）。
○ 有低延迟交易系统开发经验，熟悉 CEX API 对接、订单簿处理、行情数据解析等核心模块。
○ 掌握多线程编程、分布式系统设计，熟悉 Linux 内核调优（如 CPU 亲和性、零拷贝、网络栈优化）。
● 行业经验
○ 5 年以上量化交易、高频交易或对冲基金技术研发经验，至少 3 年技术管理经验，成功主导过复杂交易系统的全生命周期开发。
○ 熟悉 CTA、套利、高频等策略的技术实现，理解市场微观结构与交易成本分析。
● 团队与项目管理
○ 具备跨部门协作能力，能有效沟通业务需求与技术方案，推动团队高效执行。
○ 有带领团队从 0 到 1 搭建技术架构的经验，能合理规划资源、把控项目进度。
● 其他要求
○ 本科及以上学历，计算机科学、电子工程等相关专业；硕士或博士学历优先。
○ 对crypto市场有深入理解，熟悉主流 CEX（如 Binance、Coinbase）的交易规则与 API 特性。 
加分项：
● 技术加分项
○ 熟悉 DEX（去中心化交易所）架构、链上数据分析工具（如 Flux、The Graph）
或智能合约开发。
○ 掌握 Python/Cython 混合编程，能高效实现策略回测与实盘逻辑的无缝切换。
● 行业经验加分项
○ 曾在多 PM 制对冲基金担任技术负责人，成功支持过多个策略团队的并行开发与上线。
○ 管理过 1 亿美元以上 AUM 的交易系统，具备应对大规模资金量下的技术扩容与稳定性保障经验。 
我们能提供：
● 薪资范围
○ 基础薪资：100 万 - 200 万元 / 年。
○ 奖金与绩效：根据公司业绩与个人贡献，年度奖金可达基础薪资的 30%-100%。
● 其他福利
○ 技术自主权：主导前沿技术探索，参与公司战略决策。
○ 团队氛围：扁平化管理，与行业顶尖量化团队、PM 协作，接触高挑战性技术问题。
○ 职业发展：提供行业资源对接、技术培训与全球化视野拓展机会。

● 其他要求

● 行业经验加分项
○ 曾在多 PM 制对冲基金担任技术负责人，成功支持过多个策略团队的并行开发与上线。
○ 管理过 1 亿美元以上 AUM 的交易系统，具备应对大规模资金量下的技术扩容与稳定性保障经验。 
我们能提供：
● 薪资范围
○ 基础薪资：100 万 - 200 万元 / 年。
○ 奖金与绩效：根据公司业绩与个人贡献，年度奖金可达基础薪资的 30%-100%。
● 其他福利
○ 技术自主权：主导前沿技术探索，参与公司战略决策。
○ 团队氛围：扁平化管理，与行业顶尖量化团队、PM 协作，接触高挑战性技术问题。
○ 职业发展：提供行业资源对接、技术培训与全球化视野拓展机会。
description_english:
Responsibilities
● Technical Architecture Design and Implementation
○ Lead the design and development of the company's overall trading infrastructure, with a focus on supporting strategies like high-frequency trading, CTA, and arbitrage within CEX, ensuring low latency, high concurrency, and high availability.
○ Use C++ to build a high-performance underlying framework, optimizing core modules such as memory management, multi-threaded parallel processing, and network communication to meet microsecond-level response requirements.
○ Design a system architecture that supports multiple PMs (Portfolio Managers), implementing strategy isolation, dynamic resource allocation, and cross-team collaboration to improve R&D efficiency and strategy iteration speed.
● Team Management and Collaboration
○ Build and manage a technical team, establish R&D processes and standards, and promote technical documentation and code quality control.
○ Collaborate closely with investment research, trading, risk control, and other departments to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions, ensuring the system aligns with business objectives.
● System Optimization and Risk Management
○ Continuously monitor system performance, optimizing latency and throughput through methods like load testing and stress simulations to handle high-concurrency challenges during extreme market conditions.
○ Design and implement a risk control system, integrating features such as real-time monitoring, circuit breakers, and abnormal transaction interception to ensure fund security and compliance.
● Exploring Technological Frontiers
○ Track technology trends in the crypto industry, explore the application of technologies in areas like DEX, on-chain data integration, and AI strategy optimization, and provide direction for the company's technological innovation.
Requirements
● Technical Skills
○ Proficient in C++, with a solid foundation in algorithms and data structures, familiar with high-performance computing optimizations (e.g., SIMD instructions, lock-free queues, memory pools).
○ Experience in developing low-latency trading systems, familiar with core modules such as CEX API integration, order book processing, and market data parsing.
○ Proficient in multi-threaded programming and distributed system design, familiar with Linux kernel tuning (e.g., CPU affinity, zero-copy, network stack optimization).
● Industry Experience
○ Over 5 years of technical R&D experience in quantitative trading, high-frequency trading, or hedge funds, with at least 3 years of technical management experience, having successfully led the full lifecycle development of complex trading systems.
○ Familiar with the technical implementation of strategies such as CTA, arbitrage, and high-frequency trading, with an understanding of market microstructure and transaction cost analysis.
● Team and Project Management
○ Possess cross-departmental collaboration skills, able to effectively communicate business requirements and technical solutions, and drive efficient team execution.
○ Experience leading a team to build a technical architecture from scratch (0 to 1), with the ability to plan resources and manage project timelines effectively.
● Other Requirements
○ Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field; Master's or PhD degree preferred.
○ In-depth understanding of the crypto market, familiar with the trading rules and API characteristics of major CEXs (e.g., Binance, Coinbase).
Bonus Points:
● Technical Bonuses
○ Familiarity with DEX (Decentralized Exchange) architecture, on-chain data analysis tools (e.g., Flux, The Graph), or smart contract development.
○ Proficient in Python/Cython hybrid programming, capable of efficiently switching between strategy backtesting and live trading logic.
● Industry Experience Bonuses
○ Previously served as a technical lead in a multi-PM hedge fund, successfully supporting the parallel development and launch of multiple strategy teams.
○ Managed a trading system with over $100 million AUM, with experience in technical scaling and stability assurance for large-scale capital.
What We Offer:
● Salary Range
○ Base Salary: 1,000,000 - 2,000,000 RMB / year.
○ Bonus and Performance: Annual bonus can reach 30%-100% of the base salary, based on company performance and individual contributions.
● Other Benefits
○ Technical Autonomy: Lead cutting-edge technology exploration and participate in company strategic decisions.
○ Team Atmosphere: Flat management structure, collaborate with top quant teams and PMs in the industry, and tackle highly challenging technical problems.
○ Career Development: Provide opportunities for industry resource networking, technical training, and global perspective expansion.

title: 区块链安全工程师 远程办公
team: 某大型互联网出行平台上市公司
summary_chinese: 安全审计与测试,Web3安全,Golang/Rust/Solidity,智能合约审计,漏洞挖掘,EVM/MoveVM
summary_english: Security Auditing & Testing,Web3 Security,Go/Rust/Solidity,Smart Contract Auditing,Vulnerability Discovery,EVM/MoveVM
description:
### 工作职责
- 设计并执行完整的模拟测试，从概念验证(PoC)到最终报告生成
- 对应用层、共识机制及底层⽹络协议进⾏全⾯安全审计与测试
- 通过书面报告和口头汇报清晰阐述安全风险及修复方案
- 参与⽩帽工具和漏洞利用程序，用于漏洞赏金计划及内部研究
- 在跨部门协作中保持专业自主性，完成专项任务
- 恪守公司制度与行业道德准则的最高标准
### 任职要求
- 对区块链技术和Web3安全领域有真挚热情
- 3年以上Golang/Rust/Solidity应用开发经验（具备区块链/智能合约开发经验者优先）
- 至少精通一门脚本语言（Python/JavaScript/Shell等）
- 深入理解区块链架构与智能合约实现原理
- 精通智能合约Runtime环境（EVM, MoveVM等）
- 能够通过批判性思维评估技术与运营风险
- 出色的技术文档撰写能力，善于向非技术人员阐释复杂概念
- 在安全研究领域有实证成果，包括漏洞发现与利用开发
所属部门：安全

description_english:
### Responsibilities
- Design and execute complete simulation tests, from Proof of Concept (PoC) to final report generation
- Conduct comprehensive security audits and tests on the application layer, consensus mechanisms, and underlying network protocols
- Clearly articulate security risks and remediation plans through written reports and oral presentations
- Participate in developing white-hat tools and exploits for bug bounty programs and internal research
- Maintain professional autonomy in cross-departmental collaborations to complete special tasks
- Adhere to the highest standards of company policies and industry ethics
### Requirements
- Genuine passion for blockchain technology and the Web3 security field
- Over 3 years of application development experience in Go/Rust/Solidity (experience in blockchain/smart contract development is preferred)
- Proficient in at least one scripting language (e.g., Python/JavaScript/Shell)
- In-depth understanding of blockchain architecture and the principles of smart contract implementation
- Proficient with smart contract runtime environments (e.g., EVM, MoveVM)
- Ability to assess technical and operational risks through critical thinking
- Excellent technical documentation skills, adept at explaining complex concepts to non-technical personnel
- Proven achievements in the security research field, including vulnerability discovery and exploit development
Department: Security

summary_english: Facebook Ads Management,Gaming Industry,Web3,Ad Creative Production,Kwai/X.com Ads Experience,Comprehensive Health Insurance
description:
广告投手 (Media Buyer)
地点: 远程办公
职位描述:
我们正在寻找初级和资深广告投手，负责管理和优化广告投放策略，确保最大化广告效果。
主要职责:
- 在Facebook平台上管理和优化广告投放。
- 制定和执行广告策略，监控和分析广告效果。
- 协同团队成员，确保广告活动按计划进行。
- 持续跟踪和研究市场和竞争对手动向。
- 使用Photoshop进行广告素材制作。
职位要求:
初级广告投手:
- 至少1年的Facebook广告投放经验。
- 熟悉游戏行业和Web3行业优先。
- 良好的数据分析能力和解决问题的能力。
- 优秀的沟通和团队合作能力。
- 能够独立完成投流，并进行优化。
- 具备Kwai和X.com广告投放经验者优先。
资深广告投手:
- 至少3年的Facebook广告投放经验。
- 深厚的数据分析能力和广告优化能力。
- 熟悉游戏行业和Web3行业优先。
- 优秀的领导能力和项目管理能力。
- 能够独立完成投流，并进行优化。
- 具备Kwai和X.com广告投放经验者优先。
薪资:
- 初级广告投手：基本薪资+投流提成（可以达到基础工资的几倍）
- 资深广告投手：基本薪资+高比例投流提成（可以达到基础工资的几倍）
福利待遇:
- 具有竞争力的薪资和绩效奖金。
- 综合健康保险。
- 职业成长和发展的机会。
- 友好和充满活力的工作环境
公司成立于2023年3月

主要经营：网络技术服务  信息服务咨询

description_english:
Media Buyer
Location: Remote
Job Description:
We are looking for junior and senior Media Buyers to manage and optimize ad strategies to ensure maximum advertising effectiveness.
Key Responsibilities:
- Manage and optimize ad campaigns on the Facebook platform.
- Develop and execute advertising strategies, monitor and analyze ad performance.
- Collaborate with team members to ensure advertising campaigns proceed as planned.
- Continuously track and research market and competitor trends.
- Use Photoshop to create ad creatives.
Job Requirements:
Junior Media Buyer:
- At least 1 year of experience in Facebook advertising.
- Familiarity with the gaming and Web3 industries is a plus.
- Good data analysis and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
- Able to independently manage and optimize ad campaigns.
- Experience with Kwai and X.com advertising is a plus.
Senior Media Buyer:
- At least 3 years of experience in Facebook advertising.
- Strong data analysis and ad optimization skills.
- Familiarity with the gaming and Web3 industries is a plus.
- Excellent leadership and project management skills.
- Able to independently manage and optimize ad campaigns.
- Experience with Kwai and X.com advertising is a plus.
Salary:
- Junior Media Buyer: Base salary + commission on ad spend (can be several times the base salary)
- Senior Media Buyer: Base salary + high-percentage commission on ad spend (can be several times the base salary)
Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance bonuses.
- Comprehensive health insurance.
- Opportunities for career growth and development.
- A friendly and vibrant work environment
Company founded in March 2023

Main business: Network technology services, Information consulting services

summary_english: Overseas User Growth Operations,Web3 Industry,FinTech,Exchange Operations,Data Analysis,Cross-timezone Collaboration
description:
"区域运营（远程办公）
岗位职责：
负责指定海外区域的运营工作，包括但不限于用户增长、活动策划与执行、用户关系维护，确保业务目标的达成；
深入理解本地市场与用户需求，通过数据分析驱动运营策略优化，提升用户活跃度与满意度；
协调产品、技术、市场等内部团队，高效推进运营项目落地，确保跨时区协作顺畅；
监控并分析运营数据，定期输出运营报告，为业务决策提供有效支持。
任职要求：
1、学历/专业：本科及以上学历
2 、互联网/金融科技行业运营相关工作经验，有海外业务或交易所运营经验者优先；
3、具备出色的跨文化沟通能力和团队协作精神，能够高效推动跨部门项目；
4、具备较强的责任心、主动性和统筹能力，能独立负责业务推进并确保落地；
5、熟悉Web3/区块链行业，拥有加密货币交易经验，英语可作为工作语言，能适应跨时区工作安排。"

title: 亚马逊运营（远程办公）
team: 某深圳中型电子商务公司
summary: 店铺运营,美国站,精品运营
summary_chinese: 店铺诊断与优化,跨境电商,新品0到1推广,PPC广告优化,美国站精品模式,Helium 10/Jungle Scout
summary_english: Store Diagnosis & Optimization,Cross-border E-commerce,New Product 0-to-1 Promotion,PPC Ad Optimization,US Site Boutique Model,Helium 10/Jungle Scout
description:
岗位职责：
1、深度诊断客户亚马逊店铺运营现状（侧重美国站），制定针对性优化方案（Listing优化、广告架构、库存规划等）；
2、主导客户新品从选品验证、上市策划到爆款打造的全程方案设计，具备成功0-1推广案例经验；
3、指导广告结构升级（SP/SB/SD广告组合）、ACOS优化及关键词反哺策略；
4、 基于亚马逊后台数据、第三方工具（Helium 10/Jungle Scout等）输出周期性运营健康报告，提出增长杠杆点。
岗位要求：
1、5年以上亚马逊美国站运营实战经验，精通精品模式（非铺货），有服务商/顾问背景优先；
2、具备3个以上跨品类（如消费电子、家居、运动户外）成功运营案例，独立主导过≥3款产品0-1上市并达成月销20万美金+；
3、英语读写流利（CET-6级或同等能力），可熟练撰写英文Listing、处理客服case等；
4、精通亚马逊广告系统、PPC优化技巧、BSR排名提升策略及数据化运营模型。

1、深度诊断客户亚马逊店铺运营现状（侧重美国站），制定针对性优化方案（Listing优化、广告架构、库存规划等）；

description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Conduct in-depth diagnosis of clients' Amazon store operations (with a focus on the US site) and develop targeted optimization plans (Listing optimization, ad structure, inventory planning, etc.).
2. Lead the entire process for clients' new products from product selection validation and launch planning to creating best-sellers, with proven experience in successful 0-to-1 promotion cases.
3. Guide the upgrading of advertising structures (SP/SB/SD ad combinations), ACOS optimization, and keyword feedback strategies.
4. Generate periodic operational health reports based on Amazon backend data and third-party tools (Helium 10/Jungle Scout, etc.), and identify key growth leverage points.
Requirements:
1. 5+ years of hands-on experience in Amazon US site operations, proficient in the boutique model (not general product listing), with a background as a service provider/consultant preferred.
2. Possess at least 3 successful operation cases across different categories (e.g., consumer electronics, home goods, sports & outdoors), and have independently led the 0-to-1 launch of ≥3 products achieving monthly sales of $200,000+.
3. Fluent in English reading and writing (CET-6 or equivalent proficiency), capable of skillfully writing English Listings, handling customer service cases, etc.
4. Proficient in the Amazon advertising system, PPC optimization techniques, BSR ranking improvement strategies, and data-driven operational models.

title: AI应用研发工程师（remote）
team: 成都创元聚星科技有限公司
summary: Java,机器学习,大模型,接受居家办公,Python
summary_chinese: 大模型AI Agent开发,金融风控,多智能体系统,大模型微调,Python,分布式系统
summary_english: LLM AI Agent Development,Financial Risk Control,Multi-Agent Systems,LLM Fine-tuning,Python,Distributed Systems
description:
【岗位职责】
1、参与大模型驱动的 AI Agent 系统开发，包括数据接入、模型接口调用、推理服务封装等
2、将风险巡检、研判、策略生成等业务逻辑落地为可运⾏的 AI 应⽤服务
3、优化⼤模型调用的延迟、吞吐与成本（Prompt优化、模型微调部署）
4、设计并实现多Agent间的消息队列、任务调度与协作机制
5、对接内部风控策略引擎和数据平台，实现模型结果的闭环落地
6、编写技术文档与操作⼿册，支持研发过程中的技术验证与上线
【任职要求】
1、计算机或相关专业本科及以上学历，3年以上AI/机器学习研发经验
2、熟悉 Python/Java 等后端开发语言，掌握常用机器学习和深度学习框架（PyTorch、TensorFlow 等）
3、有大模型相关开发经验（OpenAI API、HuggingFace Transformers 等）
4、具备良好的工程化能力，能将AI原型转化为高性能生产应用
5、了解消息队列、微服务架构，具备分布式系统开发经验
6、有交易所、金融风控或数据平台开发经验者优先
【加分项】
1、熟悉 Prompt Engineering 和大模型微调（LoRA/PEFT）
2、有多智能体（Multi-Agent）系统、LangChain、AutoGPT 等相关落地经验
3、对金融风险、交易安全有一定

description_english:
[Job Responsibilities]
1. Participate in the development of LLM-driven AI Agent systems, including data ingestion, model API calls, inference service encapsulation, etc.
2. Implement business logic such as risk inspection, analysis, and strategy generation into executable AI application services.
3. Optimize the latency, throughput, and cost of LLM calls (Prompt optimization, model fine-tuning and deployment).
4. Design and implement message queues, task scheduling, and collaboration mechanisms among multiple Agents.
5. Integrate with internal risk control strategy engines and data platforms to achieve closed-loop implementation of model results.
6. Write technical documents and operation manuals to support technical verification and go-live during the R&D process.
[Job Requirements]
1. Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related fields, with over 3 years of experience in AI/Machine Learning R&D.
2. Familiar with backend development languages such as Python/Java, and proficient in common machine learning and deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.).
3. Experience with large model development (OpenAI API, HuggingFace Transformers, etc.).
4. Possess strong engineering skills to transform AI prototypes into high-performance production applications.
5. Understanding of message queues and microservices architecture, with experience in distributed systems development.
6. Experience in exchanges, financial risk control, or data platform development is a plus.
[Bonus Points]
1. Familiar with Prompt Engineering and large model fine-tuning (LoRA/PEFT).
2. Experience in implementing Multi-Agent systems, LangChain, AutoGPT, etc.
3. Have some understanding of financial risk and transaction security.

title: Remote 全栈工程师（AI Tutor 项目）
title_chinese: 全栈工程师 (AI Tutor 项目)
team: 南宁市梦想岛教育投资有限公司
summary_chinese: AI Tutor端到端开发,在线教育,LLM/RAG,React Native,NestJS/FastAPI,美企,跨时区协作
summary_english: AI Tutor End-to-End Development,Online Education,LLM/RAG,React Native,NestJS/FastAPI,US Company,Cross-timezone Collaboration
description:
岗位职责：
1. 独立负责 **AI Tutor MVP** 的端到端开发（移动端、家长端、后端、AI 模型集成）；
2. 搭建轻量运营后台（用户检索、质量反馈、日志归因）；
3. 建立稳定的⼯程基础设施（⽇志埋点、CI/CD、观测监控、性能优化）；
4. 与产品与教研团队紧密协作，迭代⾃适应作业与知识点逻辑。
---
任职要求：
必备条件
* 3 年以上全栈开发经验，能独立交付移动端 + 后端项目；
* ⾄少 1 个 **LLM/RAG 实战上线案例**；
* 熟悉以下之一：React Native/Expo 或 Flutter；NestJS/FastAPI；
* 熟悉数据库（Postgres/Supabase）、缓存/队列（Redis）、对象存储（S3）；
* 具备良好的代码质量意识，熟悉 CI/CD 与日志监控；
* 具备远程沟通能力，能独立拆解任务与按时交付。
加分项
* 数学/理科题库经验，LaTeX/MathJax 渲染；
* 向量数据库（pgvector/Qdrant/Weaviate）实战经验；
* 有教育、K12、B2C 产品研发经历；
* 成本优化与模型推理性能调优经验。
---
薪资与合作模式
* 合同制 / 全职远程；
* 参考薪资：月薪 1 万 RMB；
* 可先进行2–3 周付费试用 Sprint，通过后转长期合作。
---
工作地点：
* 远程（优先考虑 UTC-8 \~ UTC+3 时区）。
---
投递方式
请附上：
简历GitHub/上线案例链接
梦想岛教育是国际一站式远程线上教育的开拓者，总部位于美国纽约曼哈顿，客户遍及全球二十三个国家和地区。我们旨在为儿童和青少年打造最优质的线上课程平台，严选优质国际执照教师，让线上互动教育同线下教育一样高效有趣。梦想岛教育的课程设置专门针对4-17岁孩子的智力发展趋势，在融合了传统学术要求的知识点的同时扩宽孩子的思维，提升学习兴趣，让孩子从课程中探索未知，在欢笑中温故知新。

title: 高级前端工程师-全国remote
team: 某大型互联网公司
summary: JavaScript,HTML5,接受居家办公,React,前端开发经验
summary_chinese: 前端组件库开发,React+TypeScript,Node.js/Next.js,初创团队,期权,扁平化管理
summary_english: Frontend Component Library Development,React+TypeScript,Node.js/Next.js,Founding Team,Stock Options,Flat Management
description:
Also looking for a senior frontend engineer consultant. We only work with the best.
We are going through hypergrowth. 
你將:
為我們針對消費者設計的網站應用程式、建立程式碼文檔的文化和元件函式庫奠定基礎
與創始團隊密切合作，構建一個優秀的消費者導向的應用程式，重視設計敏感性、使用者體驗和實用性
建立一個高度可擴展和有彈性的系統，培養卓越的文化
寫出漂亮且能快速執行的程式碼，以有意義的方式改進我們的程式庫
你是一個：
熱愛科技，喜歡動手工作，思想開放和能自我管理的人
能夠與隊友、工程師、設計師、專案經理、在高度合作的環境中一起工作和處理業務
堅信程式碼應該要簡單且能經過完整驗証的人
不自我設限，看到問題，會解決問題的人
有良好軟體工程實務經驗，包括編碼規範、程式碼審查、原始碼控制管理、持續部署和測試
你有：
3-5 年以上 HTML、CSS 和 JavaScript 核心基礎經驗
至少精通一種常用的 JavaScript 框架，例如 Angular 或 React
習慣於撰寫響應式網站應用程式
熟悉附有註釋的 JavaScript，例如 Typescript 或 Flow
伺服器端 JavaScript 經驗，能用 NodeJS、NextJS 等技術
設計可重覆使用組件的經驗
理想的技能組合：Javascript、ReactJS、Typescript、NodeJS、NextJS、MongoDB、Terraform、Docker、Kubernetes 和 AWS
福利：
具競爭力的薪資，包括可能增加的股權（有潛在的超高報酬）
成為具有高度自主權的創始團隊一員
在全新的發展空間中定義和設定行銷標準的機會
可選擇完全遠距工作
快節奏、具有挑戰性和全球性業務的挑戰
扁平、動態、透明的組織文化
description_chinese:
我们也在寻找高级前端工程师顾问。我们只与最优秀的人合作。我们正在经历高速增长。
你将:
为我们针对消费者设计的网站应用程序、建立代码文档的文化和组件函数库奠定基础
与创始团队密切合作，构建一个优秀的消费者导向的应用程序，重视设计敏感性、用户体验和实用性
建立一个高度可扩展和有弹性的系统，培养卓越的文化
写出漂亮且能快速执行的代码，以有意义的方式改进我们的代码库
你是一个：
热爱科技，喜欢动手工作，思想开放和能自我管理的人
能够与队友、工程师、设计师、项目经理在高度合作的环境中一起工作和处理业务
坚信代码应该要简单且能经过完整验证的人
不自我设限，看到问题，会解决问题的人
有良好软件工程实践经验，包括编码规范、代码审查、源代码控制管理、持续部署和测试
你有：
3-5 年以上 HTML、CSS 和 JavaScript 核心基础经验
至少精通一种常用的 JavaScript 框架，例如 Angular 或 React
习惯于撰写响应式网站应用程序
熟悉附有注释的 JavaScript，例如 Typescript 或 Flow
服务器端 JavaScript 经验，能用 NodeJS、NextJS 等技术
设计可重复使用组件的经验
理想的技能组合：Javascript、ReactJS、Typescript、NodeJS、NextJS、MongoDB、Terraform、Docker、Kubernetes 和 AWS
福利：
具竞争力的薪资，包括可能增加的股权（有潜在的超高报酬）
成为具有高度自主权的创始团队一员
在全新的发展空间中定义和设定营销标准的机会
可选择完全远距工作
快节奏、具有挑战性和全球性业务的挑战
扁平、动态、透明的组织文化
description_english:
Also looking for a senior frontend engineer consultant. We only work with the best. We are going through hypergrowth.
You will:
Lay the foundation for our consumer-facing web applications, establishing a culture of code documentation and component libraries
Work closely with the founding team to build an excellent consumer-oriented application, valuing design sensitivity, user experience, and practicality
Build a highly scalable and resilient system, fostering a culture of excellence
Write beautiful and fast-performing code that improves our codebase in meaningful ways
You are:
Someone who loves technology, enjoys hands-on work, is open-minded, and self-managing
Able to work and handle business with teammates, engineers, designers, and project managers in a highly collaborative environment
A firm believer that code should be simple and thoroughly validated
Someone who doesn't set self-limits; when you see a problem, you solve it
Experienced with good software engineering practices, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, continuous deployment, and testing
You have:
3-5+ years of experience with core fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Proficiency in at least one common JavaScript framework, such as Angular or React
Accustomed to writing responsive web applications
Familiar with typed JavaScript, such as Typescript or Flow
Server-side JavaScript experience with technologies like NodeJS, NextJS, etc.
Experience designing reusable components
Ideal skill set: Javascript, ReactJS, Typescript, NodeJS, NextJS, MongoDB, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS
Benefits:
Competitive salary, including potential for increased equity (with potentially very high returns)
Be part of a founding team with a high degree of autonomy
The opportunity to define and set marketing standards in a brand new development space
Option to work fully remotely
The challenge of a fast-paced, demanding, and global business
A flat, dynamic, and transparent organizational culture

title: 金融产品经理 - Remote
team: 某中型互联网金融公司
summary_chinese: RWA产品线规划,互联网金融,ToC产品,产品从0到1,理财/证券产品,数据驱动迭代
summary_english: RWA Product Line Planning,Internet Finance,ToC Products,Product 0-to-1 Experience,Wealth Management/Securities Products,Data-Driven Iteration
description:
工作职责 
1. 用户与市场驱动： 深入洞察目标用户（尤其是互联网理财用户）的痛点与需求，进行市场调研、竞品分析和用户访谈，定义产品的核心价值主张和差异化优势。 
2. 产品规划与设计： 负责 RWA 产品线的规划，撰写详尽的 PRD 文档，设计清晰流畅的用户旅程和产品原型，聚焦如何降低用户认知门槛和操作成本。 
3. 跨职能推进： 作为项目的核心驱动者，与工程、设计、运营、市场及合规团队紧密协
作，确保产品高效高质落地，并对最终的业务结果（用户增长、AUM、用户体验）负责。 
4. 数据导向迭代： 建立产品数据监控体系，深度分析用户行为和数据表现，持续进行A/B 测试和产品迭代，优化关键指标，实现增长闭环。 
5. 创新与探索： 持续跟踪全球 RWA 领域的最新趋势和创新案例，思考并将其转化为潜在的产品机会。 
 
工作要求 
必备条件： 
1. 年轻与驱动力： 我们看重候选人的潜力和能量远胜于候选人的年限。极度自驱，拥有强烈的 ownership意识，对成就和结果充满渴望，能在一个快节奏、模糊的环境中主动寻找机会和创造价值。 
2. 产品经验： 拥有 2-4 年成熟的 ToC 互联网产品经验，完整经历过产品从 0 到 1 或重要版本从设计到上线的全过程。 
3. 金融背景： 必须有互联网金融产品背景（如：理财 APP、证券交易 APP、基金产品、支付产品等），对金融用户的心理和行为有深刻理解。 
4. 核心能力： 出色的用户洞察力、逻辑分析能力和沟通协调能力。精通产品设计工具（如 Figma, Axure, Xmind 等）。 
5. 数据敏感： 具备良好的数据思维，能通过数据发现问题、驱动决策并评估效果。 
6. 学习能力： 对新生事物充满好奇心，具备快速学习、消化并应用新知识的能力。
description_chinese:
工作职责 
1. 用户与市场驱动： 深入洞察目标用户（尤其是互联网理财用户）的痛点与需求，进行市场调研、竞品分析和用户访谈，定义产品的核心价值主张和差异化优势。 
2. 产品规划与设计： 负责 RWA 产品线的规划，撰写详尽的 PRD 文档，设计清晰流畅的用户旅程和产品原型，聚焦如何降低用户认知门槛和操作成本。 
3. 跨职能推进： 作为项目的核心驱动者，与工程、设计、运营、市场及合规团队紧密协作，确保产品高效高质落地，并对最终的业务结果（用户增长、AUM、用户体验）负责。 
4. 数据导向迭代： 建立产品数据监控体系，深度分析用户行为和数据表现，持续进行A/B 测试和产品迭代，优化关键指标，实现增长闭环。 
5. 创新与探索： 持续跟踪全球 RWA 领域的最新趋势和创新案例，思考并将其转化为潜在的产品机会。 
 
工作要求 
必备条件： 
1. 年轻与驱动力： 我们看重候选人的潜力和能量远胜于候选人的年限。极度自驱，拥有强烈的 ownership意识，对成就和结果充满渴望，能在一个快节奏、模糊的环境中主动寻找机会和创造价值。 
2. 产品经验： 拥有 2-4 年成熟的 ToC 互联网产品经验，完整经历过产品从 0 到 1 或重要版本从设计到上线的全过程。 
3. 金融背景： 必须有互联网金融产品背景（如：理财 APP、证券交易 APP、基金产品、支付产品等），对金融用户的心理和行为有深刻理解。 
4. 核心能力： 出色的用户洞察力、逻辑分析能力和沟通协调能力。精通产品设计工具（如 Figma, Axure, Xmind 等）。 
5. 数据敏感： 具备良好的数据思维，能通过数据发现问题、驱动决策并评估效果。 
6. 学习能力： 对新生事物充满好奇心，具备快速学习、消化并应用新知识的能力。
description_english:
Responsibilities 
1. User and Market Driven: Gain deep insights into the pain points and needs of target users (especially internet wealth management users), conduct market research, competitor analysis, and user interviews to define the product's core value proposition and differentiation. 
2. Product Planning and Design: Responsible for planning the RWA product line, writing detailed PRD documents, and designing clear and smooth user journeys and product prototypes, focusing on reducing user cognitive barriers and operational costs. 
3. Cross-Functional Promotion: As the core driver of projects, collaborate closely with engineering, design, operations, marketing, and compliance teams to ensure efficient and high-quality product implementation, and be responsible for the final business results (user growth, AUM, user experience). 
4. Data-Driven Iteration: Establish a product data monitoring system, deeply analyze user behavior and data performance, continuously conduct A/B testing and product iterations to optimize key metrics and achieve a closed-loop growth. 
5. Innovation and Exploration: Continuously track the latest trends and innovative cases in the global RWA field, and contemplate how to transform them into potential product opportunities. 
 
Requirements 
Prerequisites: 
1. Youth and Drive: We value a candidate's potential and energy far more than their years of experience. Extremely self-driven, with a strong sense of ownership, a desire for achievement and results, and the ability to proactively seek opportunities and create value in a fast-paced, ambiguous environment. 
2. Product Experience: 2-4 years of mature ToC internet product experience, with complete experience in taking a product from 0 to 1 or a major version from design to launch. 
3. Financial Background: Must have a background in internet financial products (e.g., wealth management apps, stock trading apps, fund products, payment products), with a deep understanding of the psychology and behavior of financial users. 
4. Core Competencies: Excellent user insight, logical analysis, and communication/coordination skills. Proficient in product design tools (such as Figma, Axure, Xmind, etc.). 
5. Data Sensitivity: Possess strong data-driven thinking, able to identify problems, drive decisions, and evaluate effectiveness through data. 
6. Learning Ability: Curious about new things, with the ability to quickly learn, digest, and apply new knowledge.

title: 算力服务器交付【GPU Remote】
team: 上海往前文化科技有限公司
summary_chinese: GPU服务器运维,AI算力服务,Linux系统管理,GPU技术栈 (CUDA),Ansible自动化运维,7x24轮值,跨时区协作
summary_english: GPU Server Operations,AI Computing Services,Linux System Administration,GPU Tech Stack (CUDA),Ansible Automation O&M,7x24 On-call Shifts,Cross-timezone Collaboration
description:
岗位职责
全程对客户负责，统筹 GPU 算力服务器及网络设备全生命周期管理，涵盖机房上架、验收、固件更新、资产标签管理等全流程。
负责服务器硬件（主板、CPU、GPU 等）及网络设备（ToR 交换机、链路等）故障诊断与维修，协调客户停机时间，保障维修质量与效率。
管理 BMC 系统，完成批量配置、固件升级与安全加固；处理⽹络连通性排障，保障带外⽹络与业务⽹络稳定。
负责 GPU 服务器验收、健康巡检，安装维护 GPU 驱动、CUDA 等组件，优化 AI 训练 / 推理环境，配合客户排查相关问题。
主导 Linux 系统调优、自动化装机与补丁升级，通过 Ansible 等工具落地 ，搭建标准化运维体系。
搭建监控告警体系（Prometheus/Zabbix 等），负责故障应急响应、根因分析（RCA）与复盘，设计⾼可用及容灾方案，保障 SLO/SLA 达成。
任职要求
本科及以上学历，计算机 / 电子信息等相关专业，具备服务器及网络设备运维实战经验。
精通 Linux 系统管理与调优，熟悉 TCP/IP 协议、网络排障工具，能独立完成服务器硬件与网络设备故障排查。
掌握 GPU 相关技术（驱动、CUDA 等），了解 Kubernetes GPU 资源编排，有 AI 算力集群运维经验者优先。
熟练使用 Ansible 等自动化工具，具备 Shell/Python/Go 任一脚本开发能力，有 IaC 实践经验加分。
具备出色的客户服务意识与跨团队沟通能力，能在压力下快速响应故障，保障服务恢复。
接受 7x24 轮值值班，美国岗位需适配当地工作时区，深圳岗位需配合应急响应轮值。
加分项
有大模型训练集群、AIGC 业务或大规模 IDC 运维经验。
熟悉 Kubernetes GPU 资源编排、GitOps/CI/CD 或 NVIDIA DCGM 等工具。
掌握 RDMA/IB 网络技术，或主流服务器（Dell/Supermicro）、GPU 硬件生态。
英文沟通流利（美国岗优先），具备客户项目全流程主导经验。
上海往前文化科技有限公司是一家立足于中国、以合规为核心的服务实体。我们为科技和金融领域的国际客户提供关键的运营支持，助力他们在华建立高效合规的本地运营，从而专注于全球创新与发展。

我们的服务 (Our Services):
●人力资源与运营支持 (Human Resources & Operational Support)
●我们提供全面的本地人力资源管理和员工支持服务，确保您的团队架构清晰、合规且获得充分赋能。
●技术与交付支持 (Technology & Delivery Support)
●我们的团队提供可靠的系统维护、质量保证测试和技术支持，确保您本地业务的稳定性和可扩展性。
流程整合与本地化支持 (Process Integration & Local Enablement)
●我们致力于融合全球标准与本地实践，提供量身定制的流程优化与整合支持，确保高效无缝的市场进入与运营。
●数据管理与项目协调 (Data Management & Project Coordination)
我们提供严格符合本地法规的安全数据汇总、分析和管理服务，以及专业的跨部门项目协调，确保项目的成功实施。

description_english:
Responsibilities
Be fully responsible for the client, overseeing the entire lifecycle management of GPU compute servers and network equipment, covering the entire process from rack installation, acceptance, firmware updates, to asset tag management.
Responsible for diagnosing and repairing server hardware (motherboards, CPUs, GPUs, etc.) and network equipment (ToR switches, links, etc.), coordinating downtime with clients, and ensuring repair quality and efficiency.
Manage BMC systems, performing bulk configurations, firmware upgrades, and security hardening; handle network connectivity troubleshooting to ensure the stability of out-of-band and business networks.
Responsible for GPU server acceptance and health checks, installing and maintaining components like GPU drivers and CUDA, optimizing AI training/inference environments, and assisting clients in troubleshooting related issues.
Lead Linux system optimization, automated OS installation, and patch upgrades, implementing a standardized operations system using tools like Ansible.
Build monitoring and alert systems (e.g., Prometheus/Zabbix), be responsible for incident response, root cause analysis (RCA) and post-mortems, design high-availability and disaster recovery solutions to ensure SLO/SLA achievement.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Electronic Information, or a related field, with practical experience in server and network equipment operations.
Proficient in Linux system administration and tuning, familiar with the TCP/IP protocol and network troubleshooting tools, capable of independently troubleshooting server hardware and network equipment failures.
Mastery of GPU-related technologies (drivers, CUDA, etc.), understanding of Kubernetes GPU resource orchestration; experience in operating AI compute clusters is a plus.
Proficient with automation tools like Ansible, with scripting skills in at least one of Shell/Python/Go; experience with IaC is a bonus.
Possess excellent customer service awareness and cross-team communication skills, with the ability to respond quickly to incidents under pressure and ensure service recovery.
Willing to accept 7x24 on-call shifts. The US position requires adapting to the local time zone, and the Shenzhen position requires participating in on-call rotations for emergency response.
Bonus Points
Experience with large model training clusters, AIGC business, or large-scale IDC operations.
Familiar with tools like Kubernetes GPU resource orchestration, GitOps/CI/CD, or NVIDIA DCGM.
Knowledge of RDMA/IB networking technologies, or the ecosystem of mainstream servers (Dell/Supermicro) and GPU hardware.
Fluent in English communication (preferred for US positions), with experience leading the entire lifecycle of client projects.
Forward Culture Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. is a service entity based in China with a core focus on compliance. We provide crucial operational support to international clients in the technology and financial sectors, helping them establish efficient and compliant local operations in China, thereby enabling them to focus on global innovation and development.

Our Services:
● Human Resources & Operational Support
● We provide comprehensive local human resources management and employee support services to ensure your team structure is clear, compliant, and fully empowered.
● Technology & Delivery Support
● Our team offers reliable system maintenance, quality assurance testing, and technical support to ensure the stability and scalability of your local business.
Process Integration & Local Enablement
● We are dedicated to integrating global standards with local practices, providing tailored process optimization and integration support to ensure an efficient and seamless market entry and operation.
● Data Management & Project Coordination
We offer secure data aggregation, analysis, and management services that strictly comply with local regulations, along with professional cross-departmental project coordination to ensure successful project implementation.

title: Sales Operation (Remote)
team: 上海敬衡数据科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 销售运营支持,销售流程优化,销售数据分析,CRM系统,预算与佣金管理,英语流利
summary_english: Sales Operations Support,Sales Process Optimization,Sales Data Analysis,CRM System,Budget and Commission Management,Fluent in English
description:
Key Responsibilities
1.Provide day-to-day operational support to the global sales team, ensuring timely resolution of inquiries and operational issues.
2.Facilitate effective cross-department coordination and follow-up to ensure smooth operation of sales processes.
3.Identify operational gaps, inefficiencies, and risks in existing sales processes; propose and implement actionable improvements.
4.Support system enhancements, CRM optimization initiatives, and workflow automation projects to improve sales efficiency.
5.Assist the CEO in preparing annual and quarterly sales budgets and planning documents.
6.Track budget utilization, monitor performance trends, forecast resource needs, and report deviations to senior management.
7.Support the CEO in drafting, optimizing, and implementing sales-related SOPs and operational workflows.
8.Coordinate sales recruitment processes with HR, including scheduling and documentation.
9.Assist with onboarding and training arrangements for new sales team members to ensure strong integration and performance readiness.
10.Prepare weekly, monthly, and quarterly sales performance reports for management review.
11.Review performance results with the CEO and provide meaningful insights, analysis, and improvement recommendations.
12.Organize recurring meetings between the CEO, Sales Directors, and regional sales teams, including agenda preparation and follow-ups.
13.Prepare monthly sales commission reports and commission payout summaries.
14.Collaborate with Finance and HR to ensure accurate and timely commission payments.
Qualifications & Requirements
1.Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Sales, Operations Management, or a related field.
2.1-3 years of experience in sales operations, business operations, or relevant -administrative support roles.
3.Strong English proficiency in both written and spoken communication; Chinese language ability is an advantage.
4.Strong communication, coordination, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with global teams.
5.High attention to detail, strong sense of responsibility, and excellent organizational skills.
6.Proficiency in Excel and strong analytical/reporting capabilities.
7.Ability to manage confidential information with professionalism and discretion.
8.Fluency in English in oral, writing. Chinese languages is a plus.
上海敬衡数据科技有限公司是成立于2019年3月21日的一站式技术服务供应商， 致力于为企业提供全面化、整体化、精准化的技术支持服务。公司拥有一支年轻化、专业化、领先于同行业的精英团队。公司基于各地区合规要求和科学精准的服务， 从多地客户的实际需求出发，迅速起步和发展。目前业务已遍布中国大陆及港澳台地区，服务网络辐射国内多个城市。
description_chinese:
主要职责
1.为全球销售团队提供日常运营支持，确保及时解决问询和运营问题。
2.促进有效的跨部门协调和跟进，确保销售流程的顺利运作。
3.识别现有销售流程中的运营差距、低效和风险；提出并实施可行的改进措施。
4.支持系统增强、CRM优化项目和工作流自动化项目，以提高销售效率。
5.协助CEO准备年度和季度销售预算及规划文件。
6.跟踪预算使用情况，监控绩效趋势，预测资源需求，并向高级管理层报告偏差。
7.支持CEO起草、优化和实施与销售相关的SOP和操作工作流。
8.与人力资源部门协调销售招聘流程，包括安排和文件记录。
9.协助新销售团队成员的入职和培训安排，确保其良好融入并准备好发挥绩效。
10.为管理层审查准备每周、每月和每季度的销售业绩报告。
11.与CEO一同审查业绩结果，并提供有意义的见解、分析和改进建议。
12.组织CEO、销售总监和区域销售团队之间的定期会议，包括议程准备和后续跟进。
13.准备月度销售佣金报告和佣金支付摘要。
14.与财务和人力资源部门合作，确保准确及时地支付佣金。
资格与要求
1.工商管理、销售、运营管理或相关领域的学士学位。
2.1-3年销售运营、业务运营或相关行政支持岗位经验。
3.出色的英语书面和口头沟通能力；具备中文能力者优先。
4.强大的沟通、协调和人际交往能力，能与全球团队有效合作。
5.高度注重细节，责任心强，组织能力出色。
6.精通Excel，具备强大的分析/报告能力。
7.能够以专业和审慎的态度处理机密信息。
8.英语口语、写作流利。懂中文者优先。
上海敬衡数据科技有限公司是成立于2019年3月21日的一站式技术服务供应商， 致力于为企业提供全面化、整体化、精准化的技术支持服务。公司拥有一支年轻化、专业化、领先于同行业的精英团队。公司基于各地区合规要求和科学精准的服务， 从多地客户的实际需求出发，迅速起步和发展。目前业务已遍布中国大陆及港澳台地区，服务网络辐射国内多个城市。
description_english:
Key Responsibilities
1.Provide day-to-day operational support to the global sales team, ensuring timely resolution of inquiries and operational issues.
2.Facilitate effective cross-department coordination and follow-up to ensure smooth operation of sales processes.
3.Identify operational gaps, inefficiencies, and risks in existing sales processes; propose and implement actionable improvements.
4.Support system enhancements, CRM optimization initiatives, and workflow automation projects to improve sales efficiency.
5.Assist the CEO in preparing annual and quarterly sales budgets and planning documents.
6.Track budget utilization, monitor performance trends, forecast resource needs, and report deviations to senior management.
7.Support the CEO in drafting, optimizing, and implementing sales-related SOPs and operational workflows.
8.Coordinate sales recruitment processes with HR, including scheduling and documentation.
9.Assist with onboarding and training arrangements for new sales team members to ensure strong integration and performance readiness.
10.Prepare weekly, monthly, and quarterly sales performance reports for management review.
11.Review performance results with the CEO and provide meaningful insights, analysis, and improvement recommendations.
12.Organize recurring meetings between the CEO, Sales Directors, and regional sales teams, including agenda preparation and follow-ups.
13.Prepare monthly sales commission reports and commission payout summaries.
14.Collaborate with Finance and HR to ensure accurate and timely commission payments.
Qualifications & Requirements
1.Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Sales, Operations Management, or a related field.
2.1-3 years of experience in sales operations, business operations, or relevant administrative support roles.
3.Strong English proficiency in both written and spoken communication; Chinese language ability is an advantage.
4.Strong communication, coordination, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with global teams.
5.High attention to detail, strong sense of responsibility, and excellent organizational skills.
6.Proficiency in Excel and strong analytical/reporting capabilities.
7.Ability to manage confidential information with professionalism and discretion.
8.Fluency in English in oral, writing. Chinese languages is a plus.
Shanghai Jingheng Data Technology Co., Ltd., established on March 21, 2019, is a one-stop technology service provider dedicated to offering comprehensive, integrated, and precise technical support services to enterprises. The company boasts a young, professional, and industry-leading elite team. Based on regional compliance requirements and scientific, precise services, the company has rapidly launched and developed by addressing the actual needs of clients from various locations. Currently, its business has expanded across mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan, with a service network covering multiple cities domestically.

title: AI agent工程师(remote)
team: 上海某小型大数据公司
summary: agent,LLM,大模型算法,langchain
summary_chinese: 构建AI Agent架构,LangChain/LangGraph,RAG系统开发,多Agent协同,LLM应用落地,Python
summary_english: AI Agent Architecture Construction,LangChain/LangGraph,RAG System Development,Multi-Agent Collaboration,LLM Application Implementation,Python
description:
核心框架搭建：基于 LangChain/LangGraph 等框架，设计并实现支持 CoT/ReAct 推理范式的 Agent 架构，落地任务拆解、状态管理与多步决策逻辑。
记忆与知识系统开发：构建 STM/LTM（短期 / 长期记忆）架构，集成 Hybrid RAG 与向量数据库，优化上下文检索、记忆压缩及知识整合能力。
⼯具与协同⽣态建设：开发⼯具调用平台，支持第三⽅系统 / API 集成，设计 MCP 协议与多 Agent 协同机制，实现 Agent-to-Agent 高效通信。
系统优化与工程落地：优化模型调用效率、令牌消耗及响应延迟，搭建高可用、高并发的分布式部署架构，保障系统稳定性与扩展性。
技术创新与迭代：跟进 AI Agent 领域前沿技术，将大模型微调、DSL 执行引擎等技术应用于业务，推动 Agent 平台功能迭代与性能升级。
三、任职要求
（一）核心要求
计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，2 年以上后端开发经验，1 年以上 AI Agent 或 LLM 应用落地经验。
精通 Python/Java/Rust 等至少一门编程语言，深入理解状态机、任务调度、并发执行等系统编程概念。
熟悉 Agent 核心技术栈，包括 LangChain/LangGraph/Autogen 等框架，掌握 Tool Calling、多 Agent 协同等关键机制。
具备 RAG 系统搭建经验，熟悉 Milvus/Chroma 等向量数据库，了解意图识别与记忆管理原理。
有扎实的工程落地能力，熟悉 Docker/K8s 部署，具备微服务架构设计与性能调优经验。
（二）加分项
有企业级多 Agent 协同系统或复杂工作流引擎完整落地案例。
具备大模型微调（LoRA/PEFT）、Prompt 工程或 Agent 评估体系搭建经验。
熟悉智能合约、链上系统或 DSL（领域专用语言）开发，有相关场景 Agent 落地经验。
参与过 LangChain 等开源项目贡献，或有个人技术博客 / 项目成果可展示。
description_chinese:
岗位职责：
- 核心框架搭建：基于 LangChain/LangGraph 等框架，设计并实现支持 CoT/ReAct 推理范式的 Agent 架构，落地任务拆解、状态管理与多步决策逻辑。
- 记忆与知识系统开发：构建 STM/LTM（短期 / 长期记忆）架构，集成 Hybrid RAG 与向量数据库，优化上下文检索、记忆压缩及知识整合能力。
- 工具与协同生态建设：开发工具调用平台，支持第三方系统 / API 集成，设计 MCP 协议与多 Agent 协同机制，实现 Agent-to-Agent 高效通信。
- 系统优化与工程落地：优化模型调用效率、令牌消耗及响应延迟，搭建高可用、高并发的分布式部署架构，保障系统稳定性与扩展性。
- 技术创新与迭代：跟进 AI Agent 领域前沿技术，将大模型微调、DSL 执行引擎等技术应用于业务，推动 Agent 平台功能迭代与性能升级。

任职要求：
（一）核心要求
- 计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，2 年以上后端开发经验，1 年以上 AI Agent 或 LLM 应用落地经验。
- 精通 Python/Java/Rust 等至少一门编程语言，深入理解状态机、任务调度、并发执行等系统编程概念。
- 熟悉 Agent 核心技术栈，包括 LangChain/LangGraph/Autogen 等框架，掌握 Tool Calling、多 Agent 协同等关键机制。
- 具备 RAG 系统搭建经验，熟悉 Milvus/Chroma 等向量数据库，了解意图识别与记忆管理原理。
- 有扎实的工程落地能力，熟悉 Docker/K8s 部署，具备微服务架构设计与性能调优经验。
（二）加分项
- 有企业级多 Agent 协同系统或复杂工作流引擎完整落地案例。
- 具备大模型微调（LoRA/PEFT）、Prompt 工程或 Agent 评估体系搭建经验。
- 熟悉智能合约、链上系统或 DSL（领域专用语言）开发，有相关场景 Agent 落地经验。
- 参与过 LangChain 等开源项目贡献，或有个人技术博客 / 项目成果可展示。
description_english:
Job Responsibilities:
- Core Framework Construction: Based on frameworks like LangChain/LangGraph, design and implement an Agent architecture that supports CoT/ReAct reasoning paradigms, and implement task decomposition, state management, and multi-step decision logic.
- Memory and Knowledge System Development: Build an STM/LTM (Short-Term/Long-Term Memory) architecture, integrate Hybrid RAG with vector databases, and optimize context retrieval, memory compression, and knowledge integration capabilities.
- Tool and Collaborative Ecosystem Building: Develop a tool-calling platform, support third-party system/API integration, design MCP protocols and multi-Agent collaboration mechanisms, and achieve efficient Agent-to-Agent communication.
- System Optimization and Engineering Implementation: Optimize model calling efficiency, token consumption, and response latency; build a high-availability, high-concurrency distributed deployment architecture to ensure system stability and scalability.
- Technological Innovation and Iteration: Keep up with cutting-edge technologies in the AI Agent field, apply technologies such as large model fine-tuning and DSL execution engines to the business, and drive the functional iteration and performance upgrade of the Agent platform.

Requirements:
(I) Core Requirements
- Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related majors, with over 2 years of backend development experience and over 1 year of experience in implementing AI Agent or LLM applications.
- Proficient in at least one programming language such as Python/Java/Rust, with a deep understanding of system programming concepts like state machines, task scheduling, and concurrent execution.
- Familiar with the core Agent technology stack, including frameworks like LangChain/LangGraph/Autogen, and master key mechanisms such as Tool Calling and multi-Agent collaboration.
- Experience in building RAG systems, familiar with vector databases like Milvus/Chroma, and understand the principles of intent recognition and memory management.
- Solid engineering implementation capabilities, familiar with Docker/K8s deployment, and have experience in microservices architecture design and performance tuning.
(II) Bonus Points
- Have complete implementation cases of enterprise-level multi-Agent collaboration systems or complex workflow engines.
- Experience in large model fine-tuning (LoRA/PEFT), Prompt Engineering, or building Agent evaluation systems.
- Familiar with smart contracts, on-chain systems, or DSL (Domain-Specific Language) development, with experience in implementing Agents in related scenarios.
- Have contributed to open-source projects like LangChain, or have personal technical blogs/project achievements to showcase.

title: golang（remote）
team: 某知名互联网公司
summary: Golang,Golang服务端开发经验,计算机相关专业,中大型项目开发经验,系统架构设计经验
summary_chinese: 核心业务后台开发,高并发系统架构,分布式/微服务,金融行业,Docker/Kubernetes,5年以上经验
summary_english: Core Business Backend Development,High-concurrency System Architecture,Distributed/Microservices,Finance Industry,Docker/Kubernetes,5+ years of experience
description:
工作职责：
- 负责公司核心业务系统的后台开发工作，确保任务按时、高质量交付。
- 参与⾼并发、复杂业务系统的架构设计和优化，提升系统的性能和稳定性。
- 参与技术⽅案的制定和评审，推动关键技术问题的解决和技术难题的攻克。
- 维护和优化现有系统，持续改进系统的可扩展性、可维护性和安全性。
任职资格：
- 计算机科学或相关专业本科及以上学历，5年以上⼯作经验。
- 精通Golang开发，具备扎实的编程功底和良好的代码习惯，熟练掌握Linux操作系统和计算机网络知识。
- 深入理解Golang协程机制，精通channel和锁的使⽤，对高并发、高可用系统架构有深入的理解和实践经验。
- 熟悉业务开发相关的技术栈，包括常见的数据库、网络协议、缓存（如Redis）、消息队列，有丰富的API设计经验。
- 优秀的分析问题和解决问题的能力，能够快速定位并解决系统中的瓶颈和故障。
- 良好的团队合作精神和沟通能力。
加分项：
- 有大型分布式系统或微服务架构的开发经验。
- 熟悉Docker、Kubernetes等容器化技术。
- 有金融行业经验。

description_english:
Responsibilities:
- Responsible for the backend development of the company's core business systems, ensuring tasks are delivered on time and with high quality.
- Participate in the architectural design and optimization of high-concurrency, complex business systems to enhance system performance and stability.
- Participate in the formulation and review of technical solutions, driving the resolution of key technical issues and overcoming technical challenges.
- Maintain and optimize existing systems, continuously improving their scalability, maintainability, and security.
Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or a related field, with over 5 years of work experience.
- Proficient in Golang development with a solid programming foundation and good coding habits; skilled in the Linux operating system and computer networking.
- In-depth understanding of Golang's concurrency mechanisms, proficient in the use of channels and locks, with a deep understanding and practical experience in high-concurrency, high-availability system architecture.
- Familiar with the technology stack for business development, including common databases, network protocols, caching (e.g., Redis), message queues, and possess rich API design experience.
- Excellent problem-analysis and problem-solving skills, able to quickly locate and resolve system bottlenecks and failures.
- Good teamwork spirit and communication skills.
Bonus Points:
- Experience in developing large-scale distributed systems or microservices architectures.
- Familiarity with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.
- Experience in the financial industry.

1、本科及以上学历，双一流院校优先，计算机相关专业，1-2年系统设计及开发经验，有⼤型平台级软件开发及⼤⼚经验优先

3、有大规模高并发架构设计和开发经验， 掌握分布式、⾼并发的程序设计以及性能调优
4、有优秀的系统设计能力，对业界数据库中间件、消息中间件及其他大规模分布式系统的基础架构组件有深入理解
5、有较好的分析问题和解决问题的能力，有较好的抗压能力
6、有owner意识，主动负责；对AI有兴趣，并且使用AI工具辅助开发
7、有web3相关经验优先
深圳希言信创技术有限公司（简称希言信创）成立于2022年，由多位在投资领域从业多年的一线工作者创立。企业坚持核心技术自主研发，运用AI、大数据、云计算等新技术，打造财经资讯+数据+行情+AI+社区互动+UGC的综合性网站+大数据服务平台，为广大投资者提供决策相关工具。
description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for business requirement analysis, technical solution design, and requirement development.
2. Responsible for building and maintaining high-performance, high-reliability backend Golang systems to ensure service SLA.
3. Responsible for technology architecture selection, continuous optimization of system architecture, and proactively driving implementation.
Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above, with priority given to candidates from Double First-Class universities; major in computer science or related fields; 1-2 years of experience in system design and development; experience in large-scale platform-level software development and at major tech companies is a plus.
2. Familiar with Golang-related technologies and frameworks, and familiar with microservices architecture.
3. Experience in large-scale, high-concurrency architecture design and development; proficient in distributed, high-concurrency programming and performance tuning.
4. Excellent system design skills; in-depth understanding of industry-standard database middleware, message middleware, and other infrastructure components of large-scale distributed systems.
5. Strong ability to analyze and solve problems, with good resilience under pressure.
6. Possess a sense of ownership and take initiative; interested in AI and uses AI tools to assist in development.
7. Experience with Web3 is a plus.
Shenzhen Xiyan Xinchuang Technology Co., Ltd. (referred to as Xiyan Xinchuang) was established in 2022, founded by several frontline professionals with many years of experience in the investment sector. The company is committed to independent research and development of core technologies, utilizing new technologies such as AI, big data, and cloud computing to create a comprehensive website and big data service platform that integrates financial information, data, market quotes, AI, community interaction, and UGC, providing decision-making tools for investors.

title: Web3 Marketing Campaign（remote）
team: 某国内知名互联网金融公司
summary: 一般企业（甲方）,市场营销/广告相关专业,英语可作为工作语言,营销策划及执行,金融
summary_chinese: 整合营销活动策划,Web3行业,品牌曝光与用户增长,英语流利,加密货币市场认知,文案创作
summary_english: Integrated Marketing Campaign Planning,Web3 Industry,Brand Exposure & User Growth,Fluent in English,Crypto Market Knowledge,Copywriting
description:
1.统筹并细化营销活动全环节，涵盖活动机制、品牌包装、配套物料等核心内容。
2.联动品牌侧与活动侧，推动品牌曝光及用户规模增长。
3.搭建并维护公司全球及本地营销活动日历，保障活动排期清晰可控。
4.跨团队协作，推进活动优化与主题整合，提升活动协同性。
5.负责活动相关文案撰写与校对，确保内容准确合规。
6.审核所有营销活动物料及方案，保障输出质量。
7.多渠道监测活动数据，完成效果分析并输出可落地的优化建议。
8.落地 “测试 - 迭代” 营销策略，保障活动目标达成。
9.支持付费获客、推荐裂变及联合营销类活动的上线执行。
任职要求
1.英语流利，可顺畅对接海外协作方，掌握其他语种者优先。
2.具备整合营销活动实操经验，3年及以上相关工作经历。
3.有项目管理能力，且对加密货币市场有基础认知。
4.擅长或热衷文案创作，熟悉品牌建设、效果营销及数据分析逻辑。
5.有大型团队及多利益相关方项目管理经验。
6.责任心强、抗压能力优，自驱力足且结果导向。

description_english:
1.Coordinate and detail all aspects of marketing campaigns, including campaign mechanics, brand packaging, and supporting materials.
2.Collaborate with brand and campaign teams to drive brand exposure and user base growth.
3.Build and maintain the company's global and local marketing campaign calendar, ensuring a clear and manageable schedule.
4.Collaborate across teams to promote campaign optimization and theme integration, enhancing campaign synergy.
5.Responsible for writing and proofreading campaign-related copy to ensure accuracy and compliance.
6.Review all marketing campaign materials and plans to ensure output quality.
7.Monitor campaign data across multiple channels, complete performance analysis, and provide actionable optimization suggestions.
8.Implement a "test-iterate" marketing strategy to ensure campaign goals are met.
9.Support the execution of paid acquisition, referral fission, and co-marketing campaigns.
Requirements
1.Fluent in English for smooth collaboration with overseas partners; proficiency in other languages is a plus.
2.Hands-on experience in integrated marketing campaigns, with 3+ years of relevant work experience.
3.Project management skills and a basic understanding of the cryptocurrency market.
4.Skilled in or passionate about copywriting, familiar with brand building, performance marketing, and data analysis logic.
5.Experience managing projects with large teams and multiple stakeholders.
6.Strong sense of responsibility, excellent ability to work under pressure, self-motivated, and results-oriented.

title: rust工程师（remote，SG,HK,深圳，新组建）
team: 某大型互联网金融上市公司
summary: rust,WASM,高性能公链,密码学
summary_chinese: 跨平台架构设计,Rust,系统编程,WebAssembly(WASM),FFI,区块链,金融科技
summary_english: Cross-platform Architecture Design,Rust,Systems Programming,WebAssembly (WASM),FFI,Blockchain,FinTech
description:
Rust工程师
职位概述
作为Rust工程师，您将在塑造和推进公司下一代跨平台架构中发挥关键作用。您将设计、构建和优化⽀持多平台产品的核⼼服务与框架。该职位需要深厚的Rust技术专长、解决复杂架构挑战的创造⼒，以及推动规模化工程卓越的能力。这是⼀个在快速发展行业中领导变革性举措的独特机会，同时能与世界一流的工程团队合作。
您将负责
领导Rust跨平台软件组件的设计与开发，确保一流的性能、安全性和可靠性
构建可部署于不同操作系统和硬件架构的可扩展、可维护系统
制定并执行编码标准、测试框架和CI/CD实践，确保代码质量和开发效率
解决涉及FFI绑定、系统集成和平台特定优化的复杂互操作性挑战
作为应用架构的技术权威，推动性能、稳定性和可扩展性方面的改进
通过关注Rust生态系统、跨平台框架和开发工具的前沿趋势，推动创新
通过Rust最佳实践、系统设计和架构原则的指导，赋能跨团队工程师
我们寻找的候选人
计算机科学、软件工程或相关专业学士学位，硕士优先
6年以上生产级软件开发经验，其中3年以上专注于Rust
精通Rust，包括所有权与借用、生命周期、异步编程、不安全Rust和FFI集成
扎实掌握Rust编译器内部原理、WebAssembly（WASM）和现代构建工具链
深入了解系统编程，包括并发模型、内存管理、CPU架构和性能分析
扎实的数据结构、算法和操作系统基础
出色的沟通和领导能力，有指导工程师和交付复杂系统的成功经验
加分项
积极参与Rust开源社区或有影响力的公共项目
有区块链系统、智能合约或密码学协议经验
有高性能或嵌入式系统开发背景，强调性能调优和优化
有交易系统或金融科技平台经验

description_english:
Rust Engineer
Position Overview
As a Rust Engineer, you will play a key role in shaping and advancing the company's next-generation cross-platform architecture. You will design, build, and optimize core services and frameworks that support multi-platform products. This position requires deep technical expertise in Rust, creativity in solving complex architectural challenges, and the ability to drive engineering excellence at scale. This is a unique opportunity to lead transformative initiatives in a fast-paced industry while collaborating with a world-class engineering team.
You will be responsible for
Leading the design and development of Rust cross-platform software components, ensuring top-tier performance, security, and reliability
Building scalable and maintainable systems deployable on various operating systems and hardware architectures
Establishing and executing coding standards, testing frameworks, and CI/CD practices to ensure code quality and development efficiency
Solving complex interoperability challenges involving FFI bindings, system integration, and platform-specific optimizations
Acting as the technical authority on application architecture, driving improvements in performance, stability, and scalability
Driving innovation by staying at the forefront of trends in the Rust ecosystem, cross-platform frameworks, and development tools
Empowering engineers across teams by providing guidance on Rust best practices, system design, and architectural principles
What we are looking for
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field; Master's degree preferred
6+ years of experience in production-grade software development, with 3+ years focused on Rust
Proficiency in Rust, including ownership and borrowing, lifetimes, asynchronous programming, unsafe Rust, and FFI integration
Solid understanding of Rust compiler internals, WebAssembly (WASM), and modern build toolchains
In-depth knowledge of systems programming, including concurrency models, memory management, CPU architecture, and performance profiling
Solid foundation in data structures, algorithms, and operating systems
Excellent communication and leadership skills, with a proven track record of mentoring engineers and delivering complex systems
Bonus Points
Active participation in the Rust open-source community or impactful public projects
Experience with blockchain systems, smart contracts, or cryptographic protocols
Background in high-performance or embedded systems development, with an emphasis on performance tuning and optimization
Experience with trading systems or FinTech platforms

2. 用户增长与活动执行
-策划并落地AMA、空投、支付体验等活动，明确以Dogpay APP的拉新、激活和提升用户留存为首要目标；
-跟踪社媒流量（TikTok、YouTube等）在APP内的转化数据，分析用户从关注到下载、从下载到付费的完整漏斗，形成复盘报告，持续优化运营策略；
-建立用户分层意识，针对新用户、沉默用户等不同群体，在社媒及社群内策划精准的激活与召回活动。
3. 合作与资源拓展
-对接海外媒体、支付行业社区、KOL，推动联合推广，核心考核指标为为Dogpay APP带来的高质量新增用户；
-参与国际行业会议，提升Dogpay品牌与APP产品的知名度。
任职要求：
-本科及以上学历，市场营销、国际商务、金融科技、语言类专业优先；
-具备1年以上运营或新媒体经验，有APP产品运营、用户增长或数据运营经验者极佳，有支付、金融科技等项目经验者优先；
-熟悉海外主流社交媒体玩法(TikTok、YouTube等)，并能够理解社媒运营如何服务于APP产品增长；
-对支付/跨境支付产品有一定了解，能快速学习并转化为用户友好的内容；
-具备强数据分析意识与能力，能够跟踪分析社媒渠道对APP下载、注册、留存等核心指标的影响，并据此优化工作；
-英文读写流利(能作为工作语言)，具备跨文化沟通能力；
-有责任心和执行力，善于与产品、数据等团队协作。
一家专注于跨境支付的公司
