description_english:
Work Period: Long-term part-time
Weekly Workload: 5 days or more
Working Hours: Flexible
Work Schedule: Flexible
Payment Method: Monthly
Application Deadline: 2027-01-01
Responsibilities:
1. Payment Product Operations and Feature Promotion
- In conjunction with Dogpay's payment services (cross-border payments, acquiring, cards, etc.), design product introductions and educational content to significantly increase the usage rate and user stickiness of core payment functions within the app.
- Work closely with the product team to collect and analyze user behavior feedback from social media to the app, optimizing the promotion path and user guidance process for the payment product in overseas markets.
- Monitor and analyze the penetration rate of key in-app features, and plan special content and activities for improvement.
2. User Growth and Campaign Execution
- Plan and execute activities such as AMAs, airdrops, and payment experience campaigns, with the primary goal of acquiring, activating, and retaining users for the Dogpay app.
- Track the conversion data of social media traffic (TikTok, YouTube, etc.) within the app, analyze the complete funnel from follow to download and from download to payment, generate review reports, and continuously optimize operational strategies.
- Develop an awareness of user segmentation and plan targeted activation and recall campaigns on social media and in communities for different groups such as new users and inactive users.
3. Partnership and Resource Expansion
- Liaise with overseas media, payment industry communities, and KOLs to promote joint marketing efforts, with the core performance indicator being the acquisition of high-quality new users for the Dogpay app.
- Participate in international industry conferences to enhance the brand awareness of Dogpay and its app product.
Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree or above, with a preference for majors in Marketing, International Business, Fintech, or Languages.
- At least 1 year of experience in operations or new media; experience in app product operations, user growth, or data operations is highly desirable; experience in payment, fintech, or related projects is a plus.
- Familiar with the mechanics of major overseas social media platforms (TikTok, YouTube, etc.) and understand how social media operations can contribute to app product growth.
- Have some understanding of payment/cross-border payment products and can quickly learn and translate this knowledge into user-friendly content.
- Strong data analysis awareness and skills, with the ability to track and analyze the impact of social media channels on core metrics like app downloads, registrations, and retention, and optimize work accordingly.
- Fluent in written and spoken English (can be used as a working language), with cross-cultural communication skills.
- Responsible and proactive, with strong execution skills and adept at collaborating with product, data, and other teams.
A company focused on cross-border payments

title: crypto交易系统开发（C++）Remote/SH/SZ/HK
team: 某中型基金公司
summary: 高频开发,C++,交易所链接,MySQL,rust语言,tick,Linux开发/部署经验,crypto开发经验

description:
crypto交易系统开发(c++)    Remote/SH/SZ/HK
工作内容:
 实盘系统维护: 开发、部署、维护高性能的交易实盘执行系统，确保交易的高可靠性。
 交易所连接: 负责与多个crypto交易所的连接，优化数据传输速度，增加系统稳定性，提高执行效率。
能力要求:
- 教育背景: 毕业于国内或海外知名高校，具有数学、物理、计算机或相关理工科本科及以上学历。
编程技能:
- 精通C++，具备扎实的面向对象编程能力。
- 熟练掌握Python 或其他脚本语言，用于快速原型开发和数据分析。
技术经验:
- 有实际连接交易所API 并开发实盘交易程序的经验。
- 熟悉中高频交易系统的架构设计。
。

description_english:
Responsibilities:
 Live System Maintenance: Develop, deploy, and maintain high-performance live trading execution systems, ensuring high reliability of transactions.
 Exchange Connectivity: Responsible for connecting with multiple crypto exchanges, optimizing data transmission speed, enhancing system stability, and improving execution efficiency.
Requirements:
- Educational Background: Bachelor's degree or above in Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, or related STEM fields from a well-known university in China or abroad.
Programming Skills:
- Proficient in C++, with solid object-oriented programming skills.
- Skilled in Python or other scripting languages for rapid prototyping and data analysis.
Technical Experience:
- Experience in connecting to exchange APIs and developing live trading programs.
- Familiar with the architecture design of mid-to-high frequency trading systems.
.
Bonus Points:
- Crypto Industry Experience: Trading experience, familiarity with the interfaces and operational procedures of mainstream crypto exchanges. Experience as a developer in the quantitative trading industry is also a plus.
- Visualization Tool Development: Experience in developing and using web-based visualization tools (e.g., grafana) to present complex data results intuitively.

summary_english: Ad Media Buying Strategy,Facebook/Google Advertising,Data Analysis,Large Budget Management,Tech-Driven,Result-Oriented
description:
【职位职责】
1、根据产品规划与市场特性，制定并实施 Facebook/Google/Twitter 等广告媒体投放策略；
2、有系统性的投放思路，具有较强的数据意识，对广告成效负责；
3、管理并提升投放团队，对接产品、技术部门同事；
4、密切关注行业热点，跟综市场需求，分析竞品推广思路；
5、关注各类核心用户行为数据，不断完善广告投放的数据跟踪、归因和分析；
【任职要求】
1、本科以上学历，3 年以上海外广告投放优化经验；
2、熟悉Facebook/Google广告平台规则及操作技巧，了解广告平台机器学习的原理和触发机制；
3、有操盘大额投放预算经验的优先；
4、出色的逻辑和数据分析能力。
在 Cointracts，我们不提供朝九晚五的打卡生活，只提供通往自由与专业的船票。如果你厌倦了传统职场的繁文缛节，渴望在一个由技术驱动、以结果为导向的环境中释放潜能，这里就是你的主场。

title: Java工程师（支付行业 远程办公 英语流利）
team: 某中型互联网金融科技公司
summary: Golang,JVM,Java,On-Ramp,分布式经验,Kafka,Redis,Spring,接受居家办公,Docker,Crypto支付,MySQL,Off-Ramp,Spark,区块链经验
summary_chinese: Crypto支付网关开发,加密货币支付,On/Off-Ramp,Spring Boot,微服务架构,英语流利,Go
summary_english: Crypto Payment Gateway Development,Cryptocurrency Payments,On/Off-Ramp,Spring Boot,Microservices Architecture,Fluent English,Go
description:
主要职责
1. 基于PRD和接口文档，开发On-Ramp、Off-Ramp及Crypto支付网关的核心服务，包括API设计、业务逻辑和数据库优化。
2. 集成全球⽀付通道，处理交易流程、KYC/AML校验及异常重试，提升成功率和可靠性。
3. 与产品/QA团队协作，进⾏代码审查、单元/集成测试，推动CI/CD，确保代码质量和快速迭代。
4. 设计⾼并发架构，监控性能指标（如TPS、延迟），优化瓶颈，支持多链/Web3集成。
5. 排查生产问题，输出分析报告，优化开发者/客户集成体验。
任职要求
1. 经验背景：3年以上互联⽹/金融/支付后端经验，精通Java（Spring Boot优先），熟悉Go加分；至少1年Crypto/区块链开发，理解On/Off-Ramp流程和智能合约集成。
2. Web3与区块链基础：熟悉EVM链（如Ethereum/BSC），掌握账户模型、Gas/Nonce、交易确认及事件监听；有web3j/ethers.js等SDK交互经验，优先有钱包/稳定币集成。
3. 后端语言与框架：精通Java 8+异步/多线程编程；熟悉Go用于高性能API/链上服务。
4. 架构与基础设施：掌握微服务（Kubernetes/Docker）、消息队列（Kafka/RabbitMQ），设计API网关、支付路由、事件驱动系统。
5. 数据存储与优化：熟练MySQL/PostgreSQL（索引/事务/分库）、Redis（缓存/限流）；有支付流水/对账数据优化经验优先。
安全、合规与集成：第三方支付API经验（如Stripe/MoonPay）；熟悉OAuth2/JWT、加密防护、KYC/AML风控及审计日志。
6. DevOps与可观测性：CI/CD工具链、Prometheus/Grafana/ELK监控；基于TPS/延迟等指标优化系统。
7. 其他：英文流利（文档/会议/API编写）；问题解决强，注重代码维护性和团队协作。

description_english:
Main Responsibilities
1. Develop core services for On-Ramp, Off-Ramp, and Crypto payment gateways based on PRD and interface documentation, including API design, business logic, and database optimization.
2. Integrate global payment channels, handle transaction flows, KYC/AML verification, and exception retries to improve success rates and reliability.
3. Collaborate with Product/QA teams for code reviews, unit/integration testing, and promoting CI/CD to ensure code quality and rapid iteration.
4. Design high-concurrency architecture, monitor performance metrics (e.g., TPS, latency), optimize bottlenecks, and support multi-chain/Web3 integration.
5. Troubleshoot production issues, produce analysis reports, and optimize the integration experience for developers/clients.
Job Requirements
1. Experience Background: 3+ years of backend experience in internet/finance/payment, proficient in Java (Spring Boot preferred), familiarity with Go is a plus; at least 1 year of Crypto/blockchain development, with an understanding of On/Off-Ramp processes and smart contract integration.
2. Web3 & Blockchain Fundamentals: Familiar with EVM chains (e.g., Ethereum/BSC), understanding of account models, Gas/Nonce, transaction confirmations, and event listening; experience with SDK interactions like web3j/ethers.js, with wallet/stablecoin integration experience preferred.
3. Backend Languages & Frameworks: Proficient in Java 8+ asynchronous/multi-threaded programming; familiar with Go for high-performance API/on-chain services.
4. Architecture & Infrastructure: Mastery of microservices (Kubernetes/Docker), message queues (Kafka/RabbitMQ), and designing API gateways, payment routing, and event-driven systems.
5. Data Storage & Optimization: Skilled in MySQL/PostgreSQL (indexing/transactions/sharding), Redis (caching/rate limiting); experience in optimizing payment transaction/reconciliation data is preferred.
Security, Compliance & Integration: Experience with third-party payment APIs (e.g., Stripe/MoonPay); familiar with OAuth2/JWT, cryptographic protection, KYC/AML risk control, and audit logs.
6. DevOps & Observability: Experience with CI/CD toolchains, monitoring with Prometheus/Grafana/ELK; able to optimize systems based on metrics like TPS/latency.
7. Other: Fluent in English (for documentation/meetings/API writing); strong problem-solving skills, with a focus on code maintainability and teamwork.

title: 前端工程师（远程办公）
team: 上海往联互联网上网服务有限公司
summary: TypeScript,CSS,JavaScript,HTML5,接受居家办公,React,Webpack,前端开发经验

description:
【岗位亮点】
全远程 & 弹性工作时间，结果导向
React + Tailwind CSS 现代前端技术栈
鼓励并支持使用 Cursor / Augment Code 等 AI ⼯具提升开发效率
参与⾼并发、低延迟的交易系统，技术挑战丰富
职位描述：
1. 负责核⼼业务的前端开发，保障交互流畅与稳定；
2. 与产品、设计紧密协作，持续优化用户体验；
3. 基于 WebSocket 等实时通信技术，构建秒级数据更新与推送能力；
a. 对前端性能进⾏监控与优化，保证高并发场景下的加载与渲染效率；
4. 与后端、安全及 DevOps 团队合作，确保前后端数据交互的安全与高效；
5. 主动探索并落地新技术、新工具（特别是 AI 工具），提升团队生产力；
6. 维护高质量代码与文档，推动最佳实践在团队内落地；
7. 快速响应线上问题，保障平台安全稳定运行。
【任职要求】
1.熟练掌握 HTML5、CSS3、JavaScript/TypeScript，深入理解 React 及其生态；
2.精通javascript面向对象机制，能用原生javascript进行DOM编程；
3.熟悉业界常用Javascript库或框架（如React，Next, Vue等）；
4.熟悉或精通webpack打包构建机制，如有webpack性能优化、配置搭建等经验则更佳； 
6.快速学习，不断突破技术瓶颈，乐于探索未知领域，随时准备好去面对新挑战；
7.具备优秀程序员的基本素养，对代码有洁癖，遇到问题可以一查到底，善用工具，对工程效率有自己的见解；
【加分项】
知名一线公司就职经历
了解熟悉或精通业界常用Javascript库或框架的实现原理或设计思路；
有远程团队工作经验；
积极参与开源社区或技术分享。

title: 架构-技术框架(居家/远程办公)
team: 杭州长奇网络科技有限公司
summary: Golang,Java,微服务,SpringCloud,MySQL,云计算经验,消息队列,缓存,架构设计经验,接受居家办公
summary_chinese: 研发框架设计与落地,金融科技,Java,Go,微服务,分布式系统
summary_english: R&D Framework Design & Implementation,FinTech,Java,Go,Microservices,Distributed Systems
description:
一、主要职责  
1. 主导统一技术研发框架（Java/Go）设计与落地，包括但不限于微服务框架、缓存、任务调度、消息中间件、数据存储、基础组件
2. 制定相关的研发规范与标准，并推进研发团队落地
3. 制定并管理开源组件引入规范与标准，保证基础研发框架的安全
4. 研发落地统一框架与SDK（Starter/Lib/脚⼿架），沉淀默认稳定/默认安全最佳实践，降低接⼊与维护成本
5. 与CI/CD平台集成模板化流程与质量、安全流程检测与控制
6. 参与重⼤生产事故响应与复盘，沉淀为框架规则与自动化策略，持续提升系统韧性
⼆、技能要求    
1. 精通 Java 或 Go 至少一门，具备扎实的系统设计与高并发编程能力，可输出高质量研发框架与组件
2. 熟悉微服务框架(Spring Cloud、Dubbo/Go GRPC、Eureka/Consul/Nacos、Sentinel、Apisix)、缓存(Redis)、任务调度(xxl-job)、消息中间件(Kafka/RocketMQ)、存储(MySQL(MyBatis、Sharding-jdbc)/OSS(S3))中的主流组件至少3种，深入理解源码和原理，有实际的开发、调优、封装经验者优先
3. 具备工程化与推动力：依赖治理、兼容策略、模板化交付与文档能力，良好的跨团队沟通与落地推动能力
三、加分项  
1. 在交易或高并发金融领域主导过统一研发框架建设
2. 有大规模分布式系统或者基础中间件类库研发经验，熟悉主流开源中间件，深入了解实现机制，有社区贡献者优先
网络技术开发，欢迎对这个行业感兴趣的小伙伴加入

description_english:
I. Main Responsibilities
1. Lead the design and implementation of a unified technology R&D framework (Java/Go), including but not limited to microservices framework, caching, task scheduling, message middleware, data storage, and base components.
2. Formulate relevant R&D norms and standards, and promote their implementation within the R&D team.
3. Establish and manage norms and standards for introducing open-source components to ensure the security of the base R&D framework.
4. Develop and implement a unified framework and SDK (Starter/Lib/Scaffolding), accumulating best practices for default stability and security to reduce integration and maintenance costs.
5. Integrate templated processes, quality and security process checks, and controls with the CI/CD platform.
6. Participate in major production incident responses and post-mortems, consolidating learnings into framework rules and automated strategies to continuously enhance system resilience.
II. Skill Requirements
1. Proficient in at least one of Java or Go, with solid system design and high-concurrency programming skills, capable of producing high-quality R&D frameworks and components.
2. Familiar with at least 3 mainstream components in areas such as microservices frameworks (Spring Cloud, Dubbo/Go GRPC, Eureka/Consul/Nacos, Sentinel, Apisix), caching (Redis), task scheduling (xxl-job), message middleware (Kafka/RocketMQ), and storage (MySQL(MyBatis, Sharding-jdbc)/OSS(S3)). A deep understanding of source code and principles, with practical experience in development, optimization, and encapsulation is preferred.
3. Possess engineering capabilities and drive: dependency management, compatibility strategies, templated delivery, and documentation skills, with strong cross-team communication and implementation promotion abilities.
III. Bonus Points
1. Experience leading the construction of a unified R&D framework in the trading or high-concurrency financial domain.
2. Experience in R&D of large-scale distributed systems or base middleware libraries, familiar with mainstream open-source middleware, with a deep understanding of their implementation mechanisms. Community contributors are preferred.
Network technology development, we welcome partners interested in this industry to join us.

title: 前端开发工程师 (远程办公)
team: 杭州同雷网络文化有限公司
summary: 高并发低延迟,Websocket,JavaScript,接受居家办公,计算机/软件工程相关专业,前端开发经验,Tradingview,Nuxtjs
summary_chinese: 交易系统前端开发,数字资产交易,React/TypeScript,高性能数据可视化,实时数据处理,前端性能优化
summary_english: Trading System Frontend Development,Digital Asset Trading,React/TypeScript,High-Performance Data Visualization,Real-time Data Processing,Frontend Performance Optimization
description:
职位概述
负责业务的前端架构设计与开发，包括前端交互、行情展示、交易撮合深度可视化等核心模块。将与产品经理、设计师以及后端团队紧密合作，确保交易体验的高性能、低延迟、安全性和⼀致性。
⼯作职责
1. 负责交易业务相关 Web 前端项⽬的架构设计与开发，包括交易撮合、行情展示、下单系统、风险控制前端等模块；
2. 优化前端性能，保证在⾼并发、大数据场景下的流畅体验，特别是实时行情渲染与低延迟交互；
3. 参与前端基础设施和组件库的建设，推动业务模块化、可复用和高扩展性；
4. 与产品、设计、后端团队深度合作，参与需求分析、技术选型、系统设计与迭代实现；
5. 保障前端安全性，防范 XSS、CSRF 等常见攻击，提升交易系统的安全与稳定性；
6. 推动工程效率提升，包括自动化测试、CI/CD 流程优化和前端监控体系建设；
任职要求
1. 全日制本科及以上学历，计算机科学或相关专业优先；
2. 5 年以上前端开发经验，其中至少 2 年负责金融/交易类产品开发经验；
3. 精通 JavaScript/TypeScript，熟悉 React/Next.js 或 Vue 技术栈，具备复杂前端架构设计经验；
4. 深入理解浏览器渲染机制、前端性能优化手段、WebSocket/实时数据处理机制；
5. 熟悉前端工程化体系，包括打包构建（Webpack/Vite）、单元测试（Jest/Playwright）、持续集成等；
6. 有高性能可视化经验（ECharts/D3/Canvas/WebGL）者优先，能处理深度图、K 线、成交明细等交易可视化需求；
7. 具备良好的系统设计能力，能够在保证性能和稳定性的前提下实现复杂业务逻辑；
8. 具备较强的沟通协调能力，能够推动跨团队协作，解决复杂问题。
9. 对区块链、数字资产交易领域有兴趣或相关经验者优先。
加分项
- 有交易所、券商、金融交易系统前端开发经验。
- 有组件库、前端框架、脚手架或基建工具建设经验。
- 熟悉前端监控体系搭建和性能追踪优化经验。
主要经营前端开发，测试工程师

3. 精通 JavaScript/TypeScript，熟悉 React/Next.js 或 Vue 技术栈，具备复杂前端架构设计经验；
4. 深入理解浏览器渲染机制、前端性能优化手段、WebSocket/实时数据处理机制；

7. 具备良好的系统设计能力，能够在保证性能和稳定性的前提下实现复杂业务逻辑；
8. 具备较强的沟通协调能力，能够推动跨团队协作，解决复杂问题。
9. 对区块链、数字资产交易领域有兴趣或相关经验者优先。
加分项
- 有交易所、券商、金融交易系统前端开发经验。
- 有组件库、前端框架、脚手架或基建工具建设经验。
- 熟悉前端监控体系搭建和性能追踪优化经验。
主要经营前端开发，测试工程师
description_english:
Position Overview
Responsible for the front-end architecture design and development of the business, including core modules such as front-end interaction, market data display, and in-depth visualization of trade matching. You will work closely with product managers, designers, and the backend team to ensure the high performance, low latency, security, and consistency of the trading experience.
Responsibilities
1. Responsible for the architecture design and development of Web frontend projects related to the trading business, including modules such as trade matching, market data display, order placement system, and front-end for risk control.
2. Optimize front-end performance to ensure a smooth experience in high-concurrency and big data scenarios, especially in real-time market data rendering and low-latency interaction.
3. Participate in the construction of front-end infrastructure and component libraries, promoting the modularization, reusability, and high scalability of business modules.
4. Collaborate deeply with product, design, and backend teams, participating in requirement analysis, technology selection, system design, and iterative implementation.
5. Ensure front-end security, preventing common attacks such as XSS and CSRF, and enhancing the security and stability of the trading system.
6. Drive improvements in engineering efficiency, including automated testing, CI/CD process optimization, and the construction of a front-end monitoring system.
Requirements
1. Full-time Bachelor's degree or above, with a preference for Computer Science or related majors.
2. Over 5 years of front-end development experience, with at least 2 years of experience in developing financial/trading products.
3. Proficient in JavaScript/TypeScript, familiar with React/Next.js or Vue tech stacks, with experience in complex front-end architecture design.
4. In-depth understanding of browser rendering mechanisms, front-end performance optimization techniques, and WebSocket/real-time data processing mechanisms.
5. Familiar with the front-end engineering ecosystem, including packaging and building (Webpack/Vite), unit testing (Jest/Playwright), continuous integration, etc.
6. Experience with high-performance visualization (ECharts/D3/Canvas/WebGL) is preferred, capable of handling trading visualization needs such as depth charts, K-lines, and trade details.
7. Possess strong system design capabilities, able to implement complex business logic while ensuring performance and stability.
8. Strong communication and coordination skills, able to drive cross-team collaboration and solve complex problems.
9. Interest or related experience in the fields of blockchain and digital asset trading is a plus.
Plus Points
- Experience in front-end development for exchanges, brokerage firms, or financial trading systems.
- Experience in building component libraries, front-end frameworks, scaffolding, or infrastructure tools.
- Familiarity with building front-end monitoring systems and experience in performance tracking and optimization.
Mainly engaged in front-end development, test engineers

2、主导前端系统架构设计，推动模块解耦、代码规范化与工程体系建设。
3、深⼊分析前端性能瓶颈，解决主线程阻塞、卡顿、资源加载等关键问题。
4、设计并接⼊前端监控体系，实现性能指标、异常⽇志、关键行为的自动⾤集与告警。
5、主导核心 UI 组件与通用模块的抽象封装，构建高复用、易维护的组件体系。
6、参与前端基建能力建设，如统一脚手架、组件库、自动化测试与文档平台。
7、编写高质量技术文档，规范开发流程与协作方式，赋能团队技术沉淀。
与产品、后端及测试团队紧密协作，推动前端项目高质量、高效率交付。
【任职要求】
1、扎实的前端基础，精通 JavaScript / TypeScript，深入理解浏览器运行机制与事件循环机制。
2、有丰富的性能优化实战经验，熟悉关键指标（如 FCP、LCP、长任务）和优化策略（如懒加载、分片渲染、请求合并）。
3、能熟练使用 Chrome DevTools等工具进行性能分析和调优。
4、有前端监控平台（如 Sentry）设计与接入经验优先。
5、有良好的工程能力，熟悉脚手架搭建、CI/CD 流程、规范化开发与自动化测试。
6、注重文档编写与团队协作，具备良好的代码审查与知识沉淀意识。
加分项：dapp开发经验、参与开源项目开发、TradingView开发经验、插件钱包开发经验

description_english:
【Job Responsibilities】
1. Responsible for the development of core functions for Web applications, continuously optimizing user experience, interaction performance, and response speed.
2. Lead the design of the frontend system architecture, promoting module decoupling, code standardization, and engineering system construction.
3. Deeply analyze frontend performance bottlenecks, resolving key issues such as main thread blocking, stuttering, and resource loading.
4. Design and integrate a frontend monitoring system to achieve automatic collection and alerting of performance metrics, exception logs, and key behaviors.
5. Lead the abstraction and encapsulation of core UI components and general modules, building a highly reusable and easily maintainable component system.
6. Participate in the construction of frontend infrastructure capabilities, such as unified scaffolding, component libraries, automated testing, and documentation platforms.
7. Write high-quality technical documentation, standardize development processes and collaboration methods, and empower the team's technical knowledge accumulation.
Closely collaborate with product, backend, and testing teams to drive high-quality and high-efficiency delivery of frontend projects.
【Job Requirements】
1. Solid frontend fundamentals, proficient in JavaScript / TypeScript, with a deep understanding of browser operating mechanisms and the event loop.
2. Rich practical experience in performance optimization, familiar with key metrics (e.g., FCP, LCP, Long Tasks) and optimization strategies (e.g., lazy loading, chunked rendering, request merging).
3. Proficient in using tools like Chrome DevTools for performance analysis and tuning.
4. Experience in designing and integrating frontend monitoring platforms (e.g., Sentry) is a plus.
5. Good engineering skills, familiar with scaffold setup, CI/CD processes, standardized development, and automated testing.
6. Values documentation and team collaboration, with a good sense of code review and knowledge sharing.
Bonus points: dapp development experience, participation in open-source project development, TradingView development experience, browser extension wallet development experience

title: Web3聚合引擎开发工程师(remote)
team: 杭州长奇网络科技有限公司
summary_chinese: DEX聚合路由开发,区块链行业,精通Uniswap V2/V3/V4,Java/Solidity,MEV保护机制,智能合约安全
summary_english: DEX Aggregation Routing Development,Blockchain Industry,Proficient in Uniswap V2/V3/V4,Java/Solidity,MEV Protection Mechanisms,Smart Contract Security
description:
主要职责:
1. 设计并实现高效的链上交易聚合智能合约系统
2.深度集成主流DEX协议，特别要求精通Uniswap V2/V3/V4机制
3.开发基于dex交易所的路径优化算法，实现ticker区间内的最优路径发现
4.构建跨多流动性池/多链的复杂路由策略，最大化交易收益
5.实现MEV保护机制，包括防三明治攻击和前端运行保护
6.熟悉智能合约的安全审计和性能优化，确保资金安全
7.与链下索引团队紧密协作，设计⾼效的链上链下协同架构
任职要求
1.4-6年区块链开发经验，精通Java 技术栈，熟悉solidity合约语⾔
2.深⼊理解Uniswap V2/V3/V4协议机制，特别是V3的tick系统、流动性集中和费用计算
3.有实际的DEX集成经验，熟悉PancakeSwap、Uniswap等主流去中心化交易所
4.能够基于tick数据开发价格优化算法，理解tick区间内的流动性分布
5.熟悉常见的DeFi攻击向量及防护⽅案（三明治攻击、重入攻击等）
6.有交易聚合器、路由优化或AMM协议开发经验者优先
7.熟悉EVM Chain生态，了解其Gas优化和合约部署最佳实践
技术栈要求
1.核心语言：Java / Solidity
2.开发框架：spring boot等
3.协议熟悉度：Uniswap, PancakeSwap, 1inch和其他跨链协议等
网络技术开发，欢迎对这个行业感兴趣的小伙伴加入

description_english:
Key Responsibilities:
1. Design and implement efficient on-chain transaction aggregation smart contract systems
2. Deeply integrate mainstream DEX protocols, with special proficiency required in Uniswap V2/V3/V4 mechanisms
3. Develop path optimization algorithms based on DEX exchanges to find the optimal path within a ticker range
4. Build complex routing strategies across multiple liquidity pools/multiple chains to maximize trading returns
5. Implement MEV protection mechanisms, including anti-sandwich attack and front-running protection
6. Be familiar with smart contract security audits and performance optimization to ensure fund security
7. Collaborate closely with the off-chain indexing team to design an efficient on-chain and off-chain collaborative architecture
Job Requirements
1. 4-6 years of blockchain development experience, proficient in the Java tech stack, and familiar with the Solidity contract language
2. In-depth understanding of Uniswap V2/V3/V4 protocol mechanisms, especially V3's tick system, concentrated liquidity, and fee calculation
3. Practical experience in DEX integration, familiar with mainstream decentralized exchanges such as PancakeSwap and Uniswap
4. Ability to develop price optimization algorithms based on tick data and understand liquidity distribution within tick ranges
5. Familiar with common DeFi attack vectors and protection solutions (e.g., sandwich attacks, re-entrancy attacks)
6. Experience in developing transaction aggregators, routing optimization, or AMM protocols is a plus
7. Familiar with the EVM Chain ecosystem, understanding its Gas optimization and smart contract deployment best practices
Tech Stack Requirements
1. Core Languages: Java / Solidity
2. Development Frameworks: Spring Boot, etc.
3. Protocol Familiarity: Uniswap, PancakeSwap, 1inch, and other cross-chain protocols, etc.
Network technology development, we welcome friends interested in this industry to join us

title: 中/高级java工程师-对账系统（Remote）
title_chinese: 中/高级Java工程师-对账系统
team: 杭州同雷网络文化有限公司
summary: 对账系统开发及优化,Java,SpringCloud,MySQL,Kafka,Redis,Spring,接受居家办公,区块链经验
summary_chinese: 业财对账系统研发,金融科技,高并发微服务,Spring Cloud,Kafka,熟悉财务对账流程
summary_english: Business-Finance Reconciliation System R&D,FinTech,High-Concurrency Microservices,Spring Cloud,Kafka,Familiar with Financial Reconciliation Processes
description:
岗位职责：
1. 负责业财对账系统的设计与研发，深度对接业务场景，梳理跨账户、跨业务、跨数据源的对账需求，设计高可用、高实时的系统架构与技术方案；
2. 负责核⼼模块开发与优化：搭建⾃动化对账引擎，实现交易流⽔、内部账单、外部数据的智能匹配；设计差异分析模块，精准定位未达账项、金额不符等问题并提供处理方案；
3. 保障系统合规与数据安全：落实财务合规要求，设计数据加密、权限分级管控机制；建⽴系统监控与预警体系，实时追踪对账任务执行状态，快速响应数据一致性异常；
4. 跨团队协作推进问题解决：对接业务、财务、数据等部门，梳理对账流程痛点，通过技术手段优化流程效率；
任职要求：
1. 全日制本科及以上学历，计算机、软件工程、信息管理等相关专业优先；
2. 3 年以上 Java 开发经验，其中至少 1 年财务对账系统或金融科技系统核心开发经历；
3. 技术能力扎实：精通 Java 编程语言及多线程、设计模式等高级特性；熟练掌握 Spring Boot/Spring Cloud、MyBatis-Plus 等框架；深入理解 MySQL 优化、Redis 缓存、Kafka 消息队列等中间件在财务场景的应用；
4. 具备业务与技术融合能力：熟悉财务对账核心流程（如银行对账、往来账核对），能将复杂财务需求拆解为技术模型；掌握 ETL 流程设计或 Flink 等工具进行大规模财务数据处理者优先；
5. 有核心、大规模、高并发微服务架构的开发、服务治理、服务监控等方面经验；
6. 具备严谨的工作态度与协作能力：数据敏感度高，注重细节与合规性；具备良好的跨部门沟通能力、问题解决能力及团队合作精神，能承受多场景需求迭代压力；
解决问题：
1. 缓解对账系统开发人员不足问题；
2. 提升对账系统的扩展性与可靠性：优化现有架构，实现多业务线对账需求的快速适配；完善差异处理与监控机制，降低财务数据误差风险。
主要经营前端开发，测试工程师

summary: Java,北美remote,分布式经验,MySQL,SQL Server,架构设计经验,Spring,接受居家办公,电商，票务,海外c端项目经验

summary_english: Core Business Backend Development,System Stability Assurance,API Performance Optimization,CI/CD,Docker
description:
职位描述 
  1.参与核⼼业务后端开发与优化：负责公司核⼼业务（如交易、⽤户、营销模块）的Java语⾔后端开发，参与架构设计讨论与⽅案细化，⽀撑业务平稳迭代与增⻓。 
  2.协助解决技术问题，保障系统稳定：参与线上常⻅技术问题排查与解决（如接⼝性能优化、数据处理延迟、简单并发问题），协助搭建基础监控与告警体系，将系统可⽤性（SLA）维持在99.99%以上。 
  3.推动⼯程化与研发效率提升：参与后端⼯程体系的搭建与优化，包括CI/CD基础流⽔线、Docker容器化部署、代码规范执⾏与静态检查、单元测试/接⼝测试编写，协助提升团队研发效率。 
  4.参与业务与产品协作，⽀撑业务需求：参与产品需求评审，从技术视⾓提供可⾏性建议；协助结合新技术（如基础AI能⼒、简单数据⼯具）设计后端⽀撑⽅案，助⼒业务功能拓展（如基础推荐、⾃动化报表）。
description_chinese:
职位描述 
  1.参与核⼼业务后端开发与优化：负责公司核⼼业务（如交易、⽤户、营销模块）的Java语⾔后端开发，参与架构设计讨论与⽅案细化，⽀撑业务平稳迭代与增⻓。 
  2.协助解决技术问题，保障系统稳定：参与线上常⻅技术问题排查与解决（如接⼝性能优化、数据处理延迟、简单并发问题），协助搭建基础监控与告警体系，将系统可⽤性（SLA）维持在99.99%以上。 
  3.推动⼯程化与研发效率提升：参与后端⼯程体系的搭建与优化，包括CI/CD基础流⽔线、Docker容器化部署、代码规范执⾏与静态检查、单元测试/接⼝测试编写，协助提升团队研发效率。 
  4.参与业务与产品协作，⽀撑业务需求：参与产品需求评审，从技术视⾓提供可⾏性建议；协助结合新技术（如基础AI能⼒、简单数据⼯具）设计后端⽀撑⽅案，助⼒业务功能拓展（如基础推荐、⾃动化报表）。
description_english:
Job Description 
  1. Participate in core business backend development and optimization: Responsible for the company's core business (e.g., transaction, user, marketing modules) backend development in Java, participate in architecture design discussions and solution refinement, and support stable business iteration and growth. 
  2. Assist in solving technical problems and ensure system stability: Participate in troubleshooting and resolving common online technical issues (such as API performance optimization, data processing delays, simple concurrency problems), assist in building basic monitoring and alarm systems, and maintain system availability (SLA) above 99.99%. 
  3. Promote engineering excellence and improve R&D efficiency: Participate in the construction and optimization of the backend engineering system, including basic CI/CD pipelines, Docker containerized deployment, code standard enforcement and static checks, and writing unit/interface tests, to help improve the team's R&D efficiency. 
  4. Collaborate with business and product teams to support business needs: Participate in product requirement reviews and provide feasibility suggestions from a technical perspective; assist in designing backend support solutions using new technologies (such as basic AI capabilities, simple data tools) to facilitate the expansion of business functions (e.g., basic recommendations, automated reports).

title: UI（remote）
team: 某大型互联网金融公司
summary: 带薪假期,年终奖,SketchUp,交互设计经验,3-5年UI设计经验,周末双休,远程办公,5年以上UI设计经验,Sketch,有UI设计经验/技能,甲方公司
summary_chinese: 多端产品UI设计,NFT/元宇宙,制定UI规范,用户体验优化,Sketch/PS/C4D
summary_english: Multi-platform Product UI Design,NFT/Metaverse,Establishing UI Specifications,User Experience Optimization,Sketch/PS/C4D
description:
职位描述：
1.根据需求进行项目iOS、Android 、PC、web端的设计和优化；
2.管理和制定UI规范及交互设计原则，把控UI创意、设计、出品的质量；
3.理解业务和产品规划，对用户体验负责；推动和提升团队整体专业能力；
4.跟踪业界的可用性设计趋势，提出用户体验改进建议，整体上优化产品设计。
任职要求：
1.本科及以上学历，设计、美术等相关专业；
2.有3年以上互联网产品UI设计经验（移动端和Web端)；’
3.能熟练运用Sketch 、PS、A、C4D、海外沟通工具等相关软件，有扎实的UI和平面设计功底，需展示比较完整的设计案例及上线作品；
4.热爱设计，关注UI、交互设计等发展趋势，对社交、NFT、元宇宙等类型产品流程、用户体验有深入的理解；
5.抗压能力强，有敏锐的观察力，高品质的审美能力，善于沟通和坚守原则并富有创新精神。

title: 风控策略 (MJ000110) Remote
team: 相信光（重庆）网络科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 支付风控策略设计,支付行业,欺诈检测,数据分析,熟悉AML/KYC,Web3经验优先
summary_english: Payment Risk Control Strategy Design,Payment Industry,Fraud Detection,Data Analysis,Familiar with AML/KYC,Web3 Experience Preferred
description:
支付风控策略
1. 通过监控和分析交易数据和玩家行为，实时识别可能发生的欺诈，黑产攻击等风险⾏为并布控应对策略。执⾏账户调查并处理争议和拒付（chargeback）问题。  
2. 与业务深度合作，平衡⽀付体验与风控控制，设计、实施、监控与迭代风控策略来平衡交易风险与交易转化率。保证业务健康发展。
3. 了解支付卡行业数据安全标准（PCI DSS），能设计通过实施令牌化（tokenization）和加密技术保护敏感⽀付数据的支付链路。
4. 持续跟踪国际法律法规和行业新兴威胁，并制定相应的风险缓解策略。确保支付流程符合各国家和地区的AML、KYC、数据安全（如GDPR）等法律法规要求。      
5. 参与业务与产品需求评审，制定与技术、财务和法务团队协作SOP，将风控与合规融入日常流程。   
任职要求：
1. 具备欺诈检测、风险管理3年以上经验，有web3经验的优先  
2. 扎实的数据分析基础，熟练掌握至少一种常规数据分析工具，例如：SQL、R或Python等；了解数据可视化工具（如Tableau、Power BI）的使用为加分项。
3. 熟悉支付流程、支付风险管理机制等

支付风控策略

2. 与业务深度合作，平衡⽀付体验与风控控制，设计、实施、监控与迭代风控策略来平衡交易风险与交易转化率。保证业务健康发展。
3. 了解支付卡行业数据安全标准（PCI DSS），能设计通过实施令牌化（tokenization）和加密技术保护敏感⽀付数据的支付链路。
4. 持续跟踪国际法律法规和行业新兴威胁，并制定相应的风险缓解策略。确保支付流程符合各国家和地区的AML、KYC、数据安全（如GDPR）等法律法规要求。      
5. 参与业务与产品需求评审，制定与技术、财务和法务团队协作SOP，将风控与合规融入日常流程。   
任职要求：
1. 具备欺诈检测、风险管理3年以上经验，有web3经验的优先  
2. 扎实的数据分析基础，熟练掌握至少一种常规数据分析工具，例如：SQL、R或Python等；了解数据可视化工具（如Tableau、Power BI）的使用为加分项。
3. 熟悉支付流程、支付风险管理机制等
description_english:
Payment Risk Control Strategy
1. Monitor and analyze transaction data and player behavior to identify potential fraudulent activities, black-hat attacks, and other risky behaviors in real-time, and deploy corresponding response strategies. Conduct account investigations and handle disputes and chargeback issues.
2. Collaborate deeply with business departments to balance payment experience and risk control. Design, implement, monitor, and iterate risk control strategies to balance transaction risk and conversion rates, ensuring healthy business development.
3. Understand the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) and be able to design payment links that protect sensitive payment data by implementing tokenization and encryption technologies.
4. Continuously track international laws, regulations, and emerging industry threats, and formulate corresponding risk mitigation strategies. Ensure the payment process complies with legal and regulatory requirements such as AML, KYC, and data security (e.g., GDPR) in various countries and regions.
5. Participate in business and product requirement reviews, establish SOPs for collaboration with technical, finance, and legal teams, and integrate risk control and compliance into daily processes.
Requirements:
1. Over 3 years of experience in fraud detection and risk management; experience with Web3 is preferred.
2. Solid foundation in data analysis, proficient in at least one common data analysis tool such as SQL, R, or Python; familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.
3. Familiar with payment processes, payment risk management mechanisms, etc.

title: 资深SEO优化师（Remote）
team: 某知名互联网金融公司
summary: Remote,SEO
summary_chinese: 谷歌SEO优化,Web3行业,关键词策略,搜索引擎优化,数据分析,海外推广
summary_english: Google SEO Optimization,Web3 Industry,Keyword Strategy,Search Engine Optimization,Data Analysis,Overseas Promotion
description:
谷歌SEO优化师（web3）
地点：remote
岗位职责：
1.负责围绕平台官网SEO相关的内容优化，结构优化和搜索引擎优化，制定方案并落地实施，整体提高品牌的复现率和搜索排名；
2.负责评估与分析网站的关键词等，利用搜索引擎竞价和排名机制，提高网站排名和页面下载转化率，实现导流和用户转化；
3. 结合产品和品牌关键营销节点，主动推动SEO相关方案的落地执行；
4.研究、分析和监控竞争对手及相关平台的推广和搜索引擎规则变化，能及时有效地调整全局推广策略；
5.深入分析竞品网站和热门关键词背后的用户需求，对网站架构、内容页、产品页等进行优化，实现引流转化和提升网站排名的目标；
岗位要求：
1. 至少3/7年以上Cry-（web3）行业谷歌SEO经验，了解搜索引擎的排名机制、索引机制及其相关指标，并有数据验证的SEO增长运营经验和方法论；
2.熟悉谷歌搜索引擎算法和海外搜索引擎优化策略，能够制定出有效的关键词策略、内容策略和链接策略；
3.能够熟练运用各种SEO工具和技术，为网站提高流量和排名；
4.有币圈海外媒体的投放渠道，投放资源，有一定的文案能力。
5.良好的数据分析能力，能够透过数据分析问题点和增长点，并形成方案推动落地，优化相应指标；
6.对于行业热点有相对敏锐的嗅觉并能转化为在业务上的思考，责任心强，在增长模块能够主动积极思考和不断迭代尝试；
7.具备良好的沟通能力和团队合作精神，能够与团队成员进行有效的沟通和协作；
8.同时有海外社媒投放经验的，如facebook 、 twitter等，可作为额外加分项。

1.负责围绕平台官网SEO相关的内容优化，结构优化和搜索引擎优化，制定方案并落地实施，整体提高品牌的复现率和搜索排名；
2.负责评估与分析网站的关键词等，利用搜索引擎竞价和排名机制，提高网站排名和页面下载转化率，实现导流和用户转化；

岗位要求：
1. 至少3-7年以上Crypto（web3）行业谷歌SEO经验，了解搜索引擎的排名机制、索引机制及其相关指标，并有数据验证的SEO增长运营经验和方法论；
2.熟悉谷歌搜索引擎算法和海外搜索引擎优化策略，能够制定出有效的关键词策略、内容策略和链接策略；
3.能够熟练运用各种SEO工具和技术，为网站提高流量和排名；
4.有币圈海外媒体的投放渠道，投放资源，有一定的文案能力。

8.同时有海外社媒投放经验的，如facebook 、 twitter等，可作为额外加分项。
description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for SEO-related content optimization, structural optimization, and search engine optimization for the platform's official website; develop and implement plans to improve brand visibility and search rankings overall.
2. Responsible for evaluating and analyzing website keywords, utilizing search engine bidding and ranking mechanisms to improve website ranking and page download conversion rates, achieving traffic acquisition and user conversion.
3. Actively drive the implementation of SEO-related plans in conjunction with key product and brand marketing milestones.
4. Research, analyze, and monitor the promotional activities of competitors and related platforms, as well as changes in search engine rules, and be able to adjust the overall promotion strategy in a timely and effective manner.
5. Deeply analyze the user needs behind competitor websites and popular keywords, and optimize the website architecture, content pages, product pages, etc., to achieve the goals of traffic conversion and improved website rankings.

Requirements:
1. At least 3-7 years of Google SEO experience in the Crypto (web3) industry, with an understanding of search engine ranking mechanisms, indexing mechanisms, and related metrics, and possess data-validated SEO growth operation experience and methodologies.
2. Familiar with Google's search engine algorithms and overseas search engine optimization strategies; able to formulate effective keyword strategies, content strategies, and link strategies.
3. Proficient in using various SEO tools and techniques to increase website traffic and rankings.
4. Possess channels and resources for media placement in overseas crypto media, with certain copywriting skills.
5. Strong data analysis skills, able to identify problems and growth points through data analysis, formulate plans for implementation, and optimize relevant metrics.
6. Have a keen sense for industry hot topics and be able to translate them into business insights; strong sense of responsibility, with the ability to think proactively and iterate continuously in the growth module.
7. Possess good communication and teamwork skills, able to communicate and collaborate effectively with team members.
8. Experience with overseas social media advertising, such as on Facebook, Twitter, etc., is a plus.

title: 留学文案全职/兼职-远程办公/自由舒服
team: 北京海特思文教育科技有限公司
summary: 笔译,兼职,无需坐班,全职,雅思6.5分及以上,英语专业
summary_chinese: 英国院校申请文案,国际教育,雅思7.5/写作7.0,QS前150高校背景,海外团建机会,无需通勤
summary_english: UK University Application Copywriting,International Education,IELTS 7.5/Writing 7.0,QS Top 150 University Background,Overseas Team Building Opportunities,No Commute
description:
【岗位职责】
1.负责为学生提供英国院校申请各类文案规划服务;
2.负责学生文案服务全流程把控，确保学生文案按时输出:
3.及时和英国留学顾问老师沟通，积极反馈各项目的进展情况:
4.积极跟进学生英国大学的申请进度(基于有录网智能申请平台):
5.定期参与部门内部培训，不断学习，更新业务知识:
6.与英籍文案老师沟通学生申请，匠心打造学生申请文案。
【任职要求】
1.世界大学排名QS前150高校毕业或在读，雅思总分不低于7.5，写作小分不低于7.0，托福等同于总分102-109，写作27-28，有文案写作经验的优先。及其优秀者可酌情按以下要求:统招本科，理工科等相关专业，英语专业八级，曾在英语系国家留学者优先；
2.认同英国有录网企业文化，诚实守信，有较强的责任心；
3.有实干精神，工作耐心细致，热爱文案工作，并且有着良好的倾听表达能力以及沟通能力擅于团队合作；
4.能承受一定的工作压力，积极乐观的为人处事态度；
5.有1-2年文案工作经验或者留学公司业内(如:留学顾问、留学文案)工作经验者优先。
【我们的文化】
1. 结果导向，效率为主，创造价值：我们注重工作结果和效率，以创造价值为核心目标;
2. 美貌与智慧并重的年轻团队（高颜值+高学历背景），实干为主：公司拥有一支充满活力的年轻团队，崇尚实干精神。
【超明朗的晋升通道】
1. 纵向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 团队主管 – 部门主管 – 部门经理 – 部门负责人
2. 横向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 项目/品牌主管 – 项目/品牌负责人
3. 毕业生孵化计划：一对一培训 + 各部门轮岗机会 
【超酷的福利待遇】
1. 高于同行业薪水 & 奖金丰厚不封顶
2. 线上工作，无需通勤
3. 表现优异者可享有年度一次的英国线下团建机会以及不定期海外出差培训机会
4. 宽松高效简单的工作氛围，定期培训无天花板晋级成长通道
【超暖心的人员关怀】
1. 节假日节日慰问 & 各大电商平台现金卡礼物
2. 入职周年祝福 & 周年纪念日礼物
3. 不定期线上（故事分享、线上年会、演唱会、周年庆感受分享等） &  线下团建活动（世界各地线下饭局、中英总部-北京伯明翰线下年会活动等）
（注意：仅限本公司使用，严禁搬运）
海特思文（Hitevision）全球国际教育引领者，总部位于北京。​ 秉持“无国界教育”理念，我们构建了覆盖中国大陆、香港及亚非欧核心地区的强大服务网络（近百家门店/分部）。依托顶尖全球资源与深谙本地的国际化团队，我们为学子提供专业、高效、个性化的一站式国际教育服务，助力拥抱多元文化、开拓全球视野、实现世界顶尖学府梦想。 ​ 
公司以“年轻、精进、担当、共赢”为文化，汇聚实干精英，矢志成为学生连接全球机遇的战略伙伴。​ 
加入我们，与全球化精英团队共成长，启迪智慧，照亮世界征程！​    ​

3.及时和英国留学顾问老师沟通，积极反馈各项目的进展情况:
4.积极跟进学生英国大学的申请进度(基于有录网智能申请平台):
5.定期参与部门内部培训，不断学习，更新业务知识:
6.与英籍文案老师沟通学生申请，匠心打造学生申请文案。
【任职要求】
1.世界大学排名QS前150高校毕业或在读，雅思总分不低于7.5，写作小分不低于7.0，托福等同于总分102-109，写作27-28，有文案写作经验的优先。及其优秀者可酌情按以下要求:统招本科，理工科等相关专业，英语专业八级，曾在英语系国家留学者优先；
2.认同英国有录网企业文化，诚实守信，有较强的责任心；
3.有实干精神，工作耐心细致，热爱文案工作，并且有着良好的倾听表达能力以及沟通能力擅于团队合作；
4.能承受一定的工作压力，积极乐观的为人处事态度；
5.有1-2年文案工作经验或者留学公司业内(如:留学顾问、留学文案)工作经验者优先。
【我们的文化】
1. 结果导向，效率为主，创造价值：我们注重工作结果和效率，以创造价值为核心目标;
2. 美貌与智慧并重的年轻团队（高颜值+高学历背景），实干为主：公司拥有一支充满活力的年轻团队，崇尚实干精神。
【超明朗的晋升通道】
1. 纵向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 团队主管 – 部门主管 – 部门经理 – 部门负责人
2. 横向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 项目/品牌主管 – 项目/品牌负责人
3. 毕业生孵化计划：一对一培训 + 各部门轮岗机会 
【超酷的福利待遇】
1. 高于同行业薪水 & 奖金丰厚不封顶
2. 线上工作，无需通勤
3. 表现优异者可享有年度一次的英国线下团建机会以及不定期海外出差培训机会
4. 宽松高效简单的工作氛围，定期培训无天花板晋级成长通道
【超暖心的人员关怀】
1. 节假日节日慰问 & 各大电商平台现金卡礼物
2. 入职周年祝福 & 周年纪念日礼物
3. 不定期线上（故事分享、线上年会、演唱会、周年庆感受分享等） &  线下团建活动（世界各地线下饭局、中英总部-北京伯明翰线下年会活动等）
（注意：仅限本公司使用，严禁搬运）
海特思文（Hitevision）全球国际教育引领者，总部位于北京。​ 秉持“无国界教育”理念，我们构建了覆盖中国大陆、香港及亚非欧核心地区的强大服务网络（近百家门店/分部）。依托顶尖全球资源与深谙本地的国际化团队，我们为学子提供专业、高效、个性化的一站式国际教育服务，助力拥抱多元文化、开拓全球视野、实现世界顶尖学府梦想。 ​ 
公司以“年轻、精进、担当、共赢”为文化，汇聚实干精英，矢志成为学生连接全球机遇的战略伙伴。​ 
加入我们，与全球化精英团队共成长，启迪智慧，照亮世界征程！​    ​
description_english:
【Job Responsibilities】
1. Responsible for providing students with various copywriting planning services for UK university applications;
2. Responsible for managing the entire process of student copywriting services to ensure timely output of student documents:
3. Communicate promptly with UK study abroad consultants and actively provide feedback on the progress of various projects:
4. Actively follow up on the application progress of students to UK universities (based on the Youluwang intelligent application platform):
5. Regularly participate in internal department training to continuously learn and update business knowledge:
6. Communicate with native British copywriters about student applications to meticulously craft student application documents.
【Job Requirements】
1. Graduates or current students from universities ranked in the top 150 of the QS World University Rankings, with a minimum IELTS overall score of 7.5 and a writing sub-score of no less than 7.0, or an equivalent TOEFL score of 102-109 with a writing score of 27-28. Candidates with copywriting experience are preferred. Exceptionally outstanding candidates may be considered based on the following criteria: a bachelor's degree from a nationally recognized university in a relevant major such as science or engineering, a TEM-8 certificate in English, with a preference for those who have studied in English-speaking countries;
2. Identify with the corporate culture of Youluwang, be honest and trustworthy, and have a strong sense of responsibility;
3. Have a practical spirit, be patient and meticulous in work, love copywriting, and possess good listening, expression, and communication skills, excelling in teamwork;
4. Able to withstand a certain amount of work pressure, with a positive and optimistic attitude towards work and life;
5. 1-2 years of experience in copywriting or within the study abroad industry (e.g., study abroad consultant, study abroad copywriter) is preferred.
【Our Culture】
1. Results-oriented, efficiency-focused, value-creating: We focus on work results and efficiency, with value creation as our core goal;
2. A young team that combines beauty and wisdom (high-value looks + high academic background), with a focus on practical work: The company has a vibrant young team that values a hands-on spirit.
【Super Clear Promotion Path】
1. Vertical Path: Specialist – Team Leader – Team Supervisor – Department Supervisor – Department Manager – Head of Department
2. Horizontal Path: Specialist – Team Leader – Project/Brand Supervisor – Head of Project/Brand
3. Graduate Incubation Program: One-on-one training + rotation opportunities in various departments
【Super Cool Benefits】
1. Salary higher than the industry average & unlimited generous bonuses
2. Online work, no commute required
3. Outstanding performers are eligible for an annual offline team-building opportunity in the UK and occasional overseas business trip training opportunities
4. A relaxed, efficient, and simple work atmosphere, with regular training and a promotion path with no ceiling
【Super Heart-warming Employee Care】
1. Holiday greetings & cash card gifts from major e-commerce platforms
2. Work anniversary blessings & anniversary gifts
3. Regular online (story sharing, online annual meetings, concerts, anniversary sharing sessions, etc.) & offline team-building activities (offline dinners around the world, offline annual meetings at the China-UK headquarters in Beijing and Birmingham, etc.)
(Note: For internal use by our company only. Unauthorized reproduction is strictly prohibited.)
Hitevision, a global leader in international education, is headquartered in Beijing. Upholding the philosophy of "Borderless Education," we have built a strong service network covering mainland China, Hong Kong, and core regions in Asia, Africa, and Europe (nearly a hundred stores/branches). Relying on top global resources and an international team with deep local knowledge, we provide students with professional, efficient, and personalized one-stop international education services, helping them embrace multiculturalism, broaden their global horizons, and achieve their dreams of attending world-class universities.
The company's culture is defined by being "Young, Progressive, Responsible, and Win-Win," gathering practical elites and aiming to become a strategic partner connecting students with global opportunities.
Join us to grow with a global elite team, inspire wisdom, and illuminate the journey to the world!

title: 申博规划（远程办公）
team: 领研（天津）文化传播有限公司
summary_chinese: 销售团队管理,教育行业,制定销售SOP,销售团队建设,升学教育
summary_english: Sales Team Management,Education Industry,Develop Sales SOPs,Sales Team Building,Further Education
description:
我们是谁？——
领研教育集团旗下申博业务-考博猫，由清华大学及牛津大学等校友共同成立发起，品牌致力于链接全球前沿学者和优质教育资源，打造面向未来的国际化学术视野，学员遍布世界。
我们的办公模式——
总部位于上海，公司实行全员远程办公模式，我们坚守以做事为中心的员工价值。
一、工作职责：
1、根据公司年/季/月GMV目标，分解部门目标，达成业绩要求;
2、指导团队成员做好客户触达、回访跟进、关单 转化工作;
3、制定各类销售SOP，并完成团队业务培训;
4、完成团队建设工作，强化团队销转能力。
5、完成各类绩效指标	
二、任职要求：
1、统招本科以上学历;
2、拥有教育行业职业教育/升学类教育5年以上工作经验
3、具备销售团队3年以上管理经验管理;
4、对客户有深刻理解，并能设计和指定标准、流程、SOP;
5、目标感强，抗压能力强，拥有多线程的能力；
6、需要完成个人业绩考核后开始接手团队。
一线销售-销售主管-销售经理，根据经验能力定职级
期待优秀的你加入我们远程办公的幸福工作模式！
薪资范围：15000-30000元/月
社保类型：五险
公司介绍
领研教育集团全资子公司，总部位于北京市，目前业务范围涵盖考博教育、考研教育、学术科研服务等。为适应时代的变化，致吾辈教育立志应用新时代的技术和理念，打造教育服务、教育学习、教育资源整合以及教育平台综合体。
现在与多个高等院校以及教学服务平台达成友好合作关系。
下属子公司2家，在上海市设立5个直营校区，累计服务学员超过1万名。获得学员广泛好评以及信任。在市场竞争日益激烈的今天，致吾辈始终坚持“客户第一”的服务以及教学理念。着力打造让客户满意的产品服务和教学体系!

description_english:
Who we are?——
Lingyan Education Group's doctoral application business - Kaobomao, was co-founded by alumni from Tsinghua University, Oxford University, and other institutions. The brand is dedicated to connecting cutting-edge scholars and high-quality educational resources worldwide, creating a future-oriented international academic vision, with students all over the globe.
Our work model——
Headquartered in Shanghai, the company operates on a fully remote work model. We adhere to employee values centered on getting things done.
I. Job Responsibilities:
1. Decompose departmental goals based on the company's annual/quarterly/monthly GMV targets and achieve performance requirements;
2. Guide team members in customer outreach, follow-up calls, and closing deals for conversion;
3. Formulate various sales SOPs and complete team business training;
4. Complete team-building tasks and strengthen the team's sales conversion capabilities.
5. Complete various performance indicators
II. Job Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above from a nationally recognized university;
2. Over 5 years of work experience in vocational education/further education within the education industry
3. Over 3 years of experience in managing a sales team;
4. Deep understanding of customers, and the ability to design and specify standards, processes, and SOPs;
5. Strong sense of purpose, high resistance to pressure, and multitasking abilities;
6. Will take over the team after passing a personal performance assessment.
Front-line Sales - Sales Supervisor - Sales Manager, level determined by experience and ability
We look forward to having an outstanding individual like you join our happy remote work model!
Salary Range: 15,000-30,000 RMB/month
Social Insurance Type: Five Insurances
Company Introduction
A wholly-owned subsidiary of Lingyan Education Group, headquartered in Beijing. Its current business scope covers doctoral entrance exam education, postgraduate entrance exam education, academic research services, etc. To adapt to the changing times, Zhiwubei Education is committed to applying new-era technologies and concepts to create a comprehensive entity of educational services, learning, resource integration, and platforms.
We have established friendly cooperative relationships with multiple higher education institutions and teaching service platforms.
With 2 subsidiary companies and 5 directly-operated campuses in Shanghai, we have served over 10,000 students cumulatively, earning widespread praise and trust from our students. In today's increasingly competitive market, Zhiwubei always adheres to the "customer first" service and teaching philosophy, striving to create product services and teaching systems that satisfy our customers!

title: 环境工程师（远程办公-线上兼职）
team: 云南广地建筑设计有限公司
summary: CAD,不需长期出差,接受无环保工程师经验
summary_chinese: 环境方案设计与评估,环保行业,污水处理,大气处理,环境影响评价,AutoCAD/SPSS,长期兼职
summary_english: Environmental Solution Design & Assessment,Environmental Protection Industry,Wastewater Treatment,Air Pollution Control,Environmental Impact Assessment,AutoCAD/SPSS,Long-term Part-time
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：无要求
工作时间：不限
工作时段：不限
结算方式：月结
招聘截止时间：2026-02-22
岗位职责
1、掌握污水处理（市政污水、工业污水、生活污水等）工业设计，熟悉主流工艺（AO、MBR、MBBR、氧化沟等）等独立完成方案设计和计算；
2、掌握大气处理（除尘、化学污染物等）工艺设计，熟悉主流除尘（机械、过滤、静电等）技术和化学污染物（吸收、吸附、催化燃烧等）去除技术
3、掌握固废（工业固废、农业固废、生活垃圾、危险废物等）处理技术，熟悉常见（无害化、资源化、协同化）处理技术；
4、掌握环境影响评价方向的专业知识，能独立进行数据分析、预测模拟以及编制报告；
5、掌握环境材料（吸附剂、催化剂、膜等）研发方向的专业知识，能对材料进行独立的数据处理、性能模拟；
6、熟悉以上任意一项均可；
任职要求：
1、熟练掌握办公（Word、Excel、PowerPoint）软件、绘图（AutoCAD、天正等）软件、数据处理（SPSS、Origin等）软件及部分仿真（BioWin、HSPF）软件，根据研究方向掌握；
2、环境科学、环境工程、生态学、资源环境科学等相关专业优先；
3、本科及以上学历，硕士研究生优先
工作模式:
1.灵活用工模式（线上兼职）线上远程办公，时间自由，自由接单群内接单，
2.本公司严格遵守灵活用工相关法律法规，不收取任何培训费用及押金

title: 海外广告优化师（可接受远程办公）
team: 深圳市优美量信息技术有限公司
summary: 海外广告投放经验,zj,媒介代理/广告商,媒介代理/广告商经验,游戏广告投放经验,海外投放,游戏广告投放,海外广告投放
summary_chinese: 广告账户数据优化,Facebook/Google/TikTok,appsflyer/adjust,广告素材分析,投放项目复盘
summary_english: Ad Account Data Optimization,Facebook/Google/TikTok,appsflyer/adjust,Ad Creative Analysis,Campaign Performance Review
description:
岗位职责：
1. 具备独立分析数据的能力，并能结合数据对账户进行有效优化。
2. 熟悉各大媒体的运营模式，包括但不限于Facebook、Google、TikTok、Kwai等。
3. 熟练运用三方工具，包括但不限于appsflyer、adjust等。
4. 熟练使用各大素材网站，包括但不限于热云、广大大、appgrowing等，对素材有一定的敏锐度，能够与设计师进行及时有效的沟通，协助设计人员优化素材方向。
5. 能够定期对投放项目进行复盘、总结并输出成果。
任职要求：
1. 有1年及以上相关工作经验，熟悉Facebook、Google、Tiktok等投放平台。
2. 对数据敏感，擅长数据分析。
3. 工作认真负责、积极主动，具备较强的执行能力。
description_chinese:
岗位职责：
1. 具备独立分析数据的能力，并能结合数据对账户进行有效优化。
2. 熟悉各大媒体的运营模式，包括但不限于Facebook、Google、TikTok、Kwai等。
3. 熟练运用三方工具，包括但不限于appsflyer、adjust等。
4. 熟练使用各大素材网站，包括但不限于热云、广大大、appgrowing等，对素材有一定的敏锐度，能够与设计师进行及时有效的沟通，协助设计人员优化素材方向。
5. 能够定期对投放项目进行复盘、总结并输出成果。
任职要求：
1. 有1年及以上相关工作经验，熟悉Facebook、Google、Tiktok等投放平台。
2. 对数据敏感，擅长数据分析。
3. 工作认真负责、积极主动，具备较强的执行能力。
description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Ability to independently analyze data and effectively optimize accounts based on the data.
2. Familiar with the operational models of major media platforms, including but not limited to Facebook, Google, TikTok, Kwai, etc.
3. Proficient in using third-party tools, including but not limited to appsflyer, adjust, etc.
4. Proficient in using major ad creative intelligence platforms, including but not limited to Reyun, Guangdada, AppGrowing, etc.; possess a keen sense for ad creatives and be able to communicate effectively and in a timely manner with designers to help optimize the creative direction.
5. Ability to regularly review, summarize, and report on the results of advertising campaigns.
Requirements:
1. 1+ years of relevant work experience, familiar with advertising platforms such as Facebook, Google, Tiktok, etc.
2. Sensitive to data and skilled in data analysis.
3. Conscientious, responsible, proactive, with strong execution skills.

title: Web前端工程师（Fully Remote / 全职远程）
team: 天津广航劳务有限公司
summary: 技术博客/开源项目有所贡献,CSS,JavaScript,Vue,HTML5,接受居家办公,React,前端开发经验,计算机/软件工程相关专业
summary_chinese: IM客户端开发,即时通讯,Vue3,WebSocket,性能优化,异步沟通
summary_english: IM Client Development,Instant Messaging,Vue3,WebSocket,Performance Optimization,Asynchronous Communication
description:
项目背景
我们正在构建一套模块化、可扩展的下一代即时通讯（IM）与社交平台。
这不是一个简单的外包项⽬，⽽是⼀个致力于长期演进的商业级产品。后端采⽤ Golang 分布式架构，客户端覆盖 iOS、Android 及 Web。
我们需要你作为 Web 端的核心主力，负责 Web IM 客户端（挑战高性能）与 企业级后台管理系统（挑战高复杂度）的架构设计与研发。  
岗位说明
远程办公机制：本岗位支持 **完全远程办公**，不要求固定坐班地点。我们以产出和协作为主要评价标准，通过文档、IM 与代码评审保持高频但低打扰的沟通。
职责说明
架构设计与模块化开发：
针对即时通讯客户端和后台管理系统进行前端架构设计与模块拆分，在远程协作环境下持续优化代码结构、目录规范和可维护性。
旧项目维护与升级：理解和维护现有遗留项目，识别并消解技术债，确保在不影响业务的前提下逐步迭代和升级。 
实时通讯与数据同步：基于 WebSocket/HTTP 实现消息传输和状态同步，处理远程部署和网络环境下的消息可靠性与一致性问题。
性能优化与资源管理：针对长列表、虚拟滚动、大数据渲染等场景持续优化响应速度和内存占用，分析性能瓶颈并制定解决方案。  
状态管理与跨模块通信：设计并维护复杂业务场景下的状态管理方案，解决远程团队下跨组件/模块的数据同步。 
构建体系与工具链：熟练使用 Vite 或 Webpack，优化远程开发与 CI/CD 流程，掌握打包分析、按需加载和代码分割等技巧。 
远程沟通与协作：积极参与线上需求讨论、代码评审和产品迭代，在跨时区、跨团队环境下保持高效沟通和信息透明。  
你将面临的挑战 
在浏览器中实现原生级的流畅体验（虚拟滚动、百万级消息存储、瞬时搜索）。
处理复杂的网络状态（WebSocket 断连重连、离线消息同步、消息丢包补偿）。 
保证数据安全性（端对端加密、本地数据库 IndexedDB/Sqlite 封装）。
  
任职要求 
5年以上前端经验：
深入了解 Vue3/React/Angular 等框架的组件化和模块化开发，有中大型项目架构经验。  
实时系统实践：具备 IM、实时推送或类似场景的开发经验，理解消息同步和网络异常处理。  
性能优化意识：熟悉浏览器渲染机制，能针对远程环境中的性能问题制定有效的优化方案。  
复杂状态管理能力：掌握 Redux、Vuex 或 RxJS 等状态管理工具，能在复杂业务中保持代码可读性和可维护性。  
构建与调优能力：熟悉 Vite 与 Webpack 的配置与优化，能处理远程开发中的构建效率和兼容性问题。  
远程工作素养：自我驱动，能合理安排工作时间，善于利用异步沟通工具，与团队保持顺畅的协作。  
跨团队协作能力：能够与后端、移动端及产品团队协同工作，按项目进度及时反馈并推动问题解决。  
包容与成长心态：我们倡导公平机会，鼓励来自不同背景和能力的候选人申请，包括有身体障碍或经济困难经历的朋友。公司致力于创造一个多元、包容的工作环境。  
加分项  
IM 项目经验：开发过即时通讯、直播聊天室、在线客服系统者优先。  
跨端技术：熟悉 Electron、Tauri 或 React Native，有桌面端应用开发经验。  
底层技术：了解 WebAssembly (Rust/C++)，有在浏览器中使用 SQLite 或 ffmpeg 的经验。  
后端思维：熟悉 Golang 或 Node.js，能与后端同学进行深度的架构级对话。  
我们提供  
真正的技术挑战：告别 CRUD，解决真正的分布式与高并发前端问题。  
远程协作文化：我们只看产出与代码质量，不搞形式主义打卡。  
全栈视野：你将有机会深入参与到 Golang 后端架构与移动端原生开发的讨论中。

description_english:
Project Background
We are building a modular and scalable next-generation Instant Messaging (IM) and social platform.
This is not a simple outsourcing project, but a commercial-grade product dedicated to long-term evolution. The backend uses a Golang distributed architecture, and the clients cover iOS, Android, and Web.
We need you to be the core force on the Web front, responsible for the architectural design and development of the Web IM client (high-performance challenge) and the enterprise-level admin system (high-complexity challenge).

Job Description
Remote Work Mechanism: This position supports fully remote work, with no requirement for a fixed office location. We use output and collaboration as our main evaluation criteria, maintaining high-frequency but low-interruption communication through documentation, IM, and code reviews.

Responsibilities
Architecture Design & Modular Development:
Design the frontend architecture and modularize the instant messaging client and admin system. Continuously optimize code structure, directory standards, and maintainability in a remote collaboration environment.
Legacy Project Maintenance & Upgrade: Understand and maintain existing legacy projects, identify and resolve technical debt, and ensure gradual iteration and upgrades without affecting business operations.
Real-time Communication & Data Synchronization: Implement message transmission and state synchronization based on WebSocket/HTTP, handling message reliability and consistency issues in remote deployment and network environments.
Performance Optimization & Resource Management: Continuously optimize response speed and memory usage for scenarios like long lists, virtual scrolling, and large data rendering. Analyze performance bottlenecks and develop solutions.
State Management & Cross-Module Communication: Design and maintain state management solutions for complex business scenarios, solving data synchronization issues across components/modules in a remote team.
Build Systems & Toolchain: Proficient in using Vite or Webpack, optimizing remote development and CI/CD processes. Master skills like bundle analysis, on-demand loading, and code splitting.
Remote Communication & Collaboration: Actively participate in online requirement discussions, code reviews, and product iterations. Maintain efficient communication and information transparency in a cross-time-zone, cross-team environment.

Challenges You Will Face
Achieving a native-level smooth experience in the browser (virtual scrolling, storage for millions of messages, instant search).
Handling complex network conditions (WebSocket disconnection and reconnection, offline message synchronization, message loss compensation).
Ensuring data security (end-to-end encryption, local database IndexedDB/Sqlite encapsulation).

Requirements
5+ Years of Frontend Experience:
In-depth understanding of component-based and modular development with frameworks like Vue3/React/Angular, with experience in architecting medium to large-scale projects.
Real-time Systems Practice: Experience in developing IM, real-time push, or similar applications, with an understanding of message synchronization and network exception handling.
Performance Optimization Awareness: Familiar with browser rendering mechanisms and able to devise effective optimization plans for performance issues in a remote environment.
Complex State Management Skills: Proficient with state management tools like Redux, Vuex, or RxJS, able to maintain code readability and maintainability in complex business scenarios.
Build & Tuning Skills: Familiar with the configuration and optimization of Vite and Webpack, capable of handling build efficiency and compatibility issues in remote development.
Remote Work Ethic: Self-driven, able to manage work time effectively, skilled at using asynchronous communication tools to maintain smooth collaboration with the team.
Cross-Team Collaboration Skills: Able to collaborate with backend, mobile, and product teams, providing timely feedback and driving problem resolution according to project schedules.
Inclusive & Growth Mindset: We advocate for equal opportunity and encourage candidates from all backgrounds and abilities to apply, including friends with physical disabilities or from economically disadvantaged backgrounds. The company is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment.

Bonus Points
IM Project Experience: Experience developing instant messaging, live chat rooms, or online customer service systems is a plus.
Cross-platform Technology: Familiarity with Electron, Tauri, or React Native, with experience in desktop application development.
Low-level Technology: Knowledge of WebAssembly (Rust/C++), with experience using SQLite or ffmpeg in the browser.
Backend Mindset: Familiarity with Golang or Node.js, able to engage in in-depth, architectural discussions with backend developers.

What We Offer
Real Technical Challenges: Move beyond CRUD and solve real distributed and high-concurrency frontend problems.
Remote Collaboration Culture: We focus solely on output and code quality, with no formalistic clock-ins.
Full-Stack Perspective: You will have the opportunity to be deeply involved in discussions about the Golang backend architecture and native mobile development.

title: 安卓开发工程师
team: 某知名银行上市公司
summary_chinese: 原生移动应用开发,Kotlin/Java,TDD/结对编程,App性能体验优化,国际技术组织背景
summary_english: Native Mobile App Development,Kotlin/Java,TDD/Pair Programming,App Performance & UX Optimization,International Tech Org Background
description_chinese:
工作职责：
深入了解 Android UI 设计原则、模式、最佳实践及 Material Design；
在安卓平台上优化移动应用和用户体验；
收集需求，设计、开发、部署和支持应用程序；
与产品负责人和 Scrum 团队紧密合作，为内部和外部客户提供以用户为中心的解决方案；
推动敏捷和现代软件工程实践的采纳和推广；
推广和实践创新的软件工程实践和架构设计；
与开发/接口团队协调，创建跨多个流的交付管道；
遵循敏捷原则，确保风险、问题和进度得到适当管理；
与核心 DevOps 和测试团队合作，构建和增强持续交付管道；
适应优先级和需求的变化。
任职要求：
具备原生移动应用开发（Kotlin、Java、OC、Swift）的实践经验；
具备面向对象编程的实践经验；
乐于实践 TDD 和结对编程；
精通 DevOps (ADO)；
评估新的移动方法论和技术；
能够以积极的态度和最佳的解决时间支持用户查询；
熟悉 Android SDK、不同版本的 Android，以及如何处理不同屏幕尺寸；
良好的沟通和人际交往能力；
熟悉使用 API 将 Android 应用程序连接到后端服务；
具备维护应用程序、崩溃分析、远程调试和持续集成的经验；
具备构建可维护和可测试代码库的经验，包括 API 设计、单元测试和 UI 测试技术；
理解 Android 系统和编程范式，包括 OOP、TDD、反应式模式和依赖管理；
在项目管理原则、软件开发生命周期实践和方法论方面有实际经验，并具备项目管理实践、原则和工具集的实践知识；
熟悉移动运行时安全（渗透测试）；
计算机科学或软件工程学士或硕士学位，具有7年相关经验，最好有在国际技术组织中交付复杂项目的经验；
有 H5 网页响应式应用开发经验；
良好的英语书面和口头沟通能力。

title: 电子工程师-传感器
team: 某中型仪器仪表/工业自动化公司
summary: PCB设计,Altium Designer,PADS,硬件
summary_chinese: 传感器硬件开发,多层PCB设计,数字和模拟电路设计,EMC设计,Altium/PADS,外企研发团队,英语口语流利
summary_english: Sensor Hardware Development,Multi-layer PCB Design,Digital and Analog Circuit Design,EMC Design,Altium/PADS,MNC R&D Team,Fluent Spoken English
description:
Duties & Responsibilities
Main responsible for hardware development of the product, technical support of projects
Requirement and Configuration Management
Support cost calculation in development projects
Analyses and concept development
System design for Hardware and Software/Firmware integration
Simulation and characterization of hardware, simulation and analyses of software/firmware
Policy compliant, functional and production oriented circuit and software design
Design reviews within global R&D teams
Creation of policy compliant and quality assuring documentations
Support the execution of electronic product developments within the development team with high responsibility
Support the further development of the product portfolio and industrialization
Maintenance and variants configuration development on products and portfolios
Support operation for raw material localization, quality issue analyzes and engineering change
Interface, work and support local and remote functional teams (i.e. Global R&D, Marketing, Sourcing, Manufacturing Engineering etc.) on projects requirements, development and mass production support
Qualifications & Competency
Requirement:
BS or above in Electronic Engineering or Electrical Engineering or other related majors
Familiar with product development process, product creation process
5+ years working experience in electronic design, experience on operation support
Experienced in multi-layer PCB design, schematic design and PCB design process methodology
Experienced in digital and analogue circuits design, meeting EMC requirements
IEC/EN/FCC/UL certification application in hardware design cross industrial products
Skilled in Hardware development tools（Altium, PADS…）and testing equipment
Knowledge in DFSS/Lean, risk management tools and DFM rules
Working experience in MNC R&D Organization is must
Oral English is workable
 
Competencies:
High capability and creativity for analysis and problem solving
Highly self-motivated lead engineer with a result- oriented, and proven track record
Strong team player, action oriented, highly motivated self-starter
Bring a positive, can-do attitude to the work place each day
Sense of commitment and urgency
Motivated in learning new technologies, processes and software
Good communication skills, motivated, creative and the ability to work in international team
description_chinese:
职责与责任
主要负责产品的硬件开发，项目的技术支持
需求和配置管理
支持开发项目中的成本计算
分析和概念开发
硬件和软件/固件集成的系统设计
硬件的仿真和表征，软件/固件的仿真和分析
符合政策、功能性和面向生产的电路和软件设计
参与全球研发团队的设计评审
创建符合政策和质量保证的文档
在开发团队中高度负责地支持电子产品开发的执行
支持产品组合的进一步发展和工业化
产品和产品组合的维护和变体配置开发
支持原材料本地化、质量问题分析和工程变更等运营工作
与本地和远程职能团队（如全球研发、市场、采购、制造工程等）就项目需求、开发和量产支持进行对接、合作和支持
资质与能力
要求：
电子工程、电气工程或其他相关专业本科及以上学历
熟悉产品开发流程、产品创造流程
5年以上电子设计工作经验，有运营支持经验
精通多层PCB设计、原理图设计和PCB设计流程方法论
精通数字和模拟电路设计，满足EMC要求
在跨行业产品的硬件设计中应用IEC/EN/FCC/UL认证
熟练使用硬件开发工具（Altium, PADS…）和测试设备
了解DFSS/精益生产、风险管理工具和DFM规则
必须有跨国公司研发组织的从业经验
英语口语流利
 
能力：
具备出色的分析和解决问题的能力及创造力
积极主动的领导工程师，以结果为导向，并有成功的往绩
强大的团队合作精神，行动导向，积极主动
每天以积极、乐观的态度面对工作
有责任心和紧迫感
积极学习新技术、新流程和新软件
良好的沟通技巧，积极主动，富有创造力，并能在国际化团队中工作

title: 留学申请顾问（远程办公）
team: 北京海特思文教育科技有限公司
summary: 笔译,留学/移民材料,无需坐班,全职,雅思6.5分及以上
summary_chinese: 留学文案规划与申请,国际教育行业,美国留学申请,中英文流利,奖金丰厚不封顶,线下团建机会
summary_english: Study Abroad Document Planning & Application,International Education Industry,US Study Abroad Applications,Fluent in Chinese and English,Generous Uncapped Bonuses,Offline Team Building Opportunities
description:
【岗位职责】
1.负责为学生提供院校申请各类文案规划服务；
2.负责学生文案服务全流程把控，确保学生文案按时输出；
3.及时和留学顾问老师沟通，积极反馈各项目的进展情况；
4.积极跟进学生院校申请进度；
5.与文案老师沟通学生申请，匠心打造学生申请文案。
【任职要求】
1、本科及以上学历，拥有留学行业1-3年相关工作经验者优先；对留学申请和签证政策有深入了解，能够独立处理复杂情况；
2、优先考虑熟悉多个国家的工作经验、有美国留学申请流程及签证（F-1）办理经验者者
3、出色的中英文书面及口语表达能力，优秀的沟通能力、客户服务意识及团队协作精神，能够承受一定的工作压力
5、注重细节，具备极强的责任心和严谨的工作态度；
【我们的文化】
1.结果导向，效率为主，创造价值：我们注重工作结果和效率，以创造价值为核心目标;
2.美貌与智慧并重的年轻团队（高颜值+高学历背景），实干为主：公司拥有一支充满活力的年轻团队，崇尚实干精神。
【超明朗的晋升通道】
1.纵向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 团队主管 – 部门主管 – 部门经理 – 部门负责人
2.横向通道：专员 – 团队组长 – 项目/品牌主管 – 项目/品牌负责人
3.毕业生孵化计划：一对一培训 + 各部门轮岗机会 
【超酷的福利待遇】
1.高于同行业薪水 & 奖金丰厚不封顶
2.线上工作，无需通勤
3.表现优异者可享有年度定期线下团建机会，及不定期异地培训福利，助力职业成长
4.宽松高效简单的工作氛围，定期培训无天花板晋级成长通道
【超暖心的人员关怀】
1.节假日节日慰问 & 各大电商平台现金卡礼物
2.入职周年祝福 & 周年纪念日礼物
3.不定期线上（故事分享、线上年会、演唱会、周年庆感受分享等） &  线下团建活动（世界各地线下饭局、中英总部-北京伯明翰线下年会活动等）
（注意：仅限本公司使用，严禁搬运）
海特思文（Hitevision）全球国际教育引领者，总部位于北京。​ 秉持“无国界教育”理念，我们构建了覆盖中国大陆、香港及亚非欧核心地区的强大服务网络（近百家门店/分部）。依托顶尖全球资源与深谙本地的国际化团队，我们为学子提供专业、高效、个性化的一站式国际教育服务，助力拥抱多元文化、开拓全球视野、实现世界顶尖学府梦想。 ​ 
公司以“年轻、精进、担当、共赢”为文化，汇聚实干精英，矢志成为学生连接全球机遇的战略伙伴。​ 
加入我们，与全球化精英团队共成长，启迪智慧，照亮世界征程！​    ​

description_english:
【Job Responsibilities】
1. Responsible for providing students with various document planning services for university applications;
2. Responsible for managing the entire process of student document services to ensure timely output;
3. Communicate promptly with study abroad consultants and actively provide feedback on the progress of each project;
4. Actively follow up on students' university application progress;
5. Communicate with copywriters about student applications and meticulously craft application documents.
【Job Requirements】
1. Bachelor's degree or above; 1-3 years of relevant work experience in the study abroad industry is preferred; in-depth understanding of study abroad applications and visa policies, capable of handling complex situations independently;
2. Preference will be given to candidates with work experience related to multiple countries, and experience with the US study abroad application process and F-1 visa processing;
3. Excellent written and spoken communication skills in both Chinese and English, outstanding communication skills, customer service awareness, and team spirit; able to work under a certain level of pressure;
4. Detail-oriented, with a strong sense of responsibility and a rigorous work attitude;
【Our Culture】
1. Results-oriented, efficiency-focused, value-creating: We focus on work results and efficiency, with value creation as our core goal;
2. A young team that values both appearance and intellect (good looks + high academic background), with a focus on practical work: The company has a vibrant young team that values a hands-on spirit.
【Super Clear Career Path】
1. Vertical Path: Specialist – Team Leader – Team Supervisor – Department Supervisor – Department Manager – Head of Department
2. Horizontal Path: Specialist – Team Leader – Project/Brand Supervisor – Project/Brand Head
3. Graduate Incubation Program: One-on-one training + cross-departmental rotation opportunities
【Super Cool Benefits】
1. Salary higher than the industry average & generous, uncapped bonuses
2. Online work, no commute required
3. High performers can enjoy annual offline team-building opportunities and occasional off-site training benefits to support career growth
4. A relaxed, efficient, and simple work atmosphere with regular training and a limitless promotion and growth path
【Super Warm Employee Care】
1. Holiday greetings & cash card gifts from major e-commerce platforms
2. Work anniversary blessings & anniversary gifts
3. Occasional online (story sharing, online annual meetings, concerts, anniversary sharing, etc.) & offline team-building activities (offline dinners around the world, offline annual meetings at China-UK headquarters in Beijing and Birmingham, etc.)
(Note: For internal use by our company only. Unauthorized reproduction is strictly prohibited.)
Hitevision, a global leader in international education, is headquartered in Beijing. Upholding the "Education Without Borders" philosophy, we have built a powerful service network covering Mainland China, Hong Kong, and core regions in Asia, Africa, and Europe (nearly 100 stores/branches). Leveraging top-tier global resources and an international team with deep local expertise, we provide students with professional, efficient, and personalized one-stop international education services, helping them embrace diverse cultures, broaden their global perspectives, and achieve their dreams of attending world-class universities.
The company's culture is "Young, Progressive, Responsible, and Win-Win," bringing together pragmatic elites and striving to be a strategic partner connecting students with global opportunities.
Join us to grow with a global elite team, inspire wisdom, and illuminate the journey to the world!

title: 高级.NET（远程办公）
team: 天擎千鑫（北京）科技有限公司
summary_chinese: .NET Core系统开发,.NET Core,Web API,微服务,关系型数据库,5年以上经验,英语读写能力
summary_english: .NET Core System Development,.NET Core,Web API,Microservices,Relational Databases,5+ years of experience,English Reading and Writing Skills
description:
高级.NET工程师
岗位职责：
1.            设计和实现基于.NET Core框架的应用系统，包括但不限于Web API、微服务及后台管理系统；
2.            参与系统设计，确保系统的高可⽤性和可扩展性；
3.            参与项⽬的需求分析、技术选型、⽅案设计以及文档编写等工作。
4.            与前端开发团队合作，确保前后端整合流畅，提⾼用户体验；
5.            优化现有系统架构，引入最新的安全标准和技术解决方案，提升系统安全性和性能；
6.            主动探索和评估新技术，为团队带来创新解决方案。
 
岗位要求：
1.            统招本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业，5年以上.NET Core开发经验；
2.            拥有完整的大中型项目开发经历，理解产品研发流程；
3.            具备良好的问题分析与解决能力，能够独立承担任务并有效解决技术问题；
4.            具备良好的代码编写习惯，熟悉软件开发规范；
5.            良好的英语读写能力。
6.            精通C#语言，对.NET Core平台有深入的理解和实践经验，精通ASP.NET Core、LINQ, Entity Framework Core, sqlSugar，SQL等开发工具；
7.            具备扎实的计算机基础知识，包括数据结构、算法、网络编程、多线程编程等；
8.            熟悉SQL Server、PostgreSQL或MySQL等关系型数据库，熟练使用SQL语言，具备性能优化能力；

2.            拥有完整的大中型项目开发经历，理解产品研发流程；
3.            具备良好的问题分析与解决能力，能够独立承担任务并有效解决技术问题；

6.            精通C#语言，对.NET Core平台有深入的理解和实践经验，精通ASP.NET Core、LINQ, Entity Framework Core, sqlSugar，SQL等开发工具；
7.            具备扎实的计算机基础知识，包括数据结构、算法、网络编程、多线程编程等；
8.            熟悉SQL Server、PostgreSQL或MySQL等关系型数据库，熟练使用SQL语言，具备性能优化能力；

title: 视觉设计师-远程办公
team: 北京海络梦想科技有限公司
summary: 3-5年UI设计经验,周末双休,远程办公,3D设计经验,AIGC设计经验,有UI设计经验/技能,动效设计经验
summary_chinese: 品牌视觉创意设计,金融行业,互联网行业,移动端与PC端设计,3D/动效能力,3-5年经验
summary_english: Brand Visual Creative Design,Finance Industry,Internet Industry,Mobile and PC Design,3D/Motion Graphics Skills,3-5 Years of Experience
description:
职位描述:
1、负责不同业务的日常设计需求（如主视觉、资源位、活动页、线下物料以及延展等），并结合产品定位，负责移动端、PC端等设计品牌宣传的视觉创意设计；
2、理解用户及产品，明确项目设计定位/视觉风格，输出符合业界趋势的完整的视觉设计方案，对产出质量负责并最终能落地。
3、参与日常产品运营设计包括H5 Banner等物料；
4、需要具备较强的沟通能力和与跨团队合作协调的能力，能主动进行团队沟通保证设计进度和质量的产出；
5、负责推进设计方案的AB实验，验证设计对业务的增量价值；并跟进和复盘设计效果；
任职要求:
1、3-5年以上互联网相关岗位从业经历；
2、对前沿设计潮流敏锐，有表达自己思考和见解的能力，很强的自驱力与抗压力，不断追求设计价值实现；
3、熟练掌握设计类软件，平面设计功底扎实，排版好，视觉表现力强（图像合成、插画、3D、AI），有较好手绘、3D、动效能力，有成功的设计案例优先；
4、注重细节，审美能力强
备注：请提供真实作品简历
“与海络一起创造卓越体验，激发商业无限可能！”
海络体验咨询是数字化体验创新与管理专家。我们以顶层思维与底层逻辑，帮您解读商业全局并剖析体验创新的关键。 通过整合战略、设计和技术等要素，为您提供策略探索、差异创新、体验管理、运营增长四大核心服务，优化您的数字战略并构建卓越的客户体验。让人性化体验满足当下需求，建立信任与忠诚，推动增长。

海络专注于金融、互联网等行业，并与中国40多家不同类型的银行、头部互联网企业有着长期合作。所服务的范围涵盖数字金融、短视频平台、生活服务平台、电商平台、娱乐平台、线上办公平台等业务领域。通过500+产品创新项目，驱动卓越体验落地生长，影响中国“数亿级”的用户体验。

1、负责不同业务的日常设计需求（如主视觉、资源位、活动页、线下物料以及延展等），并结合产品定位，负责移动端、PC端等设计品牌宣传的视觉创意设计；

5、负责推进设计方案的AB实验，验证设计对业务的增量价值；并跟进和复盘设计效果；

title: 课程研发专员（居家远程办公）
team: 天津金嗓子教育信息咨询有限公司
summary_chinese: 教学课件研发,在线英语教育,少儿英语,PPT课件设计,AIGC,外企,弹性工作
summary_english: Instructional Courseware R&D,Online English Education,Children's English,PPT Courseware Design,AIGC,Foreign Enterprise,Flexible Work
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：无要求
工作时间：不限
工作时段：不限
结算方式：月结
招聘截止时间：2026-05-31
负责将公司深厚的教学积淀转化为极具视觉冲击力和互动性的教学产品：
1. 标准化课件研发： 严格执行公司课件研发标准，独立完成 PPT 课件的编写、排版与动画设计。
2. IP 资产运营： 灵活调用公司的品牌 IP，根据角色职能（教学、活动、复习）设计生动的课堂情境。
3. AI 素材创作： 利用 ChatGPT、豆包 等 AI 工具，为课件生成高质量的教学脚本、插画素材及短视频背景，实现“教研+AI”的生产力飞跃。
4. SOP 落地： 编写“教师备注（Teacher Talk）”，确保不同背景的老师都能实现标准化的优质教学输出。 
岗位要求
我们寻找的是具备“教育心”和“极客魂”的你：
1. 教育背景： 本科及以上学历，英语、教育学、英语文学或相关专业，英语专业八级或持有 TESOL/CELTA 证书者优先。
2. 专业技能： PPT 大神： 能够熟练玩转 PPT 触发器、路径动画及母版设计，不依赖技术开发也能做出互动感极强的课件。AI 深度用户： 熟悉并热爱使用生成式 AI 工具。如果你能写出让 AI 乖乖听话的 Prompt，你就是我们要找的人！
3. 行业经验： 1-3 年少儿英语教研或教学经验。了解 TPR (全身反应法)、CLIL (跨学科教学) 等国际主流教学法。
4. 审美与创意： 具备良好的排版审美，能让课件一眼看上去就具备“国际大牌”的质感。
隶属加拿大NewSeason公司，公司主营在线英语业务。

description_english:
Work Period: Long-term Part-time
Weekly Schedule: No specific requirement
Work Hours: Flexible
Work Schedule: Flexible
Payment Method: Monthly
Application Deadline: 2026-05-31
Responsible for transforming the company's profound teaching experience into highly visually impactful and interactive educational products:
1. Standardized Courseware R&D: Strictly follow the company's courseware development standards to independently complete the writing, layout, and animation design of PPT courseware.
2. IP Asset Management: Flexibly utilize the company's brand IP to design vivid classroom scenarios based on character roles (teaching, activities, review).
3. AI Content Creation: Use AI tools like ChatGPT and Doubao to generate high-quality teaching scripts, illustration materials, and short video backgrounds for courseware, achieving a leap in productivity through "Educational Research + AI".
4. SOP Implementation: Write "Teacher's Notes (Teacher Talk)" to ensure that teachers from different backgrounds can deliver standardized, high-quality teaching output.
Job Requirements
We are looking for someone with a "heart for education" and a "geek soul":
1. Educational Background: Bachelor's degree or above in English, Education, English Literature, or related fields. Priority will be given to candidates with TEM-8 certification or TESOL/CELTA certificates.
2. Professional Skills: PPT Master: Proficient with PPT triggers, path animations, and master slide design, able to create highly interactive courseware without relying on technical development. AI Power User: Familiar with and enthusiastic about using generative AI tools. If you can write prompts that make AI follow your commands, you are the one we're looking for!
3. Industry Experience: 1-3 years of experience in children's English curriculum research or teaching. Familiar with internationally recognized teaching methods such as TPR (Total Physical Response) and CLIL (Content and Language Integrated Learning).
4. Aesthetics and Creativity: Possess a strong sense of layout aesthetics, capable of creating courseware that has the feel of an "international brand" at first glance.
Affiliated with NewSeason, a Canadian company, whose main business is online English education.

title: iOS/Android Development
team: 某知名银行上市公司
summary: 技术博客/开源项目有所贡献,JavaScript,Vue,接受居家办公,计算机/软件工程相关专业
summary_chinese: 原生App开发,Swift,移动端架构设计,CI/CD,7年以上经验
summary_english: Native App Development,Swift,Mobile Architecture Design,CI/CD,7+ years of experience
description:
Responsibilities
Designs and engineer software with the customer/user experience as a key objective.
Work in multiple scrum teams to craft the mobile technical design and architecture that address engineering and business needs.
Design and develop mobile components, libraries, and reference applications, using the latest technology to tackle cross cutting technical and non-functional concern. Document the knowledge and best practices appropriately.
Design, develop and deploy applications capable of meeting the anticipated load, performance, availability, security and resilience requirements.
Design and develop software with a focus on automation of build, testing and deployment process on all environments to minimize variation and ensure predictable high quality code and data.
Ensuring compliance with all relevant controls and standards including relevant Service Management Standard. Ensure high data quality exists in Service Management systems of record.
Provide support in identification and resolution of all incidents associated with the IT service, as directed by leadership of the DevOps team.
Ensure service resilience, service sustainability and recovery time objectives are met for all the software solutions delivered.
Responsible for automating the continuous integration / continuous delivery pipeline within a DevOps Product/Service team driving a culture of continuous improvement.
Keep up to date and have expertise on current tools, technologies and areas like cyber security and regulations pertaining to aspects like data privacy, consent, data residency etc. that are applicable
 Qualifications
Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related disciplines, or equivalent
7 or more years of development experience with capacity in defining mobile architecture and technology roadmap
7 or more years of native iOS development experience with solid hands-on development experience in Swift
Multi-threading (GCD, PromiseKit)
Data storage (Core data, Keychain, Realm)
Autolayout (Native, snapkit)
OOP
Remote Data via REST and JSON (Codable, Objectmapper)
Third-Party Libraries and APIs
Proficiency developing with modern programming languages and web technologies, and ability to rapidly develop proof-of-concepts
Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
Ability to work with geographically distributed and cross-functional teams
Hands-on experience with AWS or GCP,  Design pattern (MVC, MVVM, VIPER), Framework-based development, Unit & UI testing, Objective-C, Security, and Networking (Native, Alamofire) is desired
Experience building highly available, secure, distributed systems
Experience building extremely high volume and highly scalable web services
Experience with Jenkins or other CI or CD pipeline (Git, Sourcetree, Jenkin, Testflight)
description_chinese:
职责
以客户/用户体验为关键目标，设计和开发软件。
在多个 Scrum 团队中工作，打造满足工程和业务需求的移动技术设计和架构。
使用最新技术设计和开发移动组件、库和参考应用程序，以解决跨领域的技术和非功能性问题。适当地记录知识和最佳实践。
设计、开发和部署能够满足预期负载、性能、可用性、安全性和弹性需求的应用程序。
设计和开发软件，重点关注在所有环境中自动化构建、测试和部署流程，以最大限度地减少差异，并确保可预测的高质量代码和数据。
确保遵守所有相关控制和标准，包括相关的服务管理标准。确保服务管理记录系统中有高质量的数据。
在 DevOps 团队领导的指导下，为识别和解决与 IT 服务相关的所有事件提供支持。
确保为所有交付的软件解决方案满足服务弹性、服务可持续性和恢复时间目标。
负责在 DevOps 产品/服务团队中自动化持续集成/持续交付管道，推动持续改进的文化。
保持对当前工具、技术和领域的最新了解并拥有专业知识，例如网络安全以及与数据隐私、同意、数据驻留等方面相关的法规。

资格
计算机科学或相关学科的学士学位，或同等学历。
7年以上开发经验，具备定义移动架构和技术路线图的能力。
7年以上原生 iOS 开发经验，具备扎实的 Swift 动手开发经验。
多线程 (GCD, PromiseKit)
数据存储 (Core data, Keychain, Realm)
自动布局 (Native, snapkit)
面向对象编程 (OOP)
通过 REST 和 JSON 获取远程数据 (Codable, Objectmapper)
第三方库和 API
精通使用现代编程语言和网络技术进行开发，并能快速开发概念验证。
深入了解完整的移动开发生命周期。
能够与地理上分散的跨职能团队合作。
期望具备 AWS 或 GCP、设计模式 (MVC, MVVM, VIPER)、基于框架的开发、单元和 UI 测试、Objective-C、安全和网络 (Native, Alamofire) 的实践经验。
有构建高可用、安全、分布式系统的经验。
有构建超高流量和高可扩展性 Web 服务的经验。
有使用 Jenkins 或其他 CI/CD 管道 (Git, Sourcetree, Jenkin, Testflight) 的经验。
