title: Java Tech Lead
team: 奈佳罗软件（北京）有限公司
summary: Java,微服务经验,Kafka,接受居家办公
summary_chinese: 应用开发项目领导,微服务,DDD,事件驱动架构,外企
summary_english: Application Development Project Leadership,Microservices,DDD,Event-Driven Architecture,Foreign Enterprise
description:
Location: remote
JOB SUMMARY:  
leads day-to-day application development projects and engineering. This role requires a hands-on leader capable of driving technical implementation, specifically within Microservices and Domain-Driven Design (DDD) context.
Education and Experience 
Required:
•	5+ years of application development leadership experience with a strong foundation in software engineering.
•	Architecture & Design: Proven experience in Domain-Driven Design (DDD) & Clean Architecture delivery.
•	Microservices: Extensive hands-on experience in building distributed applications using Microservices architecture, including API design and gateway integration.
•	System Design: Solid system-design and tech-stack evaluation skills, with the ability to build scalable product services.
•	Data Management: Deep experience with Relational databases and NoSQL databases.
•	Messaging: Familiarity with message queues and event-driven architecture (e.g., Kafka or similar).
•	Search Tech: Experience implementing and managing search technologies (e.g., OpenSearch, Elasticsearch).
•	Version Control: Expert knowledge of Git & mainstream branch models (GitFlow, Trunk-Based).
•	Operational Excellence: Proven production-issue troubleshooting, alert optimization, and monitoring experience.
•	Communication: Strong cross-team communication skills with the ability to articulate complex technical ideas and facilitate knowledge-sharing.
Preferred:
•	Experience in building platforms and solutions for the WeChat Ecosystem.
•	Proven knowledge of Agile methodology; preferably SAFe Agile.
•	Experience with Automation, CI/CD, Release Management processes, and Application Deployments.
•	Undergraduate/graduate degree or equivalent education + experience.
CORE WORK ACTIVITIES  	
Technical Proposal / Leading
•	Tech Stack Selection: Evaluate and select appropriate technology stacks, including frameworks and databases, ensuring alignment with business goals.
•	Standards Definition: Establish and enforce coding standards, technical specifications, and best practices to promote project quality.
•	Design Review: Lead technical design reviews to ensure adherence to DDD and Clean Architecture principles.
Managing Application Development & Regular Releases
•	Hands-on Development: Actively participate in the design and development of critical features.
•	Quality Assurance: Conduct rigorous code reviews and runbook reviews to maintain high standards of code quality.
•	Process Management: Facilitate compliance with standard tools and processes regarding Git workflows (GitFlow/Trunk-Based) to ensure smooth release cycles.
•	Team Coaching: Coach the team on code-quality best practices and continuous improvement.
Operational Reliability & Monitoring
•	Health Monitoring: Implement regular application monitoring to track the health status of the application.
•	Incident Management: Lead production-issue analysis and troubleshooting efforts.
•	Alert Optimization: Perform alert analysis to reduce noise and improve response times for critical issues.
•	Resiliency: Ensure the system is robust by utilizing circuit breakers, load balancing, and registry/discovery patterns.
Cross-Team Collaboration & Knowledge Sharing
•	Partnerships: Work in a Product-based model and build strong partnerships with Product Owners.
•	Knowledge Transfer: Foster a culture of cross-team collaboration and knowledge sharing to eliminate silos.
•	Stakeholder Management: Liaise with project teams, customers, and stakeholders to coordinate integrated project activities.
Nagarro is one of the world’s fastest growing company with over 19,000 employees in 36 countries.
Diverse and loyal blue–chip customer base, 1,000+ customers across 63 countries. Our customers come from following industries: Automotive, Manufacturing, Financial Services and Insurance, Retail and CPG, Public, Non-profit, Education, Travel and Logistics, Energy, Utilities and Building Automation, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Telecom, Media and Entertainment.
We work across the technology and tools landscape. Focused on solutions. The areas mentioned here are those where we are continuously developing game-changing solutions for our clients. Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, IoT & Industrial Automation, Accelerated Quality & Test Engineering, Cloud & Digital Enablement, User Experience Design, DevOps & Infra-Ops, Marketing Tech, Assisted & Augmented Reality, Consumer Experience.
Caring is at the heart of our values, Caring means “Client-centric”, “ Agile”, “responsible”, “Intelligence”, “ Non-Hierarchical” and “ Global”.
 
       Nagarro是全球增长最快的公司之一，分布在全球36个国家和地区的19000多名员工通力合作，无论客户身在何处，我们都能够提供卓越的服务和创新高效的解决方案。我们与来自各行各业的客户建立了长期的合作伙伴关系。目前，我们的客户数量超过1000家，遍布全球63个国家和地区。我们的客户来自不同行业：汽车行业和制造业、金融保险行业、零售和消费品行业、公共事业、非盈利事业、物流和交通运输行业、能源和建筑行业、生命科学和医疗行业、通信行业、媒体和娱乐行业。
       我们熟练驾驭各种技术和工具，专注于为客户提供优质解决方案。我们擅长的领域：人工智能 & 机器学习、物联网 & 工业自动化、质量工程和测试工程、云与数字化赋能-数字化转型、用户体验设计、开发运维DevOps&基础设施运维Infra-Ops、数字化营销解决方案、辅助现实与增强现实、消费与消费者体验。
       Caring是我们的核心价值观，由以下几个词汇的首字母组成：以客户为中心（Client-centric）, 敏捷（Agile）, 责任（Responsible）, 智慧（Intelligent）, 非等级化（Non-hierarchical）, 全球化（Global）。Caring代表着我们对客户的承诺，并指导着我们的行动，塑造了我们的企业文化
description_chinese:
地点：远程
职位摘要：
领导日常应用程序开发项目和工程。该职位需要一位能够推动技术实施的实干型领导者，特别是在微服务和领域驱动设计（DDD）的背景下。

教育和经验
要求：
•	5年以上应用程序开发领导经验，具备扎实的软件工程基础。
•	架构与设计：在领域驱动设计（DDD）和整洁架构交付方面有成熟的经验。
•	微服务：在使用微服务架构构建分布式应用程序方面拥有丰富的实践经验，包括API设计和网关集成。
•	系统设计：扎实的系统设计和技术栈评估能力，能够构建可扩展的产品服务。
•	数据管理：在关系型数据库和NoSQL数据库方面有深厚的经验。
•	消息传递：熟悉消息队列和事件驱动架构（例如，Kafka或类似技术）。
•	搜索技术：有实施和管理搜索技术（例如，OpenSearch、Elasticsearch）的经验。
•	版本控制：精通Git及主流分支模型（GitFlow、Trunk-Based）。
•	卓越运营：在生产问题排查、警报优化和监控方面有成熟的经验。
•	沟通能力：强大的跨团队沟通能力，能够清晰阐述复杂的技术理念并促进知识共享。

优先考虑：
•	有为微信生态系统构建平台和解决方案的经验。
•	具备成熟的敏捷方法论知识；有SAFe敏捷经验者优先。
•	有自动化、CI/CD、发布管理流程和应用程序部署方面的经验。
•	本科/研究生学位或同等学历及经验。

核心工作活动
技术方案 / 领导
•	技术栈选择：评估并选择合适的技术栈，包括框架和数据库，确保与业务目标一致。
•	标准定义：建立并推行编码标准、技术规范和最佳实践，以提升项目质量。
•	设计评审：领导技术设计评审，确保遵循DDD和整洁架构原则。

管理应用程序开发与常规发布
•	亲身参与开发：积极参与关键功能的设计和开发。
•	质量保证：进行严格的代码审查和操作手册审查，以维持高标准的代码质量。
•	流程管理：促进对Git工作流（GitFlow/Trunk-Based）相关标准工具和流程的遵守，以确保顺利的发布周期。
•	团队指导：指导团队掌握代码质量最佳实践并持续改进。

运营可靠性与监控
•	健康监控：实施常规应用程序监控，以跟踪应用程序的健康状况。
•	事件管理：领导生产问题的分析和故障排除工作。
•	警报优化：执行警报分析以减少噪音并提高关键问题的响应时间。
•	弹性：通过利用断路器、负载均衡和注册/发现模式，确保系统的稳健性。

跨团队协作与知识共享
•	伙伴关系：在基于产品的模型中工作，并与产品负责人建立牢固的伙伴关系。
•	知识转移：培养跨团队协作和知识共享的文化，以消除信息孤岛。
•	利益相关者管理：与项目团队、客户和利益相关者联络，协调综合项目活动。

Nagarro是全球增长最快的公司之一，分布在全球36个国家和地区的19000多名员工通力合作，无论客户身在何处，我们都能够提供卓越的服务和创新高效的解决方案。我们与来自各行各业的客户建立了长期的合作伙伴关系。目前，我们的客户数量超过1000家，遍布全球63个国家和地区。我们的客户来自不同行业：汽车行业和制造业、金融保险行业、零售和消费品行业、公共事业、非盈利事业、物流和交通运输行业、能源和建筑行业、生命科学和医疗行业、通信行业、媒体和娱乐行业。
我们熟练驾驭各种技术和工具，专注于为客户提供优质解决方案。我们擅长的领域：人工智能 & 机器学习、物联网 & 工业自动化、质量工程和测试工程、云与数字化赋能-数字化转型、用户体验设计、开发运维DevOps&基础设施运维Infra-Ops、数字化营销解决方案、辅助现实与增强现实、消费与消费者体验。
Caring是我们的核心价值观，由以下几个词汇的首字母组成：以客户为中心（Client-centric）, 敏捷（Agile）, 责任（Responsible）, 智慧（Intelligent）, 非等级化（Non-hierarchical）, 全球化（Global）。Caring代表着我们对客户的承诺，并指导着我们的行动，塑造了我们的企业文化。
description_english:
Location: remote
JOB SUMMARY:
Leads day-to-day application development projects and engineering. This role requires a hands-on leader capable of driving technical implementation, specifically within Microservices and Domain-Driven Design (DDD) context.

Education and Experience
Required:
•	5+ years of application development leadership experience with a strong foundation in software engineering.
•	Architecture & Design: Proven experience in Domain-Driven Design (DDD) & Clean Architecture delivery.
•	Microservices: Extensive hands-on experience in building distributed applications using Microservices architecture, including API design and gateway integration.
•	System Design: Solid system-design and tech-stack evaluation skills, with the ability to build scalable product services.
•	Data Management: Deep experience with Relational databases and NoSQL databases.
•	Messaging: Familiarity with message queues and event-driven architecture (e.g., Kafka or similar).
•	Search Tech: Experience implementing and managing search technologies (e.g., OpenSearch, Elasticsearch).
•	Version Control: Expert knowledge of Git & mainstream branch models (GitFlow, Trunk-Based).
•	Operational Excellence: Proven production-issue troubleshooting, alert optimization, and monitoring experience.
•	Communication: Strong cross-team communication skills with the ability to articulate complex technical ideas and facilitate knowledge-sharing.

Preferred:
•	Experience in building platforms and solutions for the WeChat Ecosystem.
•	Proven knowledge of Agile methodology; preferably SAFe Agile.
•	Experience with Automation, CI/CD, Release Management processes, and Application Deployments.
•	Undergraduate/graduate degree or equivalent education + experience.

CORE WORK ACTIVITIES
Technical Proposal / Leading
•	Tech Stack Selection: Evaluate and select appropriate technology stacks, including frameworks and databases, ensuring alignment with business goals.
•	Standards Definition: Establish and enforce coding standards, technical specifications, and best practices to promote project quality.
•	Design Review: Lead technical design reviews to ensure adherence to DDD and Clean Architecture principles.

Managing Application Development & Regular Releases
•	Hands-on Development: Actively participate in the design and development of critical features.
•	Quality Assurance: Conduct rigorous code reviews and runbook reviews to maintain high standards of code quality.
•	Process Management: Facilitate compliance with standard tools and processes regarding Git workflows (GitFlow/Trunk-Based) to ensure smooth release cycles.
•	Team Coaching: Coach the team on code-quality best practices and continuous improvement.

Operational Reliability & Monitoring
•	Health Monitoring: Implement regular application monitoring to track the health status of the application.
•	Incident Management: Lead production-issue analysis and troubleshooting efforts.
•	Alert Optimization: Perform alert analysis to reduce noise and improve response times for critical issues.
•	Resiliency: Ensure the system is robust by utilizing circuit breakers, load balancing, and registry/discovery patterns.

Cross-Team Collaboration & Knowledge Sharing
•	Partnerships: Work in a Product-based model and build strong partnerships with Product Owners.
•	Knowledge Transfer: Foster a culture of cross-team collaboration and knowledge sharing to eliminate silos.
•	Stakeholder Management: Liaise with project teams, customers, and stakeholders to coordinate integrated project activities.

Nagarro is one of the world’s fastest growing companies, with over 19,000 employees in 36 countries working together to provide excellent service and innovative, efficient solutions wherever our customers are. We have established long-term partnerships with clients from various industries. Currently, we have over 1,000 customers in 63 countries worldwide. Our customers come from different industries: Automotive and Manufacturing, Financial Services and Insurance, Retail and Consumer Goods, Public Sector, Non-profit, Logistics and Transportation, Energy and Construction, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Telecommunications, Media and Entertainment.
We are proficient in a wide range of technologies and tools, focusing on providing high-quality solutions for our clients. Our areas of expertise include: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, IoT & Industrial Automation, Quality Engineering and Test Engineering, Cloud & Digital Enablement - Digital Transformation, User Experience Design, DevOps & Infra-Ops, Digital Marketing Solutions, Assisted & Augmented Reality, Consumer & Customer Experience.
Caring is our core value, formed from the initials of the following words: Client-centric, Agile, Responsible, Intelligent, Non-hierarchical, Global. Caring represents our commitment to our clients, guides our actions, and shapes our corporate culture.

title: Service Coordinator服务协调员
team: 西安迈搏智能科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 处理客户升级问题,SaaS,中英双语流利,跨时区协作,Jira/Zendesk,美企
summary_english: Customer Escalation Handling,SaaS,Fluent in Chinese and English,Cross-timezone Collaboration,Jira/Zendesk,US Company
description:
工作方式：远程（菲律宾境内）
工作时间：周一至周五，北京时间下午四小时，晚上在家办公四个小时
职位概述
MSPbots.ai 的服务协调员在处理复杂的客户升级问题、确保全球团队之间高效沟通以及通过数据驱动的洞察提升服务质量方面发挥着关键作用。该职位需要积极主动地提供技术支持、协调工作，并持续改进流程。（Remote Rocketship）
关键职责
1.作为复杂客户升级问题的主要联系人，确保及时有效地解决问题。（LinkedIn）
分析系统日志，进行详细的故障排查，以解决高级技术问题，最大程度减少客户停机时间。（Remote Rocketship）
2.促进运营团队（美国和菲律宾团队）与开发团队（中国团队）之间的沟通，确保在客户需求和项目更新方面达成一致。（Remote Rocketship）
3.识别升级问题中的模式，提出系统性变更建议，以提高平台可靠性和服务质量。（Remote Rocketship）
4.为客户提供深入的技术支持和指导，有效传达解决方案。（Remote Rocketship）
记录并维护与升级问题相关的工作流程，确保持续改进流程。（Remote Rocketship）
5.协调并管理与客户升级问题相关的任务，确保及时解决问题并使利益相关者达成共识。（Remote Rocketship）
6.支持软件更新或修复的部署，有效地向客户和内部团队传达变更信息。（Remote Rocketship）
7.协助对新团队成员进行沟通协议、升级流程和技术工具方面的培训与入职引导。（Remote Rocketship）
8.主持知识分享会议，在团队中传播见解和最佳实践。（Remote Rocketship）
任职资格
1.信息技术、计算机科学或相关领域的学士学位，或具备同等专业经验。（Remote Rocketship）
2.至少 3 年项目协调或高级技术支持经验，最好是在软件即服务（SaaS）或技术驱动型环境中。（Remote Rocketship）
3.对技术概念、软件故障排查和高级问题解决方法有深入理解。（Remote Rocketship）
4.精通英语和普通话，具备出色的双语书面和口头沟通能力。（Remote Rocketship）
5.具备出色的人际交往和沟通能力，能够清晰解释复杂的技术概念。（Remote Rocketship）
6.能够在快节奏的环境中工作，并同时管理多项任务。（Remote Rocketship）
7.熟练使用客户关系管理（CRM）系统和工单系统，如 Jira、Zendesk 或类似平台。（Remote Rocketship）
8.具备在高压力情况下保持专业和同理心的能力。（Remote Rocketship）
西安迈搏智能科技有限公司，是美国ITS (www.itsasap.com)公司在西安的软件研发中心，总公司位于芝加哥, 目前在菲律宾、 新加坡等地设有分支机构。总公司业务主要面向MSP行业(IT服务行业) 为美国市场 (财务公司, 律所等) 客户提供优质IT运维服务(包含客户公司办公设备、 网络设备等IT设备维护、 软硬件产品销售、 数据中心运维、 云服务器销售等)
西安研发中心负责的MSPBots.ai产品研发工作，包含从产品设计、软件开发、上线维护全套流程，团队包含目前50人左右，计划在本年度扩展至80人。MSPBots.ai产品团队除在中国以外，另有80人的支持团队，包含销售、客服、市场、技服等角色，产品目前beta版上线状态，已有1000+客户在使用，客户分布包含主要的英语国家 (从澳大利亚, 欧洲至北美)，研发团队和中国外的非研发团队在同一个团队框架下配合工作。

description_english:
Work Style: Remote (within the Philippines)
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, four hours in the afternoon (Beijing Time) and four hours working from home in the evening.

Position Overview
The Service Coordinator at MSPbots.ai plays a key role in handling complex customer escalations, ensuring efficient communication between global teams, and enhancing service quality through data-driven insights. This position requires proactive technical support, coordination, and continuous process improvement.

Key Responsibilities
1. Act as the primary point of contact for complex customer escalations, ensuring timely and effective resolution. Analyze system logs and perform detailed troubleshooting to resolve advanced technical issues, minimizing customer downtime.
2. Facilitate communication between the operations teams (US and Philippines teams) and the development team (China team), ensuring alignment on customer needs and project updates.
3. Identify patterns in escalated issues and propose systematic changes to improve platform reliability and service quality.
4. Provide in-depth technical support and guidance to customers, effectively communicating solutions. Record and maintain workflows related to escalated issues, ensuring continuous process improvement.
5. Coordinate and manage tasks related to customer escalations, ensuring timely resolution and stakeholder consensus.
6. Support the deployment of software updates or fixes, effectively communicating changes to customers and internal teams.
7. Assist in training and onboarding new team members on communication protocols, escalation processes, and technical tools.
8. Host knowledge-sharing sessions to disseminate insights and best practices within the team.

Qualifications
1. Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent professional experience.
2. At least 3 years of experience in project coordination or advanced technical support, preferably in a Software as a Service (SaaS) or tech-driven environment.
3. Deep understanding of technical concepts, software troubleshooting, and advanced problem-solving methods.
4. Proficiency in both English and Mandarin, with excellent bilingual written and verbal communication skills.
5. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to clearly explain complex technical concepts.
6. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
7. Proficiency with Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems and ticketing systems, such as Jira, Zendesk, or similar platforms.
8. Ability to maintain professionalism and empathy in high-pressure situations.

About Us
Xi'an Maibo Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. is the software R&D center in Xi'an for the US company ITS (www.itsasap.com), headquartered in Chicago, with branches in the Philippines, Singapore, and other locations. The parent company's business primarily serves the MSP (IT service industry), providing high-quality IT operation and maintenance services to clients in the US market (such as financial firms, law firms, etc.), including maintenance of office equipment, network devices, sales of hardware and software products, data center operations, and cloud server sales.
The Xi'an R&D center is responsible for the development of the MSPbots.ai product, covering the entire process from product design, software development, to launch and maintenance. The team currently consists of about 50 people and is planned to expand to 80 this year. In addition to the team in China, the MSPbots.ai product team has a support team of 80 people, including roles in sales, customer service, marketing, and technical services. The product is currently in beta with over 1000+ customers, distributed across major English-speaking countries (from Australia, Europe to North America). The R&D team and the non-R&D teams outside of China cooperate within the same team framework.

8.协助对新团队成员进行沟通协议、升级流程和技术工具方面的培训与入职引导。（Remote Rocketship）
9.主持知识分享会议，在团队中传播见解和最佳实践。（Remote Rocketship）
三、任职资格
1.信息技术、计算机科学或相关领域的学士学位，或具备同等专业经验。（Remote Rocketship）
2.至少 3 年项目协调或高级技术支持经验，最好是在软件即服务（SaaS）或技术驱动型环境中。（Remote Rocketship）
对技术概念、软件故障排查和高级问题解决方法有深入理解。（Remote Rocketship）
3.精通英语和普通话，具备出色的双语书面和口头沟通能力。（Remote Rocketship）
4.具备出色的人际交往和沟通能力，能够清晰解释复杂的技术概念。（Remote Rocketship）
5.能够在快节奏的环境中工作，并同时管理多项任务。（Remote Rocketship）
6.熟练使用客户关系管理（CRM）系统和工单系统，如 Jira、Zendesk 或类似平台。（Remote Rocketship）
7.具备在高压力情况下保持专业和同理心的能力。（Remote Rocketship）
西安迈搏创芯人工智能科技有限公司，是一家专注于大数据治理、数据分析和人工智能应用的高科技企业。公司致力于通过先进的数据技术，为企业提供智能化的数据解决方案，帮助客户实现数据驱动的业务增长和管理优化。经过多年的发展，我们已经成为行业内的领先者，服务客户涵盖金融、医疗、电商、制造业等多个领域。
       西安研发中心负责的MSPBots.ai产品研发工作，包含从产品设计、软件开发、上线维护全套流程，西安团队包含目前50+人，MSPBots.ai产品团队除在中国以外，另有100人的支持团队，包含销售、客服、市场、技服等角色，产品目前beta版上线状态，已有2000+客户在使用，客户分布包含主要的英语国家 (从澳大利亚, 欧洲至北美)，研发团队和中国外的非研发团队在同一个团队框架下配合工作。
       MSPBots.ai作为一款BI+RPA类型的产品，是一个数据驱动的机器人过程自动化平台，专门设计用于使用应用程序、报告和机器人，帮助MSP自动化重复的日常任务。主要目标是帮助MSP行业的实现业务流程自动化，以替代业务中的机械性流程，以降低人工成本，提高MSP企业的经营利润。我们致力于使用自动化、大数据和人工智能来帮助MSP企业更好、更便宜、更快地运营日常运营。使用机器人过程自动化技术，我们实现了约10-15%的MSP日常重复任务的自动化。我们连接到许多流行行业的API，收集数据，使用Power BI生成报告，然后使用Power BI报告驱动机器人修复这些报告中发现的问题。
description_chinese:
一、职位概述
MSPbots.ai 的服务协调员在处理复杂的客户升级问题、确保全球团队之间高效沟通以及通过数据驱动的洞察提升服务质量方面发挥着关键作用。该职位需要积极主动地提供技术支持、协调工作，并持续改进流程。
二、关键职责
1.作为复杂客户升级问题的主要联系人，确保及时有效地解决问题。
2.分析系统日志，进行详细的故障排查，以解决高级技术问题，最大程度减少客户停机时间。
3.促进运营团队（美国和菲律宾团队）与开发团队（中国团队）之间的沟通，确保在客户需求和项目更新方面达成一致。
4.识别升级问题中的模式，提出系统性变更建议，以提高平台可靠性和服务质量。
5.为客户提供深入的技术支持和指导，有效传达解决方案。
6.记录并维护与升级问题相关的工作流程，确保持续改进流程。
7.协调并管理与客户升级问题相关的任务，确保及时解决问题并使利益相关者达成共识。
8.支持软件更新或修复的部署，有效地向客户和内部团队传达变更信息。

4.精通英语和普通话，具备出色的双语书面和口头沟通能力。
5.具备出色的人际交往和沟通能力，能够清晰解释复杂的技术概念。
6.能够在快节奏的环境中工作，并同时管理多项任务。
7.熟练使用客户关系管理（CRM）系统和工单系统，如 Jira、Zendesk 或类似平台。
8.具备在高压力情况下保持专业和同理心的能力。

西安研发中心负责的MSPBots.ai产品研发工作，包含从产品设计、软件开发、上线维护全套流程，西安团队包含目前50+人，MSPBots.ai产品团队除在中国以外，另有100人的支持团队，包含销售、客服、市场、技服等角色，产品目前beta版上线状态，已有2000+客户在使用，客户分布包含主要的英语国家 (从澳大利亚, 欧洲至北美)，研发团队和中国外的非研发团队在同一个团队框架下配合工作。

description_english:
I. Position Overview
The Service Coordinator at MSPbots.ai plays a key role in handling complex customer escalations, ensuring efficient communication between global teams, and improving service quality through data-driven insights. This position requires proactive technical support, coordination, and continuous process improvement.
II. Key Responsibilities
1. Act as the primary point of contact for complex customer escalations, ensuring timely and effective resolution.
2. Analyze system logs and perform detailed troubleshooting to resolve advanced technical issues, minimizing customer downtime.
3. Facilitate communication between the operations teams (US and Philippines) and the development team (China) to ensure alignment on customer needs and project updates.
4. Identify patterns in escalations and recommend systemic changes to improve platform reliability and service quality.
5. Provide in-depth technical support and guidance to customers, effectively communicating solutions.
6. Document and maintain workflows related to escalations, ensuring continuous process improvement.
7. Coordinate and manage tasks related to customer escalations, ensuring timely resolution and stakeholder alignment.
8. Support the deployment of software updates or fixes, effectively communicating changes to customers and internal teams.
9. Assist in training and onboarding new team members on communication protocols, escalation processes, and technical tools.
10. Host knowledge-sharing sessions to disseminate insights and best practices within the team.
III. Qualifications
1. Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent professional experience.
2. At least 3 years of experience in project coordination or advanced technical support, preferably in a Software as a Service (SaaS) or tech-driven environment.
3. Deep understanding of technical concepts, software troubleshooting, and advanced problem-solving methods.
4. Fluency in English and Mandarin, with excellent bilingual written and oral communication skills.
5. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to clearly explain complex technical concepts.
6. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
7. Proficiency with Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems and ticketing systems, such as Jira, Zendesk, or similar platforms.
8. Ability to maintain professionalism and empathy in high-pressure situations.

Xi'an Maibo Chuangxin Artificial Intelligence Technology Co., Ltd. is a high-tech enterprise specializing in big data governance, data analysis, and artificial intelligence applications. The company is committed to providing intelligent data solutions for businesses through advanced data technology, helping clients achieve data-driven business growth and management optimization. After years of development, we have become a leader in the industry, serving clients across various sectors including finance, healthcare, e-commerce, and manufacturing.
The Xi'an R&D center is responsible for the product development of MSPbots.ai, covering the entire process from product design, software development, to launch and maintenance. The Xi'an team currently consists of over 50 people. In addition to the team in China, the MSPbots.ai product team has a support team of 100 people, including roles in sales, customer service, marketing, and technical services. The product is currently in its beta version with over 2000+ customers, primarily in English-speaking countries (from Australia, Europe to North America). The R&D team and the non-R&D teams outside of China cooperate within the same team framework.
MSPbots.ai, as a BI+RPA type product, is a data-driven robotic process automation platform specifically designed to help MSPs automate repetitive daily tasks using applications, reports, and bots. The main goal is to help the MSP industry automate business processes, replacing mechanical workflows to reduce labor costs and increase the operating profits of MSP enterprises. We are dedicated to using automation, big data, and artificial intelligence to help MSPs run their daily operations better, cheaper, and faster. Using robotic process automation technology, we have automated about 10-15% of MSPs' daily repetitive tasks. We connect to many popular industry APIs, collect data, generate reports using Power BI, and then use these Power BI reports to drive bots that fix the issues identified in the reports.

1.博物馆、传统历史类型书稿创作，熟悉出版规范和出版流程，编写过传统历史相关，有相关作品（必备项）；

作为国内知名美学品牌，美学生活创导者，自2006年成立以来，一直聚焦绘画美学领域悉心耕耘。现已形成集艺术与绘画类图书出版，线上绘画教育，配套绘画产品及文创周边研发为一体的绘画教育及生活美学运营生态闭环。同时我们还自有配套的电商销售体系，以及300W+用户数量的高质量艺术自媒体平台。
现全球已有超过3000万人跟随飞乐鸟用绘画点亮生活，以艺术滋养心灵。我们汇聚在一起，成为了飞乐鸟，我们还将继续前行，希望带领更多的梦想家们，一起乐享艺术生活，让美触手可及。

1. Create manuscripts for museum and traditional history topics; must be familiar with publishing standards and processes, have experience in writing about traditional history, and have a relevant portfolio (mandatory).
2. Have sufficient free time to plan and write the entire book manuscript as a part-time role, ensuring quality and quantity as per requirements.
3. Submitted manuscripts must be free of copyright issues (AI assistance is permissible).
4. Collaboration with teams, studios, or companies is preferred.
As a well-known domestic aesthetics brand and a pioneer of aesthetic living, we have been dedicated to the field of painting aesthetics since our establishment in 2006. We have now formed a complete operational ecosystem for painting education and life aesthetics, integrating the publishing of art and painting books, online painting education, and the R&D of supporting painting products and creative merchandise. We also have our own e-commerce sales system and a high-quality art self-media platform with over 3 million users.
Globally, more than 30 million people have followed Feile Bird to illuminate their lives with painting and nourish their souls with art. We have come together to become Feile Bird, and we will continue to move forward, hoping to lead more dreamers to enjoy an artistic life and make beauty accessible to all.

岗位职责：
1.主要负责公司“开心锤锤”IP的图书漫画封面及海报插画的创意与设计工作，确保画面贴合IP定位与青少年及大众读者审美；

team: 饭搭互动信息技术（北京）有限公司
summary: 矩阵营销,远程办公,社群运营,互联网产品
summary_chinese: 社交媒体内容运营,内容规划与制作,熟悉主流社媒平台,图文编辑与视频剪辑,Photoshop/Canva/剪映,要求base北京
summary_english: Social Media Content Operations,Content Planning and Creation,Familiar with Mainstream Social Media,Graphic Editing and Video Clipping,Photoshop/Canva/Jianying,Beijing-based Required
description:
岗位职责：
1. 负责国内外社交媒体平台（如微信公众号、抖音、小红书、微博、B站等）的日常内容规划、撰写、制作与发布。
2. 积极与粉丝互动，回复评论和私信，营造活跃、正向的社区氛围。
3. 保持对平台热点、新功能及用户群的高度敏感，熟悉年轻人的社交氛围和习惯。
4. 根据基础数据，从中发现问题、总结规律、优化策略。
5. 其他领导布置的相关任务
任职资格：
1. 具备1年以上新媒体运营相关工作经验，有独立运营过某个平台（如小红书、抖音、公众号等）的成功案例者优先。
2. 具备优秀的文案功底和视觉审美，能独立完成图文内容编辑或简单的视频剪辑。
3. 拥有稳定的家庭网络、办公环境及可正常工作的电脑设备
4. 能够在远程办公环境下高效工作，对结果负责。
5. 熟悉Photoshop、Canva、剪映等设计/剪辑软件。
其他：
平时远程工作，要求在北京，有重要项目可以面对面沟通的
直接发简历，不闲聊

description_english:
Job Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for the daily content planning, writing, production, and publishing on domestic and international social media platforms (such as WeChat Official Account, Douyin, Xiaohongshu, Weibo, Bilibili, etc.).
2. Actively interact with followers, respond to comments and private messages, and create an active and positive community atmosphere.
3. Stay highly sensitive to platform trends, new features, and user groups; be familiar with the social atmosphere and habits of young people.
4. Analyze basic data to identify problems, summarize patterns, and optimize strategies.
5. Other related tasks assigned by the supervisor.
Qualifications:
1. At least 1 year of relevant work experience in new media operations; candidates with successful case studies of independently operating a platform (such as Xiaohongshu, Douyin, WeChat Official Account, etc.) are preferred.
2. Possess excellent copywriting skills and visual aesthetics, able to independently complete graphic content editing or simple video clipping.
3. Have a stable home network, a suitable office environment, and a properly functioning computer.
4. Able to work efficiently in a remote work environment and be responsible for results.
5. Familiar with design/editing software such as Photoshop, Canva, Jianying, etc.
Other:
Work remotely on a daily basis, but required to be in Beijing for face-to-face communication on important projects.
Send resume directly, no idle chat.

title: 后端工程师（golang方向）远程办公
team: 重庆波士科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 高性能后端服务开发,区块链行业,CEX交易系统,Golang/Rust,PostgreSQL/Redis,CI/CD,十三薪
summary_english: High-Performance Backend Service Development,Blockchain Industry,CEX Trading Systems,Golang/Rust,PostgreSQL/Redis,CI/CD,13th Month Salary
description:
【岗位职责】
设计并实现高性能的后端服务，包括 API、微服务与数据库，确保系统稳定与高可用性；
与前端工程师、智能合约开发者、产品经理紧密协作，明确项⽬需求，确保链上链下流程顺畅对接；
与 DevOps ⼯程师配合，优化并维护 CI/CD 流⽔线，实现高效部署与高质量代码交付；
具备定位并解决后端系统复杂问题的能⼒，关注系统稳定性与性能表现；
【任职要求】
至少 5年以上后端开发经验，具备构建稳定、可扩展、安全的后端系统能力；
有 CEX工作经验，了解交易系统者；
精通 Golang、Rust等后端语言和开发框架，精通JavaScript。能快速学习新语言；
深刻理解 API 开发原则，具备 RESTful 服务开发经验；
熟练掌握关系型数据库（如 PostgreSQL、MySQL）及 NoSQL 数据库（如 Redis）的设计、管理与迁移策略；
熟悉 CI/CD 工具链（如 GitHub Actions、Bitbucket）并具备相关实施经验；
主动探索与应用新技术，推动产品与代码质量持续提升；
优秀的问题解决能力，能胜任快节奏、变化多的工作环境；
拥有良好的沟通能力，能与跨职能团队高效协作。
【教育背景】
海内外知名院校背景"
【企业概况】
波士科技是北京哈希智算科技有限公司旗下品牌（下称“波士科技”），波士科技成立于2018年3月，是一家专注于海外招聘的人力资源服务公司，从成立伊始，就投入大量资源开发自有技术平台，专注于海外互联网产品研发，拥有一支高效的自主研发团队，以产品研发和国际化市场需求为导向，持续高效研发出符合国际化趋势的移动互联网产品。
我们致力于为全球用户提供效率工具、互动娱乐、文化生活等服务。波士科技旗下拥有多款海外移动互联网产品，拥有10+项自主研发产权和软著，全网累积用户超5000万+，获得多项荣誉。

【福利待遇】
1、国际化事业发展舞台
公司为优秀员工提供国际化视野及国际化产品经验机会；
2、多元化学习提升机制
通过大佬培训等机制帮助新进员工快速成长，实现自我价值；
3、全方位员工关怀机制
下午茶+节日礼品+红包购物卡+绩效奖金+十三薪+旅游团建+按摩券+白领体检礼包。

2、有微服务开发经验，熟练掌握微服务架构相关技术栈，如：Springboot、Spring cloud、Nginx、Docker、Kubernetes等。
3、JAVA基础扎实，深入理解JVM原理，缓存，消息等机制。
4、熟练SQL语言。
5、学习能力强，善于钻研新技术。
6、工作日居家远程办公，早9晚6，双休，工作时间全程腾讯会议。

Weekly Schedule: 5 days or more
Work Hours: 09:00-18:00
Work Days: Weekdays
Payment Method: Monthly
Application Deadline: 2025-06-23
1. College degree or above in a computer-related major, with over three years of Java development experience.
2. Experience in microservices development, proficient in the microservices architecture technology stack, such as Springboot, Spring cloud, Nginx, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.
3. Solid foundation in JAVA, with a deep understanding of mechanisms like JVM principles, caching, and messaging.

title: 选址开发经理（华北地区/远程办公)
team: 满记甜品（上海）有限公司
summary: 零售,餐饮
summary_chinese: 连锁店选址拓展,餐饮零售,商务谈判与签约,熟悉Shopping Mall,店铺续约与调整,适应出差
summary_english: Chain Store Site Selection & Expansion,F&B and Retail,Business Negotiation & Contracting,Familiar with Shopping Malls,Store Renewal & Adjustment,Willing to Travel
description:
工作内容：
1、负责与商场的商务谈判及合同签订 
2、负责协助相关部门开业前协调工作 
3、负责现有店铺的续约、移位、重装、撤店的谈判及跟进，并按计划落实
4、根据经营情况，定期跟进分析店铺盈利状况，适时调整拓展布局
5、定期更新及汇总渠道信息，建立与维护品牌渠道关系及树立品牌对外良好形象
岗位要求：
1、全日制大专及以上学历；
2、有大型连锁企业3-5年的同等工作经验
3、有全国性城市拓展落地经验（以北京及周边城市为主要地缘关系），熟悉国内主要SHOPPINGMALL的商业体系及合作模式 
4、积极开朗、沟通良好、适应出差
满记甜品集团创建于1995年，在香港西贡区创办第一间香港特式“糖汇甜品”专门店，经过五年的独有家庭式管理及不断的研制创新，幸运地得到各食客的认同。并于2000年在西贡总店毗邻扩展多两所分店，及创办以“手造甜品”的品牌于香港九龙半岛尖沙咀新港中心开设第一间分店，并于同年集团以全资公司“半边天实业有限公司”增设一所中央食物工场，供应食物产品给各店铺，为求达到产品的质量保证，于2003年在泰国
开设独立工场，直接采购泰国水果及包装产品出口到香港，使客人能在四季品尝到最佳的满记甜品。

description_english:
Job Content:
1. Responsible for business negotiations and contract signing with shopping malls
2. Responsible for assisting relevant departments with pre-opening coordination work
3. Responsible for negotiating and following up on the renewal, relocation, renovation, and closure of existing stores, and implementing them as planned
4. Regularly follow up and analyze store profitability based on business conditions, and adjust the expansion layout in a timely manner
5. Regularly update and summarize channel information, establish and maintain brand channel relationships, and build a good external image for the brand
Job Requirements:
1. Full-time college degree or above;
2. 3-5 years of equivalent work experience in large chain enterprises
3. Experience in national city expansion and implementation (with a primary geographic focus on Beijing and surrounding cities), familiar with the business systems and cooperation models of major domestic SHOPPINGMALLs
4. Proactive and cheerful, with good communication skills, and able to adapt to business travel
Honeymoon Dessert Group was founded in 1995, establishing its first Hong Kong-style "Tong Fai Dessert" specialty store in the Sai Kung District of Hong Kong. After five years of unique family-style management and continuous research and innovation, it was fortunately recognized by diners. In 2000, it expanded with two more branches adjacent to the Sai Kung main store and founded the "Handmade Dessert" brand, opening its first branch at the Sunport Center in Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon Peninsula, Hong Kong. In the same year, the group, through its wholly-owned company "Ban Bian Tian Industrial Co., Ltd.", added a central food factory to supply food products to all stores. To ensure product quality, in 2003, it
opened an independent factory in Thailand to directly purchase and export Thai fruits and packaged products to Hong Kong, allowing customers to enjoy the best Honeymoon Desserts throughout the four seasons.

title: 远程办公 — CEX交易所产品经理
team: 深圳市力天合创投资有限公司
summary: 深入理解合约交易逻辑,马丁策略系统,合约交易机器人,交易所合约、策略跟单,区块链产品,策略产品,网格策略系统
summary_chinese: 合约及策略产品设计,区块链行业,合约交易,策略跟单,CEX/DeFi,项目分红
summary_english: Futures and Strategy Product Design,Blockchain Industry,Futures Trading,Copy Trading Strategy,CEX/DeFi,Project Bonuses
description:
远程办公 — CEX交易所产品经理
公司简介
      公司是一家新加坡的创新型加密交易平台初创公司，核心成员来自全球前三大交易所的高管及产研团队，具备深厚的行业经验与顶尖的技术背景。
      公司专注于高性能交易系统的研发，上线仅三个月即实现盈利。
      在这里，我们坚持简单纯粹的团队氛围与高效专注的执行文化，相信专注与执行力能创造真正有价值的产品。
 
   岗位职责
— 负责 交易所合约、策略跟单 等核心业务线的产品规划与设计，制定产品发展路线图；
— 深入理解用户需求，结合市场趋势与竞品情况，输出高质量的产品方案与PRD文档；
— 与研发、设计、测试、运营等团队紧密协作，推动产品高效落地与持续优化；
—  跟踪产品数据与用户反馈，不断迭代交易体验，提升用户粘性与交易深度；
—  对接商务与运营团队，支持平台活动、推广及生态合作项目落地；
—  持续关注行业趋势，研究 CEX、DeFi、跟单生态 的创新玩法，为产品提供创新方向；
— 负责 平台策略跟单业务 相关产品设计与优化，包括但不限于：
 合约交易机器人
 网格策略系统
 马丁策略系统
  任职要求
—  本科及以上学历，3年以上区块链产品经理经验，具备交易所合约产品经验者优先；
—  深入理解 合约交易逻辑（逐仓/全仓、杠杆、强平、资金费率等）及 策略跟单机制；
—   具备良好的数据分析能力与逻辑思维，能以数据驱动产品优化；
—  沟通协调能力强，能在多团队协作中高效推进项目；
—  对 数字资产、Web3行业 保持热情，具备创新意识与持续学习能力。
  薪资与福利
—   具竞争力的薪酬结构 + 年终奖励；
—  灵活远程办公，扁平管理，充分授权；
—   内部推荐激励 & 项目分红机会；
—   与顶级技术及产品团队共事，参与打造新一代全球化交易平台。
如果你热爱加密世界、懂用户、想打造兼具深度与温度的交易产品，欢迎加入我们，共创下一代交易体验。

title: 公考-线上兼职督学师（远程办公）
title_english: Online Part-time Civil Service Exam Academic Supervisor
team: 北京粉笔上岸科技有限公司
summary: 事业编考试,申论,不坐班,公务员考试,行测
summary_chinese: 线上督学与答疑,在线职业教育,有公考经验,学习方案辅导,长期兼职,及时响应学员
summary_english: Online Supervision and Q&A,Online Vocational Education,Civil Service Exam Experience,Study Plan Tutoring,Long-term Part-time,Timely Student Response
description:
工作周期：长期兼职
每周工期：5天及以上
工作时间：不限
工作时段：不限
结算方式：月结
招聘截止时间：2025-12-31
岗位职责：
1、根据公司安排，完成线上班群督学、课程答疑、关注并跟进学员学习进度等工作；
2、能够积极参与笔面试督学理论及带班操作培训，并不断提升笔面试综合能力；
3、为学员提供全学习环节、学习任务完成情况和学习效果监督，主动分析科目学习任务完成情况，针对薄弱环节给出针对性解决方案及辅导。
任职要求：
1、统招本科及以上学历；
2、具备至少半年公考行业从业经验或参与过公务员考试，对公考具备一定了解和基础知识掌握，认同粉笔各学科理论；
3、思维敏捷、逻辑清晰、表达精准，积极上进、有责任心；
4、空闲时间充足，能够及时关注、回复相关工作信息，可常年兼职或可稳定合作6个月以上者优先。
高水准岗前培训
闲暇时间 网络办公 不受地域限制
薪资可观，上不封顶，多劳多得！
9:00-21:00期间需保持网络在线，回复学员消息有时效要求。
【如您投递简历，即默认已知晓以下内容】
1、因我司收到简历数量较多，如您的简历通过初步筛选，我们将在7日内与您联系。如您在7日内未收到我们的回复，则表明您的简历未通过筛选，感谢您对我们工作的理解。
2、因应聘人数众多，默认应聘时间及节奏以我司要求为准，如有异议请自行克服，否则视为放弃应聘机会。
北京粉笔蓝天科技有限公司（粉笔）成立于2015年。成立以来，公司坚持科技先行，致力于用互联网技术助力教育创新，是积极推动「互联网+教育」的职业培训平台。公司目前主营业务除公务员考试培训外，还包括事业单位招考培训、教师考试、考研、财会、法考、建工等培训项目。

粉笔坚持以人为本的经营理念，以高水平教学质量和优质服务，赢得了用户的信任与尊重。用科技创新推动教育普惠，用精良师资实现教育公平，粉笔首创申论智能批改系统，搭建完善的产品体系，提供多元学习路径，荣获多项国家技术专利，为用户提供稳定、优质、便捷、高效的学习环境。

作为职业教育领域的知名企业，粉笔学习中心已覆盖全国31个省（自治区、直辖市），集结了一批授课水平优异的高学历人才，打造深受用户信赖、引领行业标准的精品课程。

未来，粉笔将积极承担更大的责任，用科技创新推动教育普惠，用精良师资实现教育公平，为更多有职业理想的青年人提供高效、多元的就业服务，为社会培养、输送更多高素质人才。努力实现企业社会价值，推动整个教育行业健康发展。

Responsibilities:
1. Conduct online class supervision, answer course-related questions, and monitor/follow up on student learning progress according to company arrangements.
2. Actively participate in training on theories and practical operations for written and interview exam supervision, and continuously improve comprehensive skills for both.
3. Supervise students throughout the entire learning process, including task completion and learning effectiveness; proactively analyze subject task completion, and provide targeted solutions and tutoring for weak areas.
Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above from a nationally recognized university.
2. At least half a year of experience in the civil service exam industry or have taken the civil service exam; possess a certain understanding and foundational knowledge of the exam, and align with Fenbi's theories for each subject.
3. Agile thinking, clear logic, precise expression, proactive, and a strong sense of responsibility.
4. Ample free time, able to promptly follow up and respond to work-related messages; candidates available for long-term part-time work or stable cooperation for over 6 months are preferred.
High-standard pre-job training
Work online in your spare time, not restricted by location
Competitive salary with no upper limit, the more you work, the more you earn!
Must remain online between 9:00-21:00; there are time requirements for replying to student messages.
[By submitting your resume, you acknowledge and agree to the following]
1. Due to the high volume of applications we receive, if your resume passes the initial screening, we will contact you within 7 days. If you do not hear from us within 7 days, it means your application was not selected. Thank you for your understanding.
2. Due to the large number of applicants, the interview schedule and pace will be determined by our company. If you have any objections, please overcome them on your own, or it will be considered as forfeiting the application opportunity.
Beijing Fenbi Bluetime Technology Co., Ltd. (Fenbi) was established in 2015. Since its inception, the company has prioritized technology, dedicating itself to using internet technology to drive educational innovation, and is a vocational training platform actively promoting "Internet + Education". Currently, in addition to civil service exam training, the company's main business includes training for public institution recruitment, teacher certification exams, postgraduate entrance exams, accounting, legal professional qualification exams, and construction engineering.

Fenbi adheres to a people-oriented business philosophy, earning the trust and respect of users with high-quality teaching and excellent service. By using technological innovation to promote inclusive education and achieving educational equity with a top-tier teaching staff, Fenbi pioneered the intelligent grading system for the Shenlun essay, built a comprehensive product system, offers diverse learning paths, has been awarded multiple national technology patents, and provides users with a stable, high-quality, convenient, and efficient learning environment.

As a well-known enterprise in the vocational education sector, Fenbi learning centers now cover all 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) in China. It has assembled a team of highly educated talents with outstanding teaching skills to create high-quality courses that are trusted by users and set industry standards.

In the future, Fenbi will actively take on greater responsibilities, using technological innovation to promote inclusive education and achieving educational equity with excellent teachers. It will provide efficient and diverse employment services for more young people with career aspirations, and cultivate and deliver more high-quality talent for society. Fenbi strives to realize its corporate social value and promote the healthy development of the entire education industry.

title: 量化交易系统基础架构工程师 - remote
title_chinese: 量化交易系统基础架构工程师
team: 一同咨询管理（深圳）有限公司
summary: 量化交易系统开发,Rust,高频/低延时,量化交易开发经验
summary_chinese: 低延时交易系统开发,量化金融,Rust,低延迟系统,分布式系统,从0到1搭建系统
summary_english: Low-Latency Trading System Development,Quantitative Finance,Rust,Low-Latency Systems,Distributed Systems,Building Systems from Scratch
description:
岗位概述：
我们正在招聘一位工程能力极强的架构师 / 工程师，负责从零开始设计并实现一整套覆盖数据采集、交易执行、回测模拟和因子研究的低延时量化交易系统。该系统将以 Rust 语言为核心开发语言，全面追求性能与稳定性。
岗位职责：
- 设计并实现多交易所、全品种的高性能交易系统底层架构
- 构建并优化低延迟的数据采集模块、订单系统、仓位管理与风控模块
- 搭建可复用的回测引擎与实盘仿真环境
- 设计灵活可扩展的因子研究与信号生成框架
- 与量化研究员、交易员紧密合作，确保系统在实盘中的稳定性与鲁棒性
- 建立高标准的工程体系，包括自动化测试、性能分析、故障注入等
任职要求：
- 编程能力极强，精通 Rust（或 C++/Go 等系统语言，愿意转向 Rust）
- 对系统性能优化、网络通信、并发编程有深入理解
- 有构建大型分布式系统或超低延迟系统的实战经验
- 扎实的计算机基础（数据结构、操作系统、网络原理等）
- 能够独立从零搭建完整系统并承担长期维护责任
- 良好的英文阅读与团队协作能力

description_english:
Position Overview:
We are hiring an architect/engineer with exceptional engineering skills to design and implement a complete low-latency quantitative trading system from scratch, covering data collection, trade execution, backtesting simulation, and factor research. The system will use Rust as its core development language, with a full focus on performance and stability.
Responsibilities:
- Design and implement the underlying architecture of a high-performance trading system for multiple exchanges and all product types.
- Build and optimize low-latency modules for data collection, order systems, position management, and risk control.
- Develop a reusable backtesting engine and a live trading simulation environment.
- Design a flexible and scalable framework for factor research and signal generation.
- Collaborate closely with quantitative researchers and traders to ensure the system's stability and robustness in live trading.
- Establish high-standard engineering practices, including automated testing, performance analysis, fault injection, etc.
Requirements:
- Extremely strong programming skills, proficient in Rust (or other systems languages like C++/Go, with a willingness to switch to Rust).
- In-depth understanding of system performance optimization, network communication, and concurrent programming.
- Practical experience in building large-scale distributed systems or ultra-low-latency systems.
- Solid computer science fundamentals (data structures, operating systems, networking principles, etc.).
- Ability to independently build a complete system from scratch and take on long-term maintenance responsibilities.
- Good English reading and teamwork skills.

title: 【硅谷独角兽 支持remote】全栈开发工程师
team: 北京捷瑞网络技术有限公司
summary: Golang,Java,全栈侧重后端,JavaScript,全栈无侧重,Node.js,MySQL/Redis/MongoDB,计算机相关专业,接受居家办公,React,全栈项目经验
summary_chinese: Web应用全栈开发,汽车金融科技,Node.js,GraphQL,AWS,硅谷初创公司,硅谷/加拿大出差转岗
summary_english: Full-Stack Web Application Development,Automotive FinTech,Node.js,GraphQL,AWS,Silicon Valley Startup,Business Trip/Relocation to Silicon Valley/Canada
description:
Jerry.ai 是总部位于硅谷的明星 Ai 汽车金融产品互联网高科技公司。 聚焦万亿级市场，以用技术解决问题为准则，以创造真正有价值的产品为驱动力，我们为数百万用户提供最佳汽车金融产品选购平台。近来，公司完成了新一轮上亿元级别融资, 并被领英列为全美高科技新兴公司 50 强,同时荣登福布斯2021 年度最佳新兴雇主排行榜。
加入我们，一起迎接职业生涯爆发黄金时期。
关于我们:
1、全美高科技新兴公司 50 强，福布斯 2021 年度最佳新兴雇主，聚焦万亿级朝阳市场，获得硅谷顶级风投上亿级融资
2、北美最佳Ai汽车金融产品平台，致力打造移动+AI 时代的最优汽车金融产品
3、直击用户痛点，提供绝佳用户体验，APP 业内排名第一，季度营收指数增长
4、国际化多元文化，团队来自全球多个国家， 开放透明平等
5、一群崇尚极客精神，热爱技术的同事（我们的成员来自于：Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, Linkedin, Nvidia, 阿里巴巴, 字节跳动等）
加入我们，您将：
1.感受极客氛围，拥抱前沿创新技术
2.全面参加从用户沟通、需求讨论、产品开发、到上线部署的每个环节，参与一个产品创新和用户高速成长的过程。您不仅仅作为一个终端执行者，而是可以提供作为产品的设计者和规划者参与其中
我们希望你:
1.你热爱挑战复杂的问题，并能产出清晰稳定、可扩展的解决方案。
2.对设计与实施优雅的软件解决方案，你有着真正的热情。
3.你熟知并跟踪最新的开发生态环境，并在选择适当的工具或库时能做出明智的决策。
4.你会在整个产品栈中贡献，并共同监督代码库的完整性。
我们想要你解决的问题:
1.与产品经理、设计师和其他工程师合作，定义技术需求，创建软件架构，并开发软件组件。
2.挖掘软件系统以及开发流程中的问题并提出可靠的解决方案，确保软件系统的稳定性、可扩展性和安全性。
3.参与新功能和自动化开发，编写单元测试、自我测试和质量保证软件，确保工程成果持续高质量交付。
4.日常进行代码审查，始终维持高标准的代码质量，不断优化软件和工具。
5.定期参与产品和工程规格的审查，从商业和技术双重视角为团队提供洞见。
6.不断收集客户及团队反馈，定期根据反馈优化产品。
7.日常积极监控软件错误和警报，确保迅速解决关键问题。
8.创建和维护开发、故障排除和培训文档。
9.理解并朝着公司的目标、战略、哲学以及盈利目标努力。
10.支持并培养初级工程师，营造持续学习和改进的文化氛围。
11.识别并解决软件系统中的性能瓶颈、可扩展性问题和其他潜在难题。
12.日常开发中关注现有代码的审查和优化，如消除重复代码、移除无效代码，以及改进一些不符合最佳实践的代码。
13.理解代码的性能和可扩展性影响。
14.设计和实施大规模复杂系统。
15.识别技术债务并实施解决方案，提升代码质量和可维护性。
16.关注行业动态，不断研究和采纳新技术、工具和最佳实践，提升软件开发效率和有效性。
我们需要你具备:
1.你具备4年以上的全职软件开发经验，本科及以上学历，且专业为计算机科学或相关领域。
2.你对软件开发的基本原理（例如数据结构，算法等）有深厚的了解
3.你具备现代web的实践经验，了解开源web框架和常用基础设施（包括但不限于 NodeJS / GraphQL / PostgreSQL / Redis / Kubernetes）
4.你对云端基础设施有比较熟悉的了解和使用经验（包括但不限于 AWS、Azure、阿里云 等）
5.你能理解并运用JavaScript的最佳实践，认识并能使用常用的设计模式，编写符合习惯的JavaScript代码。（擅长其他语言的希望能够具有快速学习的能力）
6.对于代码性能问题，可扩展性以及故障排查，你有深入的了解
7.面对疑难杂症，你能够建立清晰的排查方案，找到切入点
8.你热衷于编写有意义的测试，维持全面的测试覆盖
9.你有设计、分析、调试分布式系统或大型web应用的经验
加分项目:
对于LLM具有一些了解
对于CICD、devOps具有一些经验
熟练掌握React Native, GraphQL以及Apollo。
有写技术Blog的习惯，活跃于技术社区，参与开源项目等。
Jerry.ai 是总部位于硅谷的明星Ai汽车金融产品互联网高科技公司。 聚焦朝阳行业，以用技术解决问题为准则，以创造真正有价值的产品为驱动力，我们为数百万用户提供一站式汽车金融产品选购平台。近来，公司完成了新一轮上亿元级别融资, 并被评为全美高科技新兴公司50强，同时荣登福布斯列 2021 年度最佳新科技雇主排行榜。我们正在致力于大规模的产研团队扩建，希望寻找喜爱挑战的优秀人才加入我们的团队。

加入我们，您将：
* 感受极客氛围，拥抱前沿创新技术
* 全面参加从用户沟通、需求讨论、产品开发、到上线部署的每个环节，参与一个产品创新和用户高速成长的过程。您不仅仅作为一个终端执行者，而是可以提供作为产品的设计者和规划者参与其中
* 来硅谷总部和加拿大分公司出差和转岗的机会，结识一大群有理想、有热情的战斗伙伴

description_english:
Jerry.ai is a star AI automotive financial products high-tech internet company headquartered in Silicon Valley. Focusing on a trillion-dollar market, we operate on the principle of using technology to solve problems and are driven by creating truly valuable products, providing millions of users with the best platform for selecting automotive financial products. Recently, the company completed a new round of financing in the hundreds of millions of RMB, was listed by LinkedIn as one of the top 50 high-tech emerging companies in the US, and was also featured on Forbes' 2021 list of Best Startup Employers. We are committed to a large-scale expansion of our product and research teams and are looking for outstanding talent who love challenges to join our team.

About us:
1. Top 50 high-tech emerging company in the US, Forbes' Best Startup Employer of 2021, focusing on a trillion-dollar sunrise market, and having received hundreds of millions in financing from top Silicon Valley venture capitalists.
2. North America's best AI automotive financial products platform, dedicated to creating the optimal automotive financial product for the mobile + AI era.
3. Directly addressing user pain points, providing an excellent user experience, with our app ranking first in the industry and quarterly revenue showing exponential growth.
4. International and multicultural, with a team from various countries around the world, promoting openness, transparency, and equality.
5. A group of colleagues who admire the geek spirit and love technology (our members come from: Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, Linkedin, Nvidia, Alibaba, ByteDance, etc.).

By joining us, you will:
1. Experience a geek atmosphere and embrace cutting-edge innovative technologies.
2. Be fully involved in every stage from user communication, requirements discussion, product development, to online deployment, participating in a process of product innovation and rapid user growth. You will not just be an executor, but also a designer and planner of the product.
3. Have opportunities for business trips and transfers to our Silicon Valley headquarters and Canadian branch, and meet a large group of ambitious and passionate partners.

We hope you:
1. Love tackling complex problems and can produce clear, stable, and scalable solutions.
2. Have a genuine passion for designing and implementing elegant software solutions.
3. Are familiar with and keep track of the latest development ecosystem, and can make wise decisions when choosing appropriate tools or libraries.
4. Will contribute across the entire product stack and jointly oversee the integrity of the codebase.

Problems we want you to solve:
1. Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to define technical requirements, create software architecture, and develop software components.
2. Identify problems within the software system and development process and propose reliable solutions to ensure the system's stability, scalability, and security.
3. Participate in the development of new features and automation, writing unit tests, self-testing, and quality assurance software to ensure continuous high-quality engineering delivery.
4. Conduct daily code reviews, consistently maintaining high standards of code quality, and continuously optimizing software and tools.
5. Regularly participate in the review of product and engineering specifications, providing insights to the team from both business and technical perspectives.
6. Continuously collect feedback from customers and the team, and regularly optimize the product based on that feedback.
7. Actively monitor software errors and alerts daily to ensure critical issues are resolved promptly.
8. Create and maintain documentation for development, troubleshooting, and training.
9. Understand and work towards the company's goals, strategies, philosophy, and profitability objectives.
10. Support and mentor junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
11. Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, scalability issues, and other potential challenges in the software system.
12. Focus on reviewing and optimizing existing code in daily development, such as eliminating duplicate code, removing dead code, and improving code that does not follow best practices.
13. Understand the performance and scalability implications of code.
14. Design and implement large-scale complex systems.
15. Identify technical debt and implement solutions to improve code quality and maintainability.
16. Stay updated with industry trends, continuously researching and adopting new technologies, tools, and best practices to enhance software development efficiency and effectiveness.

We need you to have:
1. Over 4 years of full-time software development experience, with a Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or a related field.
2. A deep understanding of the fundamental principles of software development (e.g., data structures, algorithms, etc.).
3. Practical experience with modern web technologies, and familiarity with open-source web frameworks and common infrastructure (including but not limited to NodeJS / GraphQL / PostgreSQL / Redis / Kubernetes).
4. Familiarity and experience with cloud infrastructure (including but not limited to AWS, Azure, Alibaba Cloud, etc.).
5. The ability to understand and apply JavaScript best practices, recognize and use common design patterns, and write idiomatic JavaScript code. (Those proficient in other languages should have the ability to learn quickly).
6. In-depth understanding of code performance issues, scalability, and troubleshooting.
7. The ability to establish clear troubleshooting plans and find entry points when facing difficult problems.
8. A passion for writing meaningful tests and maintaining comprehensive test coverage.
9. Experience in designing, analyzing, and debugging distributed systems or large-scale web applications.

Bonus points:
* Some understanding of LLM.
* Some experience with CICD and DevOps.
* Proficiency in React Native, GraphQL, and Apollo.
* A habit of writing technical blogs, being active in technical communities, participating in open-source projects, etc.

title: AI外企-全栈开发（remote居家）
team: 南京白利度科技有限公司
summary: Golang,后端开发经验,英语流利,Vue,Node.js,计算机相关专业,React,前端开发经验,Angular,英语读写能力良好,全栈项目经验,TypeScript,全栈无侧重,Python
summary_chinese: 构建可扩展Web系统,AI+生物科技,React/Python/Go,数据处理与可视化,外企,法规合规
summary_english: Build Scalable Web Systems,AI+Biotech,React/Python/Go,Data Processing & Visualization,Foreign Enterprise,Regulatory Compliance
description:
职位概述：
您将负责设计、构建和维护基于网络的系统，涵盖身份验证、工作流程、AI集成以及市场功能。您将与创始人及资深⽣命科学专家紧密合作，提供可扩展的解决⽅案，确保⽤户从注册到日常使用的⽆缝体验。这是一个在生物科技与AI基础设施前沿领域工作的机会，您将参与设计能够挑战现状、重新定义这个传统行业操作方式的工具。
该职位为远程工作，同时提供在加利福尼亚州旧金山线下交流的机会。
岗位职责：
1.设计并开发多租户、基于角色访问且具备租户数据隔离功能的全栈网络应用程序。
2.与生命科学专家合作，将复杂的监管策略逻辑转化为直观的用户界面和可扩展的后端系统。
3.构建数据可视化工具（如甘特图、仪表板），以清晰展示药物开发时间线与监管路径。
4.开发处理结构化和非结构化数据的后端系统，包括文档、访谈记录与监管相关材料。
5.搭建数据处理流程，解析PDF、Word文档及文本输入，将其转化为可用于工作流和AI辅助建议的结构化数据。
任职要求：
1.拥有丰富的全栈开发经验，熟练掌握现代前端框架（如React、Vue或Angular）与后端技术（如Python、Go或Node.js）。
2.具备构建符合SOC2或类似安全标准的可扩展、高性能网络应用程序的经验。
3.深入理解RESTful和GraphQL API、分布式数据库及云基础设施。
4.熟悉文档解析、自然语言处理流程或从非结构化文本中提取数据的技术。
5.具备独立工作能力，能够全程负责从设计到部署的功能开发。
6.适应快节奏、高度协作的环境，能够应对紧张的时间安排和动态变化的优先事项。
我们提供：
1.与创始人紧密合作，将复杂的监管要求转化为直接影响药物开发进程的产品。
2.在AI、生物科技与法规合规交汇的前沿领域，参与打造创新且领先的平台。
3.团队精炼、协作密切。您将拥有核心产品功能的主导权与自主决策空间。
Brix 于2016年在美国南加州成立，一并推出一款以人工智能和数据科学为基础的HR SaaS系统💻。同时服务于「优质工程师」和「全球科技创新公司」，为双方创造双赢价值。
我们致力于帮助全球雇主搭建并管理它们的跨境远程团队，让合理合法雇佣发生在每一份远程工作中。我们合作的企业级客户遍布北美、亚洲和欧洲30多个国家，已为70多家大、中、小企业搭建符合其业务需求的远程工程师团队。2023年12月止，Brix 平台工程师达10000+。2024年，我们首次尝试的AI 招聘产品，Brix Recruiter 是一款AI HR 招聘工具，具有一键生成JD，筛选简历，高亮候选人亮点，分析人岗匹配度，智能生成岗位面试题，自动曝光岗位至全球多个求职社区等功能。目前免费开放试用中：https://recruiter.joinbrix.com/。

description_english:
Position Overview:
You will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining web-based systems, covering authentication, workflows, AI integration, and marketplace features. You will work closely with the founders and senior life science experts to provide scalable solutions, ensuring a seamless user experience from registration to daily use. This is an opportunity to work at the forefront of biotechnology and AI infrastructure, participating in the design of tools that can challenge the status quo and redefine operations in this traditional industry.
This is a remote position with opportunities for in-person collaboration in San Francisco, California.
Responsibilities:
1. Design and develop a full-stack web application with multi-tenancy, role-based access control, and tenant data isolation.
2. Collaborate with life science experts to translate complex regulatory strategy logic into intuitive user interfaces and scalable backend systems.
3. Build data visualization tools (such as Gantt charts, dashboards) to clearly display drug development timelines and regulatory pathways.
4. Develop backend systems for processing both structured and unstructured data, including documents, interview transcripts, and regulatory-related materials.
5. Build data processing pipelines to parse PDFs, Word documents, and text inputs, transforming them into structured data for use in workflows and AI-assisted recommendations.
Requirements:
1. Extensive full-stack development experience, proficient in modern frontend frameworks (such as React, Vue, or Angular) and backend technologies (such as Python, Go, or Node.js).
2. Experience in building scalable, high-performance web applications that comply with SOC2 or similar security standards.
3. In-depth understanding of RESTful and GraphQL APIs, distributed databases, and cloud infrastructure.
4. Familiarity with document parsing, natural language processing pipelines, or techniques for extracting data from unstructured text.
5. Ability to work independently and take full ownership of feature development from design to deployment.
6. Adaptable to a fast-paced, highly collaborative environment, able to handle tight schedules and dynamically changing priorities.
What we offer:
1. Work closely with the founders to transform complex regulatory requirements into a product that directly impacts the drug development process.
2. Participate in building an innovative and leading-edge platform at the intersection of AI, biotechnology, and regulatory compliance.
3. A lean, highly collaborative team. You will have ownership and autonomy over core product features.
Brix was founded in Southern California, USA in 2016, and launched an HR SaaS system based on artificial intelligence and data science 💻. Serving both "high-quality engineers" and "global tech innovation companies," we create win-win value for both parties.
We are dedicated to helping global employers build and manage their cross-border remote teams, ensuring that legal and compliant employment occurs in every remote job. Our enterprise clients are located in over 30 countries across North America, Asia, and Europe, and we have built remote engineering teams tailored to the business needs of more than 70 large, medium, and small enterprises. As of December 2023, the Brix platform has over 10,000 engineers. In 2024, we launched our first AI recruitment product, Brix Recruiter, an AI HR recruiting tool with features like one-click JD generation, resume screening, highlighting candidate strengths, analyzing person-job fit, intelligently generating interview questions for positions, and automatically promoting jobs to multiple global job communities. It is currently available for a free trial: https://recruiter.joinbrix.com/.

title: 渠道运营总监（remote）
team: 逐越科技（海南）有限公司
summary: 运营管理,用户运营
summary_chinese: 合约产品渠道增长,区块链行业,KOL合作与社区增长,付费推广与流量采购,数据驱动决策,英语流利
summary_english: Futures Product Channel Growth,Blockchain Industry,KOL Cooperation & Community Growth,Paid Promotion & Traffic Acquisition,Data-Driven Decision Making,Fluent in English
description:
核心职责  
1. 合约渠道战略规划  
    制定全球渠道运营策略，涵盖KOL合作、机构BD、社区增长等方向，目标提升用户注册量及交易转化率。渠道分级管理（如核心KOL、长尾渠道）及激励政策。  
 
2. 活动策划与执行  
    主导合约侧线上/线下活动（空投、AMA），协调中台团队完成资源整合与落地。监控活动数据（参与率、交易量增长），迭代优化策略，定期输出复盘报告。  
 
3. 付费运营与流量采购  
    管理合约侧付费推广预算（如Google Ads、KOL投放），优化CPL（单用户获取成本）及LTV（用户生命周期价值）。 探索创新合作模式（如联合品牌活动、分润机制），降低获客成本。  
 
4. 用户运营与教育  
    搭建合约用户成长体系（如新手任务、阶梯奖励），提升留存率。联合市场部制作合约交易教育内容（视频/文章），降低用户入门门槛。  
 
5. 跨部门协同  
    联动产品团队优化功能（如杠杆倍数、费率模型），推动技术需求落地。协同合规团队确保活动及渠道合作符合监管要求（如KYC/AML）。  
 
任职要求  
5年以上运营经验，其中3年以上合约侧渠道管理或增长运营经验，有成功案例。  
精通数据分析工具（Google Analytics、Dune），能通过数据驱动决策。（加分项）  
熟悉产品机制及市场动态（如资金费率、持仓量）。  
英语流利（CET6+），可处理海外渠道谈判。  
资源：具备合约KOL、做市商、媒体等行业资源者优先。

精通数据分析工具（Google Analytics、Dune），能通过数据驱动决策。（加分项）
熟悉产品机制及市场动态（如资金费率、持仓量）。
英语流利（CET6+），可处理海外渠道谈判。
资源：具备合约KOL、做市商、媒体等行业资源者优先。
description_english:
Core Responsibilities
1. Futures Channel Strategic Planning
    Formulate global channel operation strategies, covering areas such as KOL cooperation, institutional BD, and community growth, with the goal of increasing user registrations and transaction conversion rates. Manage channel tiers (e.g., core KOLs, long-tail channels) and incentive policies.

2. Event Planning and Execution
    Lead online/offline events for futures trading (e.g., airdrops, AMAs), coordinating with central platform teams for resource integration and implementation. Monitor event data (participation rate, trading volume growth), iterate and optimize strategies, and regularly produce review reports.

3. Paid Operations and Traffic Acquisition
    Manage the paid promotion budget for futures trading (e.g., Google Ads, KOL campaigns), optimizing CPL (Cost Per Lead) and LTV (Lifetime Value). Explore innovative cooperation models (e.g., co-branded events, profit-sharing mechanisms) to reduce customer acquisition costs.

4. User Operations and Education
    Build a growth system for futures users (e.g., new user tasks, tiered rewards) to improve retention rates. Collaborate with the marketing department to create educational content on futures trading (videos/articles) to lower the entry barrier for users.

5. Cross-departmental Collaboration
    Work with the product team to optimize features (e.g., leverage ratios, fee models) and push for the implementation of technical requirements. Coordinate with the compliance team to ensure events and channel partnerships comply with regulatory requirements (e.g., KYC/AML).

Job Requirements
5+ years of operations experience, with at least 3 years in futures channel management or growth operations, with a portfolio of successful cases.
Proficient in data analysis tools (Google Analytics, Dune) and able to make data-driven decisions. (Bonus point)
Familiar with product mechanisms and market dynamics (e.g., funding rates, open interest).
Fluent in English (CET6+), capable of handling negotiations with overseas channels.
Resources: Candidates with industry resources such as futures KOLs, market makers, and media are preferred.

title: Remote-资深测试工程师（业务交付）
team: 西安启工数据科技有限公司
summary_chinese: 后台业务测试,Web3,接口自动化测试,分布式架构测试,Python/Java/Go,Linux/MySQL/Redis
summary_english: Backend Business Testing,Web3,API Automation Testing,Distributed Architecture Testing,Python/Java/Go,Linux/MySQL/Redis
description:
岗位职责：
1.深入理解后台核心业务（如订单、支付、资产、财务等），设计并执行测试方案，确保关键流程与异常场景覆盖完整
2.针对业务流程中可能的边界情况和依赖点，进行系统性测试设计，保障交付质量
3.参与缺陷分析与质量问题闭环，配合开发和产品进行问题定位和解决
4.使用并优化常见测试工具（如接口自动化、数据构造、流量回放等），提升测试效率和覆盖率
5.支持测试用例管理、脚本维护及 CI 流程对接，推动自动化在项目中的持续落地
6.协助优化测试流程，如环境管理、数据构造、灰度验证等问题的持续改进
7.结合线上故障或业务漏洞，沉淀测试方法论，提升团队整体质量意识
任职要求：
1.2-8年系统测试或功能测试经验，了解后台系统的基本架构与工作方式
2.熟练使用 JMeter、Postman、Pytest 等主流测试工具，掌握接口测试方法
3.熟悉测试流程与测试文档规范，具备一定自动化测试经验（脚本或平台使用均可）
4.了解常见分布式架构（如微服务、MQ、缓存）及其测试要点
5.会基础编程（Python / Java / Go 任一），能维护或编写简单脚本更佳
6.熟悉 Linux 基本命令，了解 MySQL / Redis / 日志排查工具者加分 
7.沟通协作能力强，能推动业务测试闭环并跨团队协同；责任心强，能在项目中承担测试执行、质量把关等核心职责
我們成立於2018年，旗下產品是知名Web3資訊平臺之壹。核心成員來自摩根、高盛等頂尖金融機構以及騰訊、字節和阿里巴巴等壹線互聯網企業。
我們的業務覆蓋全球100多個國家和地區，支持超過10種語言，在美國、加拿大、歐盟、澳大利亞、新加坡、香港和臺灣均設有分支機構，在移動端和Web端均有提供服務。
description_chinese:
岗位职责：
1.深入理解后台核心业务（如订单、支付、资产、财务等），设计并执行测试方案，确保关键流程与异常场景覆盖完整
2.针对业务流程中可能的边界情况和依赖点，进行系统性测试设计，保障交付质量
3.参与缺陷分析与质量问题闭环，配合开发和产品进行问题定位和解决
4.使用并优化常见测试工具（如接口自动化、数据构造、流量回放等），提升测试效率和覆盖率
5.支持测试用例管理、脚本维护及 CI 流程对接，推动自动化在项目中的持续落地
6.协助优化测试流程，如环境管理、数据构造、灰度验证等问题的持续改进
7.结合线上故障或业务漏洞，沉淀测试方法论，提升团队整体质量意识
任职要求：
1.2-8年系统测试或功能测试经验，了解后台系统的基本架构与工作方式
2.熟练使用 JMeter、Postman、Pytest 等主流测试工具，掌握接口测试方法
3.熟悉测试流程与测试文档规范，具备一定自动化测试经验（脚本或平台使用均可）
4.了解常见分布式架构（如微服务、MQ、缓存）及其测试要点
5.会基础编程（Python / Java / Go 任一），能维护或编写简单脚本更佳
6.熟悉 Linux 基本命令，了解 MySQL / Redis / 日志排查工具者加分 
7.沟通协作能力强，能推动业务测试闭环并跨团队协同；责任心强，能在项目中承担测试执行、质量把关等核心职责
我们成立于2018年，旗下产品是知名Web3资讯平台之一。核心成员来自摩根、高盛等顶尖金融机构以及腾讯、字节和阿里巴巴等一线互联网企业。
我们的业务覆盖全球100多个国家和地区，支持超过10种语言，在美国、加拿大、欧盟、澳大利亚、新加坡、香港和台湾均设有分支机构，在移动端和Web端均有提供服务。
description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Deeply understand core backend services (such as orders, payments, assets, finance, etc.), design and execute test plans to ensure complete coverage of key processes and exception scenarios.
2. Design systematic tests for potential edge cases and dependencies in business processes to guarantee delivery quality.
3. Participate in defect analysis and quality issue resolution, collaborating with developers and product managers to locate and solve problems.
4. Use and optimize common testing tools (such as API automation, data generation, traffic replay, etc.) to improve testing efficiency and coverage.
5. Support test case management, script maintenance, and CI process integration, promoting the continuous implementation of automation in projects.
6. Assist in optimizing testing processes, such as continuous improvement of environment management, data generation, and canary release validation.
7. Develop testing methodologies based on online failures or business vulnerabilities to enhance the team's overall quality awareness.
Requirements:
1. 2-8 years of experience in system testing or functional testing, with an understanding of the basic architecture and workings of backend systems.
2. Proficient in mainstream testing tools such as JMeter, Postman, Pytest, and skilled in API testing methods.
3. Familiar with testing processes and documentation standards, with some experience in test automation (either scripting or using platforms).
4. Understanding of common distributed architectures (such as microservices, MQ, caching) and their testing key points.
5. Basic programming skills (Python / Java / Go), with the ability to maintain or write simple scripts being a plus.
6. Familiarity with basic Linux commands; knowledge of MySQL / Redis / log analysis tools is a bonus.
7. Strong communication and collaboration skills, able to drive the closure of business testing loops and coordinate across teams; strong sense of responsibility, capable of undertaking core duties like test execution and quality assurance in projects.
We were founded in 2018, and our product is one of the well-known Web3 information platforms. Our core members come from top financial institutions such as Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs, as well as leading internet companies like Tencent, ByteDance, and Alibaba.
Our business covers more than 100 countries and regions worldwide, supports over 10 languages, and has branches in the United States, Canada, the European Union, Australia, Singapore, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. We provide services on both mobile and web platforms.

title: 高级测试工程师-remote办公
team: 相信光（重庆）网络科技有限公司
summary: 自动化测试经验,测试工作经验,自动化测试,稳定性,性能测试,功能测试,性能,压测,计算机相关专业,金融
summary_chinese: 自动化测试框架搭建,UI自动化,API自动化,Python,Selenium/JMeter,CI/CD,3年以上经验
summary_english: Automation Test Framework Construction,UI Automation,API Automation,Python,Selenium/JMeter,CI/CD,3+ years experience
description:
remote
工作职责： 
1、负责团队自动化测试的测试方案、技术选型、框架搭建，设计并构建可扩展、可复用的自动化测试框架，包括UI自动化、API自动化、性能测试等。
2、设计和优化团队自动化协同方案，保障自动化的低门槛、高可维护和可传承性；
3、基于业务需求，推进协同编写详细、可执行的自动化测试用例，覆盖关键功能、边界条件、异常处理等多个维度。
4、负责团队自动化环境的自动化持续集成、自动化用例的自动执行、自动化测试报告的演进优化
任职资格： 
1、计算机科学或相关专业本科及以上学历，具有3年以上自动化测试工作经验。
2、精通至少一种自动化测试框架（如Selenium、Appium、Postman、JMeter等），有实际项目经验者优先。
3、熟练掌握至少Python编程语言，具备良好的编程能力和问题解决能力。
4、熟悉软件测试理论、方法和流程，了解敏捷开发和DevOps理念。
5、具备良好的沟通能力和团队合作精神，能够与开发人员、产品经理等紧密合作。
6、强烈的责任心和自我驱动力，对新技术保持高度敏感和好奇心。
7、有性能测试、安全测试、持续集成/持续部署（CI/CD）经验者优先。

description_english:
Responsibilities: 
1. Responsible for the team's automated testing solutions, technology selection, and framework construction; design and build scalable and reusable automated testing frameworks, including UI automation, API automation, performance testing, etc.
2. Design and optimize the team's automation collaboration plan to ensure automation is low-barrier, highly maintainable, and transferable.
3. Based on business requirements, promote the collaborative writing of detailed and executable automated test cases, covering multiple dimensions such as key functions, boundary conditions, and exception handling.
4. Responsible for the automated continuous integration of the team's automation environment, automatic execution of automated test cases, and the evolution and optimization of automated test reports.
Qualifications: 
1. Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related fields, with over 3 years of experience in automated testing.
2. Proficient in at least one automated testing framework (e.g., Selenium, Appium, Postman, JMeter), with practical project experience preferred.
3. Proficient in at least the Python programming language, with good programming and problem-solving skills.
4. Familiar with software testing theories, methods, and processes; understanding of Agile development and DevOps concepts.
5. Possess good communication skills and a spirit of teamwork, able to cooperate closely with developers, product managers, etc.
6. Strong sense of responsibility and self-drive, with high sensitivity and curiosity for new technologies.
7. Experience in performance testing, security testing, and Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) is a plus.

title: 法币出入金产品（交易所-Remote）
team: 上海区艺科技有限公司
summary: 区块链产品,金融产品
summary_chinese: 交易产品用户增长,区块链行业,用户增长策略,交易产品设计,合约/跟单产品,早期创业公司
summary_english: User Growth for Trading Products,Blockchain Industry,User Growth Strategy,Trading Product Design,Futures/Copy Trading Products,Early-stage Startup
description:
我们正在寻找一位对交易产品有热情、对用户增长有方法的产品经理，加入我们共建下一代多资产交易平台。如果你既懂用户又懂数据，能把创意变成实绩，那就是你了！
你将负责：
1. 产品规划与方向设计
  - 设计面向全球用户的交易产品路线图，把握行业趋势，把握用户核心需求。
  - 聚焦增长视角思考产品策略，用“增长思维”定义功能优先级。
2. 用户增长驱动产品落地
  - 联合设计、研发、运营团队，推动用户增长相关功能上线，如推荐系统、新手任务、邀请返佣、交易挑战等。
  - 关注注册、转化、留存等关键指标，持续调优 onboarding 流程和关键转化路径。
3. 数据驱动的产品优化
  - 搭建关键增长指标监控体系，定期复盘分析并提出迭代策略。
  - 结合用户调研与数据分析，精准定位用户流失和增长瓶颈。
4. 竞品与市场动态分析
  - 跟踪主流交易所的增长玩法与产品趋势，提出更具差异化和增长力的策略。
  - 与市场团队配合，打造能打动用户的增长活动、功能亮点与传播路径。
5. 风险与合规把控
  - 在保障用户体验与增长的同时，确保功能合规上线。
  - 协同合规/法务团队完成上线前审核，尤其在多国市场场景下考虑本地化合规限制。
我们希望你具备：
- 本科及以上学历，专业不限；有金融/互联网/加密背景更佳；
- 5年以上产品经验，至少3年以上带有用户增长目标的产品工作经历；
- 熟悉注册转化、裂变、留存、转介绍、任务系统、等级体系等增长工具箱；
- 熟悉交易类产品，对撮合引擎、资产模块、风控机制有基本理解；
- 有跨团队项目推动经验，沟通清晰，执行力强，能从0到1推动上线；
- 有全局视角但关注细节，喜欢数据，能从用户行为中发现改进机会。
加分项：
- 具备全球市场增长经验，对中文、英文或多语环境下的用户行为差异有洞察；
- 熟悉区块链钱包、期货合约、合约带单（CopyTrading）、永续合约产品设计；
- 有过独立负责项目指标增长的实际战绩（如注册量提升、DAU提升、用户转化率提升等）。
工作方式：可远程，最好线下。（杭州/ 温哥华/ 纽约）
团队风格：扁平、信任、快速试错、开放表达
我们的目标：打造一个能同时服务全球华人+全球用户的下一代交易所。
欢迎你来带动我们的用户数级跳！
公司背景：
公司由香港资本公司种子孵化，和国内高樟资本天使投资，管理团队成员来自麻省理工学院，多伦多大学等top名校，均有海外工作背景，有200人公司的运作经历。
目前公司处于早期状态，需要短期内迅速扩张，需要人才，诚邀有志之士加入，共创未来。

description_english:
We are looking for a Product Manager who is passionate about trading products and knowledgeable in user growth to join us in building the next-generation multi-asset trading platform. If you understand both users and data and can turn creative ideas into tangible results, you are the one we're looking for!
You will be responsible for:
1. Product Planning and Direction Design
   - Design the product roadmap for global users, keeping abreast of industry trends and grasping core user needs.
   - Focus on product strategy from a growth perspective, using a "growth mindset" to define feature priorities.
2. User Growth-Driven Product Implementation
   - Collaborate with design, R&D, and operations teams to launch user growth-related features, such as recommendation systems, new user tasks, invitation rebates, trading challenges, etc.
   - Monitor key metrics like registration, conversion, and retention, and continuously optimize the onboarding process and key conversion funnels.
3. Data-Driven Product Optimization
   - Establish a monitoring system for key growth metrics, conduct regular reviews and analyses, and propose iteration strategies.
   - Combine user research and data analysis to accurately identify points of user churn and growth bottlenecks.
4. Competitor and Market Dynamics Analysis
   - Track the growth tactics and product trends of major exchanges to propose more differentiated and growth-oriented strategies.
   - Coordinate with the marketing team to create growth activities, feature highlights, and communication channels that resonate with users.
5. Risk and Compliance Control
   - Ensure features are launched in compliance with regulations while guaranteeing user experience and growth.
   - Collaborate with compliance/legal teams to complete pre-launch reviews, especially considering localized compliance restrictions in multi-country scenarios.
We hope you have:
- Bachelor's degree or above, major not limited; a background in finance/internet/crypto is a plus.
- 5+ years of product experience, with at least 3 years in a product role with user growth objectives.
- Familiarity with growth toolkits such as registration conversion, viral loops, retention, referrals, task systems, and level systems.
- Familiarity with trading products and a basic understanding of matching engines, asset modules, and risk control mechanisms.
- Experience in driving cross-team projects, with clear communication, strong execution skills, and the ability to launch projects from 0 to 1.
- A holistic perspective with attention to detail, a love for data, and the ability to identify improvement opportunities from user behavior.
Bonus points:
- Experience in global market growth with insights into user behavior differences in Chinese, English, or multilingual environments.
- Familiarity with the product design of blockchain wallets, futures contracts, CopyTrading, and perpetual contracts.
- A proven track record of independently driving project metric growth (e.g., increased registrations, DAU, user conversion rates, etc.).
Work Style: Remote is possible, but offline is preferred. (Hangzhou / Vancouver / New York)
Team Culture: Flat, trust-based, rapid iteration, open communication.
Our Goal: To build a next-generation exchange that serves both global Chinese users and users worldwide.
We welcome you to help us achieve a quantum leap in our user base!
Company Background:
The company was seed-incubated by a Hong Kong capital firm and received angel investment from Gaozhang Capital in China. The management team members are from top universities such as MIT and the University of Toronto, all with overseas work experience and experience operating a 200-person company.
The company is currently in an early stage and needs to expand rapidly in the short term. We are in need of talent and sincerely invite ambitious individuals to join us in creating the future together.

title: Agent后端开发工程师-远程
team: 途谱智能（北京）科技有限公司
summary: TypeScript,Agent,后端开发经验,中大型项目架构设计经验,Node.js
summary_chinese: 智能体后端系统开发,法律科技,TypeScript,Node.js,大语言模型,SaaS
summary_english: Agent Backend System Development,LegalTech,TypeScript,Node.js,Large Language Models,SaaS
description:
岗位职责：
- 负责产品后端系统的整体设计与开发，包括数据结构、数据库搭建和功能实现；
- 将已有的自然语言工作流文档和原型代码⾃动化落地，构建可扩展的后端任务流程；
- 在⼯作流中集成和调⽤大语言模型 API，设计和实现“智能体（Agent）式”的⾃动处理逻辑；
- 负责任务调度、异步处理、进度追踪、历史记录等后台逻辑开发，确保任务执行的可追踪性和稳定性；
- 实现 Playbook 存储、合同参考库、用户权限管理等核心后端模块；
- 与前端工程师协作，支持合同审阅产品的持续迭代和功能优化。
任职要求：
- 熟练使用 TypeScript + Node.js 进行后端开发，具备系统设计和数据建模经验；
- 对大语言模型（LLM）的调用和集成有一定了解，能够设计工作流逻辑和处理模型输入输出；
- 熟悉异步任务处理、API 设计、数据库（SQL/NoSQL）设计及权限系统；
- 有自动化流程、Agent 应用或智能产品项目经验者优先；
- 具备良好的工程协作能力和自驱力，有远程协作经验优先。
加分项：
- 有将自然语言描述的流程转化为自动化系统的经验；
- 对 AI Agent、LangChain 等智能体框架有理解或使用经验；
- 有合同审阅、法律科技（LegalTech）、SaaS 工具开发经验者优先。
工作形式：Remote远程工作
description_chinese:
岗位职责：
- 负责产品后端系统的整体设计与开发，包括数据结构、数据库搭建和功能实现；
- 将已有的自然语言工作流文档和原型代码⾃动化落地，构建可扩展的后端任务流程；
- 在⼯作流中集成和调⽤大语言模型 API，设计和实现“智能体（Agent）式”的⾃动处理逻辑；
- 负责任务调度、异步处理、进度追踪、历史记录等后台逻辑开发，确保任务执行的可追踪性和稳定性；
- 实现 Playbook 存储、合同参考库、用户权限管理等核心后端模块；
- 与前端工程师协作，支持合同审阅产品的持续迭代和功能优化。
任职要求：
- 熟练使用 TypeScript + Node.js 进行后端开发，具备系统设计和数据建模经验；
- 对大语言模型（LLM）的调用和集成有一定了解，能够设计工作流逻辑和处理模型输入输出；
- 熟悉异步任务处理、API 设计、数据库（SQL/NoSQL）设计及权限系统；
- 有自动化流程、Agent 应用或智能产品项目经验者优先；
- 具备良好的工程协作能力和自驱力，有远程协作经验优先。
加分项：

- 有合同审阅、法律科技（LegalTech）、SaaS 工具开发经验者优先。

title: 日结 远程办公 不限 兼职
team: 漯河市佳晟传媒有限公司
summary: 全职兼职均可,远程办公,其他平台,不限
summary_chinese: 语音不露脸直播,直播娱乐,新手友好,薪资日结,时间灵活,全职/兼职
summary_english: Voice-only Streaming,Live Entertainment,Beginner-friendly,Daily Payout,Flexible Hours,Full-time/Part-time
description:
招募语音不露脸主播(不开视频，不露脸，居家，线上，在家办公，无需面试，薪资日结/周结，新手小白都可以做)
1.兼职或全职都可以，兼职每天工作2或4小时，全职每天工作6或8小时
2.正规平台 正规合法本公司资质齐全
3.操作简单方便无需设备手机即可不需要学历和经验
4.在家线上操作手把手教学
5.年龄要求在18-30岁之间
兼职每天3或4小时，时间自己定，主播平均收入100-300/天，下播可
以自提3或4小时月收入都在6k~
全职每天6或8小时，可分开，100-500/天，下播可
以自提6或8小时月收入都在1.2w~
可以兼职 可以长期可以短期也可以做假期工，公司承诺本工作无任何报名费，培训费，入会费，保证金等，完全免费，公司会提供流量扶持和推广。欢迎大家来尝试，来者不拒!全程没有任何费用!ps;收费的都是骗子
薪资范围：6000-11000元/月
发薪日期：非固定时间
音频为主视频为辅，创立五年，公司稳定月流水千万，多app第一公会
description_chinese:
招募语音不露脸主播(不开视频，不露脸，居家，线上，在家办公，无需面试，薪资日结/周结，新手小白都可以做)

1. 兼职或全职都可以，兼职每天工作2或4小时，全职每天工作6或8小时。
2. 正规平台，正规合法，本公司资质齐全。
3. 操作简单方便，无需设备，手机即可，不需要学历和经验。
4. 在家线上操作，手把手教学。
5. 年龄要求在18-30岁之间。

兼职每天3或4小时，时间自己定，主播平均收入100-300/天，下播可以自提，月收入都在6k~
全职每天6或8小时，可分开，100-500/天，下播可以自提，月收入都在1.2w~

可以兼职、可以长期、可以短期也可以做假期工。公司承诺本工作无任何报名费、培训费、入会费、保证金等，完全免费。公司会提供流量扶持和推广。欢迎大家来尝试，来者不拒！全程没有任何费用！PS：收费的都是骗子。

薪资范围：6000-11000元/月
发薪日期：非固定时间

音频为主视频为辅，创立五年，公司稳定月流水千万，多app第一公会。
description_english:
Recruiting voice-only hosts (no video, no face reveal, work from home, online, no interview required, daily/weekly salary payment, beginners are welcome).

1. Both part-time and full-time positions are available. Part-time: 2 or 4 hours per day. Full-time: 6 or 8 hours per day.
2. Legitimate platform, fully legal and compliant. Our company is fully qualified.
3. Simple and convenient operation. No special equipment needed, a mobile phone is sufficient. No educational background or experience required.
4. Work online from home with hands-on guidance.
5. Age requirement: between 18 and 30 years old.

Part-time: 3 or 4 hours per day, you can set your own schedule. Average host income is 100-300 RMB/day, withdrawable after the session. Monthly income is around 6k+.
Full-time: 6 or 8 hours per day, can be split. Average host income is 100-500 RMB/day, withdrawable after the session. Monthly income is around 12k+.

Part-time, long-term, short-term, and holiday work are all possible. The company promises that this job has no registration fees, training fees, membership fees, security deposits, etc. It is completely free. The company will provide traffic support and promotion. Everyone is welcome to try, we accept all applicants! There are no fees throughout the entire process! PS: Anyone who charges a fee is a scammer.

Salary Range: 6000-11000 RMB/month
Payday: Not fixed

Primarily audio-based, with video as a secondary component. Founded five years ago, the company has a stable monthly revenue in the tens of millions and is the top guild on multiple apps.

title: HRIS专家(远程办公）
team: 上海敬衡数据科技有限公司
summary_chinese: HRIS系统建设优化,技术服务,HR流程设计,数据报表与分析,飞书(Lark)实施,SQL/Power BI/Python,英语工作语言
summary_english: HRIS System Construction and Optimization,Technology Services,HR Process Design,Data Reporting and Analysis,Lark Implementation,SQL/Power BI/Python,English as a working language
description:
**这是远程居家办公岗位**
工作职责:
1、系统建设与优化
  - 协调内外部团队资源，推动HRIS的开发，测试，上线和推广，确保系统稳定运行；
  - 针对目前使用的HRIS（Lark），深入挖掘和分析业务需求，设计并优化 HR 流程（如招聘、考勤、薪资、绩效等），撰写技术方案和系统设计，将设计方案落地为具体的系统功能，持续跟踪结果，持续优化用户体验；
  - 搭建数据报表与分析模型，为 HR 决策提供数据支持（如人力成本分析、人才结构分析等）。
2、数据管理与安全
  - 制定数据标准与规范，保障 HR 数据的准确性、完整性和安全性；
  - 定期审计系统数据，推动数据质量提升，防范数据风险。
3、用户支持与培训
  - 为员工和 HRBP 提供系统操作培训与技术支持，解决系统使用中的问题；
  - 收集用户反馈，持续优化系统功能与用户体验。
4、项目协作与创新
  - 参与集团数字化转型项目，协同 IT、业务部门推动 HR 场景的数字化创新；
  - 跟进 HR 技术趋势，引入新技术（如 AI、自动化工具）提升 HR 服务效能。
任职资格:
  - 本科及以上学历，5年及以上HRIS领域的工作经验，熟悉HR专业知识和相关业务；
  - 具有较强的沟通、协调和团队合作能力，可对项目推进进行有效把控和整合各方资源，达成目标落地；
  - 有较强的逻辑思维能力，能够独立解决问题并提出创新解决方案；
  - 对产品、运营的数据敏感度较高，善于进行数据分析，收集客户反馈、持续优化产品；
  - 具备 SQL、Power BI、Python 等数据处理与分析能力；
  - 据有Python，Shell等基础编程能力者优先；
  - 据有飞书（Lark），Microsoft365等系统实施经验者优先；
  - 英语可以作为工作语言
加分项：
  - 飞书效率先锋实践案例
上海敬衡数据科技有限公司是成立于2019年3月21日的一站式技术服务供应商， 致力于为企业提供全面化、整体化、精准化的技术支持服务。公司拥有一支年轻化、专业化、领先于同行业的精英团队。公司基于各地区合规要求和科学精准的服务， 从多地客户的实际需求出发，迅速起步和发展。目前业务已遍布中国大陆及港澳台地区，服务网络辐射国内多个城市。

title: 风控Java（远程办公）
team: 成都英悦芯瑞网络科技有限责任公司
summary: Java,风控/安全策略经验,计算机相关专业
summary_chinese: 风控系统开发,Java,分布式系统,高并发,Spring,中间件,MQ
summary_english: Risk Control System Development,Java,Distributed Systems,High Concurrency,Spring,Middleware,MQ
description:
岗位职责：
1、负责风控系统技术方案设计、需求把控及核心功能开发，建设高并发、高性能、高可用的系统；
2、参与风控系统架构演进、性能优化和稳定性建设、故障排查和解决等工作；
3、参与知识传播及技术分享，促进团队成员共同进步。
岗位要求：
1、3年及以上互联网研发工作经验，熟悉Java语言，有良好的Java基础，熟悉IO、多线程等基础技术，对多线程使用、并发处理、JVM基本原理有一定认识；
2、编码功底功扎实，熟悉Spring、Mysql、Redis等常用技术，并理解其原理；
3、有扎实的数据库、中间件知识；熟悉常用的数据结构、算法、设计模式；计算机系统与网络基础知识扎实；
4、具有良好的抽象设计能力，思路清晰，能较独立地分析和解决问题；
5、对分布式系统有较深理解，熟悉常用的MQ系统、一致性协议等；
6、具备良好的学习能力，沟通能力，责任心强，具备良好的团队合作精神。
加分项：
1、有大型网站、分布式系统设计与研发经验背景；
2、有风控系统开发经验；
3、有资金核对或对账开发经验。
